column12: IMAGE PROJECTION APPARATUS FOR CHANGING POSITION OF LIGHT SPOT
ship
column13: A ship is provided. The ship comprises: a bridge placed on a deck house of a hull; a bridge wing protruding from a side of the bridge; a heat insulation panel embedded in an outer wall surrounding the bridge wing and heating the interior of the bridge wing; a drive unit for inserting the outer wall of the bridge wing into the outer wall of the bridge; and a control unit controlling the drive unit to move the bridge wing.

column12: APPARATUS METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR MANAGING AND PROCESSING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED HOSPITAL CARE AND PRESCRIPTION INFORMATION
column13: 인공지능 기반 병원 진료 및 처방 정보의 관리 및 처리 방법, 장치 및 시스템이 개시된다. 본 발명의 실시예에 따른 인공지능 기반 병원 진료 및 처방 정보의 관리 및 처리 방법은, 가입 보험 약관 정보를 수신하고, 다수의 병원 진료 및 처방 정보를 수신하며, 미리 설정된 기간 동안의 다수의 병원 진료 및 처방 정보를 포함하는 보험 보상 청구 정보를 보험사 서버로 전송하고, 보험사 서버로부터 보험 보상 처리 내역을 수신하며, 가입 보험 약관 정보 및 영수 정보와 보험 보상 처리 내역을 비교하여 가입 보험 약관 정보에 따라 보상금이 정상 지급되었는지 여부를 판단하고, 판단 결과 보상금이 정상 지급되지 않은 것으로 판단된 제1 병원 진료 및 처방 정보를 포함하는 보험 보상 수정 요청을 형성하며, 보험 보상 수정 요청을 보험사 서버로 전송하고, 보험사 서버로부터 보험 보상 수정 내역을 수신하며, 보험 보상 처리 내역 및 보험 보상 수정 내역을 매핑하여 저장한다.

column12: HEAD DRUM DRIVE MOTOR OF MAGNETIC RECORD PLAYER
column13: PURPOSE: A head drum drive motor is provided to simplify fabrication and assembling of a head drum drive motor using stator holder formed by plastics. CONSTITUTION: A head drum drive motor includes; a rotatable rotor by combining with a head drum which can contact with a magnetic record tape by rotating around supporting axis; a stator which is located concentrically toward the rotor; a substrate assembly which generates electromagnetic force for rotation of the rotor by combining with the stator in one body; an injection-formed stator holder with a supporting axis hole for housing the supporting axis along the axis center. The stator holder fixes the stator and substrate assembly to the supporting axis by locating between the stator and the substrate assembly and combining with the supporting axis.

column12: UNIFING OF THE WATER STORAGE VESSEL FOR HOT CHILLED DRINKING WATER
column13: PURPOSE: An apparatus for purifying hot and chilled drinking water is provided in which neither has any danger of deterioration of water due to proliferation of bacteria nor requires cleaning semi-permanently in storing the purified water and supplying the hot and chilled drinking water to users. CONSTITUTION: The apparatus for purifying hot and chilled drinking water comprises an integrated water purification and storage vessel(200) at the upper part of which a hot water storage vessel(202) is formed, at the middle part of which a preheated water storage vessel(207) is formed, and at the lower part of which a chilled water storage vessel(210) is formed, wherein heat blocking insulation plates(206,209) forming air layer are installed at the interfacial surfaces of each of the storage vessels(202,207,210) so as to divide storage spaces of storage water having different temperatures; a heater(504) installed in the hot water storage vessel(202); a condensing coil(302) of a refrigerant circuit(300) installed in the preheated water storage vessel(207); an evaporation coil(305) of the refrigerant circuit(300) installed in the chilled water storage vessel(210); and a float(203), a connection rod(204), a movable hot water heat blocking plate(205) and a movable preheated water heat blocking plate(208) which are installed between the central part of the hot water storage vessel(202) and the central part of the preheated water storage vessel(207) in the water purification and storage vessel(200) so as to prevent loss of heat generated as the upper high heat is being conduction transferred to the lower part when the storage water is moved by discharging and incoming of the purified stored water.

column12: LAMINATING APPARATUS
column13: A laminate device comprises: a chamber unit including a first chamber part and a second chamber part wherein a target object is arranged in the first chamber part, the second chamber part arranged to face the first chamber part and an attachment member facing the target object arranged in the second chamber part; an expansion member arranged in the second chamber part and configured to expand due to an external force to transfer the attachment member, separated from the target object, to a surface of the target object; and an expansion unit configured to expand the expansion member.

column12: UNFOLDING APPARATUS FOR FOLDING FIN
column13: The present invention provides an unfolding apparatus for a foldable fin comprising: an elastic connector; and a damper and a fixing pin which are to be connected to the elastic connector, providing unfolding force by having a fixing groove installed in an upper fin of the foldable fin and a fixing protrusion installed in a bottom fin of the foldable fin, and performing a function preventing abrasion and damage to the foldable fin.

column12: FIXTURE HYDROPHILICITY WORK DEVICE
column13: A fixture hydrophilicity processing apparatus according to the present invention comprises a chamber, a plasma gas generation unit, a driving unit, and a vacuum pump. In particular, the driving unit comprises a lifting device and a rotary device, and the lifting device comprises a tube, an inlet hose, a solenoid valve, a control unit, and an exhaust hose. Accordingly, the fixture hydrophilicity processing apparatus is simpler in structure than the background art and is capable of rotation and lifting operations, and thus can reduce manufacturing costs compared to the background art.

column12: Full cover baseball helmet
column13: An effect of the present invention is to improve the psychological stability and concentration of a player in a baseball game by protecting the entire face and head. The present invention can be safely used in unexpected accidents, and is to secure breathability through holes of the helmet.

column12: APPARATUS FOR SUBSTRATE TRANSACTION
column13: The substrate processing apparatus is provided to reduce the installation and to supply quickly chemical solution to the substrate. The substrate processing apparatus(100) comprises the supporting member(110), the container(120), and the nozzle member(160). The supporting member has the spin head(112) in which the substrate(W) is placed. The container spin accommodates the head of the supporting member. The container provides the space in which the process is performed. The nozzle member is installed at the container. The nozzle member sprays the processing liquid to the substrate placed in the supporting member. The container includes the inserting hole in which the nozzle member is penetrated.

column12: MANUFACTURING METHOD OF BUNCHUNGSAGI BY DUMBEUNG METHOD
column13: The present invention relates to a method for manufacturing grayish-blue powdered celadon by a plopping technique, and more specifically, to a method for manufacturing grayish-blue powdered celadon, which is manufactured by using coarse sandy clay containing an iron powder to perform plopping-coating with kaolin-based clay, performing coating with an oak tree glaze and being sintered. According to the present invention, the grayish-blue powdered celadon of the present invention is formed with coarse sandy clay containing an iron powder, uses the plopping technique, and by coating the glaze using a sequential firing process, an oak tree and a pine tree, has very an excellent esthetic sense such as natural cracks, and a unique shape reminiscent of a transparent and mysterious abyss.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING OF FACIAL SKIN TREATMENT APPARATUS
column13: Disclosed are a method and system for controlling a facial skin treatment device. The method for controlling a facial skin treatment device according to one embodiment of the present invention comprises the steps of: receiving face scan information of a user acquired through a scanning unit; calculating the facial invasive procedure depth of an invasive procedure unit according to the types of procedures using the face scan information; controlling the invasive procedure unit so as to perform an invasive procedure in the face of the user; periodically checking whether the invasive procedure unit has reached the facial invasive procedure depth; and controlling the invasive procedure unit so as to make the same stop performing the invasive procedure when reaching the facial invasive procedure depth thereof.

column12: AI HOSPITAL INTEGRATED LOGISTICS MANAGEMENT SYSTEM USING AI TECHNOLOGY AND HOSPITAL INTEGRATED LOGISTICS MANAGEMENT METHOD USING THE SAME
column13: The present invention relates to an integrated hospital logistics management system and an integrated hospital logistics management method using the same, which can maintain proper safe inventory levels at all times in accordance with an inventory quantity, an inventory state, a release quantity, etc. of an article of a hospital by allowing artificial intelligence to use big data to analyze a trend, a seasonal trend, etc. and predict actual usage through artificial intelligence technology to allow an artificial intelligence system to automatically process a reorder, an exchange product, etc. According to the present invention, the integrated hospital logistics management system comprises: an order processing module linked to a supplier providing an article of a hospital to process an order and reception of an article; a logistics management module to request a purchase or an exchange of an article in the hospital from the order processing module in accordance with the state of the article; and a system control module including a machine learning unit to generate and learn a rule about the operation of the article by using metadata and a control unit to control the logistics management module in accordance with the rule.

column12: SYSTEM, APPARATUS FOR CONTROLLING OVERLOAD BASED ON SUBSCRIBER'S PRIORITY AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: PURPOSE: An overload control system according to priority, an apparatus, and a method thereof are provided to control traffic by removing a call of a subscriber whose priority is low. CONSTITUTION: An HSS(Home Subscriber Server)(340) or an HLR(Home Location Register)(240) provides calling plan information in each subscriber of a terminal apparatus connecting to a communication network. A subscriber control apparatus sets priority according to the calling plan information provided from the HSS or the HLR. The subscriber control apparatus selectively removes a call from the terminal apparatus when an overload is generated in the communication network. The subscriber control apparatus executes a call control procedure for reducing the overload. The subscriber control apparatus is either an MME(Mobility Management Entity)(330) or an SGSN(Serving GPRS Support Node)(230).

column12: SYSTEM FOR CARD PAYMENT IN THE ELECTRONIC COMMERCE AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: The present invention relates to a card payment system for e-commerce and a method thereof. The present invention is capable of effectively solving problems on authentication and security, caused by thoughtlessly installed existing Active-X programs by performing card payment with a complex hybrid authentication method using order information, delivery information, and payment information without Active-X for card payment for a purchased product in e-commerce. The present invention includes a shopping mall server providing an online shopping mall service to allow a member user to buy a pre-registered product.

column12: CIRCULATION FAN AND CIRCULATION PUMP SPEED CONTROL OF AIR CONDITION SYSTEM
column13: PURPOSE: A blowing unit for air conditioning and method of controlling the speed of a circulating pump are provided to keep the temperature of an indoor space constant and reduce noise by minimizing flow velocity of air. CONSTITUTION: A method of controlling the speed of a circulating pump is as follows. The temperatures of heat sources for a heating unit and a cooling unit to ensure high efficiency are previously determined. Ionicity is determined and the temperature is controlled by speed control of a blowing unit and a circulating pump, which are used to supply the heat to a desired space.

column12: SUBSTITUTE PRODUCT OF TABLE SALT USING AMMONIUM CHLORIDE
column13: A salt substitute(ATL80S) is provided to reduce the used amount of sodium chloride while maintaining salty taste. A method for preparing salt substitute(ATL80S) of low natrium salt comprises a step for weighing ammonium chloride, low sweet sugar, strengthening base, tapioca preparation starch, calcium tertiary phosphate and lemon concentrate; a step for heating the weighed materials at 100‹C for 1 hour; a step for vacuum drying the materials at the low temperature for a long time (10 hours); a step for pulverizing the dried powder; and a packaging step.

column12: GAME PROVIDING SYSTEM AND ITS METHOD FOR INTEGRATEDLY MANAGING USER'S INFORMATION AMONG GAME SERVERS
column13: A game providing system capable of managing personal information integrally among a plurality of game servers and a method thereof are provided to protect the personal information and a user ID by making a user generate internal and external IDs from the user ID registered to a game web server, and providing the personal information after inquiring the personal information with the internal ID when the personal information is requested with the external ID. A member register(31) stores personal information to a personal information database(310) by receiving registration request from a user terminal(2) through a homepage. An ID generator(32) generates a private internal ID and an external ID opened to users by applying encryption bit operation to the registered user ID. A user information request receiver(35) receives a user authentication or personal information request including the external ID from a game server(4). A user information provider(36) provides a result by extracting the internal ID matched with the external ID and inquiring the personal information corresponding to the internal ID when the request is received.

column12: Method of Providing Alignment Plan and System of Providing Alignment Plan
column13: According to an orthodontic plan providing method and an orthodontic plan providing system of the present invention, the method comprises: a 3D oral model generating step of scanning an orthodontic object; a preliminary orthodontic model generating step of generating a plurality of preliminary orthodontic models from the 3D oral model obtained from the 3D oral model generating step; and a final orthodontic model generating step of generating a final orthodontic model by selecting and combining parts of the preliminary orthodontic models. The final orthodontic model generated through the combination of the preliminary orthodontic models enables a patient to have an excellent orthodontic experience. In addition, by generating at least one point-by-point orthodontic model corresponding to the period required for orthodontics and the intermediate time point, an orthodontist can provide an orthodontic treatment object suitable for the patient at any point during the orthodontic period.

column12: DATA DISPLAY CONTROLLING APPARATUS
Novel impurity cleaning device for chemical machinery
column13: The utility model discloses a novel impurity cleaning device for chemical machinery. The novel impurity cleaning device comprises a cleaning box, a separating box and a lubricating box, a hinge plate is arranged at the middle end of the bottom surface of the ultrasonic cleaning box, and a sound wave generator and a transducer are arranged on the outer side surface of the ultrasonic cleaning box; openings are formed in the top face of the separation box and located below the ultrasonic cleaning box and located at the two ends of the hinge plate, electric hydraulic rods are arranged on the inner side face of the separation box, and the output ends of the electric hydraulic rods extend out of the openings and are hinged to the bottom face of the hinge plate; a draining plate is arranged in the separation box, and the draining plate inclines downwards from the side away from the lubricating box to the other side; openings are formed in the opposite side faces of the separating box and the lubricating box, and the draining plate extends into the lubricating box through the openings. A warm air blower is arranged in the separation box and is positioned on the draining plate; a circulating cleaning structure is arranged on the side, away from the lubricating box, of the separation box. And a circulating lubricating structure is arranged in the lubricating box. The structure can recycle a cleaning agent and lubricating oil.

column12: Permanent wave tool for volumizing hair part near to scalp
column13: The present invention provides a permanent wave tool for volumizing hair near a scalp part, which enables an operation of winding hair to the tip of hair while forming wave only on a scalp part of the hair. According to the present invention, the permanent wave tool for volumizing the hair near the scalp part is the permanent wave tool used to form the wave on the hair near hair root, which is the scalp part of the hair, wherein the permanent wave tool comprises: a cylindrical rod on which the hair near the hair root is seated; a hair support part provided on the rod and supporting a part of the hair root part on the hair root; and a fixing clip part fixing the other end of the hair root part of the hair root to a part of the outer circumferential surface of the rod so that the other part of the hair root part has a wave shape in a state where a part of the hair root part of the hair root is supported on the hair support part.

column12: Apparatus and Method of transferring Semiconductor Device
column13: 본 발명은 반도체 소자를 전사하는 캐리어 모듈을 포함하는 반도체 소자 전사 장치로서, 캐리어 모듈은, 캐리어 기판, 캐리어 기판 상에 배치된 광열 변환층, 및 광열 변환층 상에 배치되며, 반도체 소자를 부착하는 점착층을 포함하여, 반도체 소자의 전사를 용이하게 하고, 캐리어 기판의 재활용이 용이하다.

column12: Apparatus and method for controlling phase of sampling clock signal in LCD system
column13: An apparatus and a method for accurately controlling the phase of a sampling clock signal in an LCD system, wherein the sampling clock is generated by a phase lock loop and delayed in response to a phase delay quantity generated by a controller. The controller continuously generates a first phase delay quantity until a horizontal line width of a digital image signal is equal to a desired width, stores a first total phase delay quantity corresponding to how many times the first phase delay quantity was generated, continuously generates a second phase delay quantity until the current horizontal line width is greater than the desired width, stores a second total phase delay quantity corresponding to how many times the second phase delay quantity was generated, and controls the phase delay of the sampling clock in response to an optimum phase delay quantity which is an average of the first and second phase delay quantities.
column16: SAM SUNG ELECTRONICS CO. LTD. A CORPORATION ORGANIZED UNDER THE LAWS OF THE REPUBLIC OF KOREA (2002-05-08)

column12: THE ELEVATOR CONTROL SYSTEM WHICH USES HOUSE INFORMATION
column13: An elevator control system using house information is provided to reduce additional behaviors or waiting time of residents by automatically calling an elevator using a recognition unit to recognize bio information of the residents. An elevator control system using house information includes a card key(100), a recognition unit(150), a lobby phone(200), a complex server(400), and an elevator server(500). The card key stores a specific identification number of a resident or a card. The recognition unit transmits bio information to the lobby phone after exchanging information of an iris or a fingerprint of the resident for a digital signal. The lobby phone reads the specific identification number from the card key of the resident. The lobby phone transmits prestored residence information of the resident and address information of the lobby phone to the complex server. The complex server stores information of the resident, the card key, and the lobby phone. The elevator server moves an elevator to a floor where the lobby phone is placed.

column12: STAMP SCANNER
column13: PURPOSE: A contactless stamp scanner is provided to improve reliability of a stamp image by fixing a stamp by a stopper at a constant distance. CONSTITUTION: A stamp fixing unit (120) fixes a stamp. A stopper (130) is installed at the entry side of the stamp fixing unit to determine the position of the stamp. The stopper is placed between camera modules (140). The camera modules are separated from the stamp fixing unit at the constant distance to film a stamp image. The stamp fixing unit is installed in a case with an opening, and comprises a stamp tongs which is opened and closed so that the stamp comes in and out.

column12: DISPLAY DEVICE AND FABRICATING METHOD THEREOF
column13: PURPOSE: A display device and a manufacturing method thereof are provided, which makes a display device manufactured in any size or shape that a consumer wants. CONSTITUTION: A display device manufacturing method comprises: a step(S1) of providing a display panel that the upper plate and lower plate are attached by the first sealant; a step(S2) of processing a display panel in a size different from the standard size by cutting the display panel of standard size; and a step(S3) of spreading the second sealant on cut plane of the upper plate and lower plate of the display panel formed by cutting and solidifying the second sealant.

column12: Agents for improving dye fastness
column13: An agent that is capable of improving dye fastness is provided. The agent includes a compound that includes at least one functional group capable of forming at least one interaction or at least one bond with a fiber or a dye molecule. Also, a method for using the agents to improve dye fastness and a dyed article including the agent are provided.

column12: ION GENERATING APPARATUS OF ION IMPLANTATION
column13: An ion generating apparatus of an ion injection process is provided to increase a source life time by making a heating temperature of an ion source during a waiting time low. An ion generating apparatus(100) includes an arc chamber(110), a filament, a cathode, and a repeller. A gas supply part and an outlet are formed in the arc chamber. A heating temperature of the ion source is maintained as 200~300°C during a waiting time of the ion generating apparatus. Corrosion is prevented by preventing an oxidation inside the arc chamber. An injection nozzle(200) is installed inside the arc chamber. An inner part of the arc chamber is cleaned by spraying an inert gas through the spray nozzle.

column12: LIGHT EMITTING DIODE
column13: The present invention provides a light emitting diode which includes: a first electrode; a second electrode which faces the first electrode and includes a first metal layer, a first insulation layer, a second metal layer and a second insulation layer that are sequentially stacked; and an organic light emitting layer located between the first electrode and the second electrode. The second insulation layer has a second refractive index greater than a first refractive index of the second metal layer and has a thickness of 323-550 angstroms.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR UPDATING INFORMATION OF LOCATION
column13: The present invention relates to a method and an apparatus for updating location information. The method for updating location information comprises the following steps: transmitting an update location request message for a mobile equipment to a subscriber data management apparatus, wherein a handover of the mobile equipment from a packet switched domain of a first mobile communication network to a circuit switched domain of a second mobile communication network has been completed; receiving an insert subscriber data request message including a subscriber profile of the mobile equipment from the subscriber data management apparatus; transmitting an insert subscriber data response message including short message service (SMS) unsupported identification information for the mobile equipment in response to the insert subscriber data request message to the subscriber data management apparatus; and receiving an update location response message corresponding to the update location request message from the subscriber data management apparatus. Therefore, when location information of a mobile terminating subscriber is requested for an SMS, the subscriber data management apparatus can send back packed switched information and continuously provide the SMS to the mobile equipment, which has completed an SRVCC handover, through a packet switched domain based on the packet switched information.

column12: Light unit
column13: The present invention relates to a structure of a light unit capable of increasing installation convenience of a lamp structure to which a light emitting device such as an LED is applied. More specifically, the light unit comprises: a substrate on which a plurality of light emitting devices are mounted and which has at least one through hole; a lamp housing in which a seating unit, which is seated in a structure in which the substrate is accommodated, is provided; and a fixing protrusion unit provided at a position corresponding to the through hole (220) on a surface of the seating unit and fixed to the through hole in an inserted coupling structure.

column12: conjunto de teclado para estação móvel
column13: A keypad assembly for a mobile station comprises a base pad adapted to support a plurality of keys, the plurality of keys comprising a plurality of first keys and a plurality of second keys. The keypad assembly also comprises the plurality of first keys and the plurality of second keys arranged on the base pad, the plurality of second keys defined by horizontal center lines and vertical center lines of the plurality of first keys. The plurality of second keys may be further defined by outer perimeters of the plurality of first keys. The keypad assembly may further comprise a strength reinforcing plate coupled to the base pad, adapted to mechanically strengthen the keypad assembly. An alphabetic character may be assigned to each of the plurality of first keys. A numeral may be assigned to at least one of the plurality of second keys.

column12: a carry-on motorcycle bag
column13: Provided is a portable motorcycle bag for delivery. Unlike a method of pulling out sideways, a method of pulling out upwards is safe. According to the present invention, food can be prevented from being poured out.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR HANDING OVER CALL FROM PACKET SWITCHED DOMAIN TO CIRCUIT SWITCHED DOMAIN
column13: The present invention relates to a method and an apparatus for a handover of a call from a packet switched domain to a circuit switched domain. The method for the handover of a call comprises the steps of: receiving a session transfer start message for the handover of the call from a packet switched domain to a circuit switched domain; performing a session transfer procedure according to the session transfer start message; verifying whether the handover is completed from the circuit switched domain; and releasing an access leg to the packet switched domain if it is verified that the handover is completed. Accordingly, the session of an IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) is maintained even if a single radio voice call continuity (SRVCC) handover is not normally performed due to a weak electromagnetic field and the like, thereby providing the continuity of a call service seamlessly through a packet network.

column12: ROD GUIDE FOR A SHOCK ABSORBER
column13: PURPOSE: A rod guide of a shock absorber is provided to prevent the piston valve of the end of a piston road from colliding with the rod guide of the upper end of the shock absorber by using the pressure of oil instead of a stopper of rubber or plastic material. CONSTITUTION: A rod guide(20) of a shock absorber comprises a guide portion(23) and a hydraulic generation part(25). The guide portion guides a piston rod(2) to slide in the linear direction. The hydraulic generation part is formed below the guide portion. The hydraulic generation part generates fluid pressure stopping effect with a stopper(10). The inner diameter of the guide portion is smaller than the inner diameter of the hydraulic generation part. The inner circumference surface of the rod guide is formed in a stepped manner.

column12: LED face skin improvement structure for LED mask
column13: The present invention is to provide an LED therapy skin improving structure of an LED mask. The present invention comprises: a front mask (110); a rear mask (120) combined with the front mask (110) to form an air duct in a gap from the front mask (110); a forehead caring LED disposed at the rear mask (120) to be disposed at the position facing the forehead of an LED mask user; a jawline inside LED provided at the rear mask (120); and a facial chin caring LED provided at the rear mask (120).

column12: SEMIAUTOMATIC FOLDER
column13: PURPOSE: If a user applies force to a cover unit, a semiautomatic folder is provided to be automatically opened with the sliding of the cover unit. CONSTITUTION: A cover unit(20) is pivotally combined with a main unit(10). The cover unit performs a relative sliding motion with the main unit as a predetermined length. The cover unit transfers a rotary shaft. A hinge module(30) is installed to one of the main unit and the cover unit on the rotary shaft of the main unit and the cover unit. The hinge module gives rotatory power to the opening direction of the cover unit by the accumulation of force by a sliding motion.

column12: CAMERA MODULE
column13: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a camera module that is configured to enable a quick automatic focus adjustment.SOLUTION: A camera module according to the present invention includes: a first camera unit that is configured to enable an adjustment of a focal distance; a second camera unit that has a fixed focal distance; and an actuator that acquires a resolution value of a picture taken by the second camera unit and drives a lens barrel of the first camera unit so that the focal distance of the first camera unit is adjusted on the basis of the acquired resolution value.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

column12: System for anti-icing of lighting equipment
column13: Provided is a system for anti-icing of a lighting fixture, which is installed on a ship, and uses a battery and a heating coil to heat a floodlight. The system for anti-icing of the lighting fixture includes: a heat collector for collecting thermal energy generated from a lighting body which illuminates light; a power generation unit generating power using the thermal energy collected by the heat collector; a battery module charged by using the power generated by the power generation unit; and a heating unit for heating the lighting body using the power charged in the battery module. The heating unit heats the lighting body by using the power charged in the battery module when the lighting body does not operate.

column12: CHARACTER INPUTTING SYSTEM OF DISPLAY UNIT
column13: A character input system for a display unit according to the present invention includes a display unit which displays a character string including multiple characters; and a character input unit which selects at least one character from the characters based on the motion of a client currently viewing the display unit to input the selected character on the display unit. The character input system enables a convenient and accurate character input process.

column12: TIRE PRESSURE MONITERING SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATICALLY STUDYING LOCATION OF TIRE AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: A TPMS(tire pressure monitoring system) having an automatic position learning function and a method thereof are provided to improve reproducibility of tire position learning by simplifying facilities for connection between a receiver and an LFI(low frequency initiator). A TPMS having an automatic position learning function comprises TPMS transmitters installed inside tires of a vehicle, transmitting a response message including a specific sensor ID and a value of low frequency signal reception sensitivity when a low frequency signal is received, and toggling the value higher or lower in a predetermined state, a low frequency starter provided at a position adjacent to any one of the two tires of rear wheels for transmitting a low frequency signal, and TPMS receivers provided with an LFI and transmitting a low frequency command including respective front and rear position values loaded to the low frequency signal at regular intervals, and determining whether the front wheel or the rear wheel by the front and the rear position values of a response message, and registering the corresponding sensor ID in the tire adjacent to the low frequency starter.

column12: A AIR CONDITIONER FILTER GENERATING OXYGEN FOR VEHICLE
column13: PURPOSE: An oxygen generating air conditioner filter for vehicles is provided to prevent the occurrence of negligent accidents by preventing the sleepiness of a driver. CONSTITUTION: An oxygen generating air conditioner filter for vehicles includes a filter paper(2) and gel oxygen particles(4). The filter paper is composed of multiple layers(3). The multiple layers are arranged in a frame shaped case(1). The gel oxygen particles are attached to the layers of the filter paper. The air conditioner filter further includes gel fragrance particles(5). The gel fragrance particles are attached to the layers of the filter paper.

column12: ANCHOR BOLT
column13: An anchor bolt is provided to reduce cost by fixing the anchor bolt through striking without a striking tube to push a fixing tube. An inclined surface is formed at the front end of an anchor bolt(100). Fixing protrusions are formed on the anchor bolt at regular intervals. A thread part is formed at the rear end of the anchor bolt. A protrusion unit is formed at a front end of the thread part and has a smaller diameter than the thread part so that a fixing bolt(300) is easily inserted when striking the anchor bolt. A fixing tube(200) is inserted into the front end of the anchor bolt and welded to the anchor bolt. A plurality of fixing blades(210) are formed at the front end of the fixing tube by slits(220). Folding grooves(230) are formed on the fixing blades at regular intervals.

column12: Body figure curing slant footwear
column13: The present invention relates to a body figure curing footwear, and more particularly to a body figure curing slant footwear which prevents and cures symptoms such as inwardly curved knee (bow leg) by balancing a body upon walking by slantly forming a part of front portion of footwear sole.

column12: PRIVATE SMS MESSAGE TRANSMITTING AND RECEIVING SYSTEM AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: A system and a method for transmitting and receiving secret short messages are provided to send the first short message to a receiving terminal together with the second short message having a password so that the third person only can recognize the first short message without being aware that the second short message, which the user of the receiving terminal can confirm through the input of the password, has been received to the receiving terminal. A system for transmitting and receiving secret short messages comprises a message server(300), a sending terminal(100), and a receiving terminal(400). The message server(300) provides a secret short message service wireless Internet site. The sending terminal(100) accesses the wireless Internet site of the message server(300) through a communication network, inputs the first short message, the second short message, and a password, and transmits them to the message server(300). The receiving terminal(400) receives the first short message and the second short messages from the message server(300) and confirms the first short message. In order to confirm the second short message, the receiving terminal(400) inputs the password.

column12: HOLDER FOR HANDHELD DEVICE
column13: The present invention relates to a holder for a portable electronic device, which allows the portable electronic device to be erected at a predetermined angle, thereby allowing a user to easily watch a video or the like. The holder for a portable electronic device comprises: a main body part holding the portable electronic device; a rotating part embedded in the main body part to hold the main body to be able to rotate; a support part coupled to the rotating part; and a plurality of leg parts connected to the support part. The holder may easily support the portable electronic device in a place where a bottom is not flat.

column12: METHOD FOR DISCRIMINATING DISK
column13: PURPOSE: A method for discriminating disk is provided to accurately discriminate a disk by correcting a rate of focus search by using a time axis differential component. CONSTITUTION: When a DVD is loaded in a disk driver, a light is radiated on an optical disk for focus search, an objective lens is lowered down and raised toward the DVD(S1). A focus error signal is detected by the optical beam reflected on the DVD(S2). When a first focus error signal is detected, a timer '1' is driven, a second focus error signal timer '1' value is read out and stored in a memory(S3-S5). After a peak level is detected, a timer '2' is driven and a bottom level is detected(S6-S8). A timer '2' value is read out and a time difference(t3) between the peak level and the bottom level is stored in the memory(S9). A slope of the focus error signal is obtained by the peak level, the bottom level and t3(S10). t1 value is corrected according to the slope value and its corrected value t4 is stored in the memory(S11). The kind of optical disk of being currently accessed is discriminated by using the t4 value.

column12: THE CHIP REWORK APPARATUS
column13: The present invention comprises: a beam irradiation unit for irradiating a laser beam to at least one of a chip and a solder disposed on a substrate; a duct frame extending from the beam irradiation unit toward the substrate and surrounding at least one of the chip and the solder; and a suction unit, connected to the duct frame, which is sucking internal air of the duct frame. Only defective chips can be easily and stably removed from the substrate.

column12: RECEIVE SHORT MESSAGE PROCESS METHOD FOR MOBILE COMMUNICATION TERMINAL
ELECTOLYTIC LAYER FORMING OF SOLID ELECTROLITIC CONDENSER
column13: PURPOSE: A method to form electrolytic layer of a solid electrolytic condenser is provided to improve the quality of high-frequency and to realize the low Equivalent Series Resistance value of an electrolytic condenser by reducing the porosity between the electrolytic layers. CONSTITUTION: A method to form the electrolytic layer of a solid electrolytic condenser comprises the steps of: forming conductive high-molecule layer by an electronic polymerization of the monomers as pyrrole, thiophene, furan, aniline, and acetylene on the surface of the film oxide(14) generated on a valve metal(12) as tantalum or aluminum; removing the porosity part(18) of a conductive high-molecule layer(16) by volatilizing the solvent after filling and putting out again the porosity part(18) by melting and impregnating the solvent.

column12: swirl type micro buble generating device
column13: A microbubble generator of the present invention has a structure of a gear pump consisting of a housing, a swivel drum, and a plurality of guide blades. A plurality of pulverization blades are additionally provided between respective guide blades in an outer circumferential surface of the swivel drum. An inner wall surface of the housing has a structure capable of generating a vortex to facilitate generation of fine microbubbles and mixing of water and bubbles.
column14: NAT UNIV CHANGWON IND ACADEMY COOP CORPS

column12: ELASTIC MEMBER AND SLIDING MODULE HAVING THE SAME
column13: Disclosed is an elastic member that has good durability improved by uniformly distributing stress and that materializes a miniaturization of a device by maximizing space usability. The elastic member includes a first coupling portion, a second coupling portion, and a spiral coil. The first coupling portion is coupled to pivot on the first member of the sliding module and the second coupling portion is coupled to pivot on the second member of the sliding module. The second member may be coupled to slide along the first member. The spiral coil is helically wound from the first coupling portion outwardly and connects the first and second coupling portions with each other. The first coupling portion is disposed to be apart from a reference line passing through both a substantial center of the second coupling portion and an approximate center of the spiral coil with a predetermined distance.
column14: MTX HYBRID CO LTD;;CHOI MYUNG HOON

column12: 2 Loose type Dental implant
column13: The present invention relates to an implant having a double-separation type abutment capable of assembling a dental prosthesis without damaging a gingival membrane, wherein the dental prosthesis and the abutment are coupled by the medium of a separate link by moving away from conventional technology which causes various problems in a process that the abutment is repetitively attached and detached to form the gingival membrane on a surgery portion of a patient, such that the abutment is simply attached and detached without being separated from a fixture and integrally provides a scan function and an impression coating function. More specifically, according to the present invention, the implant comprises: the fixture (100) having a thread and inserted into an alveolar bone, from which a tooth is lost, to become a base of implant coupling; the abutment (200) including a coupling part (210) having a thread to be assembled and fixed in the fixture, a taper part (220) formed on the upper surface of the coupling part and having a diameter gradually increased toward an upper side, and a head part (230) formed on the upper surface of the taper part and having a diameter gradually decreased toward a lower side; the link (300) installed on the upper end of the abutment and extended and formed to have an outer circumference gradually decreased toward the upper side to be coupled to a dental prosthesis by wedge fitting; and a screw (400) inserted from the dental prosthesis to penetrate the link and coupled to the inner space of the abutment to fix the dental prosthesis to the abutment.

column12: SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE AND METHOD OF FABRICATING THE SAME
column13: Provided are a semiconductor device and a method of manufacturing the same. The semiconductor device comprises: a substrate; a first impurity region of a first conductivity type formed on the substrate; a second impurity region of a second conductivity type formed on the substrate to be adjacent to the first impurity region; a first semiconductor film of the second conductivity type formed on the first impurity region; a second semiconductor film of the first conductivity type formed on the second impurity region; a first filling insulation film formed on the first semiconductor film; a second filling insulation film formed on the second semiconductor film; a third semiconductor film formed on the first filling insulation film; a fourth semiconductor film formed on the second filling insulation film; a first transistor and a second transistor each formed on the first semiconductor film; a third transistor formed on the second semiconductor film; a first device isolation film for separating the second transistor and the third transistor; and a second device isolation film for separating the first transistor and the second transistor and formed shallower than the first device isolation film.

column12: HEATING AND COOLING SYSTEM FOR VEHICLE
column13: The present invention discloses a heating and cooling system for a vehicle. More particularly, the present invention relates to a heating and cooling system for a vehicle, which is installed in a vehicle to quickly control the temperature of an entire area inside the vehicle in a low or a high temperature environment, such as in winter. According to an embodiment of the present invention, a temperature control mat including a heating means and/or a cooling means having a carbon nano material or a heating wire is installed on the vehicle floor, and is remotely controlled through an application, thereby allowing floor cooling/heating of the vehicle. Therefore, more comfortable driving can be performed by setting the temperature in the vehicle before a user gets in the vehicle during the extreme cold or hot weather.

column12: SKIN MASSAGE DEVICE
column13: PURPOSE: A skin massage device is provided to improve power transmission efficiency and reduce noise by delivering power to user's skin using magnetic materials. CONSTITUTION: A skin massage device comprises: a rotating unit(10) which is equipped inside the body and is axle-rotates; a first magnetic material(20) which is distant from the rotary shaft of the rotating unit and revolves while forming a first circular path; a second magnetic material(30) which moves to the top and bottom by the magnetic force of the first magnetic material; and a mobile unit which moves to the top and bottom along the movement of the second magnetic material.
column14: MTX HYBRID CO LTD;;SAMHWAP & T CO LTD

column12: Wall elements an air insulation pocket layer
column13: The present invention relates to a wall including an air insulation layer. The wall includes: a wall body including a base plate member having multiple guide protrusions formed on the front surface in upward and downward longitudinal directions to be spaced apart from each other, first pillar members which are individually provided on the front surfaces of both edges of the base plate member, and a second pillar members which have coupling grooves formed on the rear surface to be inserted into the guide protrusions; a first aqueous soft foam unit which is arranged between the first and second pillar members and is provided on the front surface of the base plate member; an air insulation layer which is arranged between the first and second pillar members and is provided on the front surface of the first aqueous soft foam unit; a second aqueous soft foam unit which is arranged between the first and second pillar members and is provided on the front surface of the air insulation layer; a plywood plate which is provided on the front surface of the first pillar member on both sides; a moisture-proof paper unit attached to the front surface of the plywood plate; and multiple finishing members arranged on the front surface of the moisture-proof paper unit. The air insulation layer having an air pocket sheet structure is arranged between the aqueous soft foam units to improve the heat insulation effects as well as stably fixing the lightweight and soft air insulation layer.

column12: hand brush for floorcloth cleaning
column13: 본 발명은 걸레부착시트의 하단에 긁기 부재가 설치되어, 걸레부착시트의 탄성을 이용하여 긁기 부재의 긁기 사용을 극대화시킨 청소 도구에 관한 것이다.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PURCHASE AND DISTRIBUTION MANAGING OF HOSPITAL ARTICLES
column13: There are provided a purchase and distribution management system and method for purchasing articles used in a hospital by proxy and managing the distribution of the articles, the purchase and distribution management system including: an interface part connecting an exclusive management device of the hospital, the device computerizing the articles in the hospital, to the purchase and distribution management system to be compatible with each other in such a way that a user is able to use the purchase and distribution management system by using only the exclusive management device without downloading a new program; a purchase application reception part receiving a purchase application for hospital articles from the user; a contract check part retrieving whether there exists a contract between the user and a provider for the articles; a contract generation part generating the contract between the user and the provider when there is no contract for the hospital articles for which purchase application is received as a result of the retrieving of the contract check part; a purchase order management part generating and sending a purchase order for the articles to the provider when there is the contract for the articles for which purchase application is received as the result of the retrieving of the contract check part or the contract is generated by the contract generation part; a distribution management part checking an amount of each article in stock in the hospital, generating a purchase application according to a result of the checking, and managing a delivery process of the article in the hospital; and a consignment stock management part allowing a certain amount of warehoused articles for consignment stock to be consigned to the provider to be stored and changing an amount of interim warehoused articles consigned to the provider according to a use of the user.

column13: An agent that is capable of improving dye fastness is provided. The agent includes a compound that includes at least one functional group capable of forming at least one interaction or at least one bond with a fiber or a dye molecule. Also, a method for using the agents to improve dye fastness and a dyed article including the agent are provided.

column12: IMAGE FORMING APPARATUS TO CHECK A PRINTING MEDIA
column13: An image forming apparatus for confirming the remaining quantity of printing paper is provided to externally check the correct quantity of paper loaded in a paper supply cassette without separating the paper supply cassette from the image forming apparatus. An image forming apparatus includes a main body and a paper supply cassette(10) combined with the main body to supply paper into the main body. The paper supply cassette includes a first hole(110) through which the quantity of paper loaded in the paper supply cassette is observed, and a casing(100) having a measurement part(113) located at one side of the first hole to measure the quantity of paper. The paper supply cassette further includes a cover(200) combined with the casing to shield the casing. The cover includes a second hole(210) corresponding to the first hole.

column12: SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE AND FABRICATING METHOD OF THE SAME
column13: A semiconductor device and a fabricating method of the same are provided. The semiconductor device a substrate including an active region defined by an element isolation film, an impurity region having a first conductivity type in the active region, a first semiconductor film of a second conductivity type on the impurity region, a buried insulating film on the first semiconductor film, a second semiconductor film on the buried insulating film, and a well contact connected to the first semiconductor film. The level of a lowermost surface of the first semiconductor film is higher than a level of a lowermost surface of the element isolation film.

column12: Keypad assembly for mobile station
column13: A keypad assembly for a mobile station comprises a base pad adapted to support a plurality of keys, the plurality of keys comprising a plurality of first keys and a plurality of second keys. The keypad assembly also comprises the plurality of first keys and the plurality of second keys arranged on the base pad, the plurality of second keys defined by horizontal center lines and vertical center lines of the plurality of first keys. The plurality of second keys may be further defined by outer perimeters of the plurality of first keys. The keypad assembly may further comprise a strength reinforcing plate coupled to the base pad, adapted to mechanically strengthen the keypad assembly. An alphabetic character may be assigned to each of the plurality of first keys. A numeral may be assigned to at least one of the plurality of second keys.

column12: POUCH TYPE LI SECONDARY BATTERY AND METHOD OF FABRICATING THE SAME
INTELLECTUAL IMAGE-INTEGRATED SYSTEM CAPABLE OF TRACKING IMAGE BASED ON TIME-SERIES CHANGE OF MEASURING INFORMATION
column13: According to the present invention, an intellectual image-integrated system capable of tracking an image based on a time-series change in measurement information comprises: a first receiving unit for receiving first water level information from a measuring sensor for sensing a water level; a basic information storage unit for storing first location information where a camera device is installed and second location information where a water level indicator is installed; a data processing unit for generating characteristic information including photographing angle information of the camera device, and generating the characteristic information by using the mutual relationship between the first location information, the second location information, and the first water level information; a setting control unit for variably setting the photographing environment of the camera device according to the characteristic information; a second receiving unit for receiving image data on a water surface area, including the water level indicator, from the camera device; and a main control unit for generating field state information including at least one of the first water level information or the image data. Therefore, the intellectual image-integrated system can optimize a tracking image that can actively reflect a field situation.

column12: APPARATUS FOR MOVING A FREIGHT ON GANG WAY FOR BUS
MEMORY SYSTEM INCLUDING HOST AND A PLURALITY OF STORAGE DEVICE AND DATA MIGRATION METHOD THEREOF
column13: A data migration method of a memory system including first and second storage devices comprises: a step of performing a read operation of original data stored in the first storage device in response to a data migration request; a step of obtaining parameters of files included in the original data with reference to metadata of the original data; and a step of re-arranging the files included in the original data based on at least one of the parameters; and a step of storing the files included in the original data in the second storage device based on the re-arrangement.

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR AUTO-SELECTION OF CAPTURE TIMING IN DIGITAL STILL CAMERA
column13: 본 발명은 디에스시(Digital Still Camera)에서 후레쉬 발광시 화상신호의 캡처 타이밍(Capture Timing)을 자동으로 최적의 시간에 선정토록 한 디에스시(DSC)에서의 후레쉬 발광시 캡처 타이밍 자동 선정장치 및 방법에 관한 것이다. 이러한, 본 발명은 렌즈를 통해 광전변환된 영상 신호중 휘도신호를 검출하여 소정치로 적분하고 디지탈값으로 변환하여 출력하는 휘도 신호 검출부와, 셔터 키의 조작후 입력되는 수직동기신호(V-sync)의 검출로부터 소정의 시간 만큼 지연후 후레쉬 충/방전 제어신호를 출력하고, 이때 상기 휘도신호 검출부로부터 얻어지는 휘도 적분치를 읽고 그 값이 최대치로부터 임의의 값만큼 작아질 경우 캡처 스타트 신호를 발생하는 마이콤과, 마이콤에서 출력된 후레쉬 충/방전 제어신호에 따라 후레쉬 라이트를 방전시키는 후레쉬 충/방전 회로부와, 마이콤에서 출력된 캡처 스타트 신호에 따라 입력되는 다음 수직동기신호(V-sync) 기간에 메모리부에 라이트해 주는 메모리 제어부로 구성된다.

column12: A processing tool system
column13: The present invention relates to a cutting tool apparatus for reusable workpiece machining having automatic discharge means. Especially during manufacturing of a cylindrical structure based on hollowing of a cylindrical workpiece, the inside of the cylindrical workpiece is hollowed in a cylindrical shape, and thus a cylinder allowing material reuse is extracted for a higher level of usability. The cutting tool apparatus for machining is provided with the automatic discharge means, and thus a forward movement of the machining apparatus is stopped and the machining apparatus is forced to withdraw automatically in the event of a post-machining load having a predetermined or more pressure. As a result, workpiece machining can be smoothly performed. The present invention includes a cylindrical or polygonal column-shaped workpiece having a circular or polygonal vertical cross section; rotation and fixing means simultaneously rotating, holding and supporting one side of the workpiece; machining means for machining the inside into a cylindrical shape and coming into contact with the other side of the workpiece at the same time; cutting oil supply means supplying cutting oil through the body of the machining means; and the automatic discharge means installed on the central shaft of the machining means so that the machining means is easily separated from the workpiece.

column12: VEHICLE AND METHOD OF CONTROLLING THE SAME
column13: Disclosed is a method of controlling a vehicle. The method includes: obtaining information on a first lane of a currently driving road from a foreground image of the vehicle, obtaining information on a second lane of the currently driving road from map data of a navigation, and updating the information on the second lane of the map data by sharing the information on the first lane obtained from the foreground image of the vehicle with the navigation.

column12: Highly breathable polyurethane foam for car seat covers and pads
column13: The present invention relates to a highly breathable polyurethane foam for car seat covers, and in the present invention, disclosed is a highly breathable polyurethane foam for car seat covers and pads, which is obtained by a catalytically reacting a mixture containing 20 to 60 parts by weight of an isocyanate-based compound based on 100 parts by weight of a polyol composition containing any one of recycled polyol, bio polyol, or mixtures thereof.

column12: Tweezers for attaching false eyelashes
SLAVE PORTABLE DEVICE
column13: A sub portable device for conveniently connecting a USB jack module to the other electronic device is provided to perform a simple pressing operation with the other electronic device due to converting a linear pressing operation into a stage movement of a USB module. A sub portable device includes a main body(10), an operation part(31), an assistant device(20) and a driving part. The operation part is arranged to be exposed to the fixed position of the main body. The assistant device is applied to the certain position of main body. The main body is moved to the other handset and the connectable state become the assistant device as the user presses the operation part. The driving part gradually rotates the assistant device.

column12: PROCESS FOR PREPARATION OF RECYCLED RESIN FOR PARTS OF A VEHICLE
column13: 본 발명은 자동차 부품용 재생수지를 제조하는 방법에 관한 것이다. 구체적으로, 본 발명은 자동차용 실린더 헤드 커버의 양산공정 중에 발생되는 불량품을 분쇄한 후 단독으로 용융 및 압출 가공하거나 실린더 헤드 커버용 원료수지와 혼합한 뒤 용융 및 압출 가공하여 자동차의 각종 부품을 생산함으로써 산업폐기물 및 생산원가를 절감시킬 수 있는 자동차 부품용 재생수지를 제조하는 방법에 관한 것이다.

column12: Handheld skin care device
column32: Notice of allowance for Chinese Design Patent Application No. 201630568042.5, with translation (5 pages).

column12: TERMINAL AND CONNECTOR USING THE TERMINAL
column13: The present invention relates to a terminal which prevents plastic deformation of an electrically connectable contact piece and a connector using the terminal. The connector comprises: a connector housing (41) and a terminal (10). Sidewalls (22) and a bottom plate (26) formed in a coupling portion (20) of the terminal (10) are separated by a separation portion (27). When the terminal (10) is inserted into an insertion space (42) of the connector housing (41), the sidewalls (22) are inserted into insertion slits (44) formed on both sides of the insertion space (42), and the bottom plate (26) is elastically deformed along an inclination protrusion (44) formed in the insertion space (42). A contact piece (28) formed by bending a part of the bottom plate (26) protrudes to a bulb insertion portion (43) which can be electrically connected to a bulb or the like as the bottom plate (26) rises. Lances (24) formed by incising a part of the sidewalls (22) are caught by catch portions (45) formed on the insertion slits (44) to prevent the terminal (10) from being separated. In addition, at the time of separating the terminal (10), interference with the inner face of the connector housing (41) is prevented by an interference avoidance portion (29) formed at the front end portion of the contact piece (28). According to the present invention, the contact piece (28) is positioned in the inner space (21) of the coupling portion (20) before being inserted into the connector housing (41), and thus there is an advantage of blocking the possibility of plastically deforming the contact piece (28) by a worker.

column12: IMAGE SENSOR MODULE AND CAMERA MODULE INCLUDING THE SAME
column13: In an image sensor module, a board may be provided with an accommodating groove and an image sensor may be disposed in the accommodating groove to decrease a space occupied by the image sensor. In addition, a side wall of the accommodating groove may be provided as an inclined surface and a bonding pad may be formed on the inclined surface to decrease a length of a bonding wire for electrically connecting the image sensor and the board to each other, whereby the overall size of the image sensor module may be decreased.

column12: Floating Waste Removal Device Having Power Saving Function and High Working Efficiency
column13: The present invention relates to a dust separator which comprises: a foreign material removing unit which removes foreign materials that are hung on a screen capable of filtering foreign materials flowing along with water currents, and removes the foreign materials filtered by the screen by pulling upwards; a foreign material removal driving unit which includes a hydropower unit for supplying driving force to drive the foreign material removing unit; a frame carriage unit where one end unit of the foreign material removing unit is installed in an upper frame in order to remove the foreign materials while the foreign material removing unit moves, and where the foreign material removal driving unit is installed in the inside that is formed by a frame unit; a driving rail unit which guides the frame carriage unit in order to move to the left and right sides by including two driving rails wherein a rotary roller is inserted in order to prevent the separation of the frame carriage unit and that are formed of a U-shaped steel, and driving rail supports that support the driving rails; and a control unit which controls the movement of the frame carriage unit, and controls the operation of the foreign material removing unit and the foreign material removal driving unit. In addition, the frame carriage unit comprises: a frame unit which is composed of a base frame, a vertical frame, and an upper frame; a carriage driving unit which supplies driving force for moving to the left and right sides; and a rotary roller unit which is formed in the lower part of the base frame, and includes four rotary rollers including a bearing for reducing friction when moving to the left and right sides. Therefore, the dust separator with a high power saving and work efficiency can provide a power saving effect by operating not continuously but only when foreign materials are accumulated, and can provide a high work efficiency through easy control by operating a foreign material remover with hydraulic pressure.

column12: Signal generator and situation notifying system using the same
column13: The present invention relates to a signal generator, and to a situation notification system using the same. According to the present invention, the signal generator comprises: an operation button; a signal generation unit generating a specific signal by pressing the operation button; a signal transmission unit transmitting a signal generated by the signal generation unit to the outside; a power supply unit supplying power to the signal generation unit and the signal transmission unit; and a body in which the signal generation unit, the signal transmission unit, and the power supply unit are built. Accordingly, a signal can be generated by a simple operation so as to quickly transmit information on the situation of the user.

column12: Combined DVD/CD data processor
Apparatus of dividing working chamber of 3D printer
column13: The invention relates to an apparatus of dividing a working chamber of a 3D printer. The invention provides the apparatus of the 3D printer which includes a working chamber plate that is disposed in alower portion of a working chamber and is capable of being raised and lowered. A number of subsidiary plates are mounted on the working chamber plate. Each subsidiary plate is capable of being raisedand lowered. A controller is configured to control raised and lowered heights of the subsidiary plates. Some of the subsidiary plates can be raised or lowered according to a size of a processed product to be 3D printed in the working chamber thereby adjusting a size of an inner volume of the working chamber.

column12: DISPLAY APPARATUS AND THE USING RESTRICTION METHOD THEREOF
column13: Provided are a display apparatus and a use restriction method thereof. The display apparatus includes a media interface unit, a memory unit, and a control unit. The media interface unit detects the connection of an external device and receives unique information of the connected external device. The memory unit stores the unique information of the external device received through the media interface unit. The control unit stores/registers the unique information of the connected external device in the memory unit and determines whether to permit the use of the external device connected through the media interface unit on the basis of the unique information registered in the memory unit. Herein, upon detecting the connection of an unregistered external device, the control unit restricts the use of the unregistered external device on the basis of the registered unique information of the external device.
column32: See also references of EP 2215835A4

column12: SYSTEM BASED MOBILE BASED DIGITAL BUSNIESS CARD GENERATION MANAGEMENT AND EXCHANGE SERVICE
column13: Provided is a system for providing a service of generating, managing and exchanging a mobile-based electronic business card, comprising: a user terminal selecting a preset business card format or a prestored business card format, automatically generating an electronic business card after collecting or receiving item data corresponding to at least one item in the electronic business card and inserting the item data into the selected electronic business card, and issuing the generated electronic business card in a one-to-one manner by scanning an identification code or using a URL or issuing the generated electronic business card in a one-to-many or a many-to-many manner by forming a session; and at least one recipient terminal receiving or storing the electronic business card from the user terminal by reading or scanning the identification code or using the URL, acquiring an issuance qualification of the electronic business card after inputting a pre-generated authentication number for accessing the session, and selecting and downloading the electronic business card of the user terminal after accessing the session. The present invention enables a giver and a recipient to exchange the business cards by using a formed session and a code.

column12: MOBILE TERMINAL FOR MANAGING VOUCHER SERVICE, AND MANAGING METHOD OF THE SAME
column13: PURPOSE: A mobile communication terminal and a management method thereof are provided to increase the convenience of a user by the supply of a voucher service. CONSTITUTION: A control unit(150) executes an embedded voucher program. A sensing unit(110) senses bio-information from a user in the execution of the voucher program. A wireless communication unit(120) transmits the bio-information to an external server. The wireless communication unit receives the service information from the external server. An output unit(140) outputs the service information or the bio-information.

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR DETECTING OBJECT
column13: An object detection apparatus according to one embodiment of the present invention comprises: a sensor which transmits a signal toward an object in front of a vehicle and receives a reflection signal reflected from the object; a control unit which calculates an angle between a signal reception direction and a driving direction of the vehicle, compares the angle and an effective detection range, and determines whether to determine the object as an effective obstacle according to the comparison result. The object detection apparatus easily detects the effective obstacle used in vehicle driving control, and thus improves vehicle driving control performance.

column12: METHOD FOR COLORING METAL THIN PLATE AND KEY-PAD MANUFACTURED BY THE SAME
column13: A method for coloring a metal thin plate provided in a key-pad for a personal mobile terminal includes a first process of coating a first coating agent on a surface of the metal thin plate by using at least one of a physical vapor deposition and a chemical vapor deposition, the first coating agent having a predetermined saturation; and a second process of coating secondarily a second coating agent on the primarily coated surface of the metal thin plate by using at least one of the physical vapor deposition and the chemical vapor deposition, the second coating agent having predetermined saturation with a refractive index that is different from a refractive index of the first coating agent. A key-pad for a personal mobile terminal includes a metal thin plate comprising plural coating layers formed thereon to present colors, the coating layers having pre-determined saturation and different refractive index of light; and a pad mounted on a lower surface of the metal thin plate, wherein plural buttons and significant marks formed at the buttons are formed on an upper surface of the metal thin plate as one body, further wherein plural switching projections are formed on a lower surface of the pad.

column12: System For Retrival Commodity Catalog Using Internet And Method Therefore
column13: 본 발명은 인터넷 통신망을 이용한 웹 서비스를 통해 소비자가 요청하는 상품을 동종의 웹카탈로그의 형태로 진열할 수 있도록 함과 더불어, 소비자가 지정하는 상품의 선택 사양에 따라 상품카탈로그의 진열을 가변하기 위한 인터넷을 이용한 상품카탈로그 검색시스템 및 그 방법을 제공한다. 이를 위해 본 발명은 인터넷 통신망을 통해 웹사이트에 접속하여 원하는 상품에 대해 다양한 검색사양을 입력하고, 그 검색사양에 따라 검색이 이루어진 다수의 상품이 개시된 웹카탈로그를 열람하기 위한 다수의 컴퓨터 단말장치와, 상기 다수의 컴퓨터 단말장치로부터 입력되는 다양한 검색사양에 따라 다수의 상품에 대해 부여된 상품분류코드를 검색하고, 그 검색사양과 일치하는 상품의 정보를 추출하여 웹카탈로그의 형태로 가공함에 의해 웹사이트를 통해 개시하는 웹호스트 서버 및, 다수의 상품에 대한 제품정보와, 각각의 상품에 대해 부여되는 상품분류코드가 격납되어 있는 정보 데이터베이스로 구성됨에 따라; 동종 또는 이종의 품목에 대한 제품사양별 비교 구매가 가능하게 되면서 제품의 구매력이 대폭적으로 향상될 수 있게 된다는 효과를 갖는다.

column12: LAPAROSCOPIC TROCAR
column13: The present invention relates to a trocar for laparoscopic surgery, which has a duckbill and a duckbill support to prevent CO_2 gas from leaking due to no blocking of a duckbill groove when a surgical instrument is removed from a trocar of laparoscopic surgery. According to an embodiment of the present invention, the trocar for laparoscopic surgery comprises: a snap cap composed of an upper snap cap having an insertion hole in the center thereof, into which a surgical instrument is inserted, and a lower snap cap fitted into the lower part of the upper snap cap; a tubular-shaped canular mounted on the lower part of the lower snap cap so that a surgical instrument is inserted into or withdrawn from the inside of a body; an opening or closing member controlling intake or blocking of CO_2 gas infused into the body; and a duckbill composed of a duckbill groove installed inside the snap cap to have a groove which enables a surgical instrument to enter into the body when the instrument is inserted, and duckbill supporting surfaces blocking the duckbill groove when the surgical instrument is removed to prevent CO_2 gas from being discharged to the outside. In addition, the present invention further includes a duckbill support fitted into the lower part of the duckbill inside the snap cap to block the opening/closing of the duckbill.

column12: DEVICE FOR PREVENTING LEAKAGE
column13: PURPOSE: A leakage preventing device is provided to reduce the power consumption and to minimize the generated heat by producing an o-ring having the elasticity and a core ring of a hardened material and exactly sealing in the surface of a shaft and the inner face of a casing. CONSTITUTION: A core ring is produced by a hardened material such as a metal or a ceramic. Grooves are formed in the lower face of a casing grand packing space. Many core rings are assembled based on the grooves to form o-ring grooves. Soft o-rings(130,131) are inserted in the o-ring grooves and tightened by a tightening nut(120). The inner o-ring and the outer o-ring seals the surface of a shaft and the inner face of a casing. Thereby, a pump and a flow control valve to control the carriage and the flow of high pressure fluid are produced by a simple process.

column12: SHOCK ABSORBER WITH HYDRAULIC STOPPER STRUCTURE
column13: PURPOSE: A shock absorber with a hydraulic stopper structure is provided to prevent a piston valve of the end of a piston road from colliding with the rod guide of the upper end of the shock absorber using the pressure of the oil. CONSTITUTION: A shock absorber with a hydraulic stopper structure comprise a rod guide(20) and a stopper(10). The rod guide is coupled with one end of a cylinder(1). The rod guide seals the cylinder. The stopper is installed on the outer surface of the piston rod(2). The rod guide comprises a guide portion(23) and a hydraulic generation part(25). The guide portion guides the piston rod in the linear direction to be slid. The hydraulic generation part is formed below the guide portion.

column12: Flame lamination device
column13: The present invention relates to a flame lamination device. The present invention relates to a flame lamination device, in which gas that is generated by cooling while deodorizing, using an air blower, a product obtained by bonding foam and fabric using flame is collected while the product passes through a chamber so as to make the work environment comfortable, which enhances the quality of a product to be bonded by adjusting the tension of the product to be bonded, and which inhibits the generation of odor from a finished product. The flame lamination device of the present invention comprises: a heating means which heats one surface or both surfaces of foam; a lamination means which laminates fabric and the foam with heated one surface or both surfaces; a tension adjusting device which sprays air to a laminated product by controlling a transfer speed of a sheet laminated by the lamination means so as to deodorize the product; a chamber installed on an inner side of the tension adjusting device, and including an air suction hole formed in one side to introduce external air and an air discharge hole formed in a direction opposite to the air suction hole to discharge air sucked in through the air suction hole and air sprayed by the tension adjusting device to the outside; and a collection device connected to the air discharge hole to collect discharged air.

column12: Rechargeable handy type skin beauty device
column13: Disclosed is a rechargeable handy type skin care device. The disclosed rechargeable handy type skin care device comprises: a main body including a head portion and a handle portion formed below the head portion; an LED portion installed on a front surface of the head portion to emit light for color therapy; a hand contact terminal installed on the outer surface of the handle portion to be in contact with a hand when the handle portion is gripped by the hand; a skin contact terminal installed on the head portion to be in contact with the skin of a user; and a control unit determining whether the skin is in contact or not by measuring a change in an input voltage according to contact or non-contact of the skin contact terminal with the skin of a user when the user grips the handle portion and the hand contact terminal is in contact with the hand, and controlling the LED portion to operate with high output when it is determined to be a skin contact state or operate with low output when it is determined to be a skin non-contact state. According to the present invention, the skin care device is configured to provide currents to the skin by enabling the skin contact terminal to be in contact with the skin while the handle portion is gripped by the user, thereby exhibiting skin care effects through iontophoresis.

column12: METING AND EXTRUDING UNIT FOR RECYCLING RESIN
column13: PURPOSE: A melting and extruding unit is provided to directly use residual resin as an injection molding material in field by instantly recycling the residual resin. CONSTITUTION: A melting and extruding unit comprises: a housing with a supply part supplying residual resin of injection molding with pulverized state in one side, and a discharging part(517) discharging the residual resin to outside; a heater in outer circumference of the housing, supplying heat for heating the residual resin over melting point; and a transfer screw(520) transferring the residual resin along longitudinal direction by rotating inside the housing.

column12: MOBILE REPEATER CONTROLLER USING WIRELESS DATA MODEM
STRUCTURE FOR JOINING A PRINTED CIRCUIT BOARD OF LIQUID CRYSTAL DISPLAY
column13: A structure for joining a printed circuit board for a liquid crystal display is provided to restrain generation of a noise due to an assembling gap, and reduce the thickness of a liquid crystal display while preventing joining power of a screw from being reduced to the printed circuit board. A nut(20) is installed at a bottom of a cover(10) and has a securing part(22) at one area for securing a lower plane of a printed circuit board(15) through surface contact. A screw(30) has an axial part(31) coupled by the nut and a head part(33) formed at an end of the axial part, and fixes the printed circuit board in cooperation with the nut. A gap compensating part(40a) is formed between the printed circuit board and the head part of the screw for compensating a gap generated between the printed circuit board and the head part of the screw as the height of the securing part becomes low relatively.

column12: leak testing apparatus
column13: The present invention relates to a water leakage inspection device having a new structure capable of effectively inspecting a leakage from a tank manufactured by welding a metal plate. According to the present invention, the water leakage inspection device supplies high pressure air to the tank (1) in a state in which the tank (1) is submerged in the water stored in the water tank (20) and inspects a water leakage from the tank (1), thereby allowing quick and accurate inspection on a water leakage from the tank (1).

column12: UNMANNED MOVING OBJECT METHOD AND PROGRAM FOR FINDING THE LOCATION IN SPACE OF UNMANNED MOVING OBJECT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column13: 본 개시는 인공 지능 기반의 무인 이동체의 공간 내 위치를 찾는 방법에 있어서, 무인 이동체의 비정상적인 재부팅의 발생 여부를 감지하는 단계; 감지된 결과를 기반으로 비정상적인 재부팅이 발생된 경우, 도킹 스테이션의 충전 신호가 수신된 것인지를 판단하는 단계; 충전 신호가 미수신이면, 공간 내 위치를 찾는 키드냅 리커버리(kidnap recovery) 모드를 수행하는 단계; 무인 이동체가 공간 내 위치를 찾도록, 기 설정된 제1 지점에서 제2 지점까지 기 설정된 지그재그 패턴의 주행으로 영상 데이터와 라이다 데이터를 추론 모델을 만들기 위하여 수집하는 단계; 수집된 영상 데이터를 영상 추출 모델에 입력하여 영상 내의 공간 데이터를 추출하는 단계; 및 영상 내의 공간 데이터 및 라이다 데이터를 위치 추적 모델에 입력하여 무인 이동체의 공간 내 예상 위치 데이터를 출력하는 단계; 를 포함할 수 있다.
column32: 이정우, 외 4명, 카메라 및 LiDAR 센서 기반의 심층 신경망을 이용한 실내 환경에서의 위치 추정에 관한 기본 연구, 동력시스템공학회지 23(4) 2019.8 49-54(6pages);;이정석, 외 4명, 표식 지도를 이용한 이동로봇의 광역 위치인식 및 kidnap recovery, 로봇공학회 논문지 제2권 제1호 (2007.3)

column12: MONITORING SYSTEM OF RESERVOIR USING TEMPERATURE CHANGE DATA
