column13: The present invention relates to a system for monitoring a reservoir and, more specifically, to a system for monitoring a reservoir using temperature data capable of monitoring of abnormality of a dam body including leakage due to a crack of a dam body in real time by comparing a temperature change rate calculated by temperature data transmitted through wireless communication network after temperature data is measured in a plurality of temperature sensors installed at a dam body of a reservoir with a preset temperature change limit, determining whether a temperature change in an internal space of a dam body of a reservoir is out of extent caused by a usual factor, and monitoring abnormality of a dam body of a reservoir in real time and by graphicalizing and presenting an internal space of a dam body of a reservoir based on installation position information of a temperature sensor, wherein a temperature change rate beyond a temperature change limit is calculated. The system comprises: a multi-point temperature sensor bar; a temperature data transmission/reception unit; and a reservoir monitoring server.

column12: Apparatus and method for controlling phase of sampling clock signal in LCD system
column13: An apparatus and a method for accurately controlling the phase of a sampling clock signal in an LCD system, wherein the sampling clock is generated by a phase lock loop and delayed in response to a phase delay quantity generated by a controller. The controller continuously generates a first phase delay quantity until a horizontal line width of a digital image signal is equal to a desired width, stores a first total phase delay quantity corresponding to how many times the first phase delay quantity was generated, continuously generates a second phase delay quantity until the current horizontal line width is greater than the desired width, stores a second total phase delay quantity corresponding to how many times the second phase delay quantity was generated, and controls the phase delay of the sampling clock in response to an optimum phase delay quantity which is an average of the first and second phase delay quantities.
column16: SAM SUNG ELECTRONICS CO. LTD. A CORPORATION ORGANIZED UNDER THE LAWS OF THE REPUBLIC OF KOREA (2002-05-08)

column12: SLIDING MODULE AND SLIDING APPRATUS COMPRISING THE SAME
column13: A sliding module and a sliding device including the same are provided to arrange a new input button capable of moving a slide in an intersecting direction. A base(100) is equipped in first guide parts(110,120) along a first direction. A lateral end of a first sliding member is equipped on a first guide part and is moved in the top of the base along the first direction. The first sliding member(200) is equipped in a second guide unit(210) according to a second direction intersecting with the first direction. A second sliding member(300) is slid in the top of the first sliding member along the second direction.

column12: MOBILE COMMUNICATION TERMINAL WITH KEY PAD ASSEMBLY
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL INTERNET DISPLAYPHONE WITH A BUILT-IN HOME SERVER AND HOME NETWORK SYSTEM USING IT
column13: A multifunctional Internet video phone having a built-in home server function and a home network system using the same are provided to make home control using the video phone possible by connecting the Internet video phone to a telephone line connection terminal. A Internet video phone(1) comprises a home network control unit(30), an input processing unit(40), a display unit(50), a memory unit(60), a wire communication unit(70) and a short-distance wireless communication unit(80). The home network control unit controls home devices(90) which are connected to a device controller(12) of a household terminal box(10) or home devices which are connected with the Internet video phone through a wireless network, through a network to provide the home automation function. The input processing unit is controlled by a controller and inputs a control command and an operated state confirming command.

column12: Laundry Treating Apparatus
column13: The present invention relates to a garment treatment apparatus including a drawer provided to be withdrawable from a cabinet, a water-storing tub body provided in the drawer, a tub cover forming the upper surface of the tub body and provided with a tub inlet for communication between the inside and the outside of the tub body, a garment-storing drum provided to be rotatable in the tub body, an inlet provided in the upper surface of the drum for communication between the inside and the outside of the drum and positioned below the tub inlet, and a withdrawal prevention portion positioned in a projection plane formed by projection of the inlet onto the tub cover, protruding from the tub cover toward the inlet, and preventing garment inflow into the space formed between the upper surface of the drum and the tub cover.

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR DISPLAYING BACKGROUND SCREEN OF NAVIGATION DEVICE
column13: PURPOSE: A background screen displaying device and a method thereof for a navigation terminal are provided to enable a driver to watch the front side of a vehicle or other directions while the driver manipulates the terminal, thereby previously preventing vehicle accidents. CONSTITUTION: A background screen displaying device and a method thereof for a navigation terminal (100) includes an interface unit (19), a display unit (15), and a control unit (14). Images of the front side of a vehicle or other sides, which are photographed by a camera, are inputted via the interface unit. The display unit displays a navigation screen and a menu screen. The control unit controls the display unit to display the images of the front side of the vehicle or other sides as a background screen of the menu screen. [Reference numerals] (10) GPS receiving unit; (11) Broadcast receiving unit; (12) Sensor unit; (13) Input unit; (14) Control unit; (15) Display unit (touch screen); (16) Audio output unit; (17) A/V processing unit; (18) Storage unit (Map/Load DB); (19) Interface unit; (AA) Front camera; (BB) Vehicle control device

column12: MANAGER FOR BANKBOOK/CARD AND MANAGEMENT SYSTEM HAVING THE SAME
column13: PURPOSE: An important certificate management device and an important certificate management system including the same are provided to prevent a loss and illegal leakage of an important certificate, thereby easily performing issue history and stock management with respect to the important certificate. CONSTITUTION: An important certificate management device(100) comprises an outer case, an information input part(120), cartridge modules(200), and a main control part(140). The outer case includes a discharge hole for the discharge of an important certificate. The information input part is equipped in the outer case in order to be exposed to the outside and receives input information for withdrawing of the important certificate. A plurality of cartridge modules is installed in the inside of the outer case and loads the important certificate with classification. The main control part is installed in the inside of the outer case. The main control part is electrically connected to the information input part and cartridge modules. The main control part detects a residual quantity of the important certificate and controls the withdrawal of the important certificate from the cartridge module in response to the input information transmitted from the information input part.

column12: OMITTED
column13: When double boiling is needed in a scientific experiment, a process including the steps of preparing a beaker, a test tube, a clamp, etc., installing a clamp, injecting water to the beaker, injecting alcohol to the test tube, immersing a small portion of the test tube and heating the test tube is inconvenient. The process can be combined by using a round bottom flask of the present invention, which merges two round bottom flasks.

column12: ELECTRONIC BUSINESS CARD PLATFORM AND INFORMATION SHARING METHOD USING THEREOF
column13: Disclosed are an electronic business card platform and an information sharing method using the same. According to an embodiment of the present invention, the electronic business card platform for sharing an electronic business card through a smart terminal comprises: a user smart terminal inputting metadata of an information object including a place, a person, a product, and a service to register the information object to an electronic business card sharing server; and an electronic business card sharing server generating an electronic business card for each information object and sharing the electronic business cards with another user smart terminal when an electronic business card sharing and recommending signal is received by the user smart terminal.

column12: HTML5 SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING SIMULATION CONTENTS OF ONLINE LEARING TRAINING AIDS BASED HTML5
column13: The present invention relates to a system for providing simulation content of online teaching materials based on HTML5, and the objective of the present invention is to solve a problem due to the insufficient quantity of teaching materials in existing offline education and provide all learners with digital teaching materials and virtual practice and experience opportunities related thereto through online simulation education, thereby providing all learners with equal opportunities for education and learning regardless of time and place. According to one embodiment of the present invention, the system comprises: a digital teaching material content management unit storing and managing digital teaching material content to be experienced virtually; a digital teaching material content selection menu unit providing selectable digital teaching material content; and a digital teaching material control practice unit loading the digital teaching material content selected through the digital teaching material content selection menu unit from the digital teaching material content management unit to output the same on a webpage and performing virtual practice using virtual teaching materials according to operation of a computer input means.

column12: SMART PAYMENT SOLUTION
column13: One or more processors access a user profile associated with a set of payment methods, the user profile being associated with a user. The one or more processors receive a selection of a plurality of items for purchase by the user and access information for a plurality of coupons. A user interface is presented that includes for each payment method of the set of payment methods, a total cost for the plurality of items; a recommended payment method selected from the set of payment methods; and a recommended assignment of the coupons to the items. The one or more processors receive a confirmation from the user and initiate a purchase transaction for the items by the user, the purchase transaction using the recommended payment method and the recommended assignment of the coupons to the items.

column12: METHOD FOR PROCESSING ATM MANAGEMENT MESSAGE BETWEEN ATM SWITCH AND TELECOMMUNICATION MANAGEMENT NETWORK MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column13: PURPOSE: A method for processing ATM management message between an ATM switch and a TMN(Telecommunication Management Network) management system is provided to easily obtain the procedure giving and taking reciprocally management message between the TMN management system and the ATM switch. CONSTITUTION: TMN agent(21) transmits a predetermined request message to an ATM switch(30). The ATM switch transmits a confirmation message to the TMN agent, and transmits a response message in connection with the request message to the TMN agent. Then, the TMN agent transmits a confirmation message to the response message to the ATM switch.

column12: HOLDER USING CASES FOR MOBILE PHONES
column13: The present invention relates to a holder using a mobile phone case, the invention comprising: a mobile phone case having a plurality of groove units on a back surface; a support unit which is a holder for vertically holding the mobile phone case and coupled to any one of the groove units to be able to ascend and descend; an extension unit extended to the left and right sides of the support unit; and rotating legs coupled to the extension unit to be able to rotate and detachably attached to the groove unit. It is possible to freely adjust a height of a mobile phone case by having the holder on a mobile phone case itself, and it is possible to vertically erect a mobile phone case, thereby, facilitating an easy self-photographing, and it is possible to further raise a height of a mobile phone case by means of the rotating legs and at the same time, there is an effect of supporting stably.

column12: GUIDANCE-LAMP IN TUNNEL
column13: The present invention relates to a gaze guidance lamp (100) for tunnels, which comprises an LED lamp (110) embedded in the ground or wall and a bollard (120) made of a transparent member and installed to extend in the direction in which light of the LED lamp (110) is emitted. The bollard (120) includes: a main body (121) made of a transparent member; an accommodation space (122) accommodating a throwing fire extinguisher (200); at least one transparent partition (123) partitioning the accommodation space (121); and a transparent door (124) opened/closed to store or separate the throwing fire extinguisher (200). According to the present invention, the gaze guidance lamp has a throwing fire extinguisher embedded therein and is installed at positions easy to access from a vehicle driver inside a tunnel in units of short sections, so that the vehicle driver can quickly access the fire extinguisher and use the fire extinguisher easily when a fire occurs inside the tunnel, thereby effectively responding to fire. As a result, the gaze guidance lamp for tunnels provides effects of performing self-extinguishing when a small fire occurs and lowering the speed of spreading into a large fire.

column12: LODING GEAR AND PINCH ROLLER PLAYING DEVICE
Advertising system and method through free lease of smoking booth
column13: According to the present invention, disclosed is free lease of a smoking booth through advertisement (AD) profit. The present invention relates to free lease of a smoking booth through advertisement profit, free renting the smoking booth to a real estate owner providing a place and exhibiting AD on the smoking booth, so as to create income from AD profit. According to the present invention, an AD method through free lease of a smoking booth, networking an Internet server-client system and a digital monitor of the smoking booth to perform AD in each AD spot formed by each digital monitor slot classified by AD locations and time zones, comprises the following steps of: matching the smoking booth with location information of the smoking booth to periodically updating the location information in an AD spot unit; receiving an AD target condition corresponding to the location information from an advertiser based on the Internet server-client system; sorting and posting all purchasable AD spots by digital monitor slot satisfying the inputted AD target condition; allowing the advertiser to purchase the purchasable AD spot by order of arrival or bidding, and informing the advertiser of an result; and transmitting AD of the advertiser to the sold AD spot.

column12: 2 Implant with double separable abutment
column13: 본 발명은 2중 분리형 어버트먼트를 갖는 임플란트에 관한 것으로 환자의 시술부위에 치은을 형성하기 위해 어버트먼트를 반복적으로 착탈하는 과정에서 다양한 문제점이 발생하던 기존 기술에서 벗어나, 별도로 마련된 링크를 매개로 보철물과 어버트먼트를 결합함으로써 어버트먼트를 픽스처로부터 분리하지 않고 간편하게 탈착이 가능함과 더불어 링크에 스캔기능과 임프레션 코핑 기능을 일괄 겸비하여 치은막의 손상없이 보철물의 조립이 가능하도록 하기 위해, 외측면에 수나사부(12)가 형성되고, 상부측에 개방부를 갖는 내측수용공간부(19)가 형성되어 치아가 상실된 치조골에 삽입되는 형태를 갖는 임플란트 결합의 베이스가 되는 픽스처(10); 하부측 외주연 상에 수나사부(22)가 형성되어 상기 픽스처(10)의 내측수용공간부(19)에 조립되는 어버트먼트(20); 상기 어버트먼트(20)는 수나사부(22)의 상단측에서 상부측으로 갈수록 외경 확장되는 형태의 경사부(21a)를 갖는 제1경사체(21)가 형성되고, 상기 제1경사체(21)의 상단측은 수평마찰면(23)이 형성되며, 상기 수평마찰면(23)의 상부측으로 밀착조립체(25)가 형성되고, 상기 어버트먼트(20)의 상부측에 구비되어 밀착조립체(25)를 수용하면서 결합되는 링크(30); 상기 링크(30)는 하단부에 밀착테두리부(32)가 형성되어 상기 수평마찰면(23)에 안착지지되고, 상기 밀착테두리부(32)의 상부측으로 연장되는 링크(30)의 외주연은 하부측에서 상부측으로 갈수록 외경 확장되는 형태의 제2경사체(31)가 형성되며, 보철물로부터 삽입되어 상기 링크(30)를 관통하여 상기 어버트먼트(20)의 내측에 결합되어 보철물을 어버트먼트(20)에 고정시키는 스크류(40);를 포함하여 이루어지는 것을 특징으로 한다.

column12: A mini sculptural folding screen for decoration and method
column13: PURPOSE: Provided is a mini carving screen for decoration which treats pictures and writings as an image file and carves as the control number of the image file so that it helps to preserve the pictures and the writings for a long time without modification. CONSTITUTION: The production process of the mini carving screen for decoration comprises the steps of: (i) taking photo of the writings and carvings by a digital camera or a scanner and treating as the image file; (ii) entering the scanned image into a central processing unit in a laser carving machine; (iii) fixing a wooden board at the lower part of head in the laser carving machine; (iv) generating laser as the control number of the image file to carve; (v) coating the carved groove with black background paint; (vi) polishing the surface of the wooden board by sand paper to eliminate the background paint painted on the surface; (vii) coating the projected part with decoration paint; (viii) coating the entire surface with transparent paint and drying; and (ix) connecting plural wooden boards by a hinge to produce the final goods.

column12: Tastatur für Mobilstation
column13: A keypad assembly for a mobile station comprises a base pad adapted to support a plurality of keys, the plurality of keys comprising a plurality of first keys and a plurality of second keys. The keypad assembly also comprises the plurality of first keys and the plurality of second keys arranged on the base pad, the plurality of second keys defined by horizontal center lines and vertical center lines of the plurality of first keys. The plurality of second keys may be further defined by outer perimeters of the plurality of first keys. The keypad assembly may further comprise a strength reinforcing plate coupled to the base pad, adapted to mechanically strengthen the keypad assembly. An alphabetic character may be assigned to each of the plurality of first keys. A numeral may be assigned to at least one of the plurality of second keys.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS OF UNIVERSAL REMOCON BASED ON OBJECT RECOGNITION
column13: The present invention relates to an integrated remote controller device based on object recognition and a method thereof. According to the present invention, an integrated management server stores the environment setting information for a remote control operation and feature point information of an electronic product. A terminal receives an image of the electronic product and the remote controller thereof. The integrated remote controller device recognizes the electronic device based on the image and the feature point information, detects the environment setting information to remotely control the recognized electronic product, and transmits the environment setting information to the terminal. The terminal implements the integrated remote controller function to control the electronic product based on the environment setting information. The present invention can provides the user interface including the unique functions regarding the electronic product based on the images of the electronic product and the remote controller thereof through the integrated remote controller. By using the integrated remote controller application and the camera function when a smartphone is used, the functions similar or identical to the corresponding product can be provided through recording the images.

column12: CUTTING DEVICE OF MEDICAL EXAMIMATION STICK
column13: PURPOSE: A cutting device for a diagnostic stick is provided to uniformly transfer raw sheets for a diagnostic stick to a discharge unit using stick pusher pins. CONSTITUTION: A cutting device for a diagnostic stick comprises a plate(10), a moving member(20), a cutting unit(40), a discharge unit, and stick pusher pins(30). The plate transfers a raw sheet(A') for a diagnostic stick in a horizontal direction. The moving member is arranged at the rear of the plate and moves the raw sheet frontward. The cutting unit has upper and lower rotary drums(42,42') and cutters(44). The cutters are arranged on the rotary drums at uniform intervals and cut the raw sheet. The discharge unit moves the cut diagnostic sticks to the next process. The stick pusher pins are installed on the front end of the moving member and move the raw sheet.

column12: SYSTEM AND SERVER FOR PRICE LIMIT PROVIDING SERVICE OF SMS TRANSMISSION FEE AND INFORMATION SUBSCRIPTION FEE AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: PURPOSE: A service system for offering SMS transmission fee and information subscription fee, a server and a method thereof are provided to solve the problem due to the excessive information subscription fee by setting the limit of the information subscription fee. CONSTITUTION: A portable terminal(101) transmits a message. If the message is about the information usage fee, a limit management server(200) decides the exhaustion of the limit amount of the preset transmission cost limit or the information usage fee in the portable terminal. If each limit amount is not exhausted, the limit management server transmits the message about the information usage fee. A web server(102) receives a message about the information usage fee from the limit management server.

column12: METHOD FOR PROCESSING DATA CALL BETWEEN WCDMA AND EPC NETWORKS
column13: PURPOSE: A data call processing method between a WCDMA(Wideband Code Division Multiple Access) network and an EPC(Evolved Packet Core) network is provided to process a data call with transmitting call plan information in a heterogeneous mobile communication mixing service environment. CONSTITUTION: When a data call is requested from a terminal device, An SGSN(Serving GPRS(General Packet Radio Service) Support Node)(230) of a WCDMA network determines whether the data call is a hand-off call from an EPC network. When the data call is determined as the hand-off call, the SGSN acquires a subscriber profile from an MME(Mobility Management Entity) of the EPC network. The subscriber profile includes fee characteristic information. The SGSN transmits a data call message to the GGSN(Gateway GPRS Support Node) of the WCDMA network based on the subscriber profile.

column12: Dust collector
column13: The present invention relates to a dust collector and, more specifically, relates to a dust collector capable of directly removing dust by using centrifugal force; managing the health of a worker by maintaining the cleanness of a wood factory by moving and collecting dust and sawdust by separating the sawdust through the centrifugal force applied to the sawdust; and variously recycling the sawdust for a stable or mushroom house by smashing the sawdust separated through a cyclone by using a smashing part. To achieve the purpose, the present invention includes: a dust and sawdust inserting part forming a duct with a turbofan and an absorption port to absorb dust and sawdust which are generated by wood processing; a cyclone connected with the duct of the dust and sawdust inserting part, and making the dust and sawdust collide with a wall and drop and elevating and discharging purified air when the dust and sawdust flow into a cylindrical container via the duct and are rotated and dropped; a purified air discharging part located in the upper part of the cyclone to discharge the air purified by the cyclone; a body located in the lower part of the cyclone, and including a storage space; a hopper formed in the lower part of the body and including an outlet; a support formed in the lower part of the body and supporting the body from the ground; and a hydro open door formed in the outlet of the hopper to open or close the outlet.

column12: APPARATUS FOR GENERATING MORSE SIGNAL IN WIRELESS TERMINAL EQUIPMENT AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: An apparatus for generating a Morse signal in a wireless terminal and a method thereof are provided to generate the Morse signal for requesting an emergent rescue by a light emitting device such as a display window or a camera flash in an emergent state that a call connection is impossible such that the user can swiftly cope with the emergent state. An apparatus for generating a Morse signal in a wireless terminal comprises a memory(130), a display unit(120), an audio outputting unit(160), a signal transmitter(150) and a terminal controller(140). The memory(130) stores Morse code data for notifying others of emergent states. The display unit(120) generates emergency signals by emitting light at every combination interval of the Morse codes inputted via a user's key operation. The audio outputting unit(160) generates sound in accordance with the Morse codes. The signal transmitter(150) transmits a radio HAM signal in accordance with the Morse codes. The terminal controller(140) controls operations of the display unit(120), the audio outputting unit(160) and the signal transmitter(150) for reading corresponding Mode code data from the memory(130) and generating emergency signals according as key signals or characters are inputted via a key inputting unit(110) for generating the emergency signals.

column12: Method for Providing Touring Service and Mobile Device therefor
column13: Disclosed are a method for providing a tour service and a mobile device therefor. A platform suggested by the method can mediate travel products between travel service providers and travelers. In particular, the travel service provider of the platform of the present invention is a driver who drives his/her own taxi or vehicle, and the travel product is that the provider directly provides a movement service for a plurality of travel sections with his/her own taxi or vehicle. Travel services can be provided at relatively low cost using local infrastructure. In addition, a traveler terminal can design its own travel course through the platform.

column12: Method of transferring Semiconductor Device
column13: According to the present invention, provided is a method for transferring a semiconductor device, which comprises the processes of: forming a release layer on a carrier substrate, and forming a semiconductor device on the release layer; preparing a base substrate having a conductive adhesive layer formed thereon; positioning the carrier substrate on the base substrate to allow the semiconductor device to face the conductive adhesive layer; and irradiating a laser beam on the carrier substrate to separate the semiconductor device from the release layer, and seating the same on the conductive adhesive layer. The process of positioning the carrier substrate on the base substrate includes a process of separating the semiconductor device from the conductive adhesive layer at a predetermined interval without being in contact therewith. Also, the process of irradiating the laser beam includes a process of irradiating the release layer with the laser beam after passing through the carrier substrate to swell an area of the release layer irradiated with the laser beam. Therefore, the semiconductor device can be transferred to a desired location on a base substrate of an electronic device.

column12: TAPE TENSION CONTROL DEVICE FOR A VCR
column13: A tape tension control device for a video cassette tape recorder includes first and second band fixing members for fixing a band, the second fixing member moved by a plate, and a tension arm fixed with a tension post, whereby by slight turning of the second band fixing member by the plate, a tape runs in the review mode while contacting the tension post so that the tape tension is uniformly controlled and maintained.

column12: Photochromic material
column13: Photochromic dyes are disclosed. A photochromic dye can include a first photo-reactive group and a second photo-reactive group. A first photochromic reaction can be induced in the first photo-reactive group of the photochromic dye by radiation having a first intensity, and a second photochromic reaction can be induced in the second photo-reactive group of the photochromic dye by radiation having a second intensity. The second intensity may be greater than the first intensity.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR SUPPLEMENTING SCAN DATA BY USING LIBRARY DATA
column13: A method for supplementing scan data by using library data according to the present invention comprises: a scan step of acquiring scan data of a subject including a structure; a step of selecting library model data corresponding to the structure; and a step of post-processing the scan data, wherein the library model data is added at the step of post-processing of the scan data and is post-processed together with the scan data. Accordingly, the scan data in which distortion or a data gap has occurred is supplemented by the library model data, and thus a user acquires a highly reliable three-dimensional model.

column12: A TUBE FIXATION STRUCTURE FOR HEAT EXCHANGER
Multi-screen generation circuit
column13: There is disclosed a multi-screen generating circuit capable of freely displaying on a main screen a plurality of multi-screens corresponding to 4 sub-screens, 9 sub-screens, 13 sub-screens and 16 sub-screens according to size of the main screen, the circuit also being capable of giving free choices in selecting any type of multi-screens regardless of the number of broadcasting channels which may differ from one region to another. The inventive subject to carry out the object of the invention includes: a command decoder 10, an address signal generator 20, a writing reference signal generation circuti(WRS) 30, a writing display controller 140, an analog-to-digital clock generator 188, a first multiplexer 60, a serial-parallel converter 50(SPC) 50, a write timing generator 70, a read timing generation circuit 80, a latch section 90, and a data multiplexer 100.

column12: A NEEDLE FOR NEEDLEWORK
column13: A needle for a needle work is provided to perform easily a thread work, by forming a cutout portion on a needle ear so that a hole of the needle ear communicates with the outsides. A needle(1) comprises a needle body(10), a needle head portion(20), and a needle bar(30). The needle body is formed in a pole shape. The needle head portion is sharply formed on one end of the needle body. The needle ear is formed on the other end of the needle body, wherein the needle bar has a hole(31) through which a thread is inserted. A cutout portion(32) is formed on the needle ear so that the thread is compulsorily inserted into the hole of the needle bar from the outside.

column12: PORTABLE DISPLAY DEVICE
Electrode raw material feeder
column13: 본 발명은 전극 원자재 공급장치에 관한 것으로, 본 발명에 따른 전극 원자재 공급장치는 전극용 원자재가 내부에 수용되는 통형의 빈(Bin); 상기 원자재를 상기 빈 측으로 이송시키는 제1 이송부; 상기 제1 이송부를 통해 이송되는 상기 원자재에서 금속 이물질을 분리하는 금속 분리기; 상기 빈의 내부에 수용된 상기 원자재를 불출하는 불출부; 및 상기 불출부로부터 불출된 상기 원자재를 이송하는 제2 이송부를 포함한다.

column12: Automatic animation production system using motion capture data
column13: 본 발명은 실시간으로 동작이 가능하므로 하나의 캐릭터뿐 아니라 군중시뮬레이션에 사용될 수 있고, 기존소프트웨어의 플러그인 형태 및 개별적인 시스템으로 개발될 수 있다.본 발명은 일일이 애니메이터들이 수작업을 통해 여러 개의 모션데이터를 변형해야 원하는 모션을 생성하는 작업을 자동화 한다. 따라서 전체적인 생산성 향상에 도움을 준다.

column12: TILTABLE SLIDING DEVICE
column13: A tiltable sliding device is provided to realize various modes by enabling sliding and tilting operations at the same time. A tiltable sliding device includes a cover unit(110), a main unit(120) and a tilting unit(130). The main unit is slidably coupled to a rear portion of the cover unit, and the tilting unit is rotatably coupled to a portion of the main unit along the sliding direction. The tilting unit can be tilted at a certain angle forward in a state that the cover unit is slid upward.

column12: TURBO COMPRESSOR
Methods of forming semiconductor devices having stressed active regions therein
column13: A method of fabricating a semiconductor device includes providing a substrate including a semiconductor material having a first lattice constant and then patterning the substrate to form a first semiconductor pattern extending in a first direction. A second semiconductor pattern is also formed on and in contact with the first semiconductor pattern. The second semiconductor pattern extends in the first direction and has a second lattice constant that is sufficiently greater than the first lattice constant so that lattice stress is present at an interface between the first semiconductor pattern and the second semiconductor pattern. The second semiconductor pattern is further patterned to define a sidewall of the second semiconductor pattern that extends in a second direction intersecting the first direction. A gate electrode is formed, which extends in the first direction on the second semiconductor pattern.

column12: LED LAMP FOR PARKING GUIDE INTERGRATED CONTROL AND LIGHTING SYSTEM FOR PARKING GUIDE INTERGRATED CONTROL USING THE LED LAMP AND METHOD FOR PARKING GUIDE INTERGRATED CONTROL USING THE LIGHTING SYSTEM
column13: The present invention relates to a light emitting diode (LED) lamp device to integrally control parking guide, a lighting system using the same, and an integrated control method using the same, modularizing each LED to facilitate maintenance, repair, and management to install the modularized LED in each separate position and perform control and monitor through wireless communication, and thereby simplifying installation, and also reducing installation costs and providing efficient energy saving effect through dimming control. According to the present invention, the system comprises: a wireless communication unit; a sensing unit to detect whether or not a vehicle is parked and to transmit information about parking through the wireless communication unit; a red LED module formed in a central part and flickered in accordance with the parking of the vehicle; a green LED module formed in the central part and flickered in accordance with the parking of the vehicle; a lighting LED module formed in left and right sides of the central part; and a control unit connected to the wireless communication unit, the sensing unit, the red and green LED modules, and the lighting LED module, and to control dimming of the lighting module in accordance with entry information of the vehicle. A partition is installed between the central part and the left and the right sides in which the lighting LED module is installed, and the red, green, and lighting LED modules are modularized to be installed in a separate position.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR FILTERING MULTICAST DATA STREAM AND CONVERTING TO UNICAST DATA STREAM
column13: PURPOSE: A multicast filtering, a method for transferring to a unicast and the system thereof are provided to minimize the unnecessary flow of multicast data on the network and to maximize the utilization of the network. CONSTITUTION: A multicast filtering and multicast to unicast transferring system(20), receiving multicast data streams from a multicast source(10) and transmitting them to clients(31-33) through hubs, is composed of a receiving device(21) and a transferring device(22). Multicast packet data transmitted from the multicast source(10), appointing a multicast group and the IP address of the multicast source(10) as a target IP address and a source IP address respectively, is transmitted on the network and transported to a receiving network through the receiving device(21).

column12: CONTENT PROTECTION SYSTEM USING CONTENT SECURE BROWSER AND CONTENT PROTECTION METHOD USING THE SAME
column13: According to one technical aspect of the present invention, provided is a content protection system using a content protection browser, which comprises: a user terminal having a content protection browser installed therein and providing digital content to a user through the content protection browser; and a management server authenticating the user by interworking with the content protection browser, and setting a protection policy for the content protection browser based on the authenticated information. The content protection browser is executed in the user terminal and performs content protection for the user terminal by itself without essential intervention of the management server based on the protection policy. In addition, for the purpose of the content protection, the content protection browser limits the negative use of the user, and creates a record of the negative use. According to the present invention, there is an effect of protecting digital content with a small amount of resources and preventing threatening behavior in advance through a dedicated browser.
column14: KORA E LEARNING DEVELOPEMENT INST;;CHOI JI HOON

column12: ELASTIC CLIP APPARATUS FOR AUTOMATIC ASSEMBLING
column13: The present invention relates to an elastic clip apparatus for automatic assembling. The frame of the elastic clip apparatus forms a clip body (10). In the clip body (10), a pair of first elastic support arms (16) is formed with a cantilever shape. A second elastic support arm (18) is extended from the free end of the first support arm (16). Both sides of the second elastic support arm (18) face each other and are extended. The pairs of the first and second elastic support arms (16,18) are symmetrical based on a virtual extension line passing through the center of the clip body (10). In the free end of the second elastic support arm (18), a mounting part (20) for mounting a first combination object (30) is formed. If the first combination object (30) is mounted on the mounting part (20), a distance between both free ends of the second elastic support arm (18) is maintained. According to the present invention like this, an automatic assembly process of the first combination object (30) and the second combination object (40) can be easily and accurately carried out.

column12: WAFER TRANSFER SYSTEM OF VERTICAL FURNACE
ELECTROLYTIC BOWL FOR ELECTROLYTIC CAPACITOR MAKING
IoT Reinforcement and maintenance method of facilities using IoT and clear elastomeric coating for facility safety
column13: The present invention relates to a facility reinforcement and maintenance method using the Internet of Things and a transparent elastic paint. The present invention includes: a step of preparing a fiber grid or a metal grid; and a step of fixing the fiber grid or the metal grid with respect to a facility. According to the present invention, a material (such as the transparent elastic paint, the fiber grid, and the metal grid) for facility durability reinforcement is provided on the surface of the wall, ceiling, floor, pillar, beam, or the like of the facility. As a result, the object structure can be easily observed with the naked eye on the site and a damaged part or the like of the facility can be clearly identified with the naked eye. Sensors are regularly attached on the facility for IoT-based remote facility state monitoring. An abnormality is checked by analysis of a part different from the unique frequency of the facility. As a result, maintenance can be facilitated and expedited.
column14: CHOI CHANG HOON;;SAFETY CREATORS CORP CO LTD

column12: Mask with beauty band for neck skin wrinkle protection that can be used simultaneously
column13: The present invention relates to a mask with a beauty band for preventing wrinkles on neck skin to be used simultaneously capable of preventing dust or bacteria from a nose or a mouth of a wearer; rapidly discharging steam to the outside; and preventing the wrinkles on the neck skin and aging of the neck skin of the wearer. The present invention comprises: a face protecting unit (108) which is positioned on a face of the wearer to prevent the bacteria from the nose or the mouth, and includes first, second, and third wrinkle units (102, 104, 106) at constant intervals; the beauty band (110) for preventing wrinkles on neck skin which is folded and unfolded in one side of a lower end of the face protecting unit (108), and is positioned on a neck of the wearer to prevent the wrinkles on the neck skin and the aging of the neck skin; and a hanging strap (112) which is installed in both ends of the face protecting unit (108) and is hung on ears of the wearer or a back head.

column12: DEVICE FOR SOLAR PANELS INSTALLATION
column13: Disclosed is a solar panel installing device. According to the present invention, it is possible to arrange solar panels to be inclined in the east-west direction when the solar panels are installed, thereby improving a separation distance between the solar panels and increasing an installation capacity of the solar panels.

column12: OPEN AND CLOSE APPARATUS FOR FUEL DOOR OF VEHICLES
column13: PURPOSE: A fuel door opening-closing apparatus is provided to reduce manufacturing cost by components reduction through composing an existing actuator and a push opener into one body. CONSTITUTION: A fuel door opening-closing apparatus comprises a housing(10), a motor(20), a popup lever(30), and a popup spring(40). The housing comprises a housing guide(12) in inner circumference. The motor is installed to be elevated in the housing. The pop up lever is rotated and moved by a motor mounting part in the lower part of the motor. The pop up lever comprises a sliding block(26) being moved along the housing guide. The popup spring supports the lower part of the popup lever elastically.

column12: CAMERA MODULE
column13: Provided is a camera module capable of solving problems caused by a filter. The camera module of the present invention comprises: a filter arranged between a lens and an image sensor; and a housing having a receiving unit for a wire connected to the image sensor, and having an installation unit for installing the filter. A first side of the installation unit and a second side of the filter are formed to have an inclined angle on an optical axis.

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PLAYING FRAMES CHANGE OF MULTI-FRAME VIDEO
column13: PURPOSE: A frames change reproduction apparatus of multi frame video and a method thereof are provided to offer seamless images to viewers. CONSTITUTION: A video frame mix unit(220) arranges header data about each frame in time order. A multi frame video file generating unit(230) creates a multi frame which is composed of an image file which is arranged in one header data. A broadcast information processing unit(240) synthesizes the video information. The broadcast information processing unit transmits the synthesized video information as one broadcast program information.

column12: LIGHT EMITTING DIODE FLAT LUMINAIRES
column13: The present invention is to provide an LED lighting fixture capable of improving convenience and efficiency of an installation work on a ceiling. For this, disclosed is the LED flat lighting fixture including: a light panel which induces a path and scattering and diffusion of a light; an LED module which irradiates the light to a side of the light panel by emitting the light when electricity is supplied; an edge frame which supports the light panel by surrounding all side frames of the light panel, and has an installation slot to install the LED module on a side facing the light panel, and has at least one rail groove on the upper plane; a slider holder which is installed on both sides of the upper planes of facing edge frames as being able to be slid, and has a hooking part protruded toward a center of the light panel, and has at least one guide protrusion of a shape corresponding to the rail groove on the bottom; and a bracket which has a hanger part apart from the ceiling at both ends in order for the hooking part of the slider holder to be hooked and supported selectively.

column12: Network traffic aggregation method and device for in-vehicle telematics systems using tethering and peer-to-peer networking of mobile devices
column13: A method for enhancing a data communication throughput associated with an in-vehicle telematics system includes receiving a communication request from the in-vehicle telematics system to perform at least one of a data upload to the Internet and a data download from the Internet, and verifying availability of one or more mobile devices within the vehicle. The maximum capability of a mobile network interface for each of the one or more available mobile devices within the vehicle is determined. When the communication request is for uploading data to the Internet, the data is fragmented into data fragments and distributed to the available mobile devices, whereas when the communication request is for downloading data from the Internet, it is determined for each mobile device which fragment of data is to be downloaded and from which server, and the respective determined fragments are received from each mobile device.

column12: UNMANNED MOVING OBJECT METHOD AND PROGRAM FOR CONTROLLING DOCKING OF UNMANNED MOVING OBJECT USING MARKER
column13: 본 개시는 마커를 활용한 무인 이동체의 도킹 제어 방법에 있어서, 도킹 스테이션까지의 도킹 경로를 생성하는 단계; 무인 이동체의 카메라를 통해 획득되는 영상 내에 포함된 마커를 인식하는 단계; 인식된 마커에 기록된 마커의 위치 정보를 획득하는 단계; 마커의 위치 정보가 도킹 스테이션의 도킹 선상에 직교되는 위치인 경우, 도킹 경로에 따라 기 설정된 제1 지점으로 이동하는 단계; 제1 지점으로의 이동이 완료된 경우, 도킹 스테이션과 서로 평행하도록 마커의 위치 정보를 기반으로 본체를 기 설정된 수준에 만족되도록 제1 얼라인하는 단계; 제1 얼라인이 완료된 경우, 도킹 경로에 따라 기 설정된 제2 지점으로 이동하는 단계; 제2 지점으로의 이동이 완료된 경우, 본체를 기 설정된 수준에 만족되도록 제2 얼라인하는 단계; 및 제2 얼라인이 완료된 경우, 도킹 경로에 따라 기 설정된 도킹을 위한 제3 지점으로 이동하여 도킹을 완료하는 단계; 를 포함할 수 있다.

column12: METHOD FOR MAKING BOOK DATA UNITING A BIBLIOGRAPHY DATA AND THE BODY OF A BOOK AND SYSTEM FOR EXECUTING THE METHOD
column13: A method and a system for generating book information integrating bibliography data and text data of a book are provided to enable a user to search a desired book easily and improve the quality of a search result by enabling the user to search the text data of the book as well as the bibliography data, as the bibliography data and the text data of a book are mapped/integrated. A bibliography data processor(S1310) receives bibliography data of a book from a CP(Content Provider) and stores the bibliography data to a bibliography database. A text data processor(S1320) receives text data of the book from the CP or other CPs, and stores the text data to a text database. A book information processor(S1330) generates book information based on the bibliography and text data, and stores the book information to an integrated book database. The book information processor includes a data integrator(S1331) integrating the bibliography and text data by adding a book ID to the bibliography and text data, a book information storing part(S1332), a data score calculator(S1333) calculating a data score for the text data including the same book ID as the bibliography data, and a data score adder(S1334) adding the data score to the text data.

column12: A COLD WAREHOUSE WHICH IS UNIFORMLY CONTROLLABLE ITS TEMPERATURE AND HUMIDITY
column13: The present invention relates to a low-temperature storage used to store various agricultural products. More specifically, cool air is supplied from a ceiling toward a lower portion of the low temperature storage, thereby uniformly supplying cool air over the entire area of the low temperature storage. A spray nozzle for humidity regulation is installed on the ceiling, and sprays moisture until the humidity reaches its target humidity preset from a controller, thereby minimizing a deviation between the temperature and humidity in the low temperature storage. Thus, it is possible to maintain long-term freshness of the stored agricultural products.

column12: Maintenance and protection facilities using tunnel walkways
column13: The present invention relates to maintenance and repair equipment using a tunnel walkway, which can be installed on the side wall of the tunnel walkway, thereby protecting vehicles and workers. In accordance with an embodiment of the present invention, a maintenance and repair equipment using a tunnel walkway comprises: a buffer panel installed on a side wall contacting a road on which vehicles travel in a tunnel walkway to buffer a collision of a vehicle on the side wall; a panel guide provided on the side wall to guide vertical sliding of the buffer panel so that the buffer panel is lifted upward from the side wall to enable repair in the tunnel walkway; a panel support rotatably installed on the buffer panel to form an evacuation space for workers working on the tunnel walkway by being tilted toward the tunnel walkway with the buffer panel slid upward from the panel guide; and a panel stopper for fixing the buffer panel with the buffer panel lifted upward by the panel guide. The buffer panel includes: a buffer pad having a plurality of buffer pockets; a pad frame in which the buffer pad is installed, and a guide protrusion portion inserted into and guided by the panel guide is installed; and a buffer throwing fire extinguisher inserted into the buffer pocket to buffer a collision of a vehicle, filled with a fire extinguishing liquid to extinguish a fire after being drawn out from the buffer pocket.

column12: Mechanical valve for automatically controlling ventilation opening and control method
column13: The invention provides a mechanical valve capable of automatically controlling a ventilation opening and a control method. The mechanical valve comprises a control assembly, and the control assembly comprises a box body, a mechanical air inlet pipe, a natural ventilation pipe, an air outlet pipe, a fixing plate, a rectangular block, a first rotating rod, a first baffle, a first reset spring, a square block, a second rotating rod, a second baffle and a second reset spring. When a ventilator runs, a first baffle is blown to rotate, a first reset spring is stretched in the rotating process of the first baffle, the first baffle drives a baffle to rotate, a second reset spring is stretched in the rotating process of a second baffle, the second baffle blocks a natural ventilation pipe, and the natural ventilation pipe is closed; when the ventilator stops, the first reset spring drives the first baffle to reset, the first baffle blocks and closes the mechanical air inlet pipe, meanwhile, the second reset spring drives the second baffle to reset, natural ventilation is started, and when the ventilator stops, operation of the post-baking equipment cannot be affected.
column14: SUZHOU YANGJI ELECTROMECHANICAL ENG CO LTD

column12: Method for detecting cracks in the silicone rod
column13: According to the present invention, a non-destructive inspection method to distinguish existence of a crack existing on a surface or in a silicon rod and the position of the crack comprises: (a) using an ultrasonic wave generator to apply an ultrasonic wave having a prescribed frequency to one surface of the silicon rod; (b) measuring a frequency of an ultrasonic wave detected on the other surface of the silicon rod; and (c) comparing the measured frequency of the ultrasonic wave and a reference frequency to distinguish existence of a crack and/or the position of the crack, or comprises: (A) using a heat source to heat a portion of one surface of the silicon rod; (B) using a heat detection unit to measure a temperature of a surface or in silicon on the other surface of the silicon rod; and (C) comparing the measured temperature and a reference temperature to distinguish existence of a crack and/or the position of the crack.

column12: AUTO TRANSMISSION OIL COOLING SYSTEM
column13: The present invention relates to an automatic transmission oil cooling system and, more specifically, to an automatic transmission oil cooling system which comprises: an automatic transmission; an air-cooling type oil cooler; and a water-cooling type oil cooler. The automatic transmission, the air-cooling type oil cooler and the water-cooling type oil cooler are connected by an oil circulation hose. As a bypass valve is arranged on the oil circulation hose, the circulation pathway is controlled according to the temperature of oil in the automatic transmission. Therefore, the automatic transmission oil cooling system can improve the fuel efficiency of a vehicle and reduce a load on a transmission oil pump, by allowing the oil in the automatic transmission to quickly reach an appropriate temperature in an initial cooling stage.

column12: ELECTROLYTIC CAPACITOR TEST EQUIPMENT
ASSEMBLING STRUCTURE OF AXLE
column13: The present invention provides an axle assembling structure, which comprises: a differential case provided inside a carrier case; a differential bearing positioned on one surface of the differential case and supported by the carrier case; and a differential gear where an extension unit extended from one surface is inserted into the differential case and the differential bearing.

column12: AN INTERPHONE SERVICE METHOD USING DATA COMMUNICATION NETWORK
column13: An extension telephone service method using mobile phones and a data communication network is provided to realize a call service method not having spatial restriction by using a mobile phone as an extension phone. A mobile phone makes a call request to a call service server through a wireless AP(Access Point), the call service server judges whether the call request is an extension call request(S100). If so, the call service server searches an extension information DB(S110). Based on the data obtained from the extension information DB, the call service server checks whether an extension phone which will receive a call is connected to the wireless AP(S120). If so, the call service server connects the extension phone to the mobile phone(S130). In case the call request is not the extension call request, however, the call service server analyzes a phone type(S102). The call service server connects the outgoing call through a data communication network, a PSTN or a mobile communication network(S104).

column12: BLADE FOR REFILL
THE TIE ROD OF AUTOMATIC ADJUSTING LENGTH TYPE AND THE STEERING APPARATUS FOR VEHICLE HAVING THE SAME
column13: A tie rod controlling the length automatically and a steering device of a vehicle are provided to reduce a working time for coupling a lock nut accurately by forming a coupling stopper in a screw part coupled with the tie rod end. A tie rod controlling the length automatically includes a screw part(240) and a coupling stopper(320). The tie rod is coupled in a tie rod end and transmits the operation of a rack bar. One side of the tie rod is connected to the rack bar with an inner ball joint(210). The other side of the tie rod is coupled in the tie rod end(120). The tie rod end is connected to a knuckle of a wheel by an outer ball joint. The screw part of the tie rod is coupled to the tie rod end. The coupling stopper is formed in the screw part. The coupling stopper has the enlarged diameter to limit the coupling length.

column12: THIN-HEAT FILM AND HEAT-RADIATION SHEET COMPARING THE SAME
column13: The present invention relates to an ultra thin heat radiation film and a multilayer heat diffusion sheet including the same. The ultra thin heat radiation film has a structure which includes an insulation thin film, a heat diffusion and radiation thin film which is in surface contact with a first surface of the insulation thin film, and a heat diffusion bonding thin film which is in surface contact with the heat diffusion and radiation thin film. The multilayer heat diffusion sheet includes the ultra thin heat radiation film, a first heat diffusion and radiation bonding thin film, a heat diffusion thin film, and a second heat diffusion and radiation bonding thin film. The heat diffusion sheet with the described structure has the same heat diffusion effect as an existing synthetic graphite sheet with high manufacturing costs.

column12: Photocrosslinkable electrically conductive polymers
column13: Photocrosslinkable electrically conductive polymers and compositions including the polymers are provided. Also, electrically conductive layers or films formed from the compositions, preparation methods of these, and articles including the electrically conductive layers or films are provided. The electrically conductive polymers according to the present disclosure have photoreactive groups that can be crosslinked using like. The electrically conductive polymers can also be dissolved in aqueous solution. These photocrosslinkable and soluble properties allow the electrically conductive polymers to be used in wet processing to make films and/or to be made into a patterned conductive layer or film using a photomask.
column14: CHOI DONG HOON;;UNIV KOREA RES & BUS FOUND
column16: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION (2010-01-18)
column32: K. G. Chittibabu, et al "Synthesis and Properties of a Novel Polythiophene Derivative with a Side-Chane NLO Chromophore" Chem. Mater. 1994, 6, 475-480.;;Massimiliano Lanzi, et al "New photosetting NLO-active polythiophenes with enhanced optical stability" European Polymer Journal 45 (2009) 1118-1126.;;Kai Wing Cheng, et al "Synthesis of Conjugated Polymers with Pendant Ruthenium Terpyridine Trithiocyanato Complexes and Their Applications in Heterojunction Photovoltaic Cells" Journal of Polymer Science: Part A: Polymer Chemistry, 2008, vol. 46, pp. 1305-1317.;;J. Morgado, et al "Optical properties of cross-linkable fluorene copolymers" Proceedings of SPIE-The International Society for Optical Engineering (2006), vol. 6192: (Organic Optoelectronics and Photonics II) pp. 619224/1-619224/7.;;Australian Patent Office, International Search Report and Written Opinion mailed Mar. 29, 2011 in corresponding PCT application No. PCT/KR2010/009122.

column12: METHOD FOR PROCESSING DATA CALL BETWEEN WCDMA AND EPC NETWORKS
column13: PURPOSE: A data call processing method between a WCDMA(Wideband Code Division Multiple Access) network and an EPC(Evolved Packet core) network is provided to execute a PCC(Policy and Charging Control) process by using call plan information in the evolved packet core network. CONSTITUTION: When a data call is requested from a terminal device, an SGSN(Serving GPRS(General Packet Radio Service) Support Node)(230) of a WCDMA network requests a subscriber profile to an HLR(Home Location Register) of a WCDMA network. The SGSN receives the subscriber profile from the HLR. The SGSN determines the location of a terminal device which uses the WCDMA network or an EPC network based on the subscriber profile. When the terminal device located in the EPC network, the SGSN transmits a data call message to a PDN GW(Packet Data Network GateWay) of the EPC network.

column12: KEY PAD WITH KEY INTERLOCKING PREVENTION FUNCTION AND PORTABLE TERMINAL HAVING THE SAME
Cooling structure of electronic element
Removable Smart Unattended Quarantine Blocking Gate
column13: 본 발명은 With 코로나 시대뿐만 아니라 기존에도 존재하였던 조류독감과 구제역등의 전염병에서도 일상적인 방역이 가능하도록 할 수 있는 장치이며, 이러한 장비의 운영에 필요한 인력과 비용, 시간등을 아낄 수 있도록 이동식 통합장치로 만듦으로서 그 효과를 나타낸 다고 할 수 있다.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS PROVIDING ADAPTIVE EXERCISE PROGRAM
column13: According to one embodiment of the present invention, provided is a method for providing an adaptive exercise program performed by a device for providing an adaptive exercise program, which includes the steps of: collecting life pattern information of a user; collecting information on changes in the user before providing the user with a first exercise program corresponding to the life pattern information; and when a change occurs, providing a second exercise program in which the change is reflected instead of the first exercise program.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR VERIFYING CIRCUIT AT CIRCUIT DIAGRAM DESIGNED
column13: The present invention relates to a circuit and component verification system and method in a designed circuit diagram. The system comprises: a scanner for scanning and converting a designed circuit diagram, specifications of various components used in the circuit diagram, and a data sheet on which required characteristics of a product are recorded into image data; a verification terminal equipped with a characteristic data extraction engine for distinguishing figures and characters from each image data converted through the scanner, recognizing a specific character and a location for a required search object, and extracting a parameter according to the required characteristics of the product and an analysis program for comparing and analyzing the characteristic data extracted from the characteristic data extraction engine with check data to evaluate the suitability of design reflection for the search object; and a storage device for storing the image data generated by the scanner as well as the extraction data and result data generated by the verification terminal. According to the present invention, it is possible to evaluate and verify whether there is no cause of a problem in the circuit itself designed in a circuit diagram design step so that the suitability of a circuit design and the validity of component selection reflected in the design can be confirmed in the circuit diagram design step. While shortening the product development schedule, it is possible to reduce the occurrence of losses and improve the quality of the product.

column12: MOBILE TERMINAL
column13: PURPOSE: A mobile terminal is provided to suppress the increase of internal temperature in a terminal caused by heat generation of electrical elements within a specific range. CONSTITUTION: A mobile terminal comprises a terminal body; a circuit board (250) installed in the terminal body and on which at least one electrical element is mounted; sealing parts (252,253) combined to the circuit board for covering the at least one electrical element; a frame having a first surface contacting with the sealing parts and a second surface to which a display module is combined. A first heat transfer part is formed on the first surface for transferring heat from the sealing part to the frame. A heat transfer prevention part is formed on the second surface for reducing heat transfer from the frame to the display module.

column12: DEHUMIDIFIER FOR AGRICULTURAL AND MARINE PRODUCTS DRYER
column13: PURPOSE: A dehumidifier of a dryer for agricultural and marine products is provided to effectively discharge moisture in the dryer by injecting the air in a low temperature to inside the dryer, and to continuously circulate the air in the dryer. CONSTITUTION: A dehumidifier of a dryer for agricultural and marine products comprises the following: an exhaust port formed on one side of the dryer; an outdoor air inlet port(5) formed to suck the air and formed on the bottom of the dryer; a switching device(20) installed on the outdoor air inlet port; an inlet cover(7) formed on a plunger of a solenoid; and a plunger part(5b) is formed on the outside of the outdoor air inlet port. A bracket and a shaft are formed to connect the inlet cover to the plunger of the solenoid.

column12: PHOTOCROSSLINKABLE ELECTRICALLY CONDUCTIVE POLYMERS
column13: Photocrosslinkable electrically conductive polymers and compositions including the polymers are provided. Also, electrically conductive layers or films formed from the compositions, preparation methods of these, and articles including the electrically conductive layers or films are provided. The electrically conductive polymers according to the present disclosure have photoreactive groups that can be crosslinked using like. The electrically conductive polymers can also be dissolved in aqueous solution. These photocrosslinkable and soluble properties allow the electrically conductive polymers to be used in wet processing to make films and/or to be made into a patterned conductive layer or film using a photomask.
column14: UNIV KOREA RES & BUS FOUND;;CHOI DONG HOON
column32: CHITTIBABU, K G ET AL.: "Synthesis and Properties of a Novel Polythiophene Derivative with a Side-Chain NLO Chromophore", CHEMISTRY OF MATERIALS, vol. 6, 1994, pages 475 - 480;;LANZI, M ET AL.: "New photosetting NLO-active polythiophenes with enhanced optical stability", EUROPEAN POLYMER JOURNAL, vol. 45, 2009, pages 1118 - 1126;;CHENG, K W ET AL.: "Synthesis of Conjugated Polymers with Pendent Ruthenium Terpyridine Trithiocyanato Complexes and Their Applications in Heterojunction Photovoltaic Cells", JOURNAL OF POLYMER SCIENCE, PART A: POLYMER CHEMISTRY, vol. 46, 2008, pages 1305 - 1317

column12: VACUUM DRYER IT USES THE FAR INFRARED RAY LAMP
column13: A vacuum dryer with a far infrared ray lamp inside a hemispherical vacuum dryer and a shielding device immediately below the far infrared ray lamp to reflect light and heat is provided. The vacuum dryer indirectly irradiates an article to be dried with the heat source of the lamp without direct irradiation by reflecting the heat source to a reflecting surface thereby retaining the color and nutrients of the article to be dried as it was without destruction. The vacuum dryer(100) comprises: a hemispherical cover(101); a far infrared ray lamp(103) on one side of the upper center of the inside(102) of the dryer; and a shielding device(105) immediately below the lamp to reflect a heat source reflecting from the lamp to a reflecting surface(108) and to indirectly irradiate an article to be dried with the reflected heat source at the bottom along a reflection path(107). The shielding device is fixed to a second support rod(106).

column12: ANTIBACTERIAL AND DEODORANT COMPOSITION INCLUDING GALLA RHOIS
column13: The present invention relates to an antibacterial and deodorant composition including Rhus javanica, and more particularly, to an antibacterial and deodorant composition including a Rhus javanica extract as an active ingredient, as a Y-zone care composition for feminine cleanliness with excellent antibacterial and deodorizing properties and durability by utilizing the Rhus javanica, which is excellent in biological deodorization rather than sensory deodorization.

column12: USE OF ETHANOL EXTRACT OF HERMENIA ACANTHOLEPIS AS AN ANTI-CANCER AGENT
column13: PURPOSE: Provided is the use of an ethanol extract of Hermenia acantholepis as an anti-cancer agent. The extract has strong anticancer effect on the Balb/c mouse in which cancer is induced. CONSTITUTION: An ethanol extract of Hermenia acantholepis is obtained by the steps of: grinding 200g of Hermenia acantholepis and mixing with a mixed extraction solvent of ethanol and acetone in a 100cc flask; shaking the flask in a shaker for about 48 hours then removing the solvent; adding a new mixed solvent thereto and repeating the above washing process twice; and concentrating the ethanol extract under reduced pressure with a rotary evaporator. The ethanol extract is suspended in a buffer solution then injected into a Balb/c mouse in which Large Intestine Cancer is induced, periodically.

column12: COUNTER CIRCUIT WITH HALF DUTY CYCLE
Bookstand having storage for base plate
column13: The present invention relates to a bookholder having a storage base plate, which solves a problem that keeping, storage and carriage are inconvenient in a prior art by being easily carried because a base plate and a clamp are foldable so as not to protrude to the outside. The present invention provides a bookholder, comprising: a main panel formed in a flat rectangular shape so as to maintain an angle; a base plate formed in a long rectangular shape so as to support the lower part of a book; a hiding plate having a shape of being partially extended from one surface of the base plate so as to hide a clamp; the clamp configured to rotate in a horizontal direction around a portion coupled to an end surface of the base plate such that paper can be fixated so as not to turn; a support storage unit formed in a shape of being capable of storing the base plate and the clamp such that the base plate can be completely stored so as not to protrude; and a support stand configured to form a plane with multiple faces of the main panel such that the angle of the main panel can be adjusted. Therefore, the present invention solves a problem that keeping, storage and carriage are inconvenient in a prior art by being easily carried because the base plate and the clamp are foldable so as not to protrude to the outside.

column12: KENDO GAME DEVICE
column13: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a kendo game device which enables a user to enjoy kendo competition in accordance with the actual competition regulation freely without restriction of time and space, even when the user has not acquired kendo technique or has not prepared with an outfit for kendo competition.SOLUTION: The kendo game device includes: at least one game piece which is classified for each team participating the game; a game board 10 in which a position for a game piece for each team is indicated; and a plurality of competitive cards for competing for victory or defeat when the game piece of each team is placed in the same position. The game piece is a three-dimensional character showing any one of the kendo postures including an upper stage posture, a middle stage posture, and a two-sword fencing posture, and is made movable on the game board in accordance with a prescribed regulation respectively.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

column12: MOVING ROBOT BASED ON AVOIDANCE PATH MODEL AUTONOMOUS DRIVING METHOD AND PROGRAM FOR MOVING ROBOT
column13: 본 개시는 인공 지능 기반의 이동 로봇의 공간 크기별 맞춤형 자율 주행 방법에 있어서, 이동 로봇이 도착지까지의 전역 경로를 생성하는 단계; 이동 로봇이 도착지까지의 전역 경로에 따라 기 설정된 공간 크기보다 큰 제1 공간 또는 기 설정된 공간 크기보다 작은 제2 공간인지를 판단하는 단계; 제1 공간이면, 이동 로봇이 장애물을 감지한 상태에서 기 설정된 장애물과의 접근 시간 및 접근 거리가 될 때에, 장애물의 접근 상태에 따라 회피하여 주행하기 위한 제1 회피 경로를 생성하는 단계; 및 제2 공간이면, 이동 로봇이 장애물을 감지한 순간, 장애물을 즉시 회피하여 주행하기 위한 제2 회피 경로를 생성하는 단계를 포함할 수 있다.

column12: DIGITAL DOOR-LOCK CONTROL SYSTEM WHICH USES THE DOOR PHONE
SIGN LANGUAGE GLOVE TRANSLATION SYSTEM
column13: The present invention relates to a system for translating a sign language glove. Such a system for translating the sign language glove includes: a sensor unit to include a second sensor which is a flexible sensor disposed in a length direction of fingers and detects a bending degree of each of the five fingers, a first sensor to detect a degree of spread between two adjacent fingers among the five fingers, and a third sensor, which is a gyro sensor, to detect a position or a degree of movement of a hand; a process unit to receive sensing information from the sensor unit, to classify the sensing information by giving different bit information depending on bending information of the five fingers, the degree of spread between fingers, or the position and the degree of movement of the hand, and to adopt a sign language or a sentence corresponding to a combination of the bit information; and an output unit including a speaker that outputs a sign language word or the sentence processed by the process unit in the form of a sound, or a display that outputs the sign language word or the sentence in the form of a text. Accordingly, since the sign language may be output in the form of the sound or the text in real time, communicating directly with a user using the sign language is possible.

column12: Body figure curing slant footwear
ROTATABLE JIG SYSTEM FOR ASSEMBLING VEHICLE NAVIGATION DEVICE
column13: The present invention relates to a horizontally rotatable jig system for assembling a navigation device for a vehicle, which comprises a rotary mounting part which is installed to be horizontally rotated to a base part, rapidly couples a screw to a part during a process of assembling a navigation system, and prevents screw omission during a screw coupling work. The jig system according to the present invention improves the productivity of parts as the locking and releasing of the parts are automatically performed.

column12: SYSTEM FOR MIXING HETEROGENEOUS MOBILE COMMUNICATION, SGSN OF WCDMA NETWORK AND METHOD FOR PROCESSING DATA CALL THEREOF, MME OF EPC NETWORK AND METHOD FOR PROCESSING DATA CALL THEREOF
column13: PURPOSE: A system for mixing heterogeneous mobile communications capable of performing all kinds of PCC(Policy and Charging Control), SGSN(Serving General packet radio Services Support Node) of a WCDMA(Wideband Code Division Multiple Access) network and a processing method of a data call thereof, and MME(Mobility Management Entity) of an EPC(Evolved Packet Core) network and a processing method of a data call thereof are provided to process a data call during transmission of the rate system information of a subscriber between the WCDMA network and the EPC network in a mixed service environment of heterogeneous mobile communications where the WCDMA network and the EPC network are mixed. CONSTITUTION: SGSN of a WCDMA network(230) receives a profile of a subscriber, which includes the rate system information, from HLR(Home Location Register). The SGSN determines whether a terminal is a subscriber of a WCDMA network or an EPC network based on the profile of the subscriber. If the terminal is a subscriber of the WCDMA network, the SGSN transmits a data call message to GGSN(Gateway General packet radio service Support Node) of the WCDMA network. If the terminal is a subscriber of the EPC network, the SGSN stores the rate system information in the form of a provided value by the HLR and a predetermined value. The SGSN transmits the data call message to PDNGW(Packet Data Network GateWay) of the EPC network.

column12: TECHNIQUES FOR TRAINING A STORE DEMAND FORECASTING MODEL
column13: According to an embodiment of the present invention, a method for training a store demand forecasting model is disclosed. The method for training a store demand forecasting model comprises the following steps of: generating a demand forecasting value by inputting an input data set for learning including store reservation history information and date information to a store demand forecasting model; and determining a weight of the demand forecasting model by using the demand forecasting value and label data.

column12: DOOR OPENING/CLOSING APPARATUS HAVING A DEVICE TO REMOVE PARTICLES
column13: A gate door opening/closing apparatus having a particle removing structure is provided to maximize a failure due to particles caused by vibration occurring during the drive of a substrate and the opening/closing apparatus by suitably controlling the particles so as to be discharged to the outside. A gate door opening/closing apparatus having a particle removing structure includes a gate door(110), a gate door driver(111), a particle removing unit(200) and a vacuum pump(204). The gate door opens and closes an opening/closing hole through which a substrate enters and leaves. The gate door driver drives the gate door. The particle removing unit is provided at one side of the opening/closing hole. The vacuum pump is connected to the particle removing unit. The particle removing unit has an electromagnetic field generator. The particle removing unit is formed of a chemical material resistant to chemical components of fluid.

column12: THE C/G FILTER COMPOSITE AND THE CONSTRUCTION METHOD FOR COLLAPSE PREVENTION AND DEFECT PREVENTION OF RETAINING WALL THEREWITH
column13: PURPOSE: C/G filter composite and a construction method for collapse prevention and defect prevention of a retaining wall using the same are provided to prevent the collapse or defect of a retaining wall by reduction in earth pressure and water pressure and increase the safety and stability of the retaining wall. CONSTITUTION: A construction method for collapse prevention and defect prevention of a retaining wall using C/G filter composite comprises following steps. A drainpipe(200) is installed behind a built retaining wall(600), and a form is installed. C/G filter composite is mixed. The mixture of C/G filter composite is placed between the retaining wall and the form. The placed C/G filter composite is cured for a fixed time, and the installed form and the support are removed, so a drainage zone(100) is formed. A non-woven fabric is installed in the exposed portion of the drainage zone. Back-filling soil(500) is placed on the rear side of the drainage zone.

column12: FUEL PROCESSING DEVICE
TILTABLE SLIDING DEVICE
column13: A sliding device which can perform a tilting motion with a sliding motion and realize various modes is provided. The sliding device includes: a cover unit; a main unit being slidably combined with a back of the cover unit; and a tilting unit being rotatably combined with a side of the main unit according to a sliding direction, and being tillable to a front at a predetermined angle when the cover unit is slid to an upper part. Accordingly, the sliding device may perform the tilting motion with the sliding motion, realize various modes, and improve a call quality and a grip feeling of a user when the sliding device is applied to a portable terminal.

column12: CAMERA MODULE
column13: There is provided a camera module including a first camera unit, a second camera unit, and an actuator. The actuator is configured to obtain a resolving power value of an image captured by the second camera unit and move a lens barrel of the first camera unit in an optical axis direction to adjust the focal length of the first camera unit according to the resolving power value.

column12: PORTABLE MIST GENERATOR AND INITIAL OUTPUT CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column13: PURPOSE: A portable ultrasound mist generator and an initial output control method thereof are provided to efficiently remove bubbles or foreign substances in a mesh filter installed in a mist generating unit of the generator. CONSTITUTION: A portable ultrasound mist generator (100) is composed of an injecting port (110), a button (120), and a control unit. Mist is sprayed through the injecting port. The button inputs an on-off switch. The control unit controls a mist generating function by vibrating an ultrasound oscillator and outputs a preset frequency. The control unit executes a normal resonance mode by outputting a resonance frequency after operating an initial operation mode during preset operation mode execution time.

column12: Deep learning-based water management decision support information provision system and method
column13: The present invention relates to a method for providing deep learning-based water management decision-making support information. The method of the present invention comprises the steps of: collecting, by an image collection unit, an image from a CCTV installed in a plurality of water facilities; collecting, by a measured data collection unit, measured data from measurement devices installed in the water facilities; pre-processing, by a deep-learning model generating unit, collected image data, reading pre-processed data, and learning the same on the basis of a model defined by a network to generate a deep-learning model for water management decision-making support; analyzing, by an analysis predicting unit, a water source environment for each of the water facilities, and generating an expected warning step; and generating, by an image generating unit, an intelligent water resource management image on the basis of the collected data. Therefore, decision-making for water management for each water facility can be rapidly performed.

column12: HINGE ASSEMBLY FOR HOME BAR DOOR OF REFRIGERATOR AND REFRIGERATOR USING THE SAME
column13: Disclosed is a hinge assembly for rotatably setting a home bar door onto a refrigerator door, and a refrigerator using the same.
