The hinge assembly includes a hinge axis extended from a home bar door opening/closing an opening in a refrigerator door; and an oil damper including a housing fixed onto the refrigerator door, a rotary shaft inserted into the housing to form a sealed space filled with oil, and connected to the hinge axis to attenuate rotation force of the hinge axis by forming a blade on one side to move in the oil, a penetration opening formed through the rotary shaft and connect the sealed space with exterior, and a fixing member inserted to/fixed to the penetration opening to seal the penetration opening. According to an embodiment, a refrigerator includes a body with a food preservation chamber kept at low temperature, a refrigerator door formed in the body to open/close the food preservation chamber and having an opening penetrating therethrough, a home bar door disposed to open/close the opening and having a hinge axis protruded from a lower part, and the hinge assembly.

column12: FINGER PRESSURE APPARATUS OF MOBILE PHONE
ELECTRICALLY CONDUCTIVE POLYMERS WITH ENHANCED CONDUCTIVITY
column13: An electrically conductive polymer linked to conductive nanoparticle is provided. The conductive polymer can include conductive monomers and one or more monomers in the conductive polymer can be linked to a conductive nanoparticle and can include a polymerizable moiety so that it can be incorporated into a polymer chain. The electrically conductive monomer can include a 3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene as a conductive monomer. The electrically conductive polymer having the conductive nanoparticle can be prepared into an electrically conductive layer or film for use in electronic devices.

column12: SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE AND METHOD FOR FABRICATING THE SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE
column13: Provided are a semiconductor device which has increased operation performance and can be miniaturized and a manufacturing method of a semiconductor device. The manufacturing method of a semiconductor device provides a substrate including a semiconductor material having a first lattice constant, forms a first semiconductor pattern extended in a first direction by patterning the substrate, forms a second semiconductor pattern having a second lattice constant greater than the first lattice constant by being extended in the first direction on the first semiconductor pattern, forms a side wall of the second semiconductor pattern extended in a second direction crossing the first direction by patterning the second semiconductor pattern, and forms a gate electrode extended in the first direction on the second semiconductor pattern.

column12: Agents for improving dye fastness
column13: An agent that is capable of improving dye fastness is provided. The agent includes a compound that includes at least one functional group capable of forming at least one interaction or at least one bond with a fiber or a dye molecule. Also, a method for using the agents to improve dye fastness and a dyed article including the agent are provided.
column14: CHOI DONG HOON;;UNIV KOREA RES & BUS FOUND
column16: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION (2010-03-16)
column32: Gerald L. Witucki "A Silane Primer: Chemistry and Applications of Alkoxy Silanes" Back to Basics, A Journal of Coatings Technology, Presented at the 57th Annual Meeting of the Federation of Societies for Coatings and Technology, Oct. 21, 1992 in Chicago Illinois, US.;;International Search Report and Written Opinion from International Application No. PCT/KR2010/009125.

column12: SPIN HEAD, AND METHOD FOR TREATING SUBSTRATE USING THE SAME
column13: A spin head and method for treating substrate using the same are provided to prevent the unnecessary part of substrate from being etched by fume by using the suction tube. The spin head(600) rotates the fixed wafer(W). The spin head comprises the body(100), the chucking pin(110) and support pin(120). The protection vessel(500) is prepared in the circumference of the body. The axis of rotation(200) unites with the body and rotates the body. The nozzle(410) is prepared inside the axis of rotation. The axis of rotation unites with the driving part(300). The nozzle is rotated by the torque of the driving part and then the wafer is rotated. A plurality of penetration holes is formed on the upper side of the body. The chucking pin is combined with the pin driving part.

column12: SLIDING DEVICE
column13: A sliding device is provided to minimize the friction of sliding, improve the convenience of a user due to stable sliding operation and reduce necessary power in sliding action. A cover unit is combined to a main unit. A sliding module(100) is equipped between a main unit and a cover unit and has a pair of members respectively mounted on the main unit and the cover unit. A sliding roller(410) obtains the circular cross-section and performs the rolling motion along a slide direction of the main unit and the cover unit according to the sliding direction of the cover unit and main unit.

column12: TRANSMISSION OIL BYPASS VALVE
column13: The present invention relates to a transmission oil bypass valve. The transmission oil bypass valve comprises: a first flow passage connected to an oil outlet of a transmission and an oil inlet of an oil cooler; a second flow passage connected to an oil inlet of the transmission and an oil outlet of the oil cooler; a bypass flow passage connected to the first flow passage and the second flow passage; and a valve plate opening and closing the bypass flow passage. When the valve plate closes the bypass flow passage, the present invention has a stepped surface of the bypass flow passage coming in contact with the valve plate or a sealing layer formed to prevent oil from being leaked to the valve plate. Accordingly, the valve plate prevents oil cooling performance of the transmission from being degraded by leakage when the valve plate closes the bypass flow passage.

column12: Mounting structure of valve plate for vacuum gate valve
column13: 본 발명은 일측에 공정챔버와 연통되는 개구가 길이방향을 따라 형성된 밸브하우징의 내부에 설치되되, 승강 및 상기 개구방향으로 회동 가능하게 설치된 밸브로드의 상단부에 결합되는 진공 게이트밸브용 밸브플레이트의 실링 장착구조에 관한 것으로서, 블록형상으로서, 일측면에 상기 개구를 차폐하는 차폐면이 형성되고, 가장자리를 따라 하방으로 함몰된 설치홈이 형성된 밸브플레이트 및 상기 설치홈 내에 융착설치되는 실링부재를 포함하되, 상기 설치홈은 상기 차폐면의 가장자리를 따라 하방으로 함몰 형성되는 메인설치홈 및 상기 밸브플레이트의 일정간격 이격된 각각의 측면 일측과 상기 메인설치홈을 연통하는 다수개의 연통홀 및 상기 메인설치홈이 형성된 상기 밸브플레트의 일정간격 이격된 각각의 내측면 일측으로부터 상기 밸브플레이트의 내측방향으로 연장형성되는 다수개의 걸림홀을 포함하여 이루어진다. 상기와 같은 본 발명에 의하면, 진공 게이트밸브용 밸브플레이트의 실링 장착구조를 개선하여 실링부재의 고정력이 향상됨에 따라 장기간 사용에도 실링부재가 밸브플레이트로부터 쉽게 이탈되는 것을 방지할 수 있다. 또한, 본 발명은 실링부재로 인가되는 응력을 분산시켜 최소화함과 아울러 방열 기능을 제공함에 따라 실링부재의 내구성이 현저하게 향상된다.

column12: Apparatus for Droplet Formation
column13: The present invention relates to a droplet discharge device which includes: a heat-emission part composed of a member capable of generating heat; and an ink jet head having a structure in contact with the heat-emission part. The droplet discharge device may further include a heat-blocking part for preventing delivery of heat generated by the heat-emission part toward the ink jet head or a temperature lowering part for lowering a temperature of the heat generated by the heat-emission part so as to prevent the ink jet head from being heated by the heat.

column12: A WIDE AREA A SPRINKLER
column13: The present invention relates to a truck-mounted wide-area sprinkler that sprinkles an agricultural pesticide across a wide farmland during a movement of the truck along a farm road by using a sprinkler of a boom pole made up of a fan and an injection nozzle. According to the present invention, the boom pole can be automatically aligned in position through single button pressing during a movement following the use of the boom pole of the agricultural pesticide sprinkler. According to the present invention, a lateral detection unit detecting a rotation of direction in the case of lateral rotation in a case where the boom pole rotates in a main body for sprinkling, a correction position detection unit detecting a correction position in a state of return after the rotation by the lateral detection unit is returned by a one-touch button, a lowering detection unit causing the boom pole to be lowered in response to a signal from the correction position detection unit and restricting the degree of the lowering, and a boom pole support supporting the boom pole based on a signal generated by the correction position detection unit are lifted so that the boom pole is correctly supported by the boom pole support in a state of lowering to a correct position and stopped.

column12: TEST JIG FOR NAVIGATION DEVICE
column13: The present invention relates to a test jig for a navigation device. According to the present invention, the test jig for the navigation device allows a user to confirm that a fixating state and a detail function of the components are normally operated when the components are shaken before a vehicle navigation device is finally released after the vehicle navigation device is assembled. The test jig for the navigation device comprises: a product mounting unit where a product is mounted; a product sensor; a vibration generation unit generating vibration to be transmitted to the product; and a control unit controlled to operate the vibration generation unit.

column12: A processing tool system
column13: 본 발명은 자동 토출수단을 갖는 재사용 가공물 가공용 절삭공구장치에 있어서, 특히 원기둥형 공작물의 속을 깍아내어 원통형 구조물로 제작하는 과정에서 상기 원기둥형 공작물의 속을 원기둥 형태로 파내도록하여 재료의 재사용이 가능한 원기둥을 추출하여 이용성을 높이도록하되 가공용 절삭공구장치에 자동 토출수단을 더 부가설치하여 가공후 일정 압력이상 부하가 발생하면 가공장치의 전진이동을 중단시키고 자동으로 강제후퇴하여 가공물의 가공이 원할하게 진행될 수 있도록 구성한 것을 특징으로 하는 자동 토출수단을 갖는 재사용 가공물 가공용 절삭공구장치에 관한 것으로, 수직단면이 원형 또는 다각형으로 이루어지는 원기둥형 또는 다각기둥형 공작물과; 상기 공작물의 일측을 붙잡아 지지함과 동시에 회전시키는 회전 고정수단과; 상기 공작물의 타측에 접촉함과 동시에 내측을 원기둥 형태로 가공하기 위한 가공수단과; 상기 가공수단의 몸체를 통해 절삭유를 공급하는 절삭유 공급수단과; 상기 가공수단이 공작물로부터 쉽게 분리되도록 가공수단의 중심축에 설치되는 자동 토출수단 포함하여 이루어지는 것이 특징이다.

column12: Apparatus of Dividing Working Chamber of 3D Printer
column13: An apparatus of a 3D printer includes a working chamber plate that is disposed in a lower portion of a working chamber and is capable of being raised and lowered. A number of subsidiary plates are mounted on the working chamber plate. Each subsidiary plate is capable of being raised and lowered. A controller is configured to control raised and lowered heights of the subsidiary plates. Some of the subsidiary plates can be raised or lowered according to a size of a processed product to be 3D printed in the working chamber thereby adjusting a size of an inner volume of the working chamber.

column12: GRINDING JIG FOR PIN CORE
column13: PURPOSE: A grinding jig for a pin core is provided to replace the pin core without lifting and to obtain the pin core ground with the uniformed slotting depth by cutting a plurality of pin cores on a grindstone with predetermined height. CONSTITUTION: A grinding jig (100) for a pin core comprises a lower block (110), an upper block (120), a tap hole (113), a pin hole (125), a detachable block (130), a slot (131), a bolt (133), and a support pin (137). The slot is penetrated to forward and backward direction of the detachable block and is vertically elongated. The pin hole is penetrated to forward and backward direction of the detachable block and is positioned on an upper side of the slot. The support pin is inserted into the pin hole and supports the pin core. The bolt is connected to the tap hole and suppresses the support pin.

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PROCESSING OVERLAPPED PAGING SIGNAL ON EPC NETWORK
column13: PURPOSE: A duplicated paging processing device in an evolved packet core (EPC) network and a processing method thereof are provided to transmit a notification message noticing the inflow of a voice call to a terminal device after being activated by controlling the terminal device to respond to packet paging. CONSTITUTION: A network connecting part (450) receives packet paging from an EPC network or voice paging for circuit switched fall back (CSFB) from a mobile switching center (MSC) of a wideband code division multiple access (WCDMA) network. A paging transmission part (452) transmits the audio paging or the packet paging to the terminal device. A control part (454) transmits the packet paging or the audio paging to the terminal device through the paging transmission unit. The control part receives the audio paging from the MSC while transmitting the packet paging to the terminal device. The control part buffers the audio paging for a predetermined period of time and notifies the reception of the audio paging to the terminal device. [Reference numerals] (450) Network connecting part; (452) Paging transmission part; (454) Control part; (456) Memory part

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR CONTROLLING ELECTRONIC DEVICE OF VEHICLE
column13: A method for controlling software needed to drive an in-vehicle electronic device includes receiving a data package including a plurality of partial data needed to update software of a vehicle and applying either a parallel update procedure or a sequential update procedure according to whether first partial data to be updated through a central processing unit (CPU) is contained in the data package.
column32: Sommer, "Scheduling Algorithm for Simultaneous Software Updates of Electronic Device in Vehicles", 2008, IEEE ICC 2008 Workshop Proceeding (Year: 2008)

column12: NANOPARTICLES
column13: Nanoparticles can include a core linked to a polymerizable moiety that can be polymerized, cross-linked or cured. The nanoparticles can be included in a composition for a polymerization, cross-linking or curing reaction in an amount and disposition sufficient for inhibiting or preventing volume shrinkage during polymerization, cross-linking or curing reaction. Also, the nanoparticles can be included with monomers, dendrimers, oligomers or polymers in the compositions that can be reacted to form a polymerized, cross-linked or cured product.

column12: APPARATUS FOR DETECTING CURRENTS AND VOLTAGES OF POWER METER AND ELECTRIC LEAKAGE DETECTOR, CAPABLE OF DETECTING INSULATED STATE OF POWER LINE BY BEING COUPLED TO THE POWER LINE
column13: PURPOSE: An apparatus for detecting currents and voltages of a power meter and an electric leakage detector is provided to detect an insulated state of a power line by measuring the amount of power and the amount of leakage currents without cutting the power line. CONSTITUTION: A core as a flux path is divided into a lower core and an upper core. An induction coil is wound around one of the lower core and the upper core. A lead wire is connected to the induction coil in order to be connected to a PCB. The lower core is installed on a lower assembly substrate(500). The upper core is installed on an upper assembly substrate. A stacked structure of the lower assembly substrate, a power line, and the upper assembly substrate is formed by using a couple of bolts and a couple of nuts. A load current and a leakage current are detected from the power line.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR TRANSMITTING CONTROL INFORMATION IN CARRIER AGGREGATION SYSTEM
column13: The present invention relates to a method and device for inserting and transmitting upward link control information in an upward link data channel. When multiple upward link carriers support an upward link control channel transmission in a carrier accumulation system and multiple upward link control channel transmission and upward link data channel transmission are performed in a single sub-frame, multiple pieces of upward link control information are inserted and transmitted in an upward link data channel.

column12: LCD BACKLIGHT SET SYSTEM
column13: PURPOSE: A coupling structure of an LCD backlight supporting an entire screen with the luminance of the uniform brightness is provided to increase productivity and reduce the manufacturing time by manufacturing the body of the socket. CONSTITUTION: A conductive rubber electrically connects an inverter supplying an electrical signal and a lamp which is located in a cover bottom. The conductive rubber blocks up the flow of the lamp. The Holder Guide between the Cover bottom and pressure conductive rubber the thing for insulation. It locates in the Holder Guide so that the upper hook fix the pressure conductive rubber.

column12: PCB PCB THE MANUFACTURING APPARATUS FOR A PCB AND THE MANUFACTURING MATHOD FOR A PCB
column13: A PCB manufacturing method of the present invention comprises: an interposer step of providing an interposer array board including a plurality of interposers and an interposer support plate connected thereto; a slave step of providing a slave array board including a plurality of slaves and a slave support plate connected thereto; a coupling step of coupling the interposer array board and the slave array board; and a separation step of cutting and separating the interposer and the slave from the interposer support plate and the slave support plate, wherein a defect that occurs during PCB manufacturing can be removed. Therefore, the present invention is capable of improving a yield.

column12: The length adjustment device for thigh support section of vehicle seat
column13: The present invention relates to a length adjustment device for a thigh support part of a vehicle seat, capable of easily setting a convenient posture. In the length adjustment device, a transfer hole (32) is formed at a center of fixed frames (30), rail grooves (31) are formed symmetrically to each other on upper portions of left and right fixed frames (30) of the transfer hole (32), a motor mounting support (33) is provided on one side of the transfer hole (32) on a bottom surface of the fixed frame (30), a shaft mounting support (34) on which a screw (41) of a driving motor (40) is mounted is provided on an opposite side of the transfer hole (32) on the bottom surface of the fixed frame (30), a ball nut (42) moving while being guided by the transfer hole (32) is mounted on the screw (41), a transfer frame (50) interlocked with the ball nut (42) is disposed on the upper portion of the fixed frame (30), a rail (51) is provided on both sides of a bottom surface of the transfer frame (50) so as to be coupled to the rail groove (31) of the fixed frame (30), and a coupling part (52) is provided on one side of an upper center of the transfer frame (50) so as to be assembled with the ball nut (42) through a piece (53).

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PROVIDING CLOTHING RECOMMENDATIONS SERVICE
column13: Disclosed is a method for allowing a clothing recommendation server to provide a clothing recommendation service to a user. Particularly, the method receives first information on a size for each body part of a user and second information on a height of the user measured by using a body fat measuring device from a terminal device, extracts information on a clothing brand and information on a clothing product for recommendation for the user based on the first information and the second information, and transmits the extracted information on the clothing brand and the extracted information on the clothing product to the terminal device. The first information can include circumference information of each of neck, chest, abdomen, right arm, left arm, right thigh, left thigh, hip, right calf, and left calf of the user.

column12: LOCKING ACCESS CONTROL CIRCUIT
column13: 본 발명은 로킹 엑세스 제어 회로에 관한 것으로, 종래에는 로킹 시점이 어긋나는 경우 시스템이 오동작할 수 있는 문제점이 있다. 따라서, 본 발명은 로킹 신호(LOCK)가 하강 에지로 액티브됨을 검출하여 1 클럭 크기의 펄스를 발생시키는 에지 검출부(210)와, 이 에지 검출부(210)에서 발생된 펄스 신호를 액세스에 필요한 1 천이 크기로 변환시키는 신호 변환부(220)와, 이 신호 변환부(220)의 출력을 인에이블 신호로 하여 외부로부터의 어드레스(ADDR) 및 데이터(DATA)를 타켓(202)에 전송하는 래치(230)으로 구성한 것으로, 본 발명은 로킹 신호의 액티브 시점을 정확히 검출하여 외부로부터의 어드레스 및 데이터를 유효화함으로써 오동작을 방지할 수 있다.

column12: FUEL PROCESSING DEVICE
SECURITY AND FIRE ALARM SYSTEM USING PAGER
How to install sealing material for window frames
column13: The present invention relates to an installation method of a sealing material for a window frame and, more specifically, to an installation method of a sealing material for a window frame which seals the gap between a window frame and a window opening part by expanding a sealing material after attaching the sealing material between a window frame and the window opening part. An objective of the present invention is to provide an installation method of a sealing material for a window frame, which can conveniently install a sealing material for a window frame. The installation method of a sealing material for a window frame sequentially carries out an installation process by: a surface cleaning job of checking a window opening part, flattening the surface of the opening part, and removing foreign substances; a taping job of attaching and installing a sealing material on a window frame; an installation job of installing a window on the window opening part; and a finishing job of expanding the installed sealing material.

column12: Information leakage device system based on the front of the device
column13: 본 발명은 출력장치의 보안 장치 및 방법에 관한 것으로, 보다 상세하게는 보안정보가 표시되는 부분을 컨테츠 별로 분할하고, 분할된 프레임별로 할당한 후 보안정보를 표시하여 화면의 캡처에 의한 보안정보의유출을 방지하는 출력장치의 화면 캡처에 의한 정보 유출 방지 장치 및 방법에 관한 것이다.

column12: Seismic retrofit using length-controlled steel moment frame
column13: According to the present invention, a length-adjustable steel structure frame is installed on an opening of a building for seismic reinforcement. The length-adjustable steel structure frame comprises: a pair of coupling members coupled to an end portion of a frame that forms the steel structure frame; and a fastening member extended to one side from each of the coupling members, and having a cross-sectional area smaller than that of columns, wherein the fastening members comprise a length-adjustable part allowing an interval between a pair of columns to be adjusted.

column12: FUNCTIONAL BED
column13: PURPOSE: A functional bed is provided to help a patient to sleep well and to change the sleeping pose of a user. CONSTITUTION: A functional bed comprises: mattresses(10a,10b) divided into a plurality of partial mattresses; a plurality of driving parts(20a,20b) which are respectively connected to the bottom of the partial mattress and ascend or descend the partial mattress; and a controller(30) which individually or wholly drives the driving part by outputting a control signal.

column12: METHOD FOR FABRICATING OF BIPOLAR JUNCTION TRANSISTOR
column13: PURPOSE: A method for fabricating a bipolar junction transistor is provided to prevent contamination by trapping metal impurity through contamination prevention areas formed under an N-type epi layer. CONSTITUTION: A first contamination prevention area(14a) is formed in a semiconductor substrate by first ion implantation. A second contamination prevention area(14b) is formed in a first contamination prevention area by secondary ion injection. A second conductive epi layer is formed by injecting second conductive impurity ion in the second contamination prevention area. A collector area, a base area and an emitter area(26) of second conductive type are formed in the semiconductor substrate. An emitter(30) and a collector(32) are formed in the collector area and the emitter area by injecting second conductive impurity ion. A base(40) is formed by injecting first conductive impurity ion in the semiconductor substrate.

column12: PORTABLE BEAUTY APPARATUS USING SUPERSONIC FOR SKIN
column13: A portable beauty apparatus using supersonic waves is provided to cut down the cost of production by using a configuration of maintaining a high output and reducing a supersonic wave oscillator into half. A portable beauty apparatus includes a control unit(25) with a microcomputer(24) and a switching portion(26). The microcomputer outputs a preset resonance frequency so as to oscillate a supersonic wave oscillator(30). The switching portion generates an input signal by means of a high speed switching operation, and applies the input signal to a primary side of a transformer(28). The transformer boosts the voltage applied to the primary side to a certain level. Meanwhile, an oscillation voltage applied to a secondary side of the transformer is transferred to the supersonic wave oscillator through a cable. In this way, the supersonic wave oscillator physically oscillates, and such oscillation is then applied to the skin of a user.

column12: METHOD AND DEVICES ON A PORTABLE OR ECONOMICAL SPRAY FOR A QUICK CLEANING AND SIMPLE CAR-WASHING BY EASILY SPRAYING
column13: The present invention relates to a method and a device for washing a car by spray cleaning using a quick, economical, and portable spray and, specifically, to a device which is portable and economical since cleaning is quickly carried out in the field by spraying a solution to enable the removal of foreign materials and easily removing dust or the foreign materials separated, so as to enable simple cleaning and facilitate car washing. The device comprises: a spray unit for spraying a solution or a dispersed liquid; a liquid unit for separating foreign materials from the surfaces, the floor, the exterior, and the like with the sprayed materials; a removal unit for helping to easily clean and remove the foreign materials separated from the surfaces, the floor, the exterior, and the like; and a separation unit for helping to easily separate the foreign materials removed from the removal unit.

column12: Apparatus and method for queue assignment for each link in multi-links of an access pointer controller
column13: 一种通信系统中管理通信的系统和方法，其分配系统中的多条链路给一个队列。该队列由一个或者多个存储器构成，且队列分配单元将队列中的一些存储器组分配给一条或者多条链路。该队列的分配还通过写入控制信号将数据写入特定链路的那些存储器组中。信号检测单元检测线路接口单元的可用程度，以及数据控制单元从队列读出数据，并将其写入线路接口单元。利用这种结构，数据传输系统速度更快，效率更高。

column12: FUEL PROCESSING DEVICE
column13: The present disclosure relates to a fuel processing apparatus, and may be configured to include an apparatus body, a fuel reforming part disposed at the central side of the apparatus body, a heating part disposed at the upper side of the apparatus body so as to heat the fuel reforming part, a CO shift-converting reaction part connected with the fuel reforming part, and disposed at the lower side of the apparatus body, and a PROX reaction part connected with the CO shift-converting reaction part, and disposed at the upper side of the apparatus body, and according to the present disclosure, it is advantageous to enhance the heat transfer and the cooling efficiency through the optimal placement, stably perform the reforming reaction and the CO removing reaction, and miniaturize the apparatus.

column12: SEPARATION-COMBINATION BONE CONDUCTION COMMUNICATION DEVICE FOR SMART PHONE
column13: A detachable bone conduction communication device for a smart phone according to the present invention includes: a detachable pin which is attached to or detached from the smart phone by being inserted into or withdrawn from the smart phone by an open part with a ㄷ structure; a bone conduction speaker which is formed on the outside of the detachable pin and is in contact with a body part of a person to transmit a voice signal outputted from the smart phone to a bone as vibration; a speaker jack which is formed on the inner side of the detachable pin and is inserted into a connector formed on the smart phone; and a Bluetooth module which is formed on an outer side of the detachable pin to wirelessly output the voice signal outputted from the smart phone through the bone conduction speaker, thereby solving inconvenience due to the wearing of an existing bone conduction earphone.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PROVIDING ERROR INFORMATION OF TERMINAL IN CREDIT SETTLEMENT SYSTEM
column13: PURPOSE: An error information providing method of a terminal in a credit payment system and apparatus thereof are provided to accurately confirm error generation frequencies in the terminal by providing error information to a payment server. CONSTITUTION: The control unit of a terminal counts error generation numbers when errors are detected in a present payment service step(201,203). In case the increased error generation numbers are higher than a threshold value, the control unit transmits error information including terminal information, error generation step, and error information including the error generation numbers to a payment server through a wireless processing unit(205,207). The control unit initializes the increased count value.
column14: KOREA INFORMATION & AMP COMM CO LTD

column12: Face complex management type LED mask
column13: The purpose of the present invention is to provide a facial complex management LED mask. The mask comprises: a front mask (110); a rear mask (120) coupled to the front mask (110) to form an air duct (121AD) between the front mask (110) and the same; an eye patch (210) coupled to the rear mask (120); and a blower assembly (510) installed in the air duct (121AD) between the front mask (110) and the rear mask (120) to supply cool or warm heat to the eye patch (210). The blower assembly (510) comprises: a Peltier element (514) for generating cold or warm heat; and a fan for supplying the cold or warm heat generated by the Peltier element (514) toward the eye patch (210) by passing the air duct (121AD).

column12: Combined DVD/CD data processor
column13: A combined DVD/CD (Digital Video Disk/Compact Disk) data processor used in a DVD/CD player. The DVD/CD data processor includes a PLL (Phase Locked Loop) to receive a pulse stream input to generate a PLL clock; a frame/ID synchronization detector to latch the pulse stream according to the PLL clock, to generate a symbol clock; a demodulator to EFM+ demodulate the pulse stream according to the symbol clock in a DVD mode, and EFM demodulate the pulse stream according to the symbol clock in a CD mode; an ECC demodulator to error-correct input data according to a predetermined code length and error correction range, the predetermined code length and error correction range having different values in the DVD and CD modes; a memory to store the demodulated data to provide the ECC demodulator with the demodulated data stored therein; a descrambler to descramble the error corrected data stored in the memory, in the DVD mode; and a CD audio processor to process the error corrected data stored in the memory, in the CD mode.

column12: TEACHING TOOLS TO ASSEMBLE TRANSPARENT SPEAKER
MANUFACTURING METHOD OF BINDER
REFUSE PLASTIC FUEL MANUFACTURE APPARATUS
column13: PURPOSE: A solid fuel manufacturing apparatus is provided to melt a waste plastic by generating a high temperature frictional heat through crushing the waste plastic between a screw and a housing, and to use the melted waste plastic as a solid fuel. CONSTITUTION: A solid fuel manufacturing apparatus comprises the following: a housing discharging a solid fuel manufactured by a frictional heat while passing through between a screw(113) and a gap in a mixture form; a motor rotating the screw; a mold(130) located in the front side of a discharging hole of the housing, and formed with solid fuel cavities matching the discharging hole located at various sections; a transferor moving the mold to match one of the sections with the discharging hole by turns; and a protrusion(115) formed at the end of the screw to cut the solid fuel filling the mold by rotating around the mold.

column12: METHODS AND DEVICES FOR EXECUTING AN APPLICATION
column13: In a method for executing an application in an electronic device, provided is the method for executing an application which includes: executing a first component of the application; executing a second component called by the first component; and performing processing on an exception if the exception is detected by the execution of the second component. Accordingly, the present invention can improve robustness of the application in an Android operating system.

column12: LED mask eye patch with height adjustment structure
column13: An object of the present invention is to provide a height adjustment structure of an LED mask eye patch, which comprises: an eye patch (210) mounted on the inner surface of the LED mask and disposed around the eyeball of the face; and a height adjusting means for adjusting the height at which the eye patch (210) protrudes from the inner surface of the LED mask, wherein the height adjusting means comprises: a plurality of adjustment pieces (214) provided on the eye patch (210); and a setting stopper (218ST) coupled to an adjustment groove formed between the adjustment pieces (214) of the eye patch (210). In response to a face shape of a user wearing the LED mask, the height of the eye patch can be easily adjusted.

column12: POWER STEERING APPARATUS FOR VEHICLE
column13: The present invention relates to a power steering apparatus which improves durability of a speed reducer, comprising: a worm wheel in which the outer circumferential face on which a gear part is formed is engaged with a worm shaft and a penetration hole formed at the center is coupled at a distance to a pinion shaft; a rotation member which is slidably connected to the pinion shaft to rotate together, attached to the worm wheel or detached from the worm wheel during an up and down sliding, and provided with a permanent magnet at a lower end; and a housing provided with an electromagnet which is positioned in the inner side facing the permanent magnet and slides the rotation member up and down.

column12: vending machine
column13: PURPOSE: A vending machine is provided to minimize the degree of the inner opening in view of energy saving and to implement a sanitary usage since an arbitrary inner opening is impossible. CONSTITUTION: A vending machine includes a showcase for displaying the articles, a cooling device(32) incorporated into the showcase, a plurality of article selection operating members(38a1-38e4) for selecting a specific article among the displayed articles, a plurality of article outlet driving members(44a1-44e4) for outputting the selected article, a controller(4) electrically connected to the cooling device(32), the plurality of article selection operating members(38a1-38e4) and the plurality of article outlet driving members(44a1-44e4) and the main computer apparatus block(C) for collecting and calculating the cost of products.

column12: Method of transferring Semiconductor Device
column13: 본 발명은 캐리어 기판 상에 릴리스 층을 형성하고, 상기 릴리스 층 상에 반도체 소자를 형성하는 공정; 베이스 기판을 준비하는 공정; 상기 반도체 소자가 상기 베이스 기판과 마주하도록 상기 캐리어 기판을 상기 베이스 기판 위에 위치시키는 공정; 및 상기 캐리어 기판 위에서 레이저 빔을 조사하여 상기 반도체 소자를 상기 릴리스 층에서 이탈시켜 상기 베이스 기판 상에 안착시키는 공정을 포함하여 이루어지고, 상기 레이저 빔을 조사하는 공정은 적어도 하나의 레이저 펄스를 가지는 레이저 빔이 상기 캐리어 기판을 통과한 후 상기 릴리스 층에 조사되어 상기 레이저 빔이 조사된 상기 릴리스 층의 영역을 부풀어 오르게 하여 상기 캐리어 기판으로부터 이탈시키는 공정을 포함하는 반도체 소자의 전사 방법을 제공한다.

column12: APPARATUS AND COMPUTER PROGRAM STORED IN COMPUTER READABLE MEDIUM FOR UPDATING WEB OBJECT INSERTED IN DOCUMENT
column13: 전술한 바와 같은 과제를 해결하기 위한 본 발명의 일 실시예에 따라 하나 이상의 프로세서에서 실행가능 하며, 소정의 동작들을 수행하도록 하는 문서 편집 소프트웨어 모듈들을 포함하는 컴퓨터-판독가능 매체에 저장된 컴퓨터 프로그램이 개시된다. 상기 모듈들은 : 사용자에 의해 선택된, 웹 브라우저 내의 웹 객체에 대한 이미지를 캡쳐(capture)하는 캡쳐 모듈; 상기 캡쳐된 이미지를 문서 편집 프로그램 내에서 실행되는 하나 이상의 문서에 삽입하는 이미지삽입 모듈; 상기 선택된 웹 객체에 대한 정보를 상기 삽입된 이미지와 관련하여 저장하는 웹 객체 정보 저장 모듈; 및 상기 저장된 웹 객체에 대한 정보에 적어도 부분적으로 기초하여, 상기 하나 이상의 문서에 삽입된 캡쳐된 이미지를 업데이트하는 업데이트 모듈; 을 포함할 수 있다. 또한, 본 발명의 일 실시예에 따른 사용자 장치가 개시된다. 상기 사용자 장치는, 문서 편집 프로그램 내에서 실행되는 하나 이상의 문서와 관련된 사용자 입력을 수신하는 입력부; 상기 하나 이상의 문서 및 상기 하나 이상의 문서 내에 삽입된 이미지를 출력하는 출력부; 웹 브라우저 내의 웹 객체에 대한 정보에 접근할 수 있는 네트워크부; 상기 웹 브라우저 내의 웹 객체에 대한 이미지를 캡쳐하고, 상기 캡쳐된 이미지를 상기 하나 이상의 문서 내에 삽입하며, 그리고 상기 삽입된 캡쳐된 이미지를 업데이트 하는 제어부; 및 상기 웹 객체에 대한 정보를 상기 삽입된 캡쳐된 이미지와 관련하여 저장하는 저장부; 를 포함할 수 있다.

column12: anti-frost mask
column13: The present invention relates to an anti-fogging mask including a release hole in one side of an external surface thereof and a backflow prevention fog release part installed on the installed release hole so as to prevent glasses from fogging by breath released from the nose or mouth. The present invention comprises: a face protective means (108) which helps to prevent bacteria from entering the nose or mouth, and includes first, second, and third wrinkled parts (102, 104, 106) formed at regular intervals; and a backflow prevention fog release means (118) which is connected and installed between the first wrinkled part (102) and the second wrinkled part (104) and between the second wrinkled part (104) and the third wrinkled part (106), and is configured to quickly release breath coming out of the nose or mouth to the outside when a wearer exhales so as to prevent the glasses from fogging and to prevent backflow of air coming in from the outside when the wearer inhales so as to prevent droplets or bacteria from entering the nose or mouth. The backflow prevention fog release means (118) comprises: a release guide part (120) which quickly releases breath coming out of the nose or mouth to the outside when the wearer exhales so as to prevent the glasses from fogging; and a backflow prevention part (122) which is installed on one side of an inner surface of the release guide part (120) to be unfolded and folded and is configured to prevent backflow of air coming in from the outside when the wearer inhales so as to prevent droplets or bacteria from entering the nose or mouth.

column12: DEVICE FOR DETECTING DEFECT IN WIRE BONDING AND OPERATION METHOD THEREOF
column13: The present invention relates to an apparatus and method for detecting a bonding defect occurring between a battery cell and a busbar connected to each other via a wire through ultrasonic bonding, wherein data obtained by collecting ultrasonic bonding parameters by hour are learned using machine learning of a convolutional neural network, and a bonding defect is detected based thereon.

column12: KNOWLEDGE INFORMATION PROVISION SYSTEM AND THE METHOD WHICH USE THE PHONE
column13: A system and a method for providing knowledge information using a phone are provided to allow residents of a complex to establish various communities by providing or receiving information, such as food, news items, stocks and traffic, among residents. A complex server receives information regarding news items as text, an image or video via the Web server outside a complex and the Internet(S302) and classifies and stores the same in its database(S304). When a resident selects new items, a controller of a bathroom phone transmits a signal for requesting the selected news information to a wall pad, and the wall pad transmits the news item request signal to the complex server(S306). The complex server searches news information stored in its database and extracts relevant news information(S308). The wall pad stores received news information and transmits it to the bathroom phone, so that the bathroom phone can display the news information as text, images or video through an LCD screen(S310).

column12: VEHICLE MULTIMEDIA TERMINAL FOR DISPLAYING CLOCK BY GLOBAL POSITIONING SYSTEM
column13: A vehicle multimedia terminal for displaying a clock by a global positioning system (GPS) comprises: a GPS module that receives GPS time information; a clock button that applies a command for displaying current time information; a control unit that controls the display of the current time information with the GPS time information when the command is applied; and a display unit that displays the current time information under control of the control unit. The vehicle multimedia terminal provides accurate time information that works in conjunction with GPS time information, thereby facilitating convenience of users.
column14: HYUNDAI MOTOR CO LTD;;KIA MOTORS CORP

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR MANAGING DATA OF THE PVR SYSTEM
LIQUID CRYSTAL DISPLAY DEVICE
column13: A liquid crystal display in which the heat radiation efficiency of a driver IC is remarkably improved is provided to improve the device reliability and extend the lifetime of the driver IC. A plurality of driver ICs(Integrated Circuits) is connected to a liquid crystal panel. First and second heat radiating members including a thermal expansion coefficient is adhered to both side of the driver IC. A top cover is contacted with the first heat radiating member. A top cover surrounds the upper side of the liquid crystal panel. The first and second heat radiating members include the coating layer of the synthetic resin for protecting the metal layer at the upper part of the metal layer. An FPC assembly(300) is formed according to coat of the heat radiating member which is connected to a data PCB(Printed Circuit Board).

column12: PARTICLE DRYING APPARATUS WITH TRAPS FOR REMOVING SCATTERING PARTICLES
column13: The present invention relates to a particle drying apparatus equipped with a trap for removing scattered particles, which can prevent the occurrence of fire as well as improve the performance of the particle drying apparatus by preventing the particles of an object to be dried from scattering when drying the object to be dried using hot air. The particle drying apparatus equipped with a trap for removing scattered particles includes a body part, a conveyance part, a hot air supply part, and a scattering particle trap part.

column12: The mask with drink intake
column13: The present invention relates to a mask with a drinking inlet, which prevents the intrusion of foreign substances and allows users to open a stopper for easy drinking by means of a drinking inlet when drinking while users are wearing the mask, thereby solving the problem that causes discomfort because users have to take a mask off to consume a drink while wearing a mask. Accordingly, the existing problem causing discomfort that users have to take off their masks to consume beverages while wearing the mask is solved. The present invention comprises: a mask body composed of a square thin cloth to prevent dust or viruses into the mask; a drinking inlet made of plastic with a double circular stopper which can be attached to and fixed to the mask, which prevents foreign substances from entering while wearing a mask and opens the stopper for easy drinking; a wire made of a thin iron plate to keep the shape when attached to the nose and pressed to prevent breathing out; a coating part made of a thin cloth to cover the mouth and nose; pleats made of a thin, pleated fabric to cover the mouth and nose wide; and a fixing part which stretches into a string shape so that the mask can be fixed by hanging on the ear. Therefore, the present invention prevents the intrusion of foreign substances when users wear the mask by the drinking inlet and allows users to open the stopper for easy drinking. By solving the problem that causes discomfort that users have to take a mask off to consume a drink while wearing a mask, the present invention has the effect of resolving the existing problem that causes discomfort that users have to take a mask off for drinking.

column12: A POLYPROPYLENE RESIN COMPOSITION AND MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF
column13: 본 발명은 폴리프로필렌(PP)을 매트릭스로 사용하고 충격보강재로서 폴리올레핀계 고무를 사용하는 차량의 범퍼커버용 수지 조성물 및 그의 제조방법에 관한 것으로, 폴리프로필렌, 폴리올레핀계 고무, 충전제에 더하여 과산화물(peroxide) 및 공가교제(co-agent)를 포함하는 본 발명의 조성물은 강성 및 충격강도가 우수하여 자동차의 범퍼커버용 재료로 유용하게 이용될 수 있다.

column12: DROP PREVENTING SAFETY SYSTEM OF CEILING LIGHT
column13: The present invention discloses a safety system for preventing a lighting device from falling, comprising: a wire hanger with one end fixed to any one of a ceiling surface, a wall surface, and a bracket for fixing a lighting main body to the ceiling surface or the wall surface; a plug which is hung on a free end of the wire hanger, has a tab formed on an upper portion of a cylinder, and a ratchet bolt laterally protruding from a lower portion of the cylinder; a striker plate which is fixed to the lighting main body and includes a through-hole formed on the inside thereof to allow the cylinder and ratchet bolt of the plug to pass therethrough; and a socket which is fixed to a lower side of the striker plate and includes a stopper formed on one inner side and configured to determine a rotational position and range of the plug by contacting the ratchet bolt. In a state in which the ratchet bolt of the plug and the through-hole of the striker plate are on a straight line, the cylinder and ratchet bolt of the plug are inserted into the through-hole of the striker plate, and the plug is rotated at a predetermined angle so that the safety system for preventing a lighting device from falling is installed to prevent the plug from being separated from the striker plate.

column12: Fire monitoring system for field equipment
column13: The present invention relates to a fire monitoring system for equipment which is configured to distinguish occurrence of an event that shows fire prediction and detection of an equipment field by using an imaging camera and transmit information related to the occurred event to a manager terminal in case of the event, so that fire of the equipment field can be prevented in advance, fire can be rapidly responded in case of fire, and stored thermal images can be used for monitoring and as evidence. The fire monitoring system is configured to enable pan-tilt rotation and magnification (focus) control of a thermal image camera and make the thermal image camera normally take the entire image of the equipment field but zoom and take a risk candidate group when the risk candidate group is detected, so that accuracy and reliability for judging the occurrence of the event can be drastically increased. The fire monitoring system is configured to judge the final event occurrence by analyzing the zoomed thermal image acquired by the zooming and taking of the thermal image camera and detect identification information and location information in the field of a corresponding part so that a manager not only simply gets information related to the occurrence of the event but also immediately recognizes accurate location in the field, a machine tool, and a part where the event occurs.

column12: EXPERIMENT EDUCATION INSTRUMENT FOR PRESS
column13: A press experiment education instrument is provided to enable student to learn a theory of a press with fun and to improve the study inspiration effect. In a press experiment education instrument, a pair of syringes(10,10') is composed of a pair of syringe cylinders(11,11') formed in sectional areas of different sizes containing fluid and provided with nozzles(13,13') flowing in or out fluid and plural scales(15,15'), and pistons(17,17') combined to the syringe cylinders to reciprocate. A pressing unit(20) is installed at the piston of one of a pair of syringes. A support plate(25) supports the syringe cylinder of the syringe with the pressing unit while the syringe cylinder penetrates through the support plate. A prop(30) places an object, has a die(35) which the pressing unit approaches or separates from, and supports the lower end of the support plate. A connecting hose(40) forming a fluid flowing path at the inside is combined to the nozzles of a pair of syringes to connect a pair of syringes to each other.

column12: RF module structure of mobile communication terminal
column13: The radio frequency (RF) part of a mobile communication terminal is separately modularized so that an RF multi-chip module (RF MCM) can easily support communication services even in locations where different frequencies are used, by replacing the RF module which is designed to correspond to the appropriate frequency for that location. The RF MCM includes a ceramic laminated board; a plurality of RF components mounted on the ceramic laminated board; and a cap for isolating the RF components from the exterior envionment.

column12: Seismic rehabilitation of structural concrete columns for building structures
column13: The present invention relates to a seismic retrofitting structure for a concrete column of a building structure and, more specifically, to a seismic retrofitting structure installed in a base column of a building structure. The seismic retrofitting structure comprises: a seismic retrofitting unit opening one side of the base column to be reinforced, installed in the building structure, and enclosing and fixing the base column for an installation space to be formed in the direction of being opened; and an aseismic finishing unit closing the open part by being installed in the seismic retrofitting unit and having a synthetic reinforcing column installed in the installation space. The seismic retrofitting structure for a concrete column of a building structure performs seismic retrofit by fixing a composite reinforcing column to the base column formed in an existing building and constructs the seismic retrofitting unit and the aseismic finishing unit while the seismic retrofitting unit and the aseismic finishing unit enclose the outer surface of the composite reinforcing column and the base column. So, seismic retrofit can be directly performed even in the base column while the composite reinforcing column is constructed in the base column. Therefore, integrity of the composite reinforcing column and the base column can be obtained, and an earthquake resistance force of the base column can be improved.

column12: APPARATUS FOR RECOVERING VALUABLE METALS FROM PRINTED CIRCUIT BOARD AND RECOVERY METHOD USING THE SAME
column13: The present invention relates to an apparatus for recovering valuable metal from a printed circuit board and a method for recovering the valuable metal using the same. The apparatus for recovering the valuable metal includes an incoming conveyor unit supplying a printed circuit board in such a way that a component side to which a component is mounted faces a predetermined direction; a solder side grinding unit transferring the printed circuit board supplied from the incoming conveyor unit and having a grinder wet-grinding a solder side, which is the opposite side of the component side; a component separation unit installed at a rear end of the solder side grinding unit, transferring the printed circuit board, and separating and discharging the component mounted to the component side from the printed circuit board; and a component side grinding unit having a grinder wet-grinding the component side of the printed circuit board discharged from the component separation unit. The method for recovering the valuable metal includes the steps of: (a) aligning the printed circuit board in such a way that a component side to which a component is mounted faces a predetermined direction and supplying the printed circuit board; (b) wet-grinding a solder side which is the opposite side of the component side; (c) separating the component mounted to the component side from the printed circuit board; and (d) wet-grinding the component side of the printed circuit board from which the component is separated. According to the present invention, grinding a solder side of a board, separating a component, and grinding a component side are performed continuously, thereby easily separating and recovering valuable metal and precious metal of high purity from a printed circuit board (PCB) and reusing the processed printed circuit board and thus increasing resource recovery rate.

column12: PHOTOCHROMIC MATERIAL
column13: PURPOSE: A photochromic dye is provided to enable fast conversion in an aqueous solution and slow conversion in a hard environment such as a hard polymer. CONSTITUTION: A photochromic dye comprises: at least two photo-reactive groups, wherein a first photo-reactive group is configured to undergo a first photochromic reaction in response to radiation having first wavelength, and a second photo-reactive group is configured to undergo a second photochromic reaction in response to radiation having second wavelength. The at least two photo-reactive groups are coupled to one another by a non-conjugated linkage selected from the group consisting of C1-12 alkylene, C1-12 heteroalkylene, C1-12 alkoxy, C1-6 alkylenoxy, C1-6 alkylenedioxy, C1-6 phenyleneoxy, and C1-6 phenylenedioxy.

column12: Strawbale block using gabions manufacturing method of the same and constructing method using the same
column13: The present invention relates to a strawbale block by using a gabion and a manufacturing method thereof, wherein the strawbale block comprises: a gabion having a box-shaped net structure; an inner skin adhered to an inner side of the gabion; and a strawbale received in an inner part of the inner skin. Provided are a strawbale block by using gabion capable of quickly and easily constructing a building similar to a strawbale house, a manufacturing method and a construction method thereof.

column12: SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE AND FABRICATING METHOD OF SAME
column13: A semiconductor device and a fabricating method of the same are provided. The semiconductor device a substrate including an active region defined by an element isolation film, an impurity region having a first conductivity type in the active region, a first semiconductor film of a second conductivity type on the impurity region, a buried insulating film on the first semiconductor film, a second semiconductor film on the buried insulating film, and a well contact connected to the first semiconductor film. The level of a lowermost surface of the first semiconductor film is higher than a level ofa lowermost surface of the element isolation film.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PURCHASE AND DISTRIBUTION MANAGING OF HOSPITAL ARTICLES
column13: There are provided a purchase and distribution management system and method for purchasing articles used in a hospital by proxy and managing the distribution of the articles, the purchase and distribution management system including: an interface part connecting an exclusive management device of the hospital, the device computerizing the articles in the hospital, to the purchase and distribution management system to be compatible with each other in such a way that a user is able to use the purchase and distribution management system by using only the exclusive management device without downloading a new program; a purchase application reception part receiving a purchase application for hospital articles from the user; a contract check part retrieving whether there exists a contract between the user and a provider for the articles; a contract generation part generating the contract between the user and the provider when there is no contract for the hospital articles for which purchase application is received as a result of the retrieving of the contract check part; a purchase order management part generating and sending a purchase order for the articles to the provider when there is the contract for the articles for which purchase application is received as the result of the retrieving of the contract check part or the contract is generated by the contract generation part; a distribution management part checking an amount of each article in stock in the hospital, generating a purchase application according to a result of the checking, and managing a delivery process of the article in the hospital; and a consignment stock management part allowing a certain amount of warehoused articles for consignment stock to be consigned to the provider to be stored and changing an amount of interim warehoused articles consigned to the provider according to a use of the user.
column32: Dong, A supply chain model of vendor managed inventory, 2002, Transportation Research Part E: Logistics and Transportation Review, Volume 38, Issue 2, Pages 75-95

column12: COSMETIC CASE
column13: PURPOSE: A cosmetic case is provided to be semi-automatically or automatically opened and closed without a component like a latch. CONSTITUTION: A cosmetic case comprises: a lower case(110) which forms a space containing contents; an upper case(120) which is equipped in order to slide or rotate against the lower case and can be opened or closed; and a rotation part(150) which accumulates elastic force when the upper case slides to one side and opens the upper case by rotating the upper case in one direction from a determined spot.
column14: MTX HYBRID CO LTD;;SAMHWAP & T CO LTD

column12: QOS MANAGEMENT APPARATUS AND METHOD OF A INBOUND ROAMER
column13: PURPOSE: A quality of service(QoS) management device and a method of an inbound roaming subscriber are provided to receive and store allowable QoS range information for each public land mobile network(PLMN) which is each operator network identification number, thereby setting a QoS policy within an allowable QoS range when an inbound roaming terminal requests call connection. CONSTITUTION: A table(122) stores allowable QoS range information for each roaming subscriber. A QoS policy setting unit(124) receives request QoS information for an inbound roaming subscriber requesting call connection from a network of the inbound roaming subscriber. The QoS policy setting unit searches the allowable QoS range information for the inbound roaming subscriber from a table. The QoS policy setting unit sets up a QoS policy for the inbound roaming subscriber through comparison between the request QoS information and the allowable QoS range information. [Reference numerals] (100) Inbound roaming terminal; (105) Domestic wireless network; (110) Roaming agreement information server; (115) Domestic exchanger; (120) Mobile control device; (122) Table; (124) QoS policy setting unit; (125) Gateway device; (130) Overseas home subscriber server; (135) Overseas exchanger

column12: Receptacle connector
column13: The invention provides a receptacle connector. The receptacle connector comprises a plurality of contactors for electrical connection of a plug connector and a substrate; an insulation portion on which the contactors are arranged; a cover on which the insulation portion is arranged; and a shielding portion combined with the cover. The cover comprises an insertion slot allowing the plug connector to be inserted into, the insulation portion is arranged on the cover in a manner that the front surface of the insulation portion is located in the insertion slot, and the shielding portion is combinedwith the cover in a manner that the rear surface of the insulation portion is shielded.

column12: METHOD FOR MANAGING BSM BY USING OBJECT MODEL
THE METHOD OF CAPTURING USB TRAFFIC SIGNALS FOR USB ANALYZER
DELINEATOR FOR TUNNEL
column13: There are described various embodiments related to a delineator for a tunnel, which sprays air introduced into a body housing to a surface of a reflector to remove dust or foreign substances adhering to the surface of the reflector. According to one embodiment, the delineator comprises: a body housing having an opening on a front face; a reflector arranged in the opening; an air spraying structure arranged on both a side surface and a rear surface of the reflector in the body housing, increasing spray pressure while guiding air introduced into the body housing, and spraying the air at the increased spray pressure on a surface of the reflector to remove dust or foreign matter adhering to the surface of the reflector; a support part connected to the body housing and supporting the air spraying structure; and a mounting member connected to the support part and mounting the body housing in the tunnel. Various other embodiments are possible.

column12: PROVISIONAL JET SPA DEVICE
column13: 본 발명은 간이 제트스파 장치에 관한 것으로, 워터제트 및 기포가 발생되는 복수의 노즐이 배치되고, 상기 노즐을 상호 연결하는 배관이 구비되어 욕조의 저부면에 고정 설치되는 매트부와; 상기 노즐을 통하여 워터제트 및 기포가 발생되도록 하는 워터제트 및 기포 발생부와; 상기 워터제트 및 기포 발생부의 작동을 위하여 전원을 공급함과 동시에 워터제트 및 기포의 발생 정도를 조절하는 제어부를; 구비함으로써, 기존 욕조에 대한 탈부착이 용이할 뿐만 아니라, 기존 제트스파 욕조와 대등한 마사지 효과를 줄 수 있는 충분한 워터 제트의 분출 수압 및 기포의 기압을 확보할 수 있고, 이러한 수압 및 기압이 장치의 고정 상태에 영향을 주지 않는 견고한 고정 기능과 내구성을 지니고, 동시에 수분 및 습기가 많은 욕실과 욕조에서 사용되므로 전기적 안전성을 확보할 수 있는 효과가 있다.

column12: Nail file
Semiconductor device and method of fabricating same
column13: The disclosure provides a semiconductor device and a method of fabricating the same. The semiconductor device comprises two transistors of a first conductivity type and two transistors of a second conductivity type separated from each other by a first element isolation layer. Further, the two transistors of the first conductivity type are separated from each other by a second element isolation layer and the two transistors of the second conductivity type are separated from each other by a third element isolation layer. In example embodiments, the second and third element isolation layers are shallower than the first element isolation layer.

column12: Receptacle Connector
column13: The present invention relates to a receptacle connector capable of reducing the occurrence of radiation for a signal. The receptacle connector comprises: a plurality of contacts electrically connecting a plug connector and a substrate; an insulating part provided with the contacts; a cover provided with the insulating part; and a blocking part coupled to the cover, wherein the blocking part is coupled to the cover to cover a rear surface of the insulation part.

column12: COOLING STRUCTURE OF AN ELECTRONIC ELEMENT
column13: A cooling structure of electronic elements is provided to realize a smooth thermal transmission through various thermal transmission paths by conduction and convection currents from cooled electronic elements without using a fan, thereby improving a cooling performance while obtaining a stable operational performance of an electronic circuit. An internal shielding material(9) and a shielding case(11) are comprised to shield an inner circuit board(5). An extension portion(13) is formed in the internal shielding material(9) to be contacted with an upper side of a PAM(Power Amplifying Module)(3) mounted on the inner circuit board(5). Plural passing holes(15) are punched on a lower side of the PAM(3) in the inner circuit board(50). A heat-radiating plate(17) is mounted on an upper side of the shielding case(11) surrounding external sides of the internal shielding material(9) and the inner circuit board(5). Plural shielding case holes(21) are formed on a lower side.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS OF EMOTION INFORMATION BASED ON FACE RECOGNITION AND GESTURE RECOGNITION
column13: The present invention relates to a method and a device for acquiring emotion information and, more specifically, to a method and a device for acquiring emotion information based on face recognition and gesture recognition. The device for acquiring emotion information according to the present invention comprises a face recognition module for recognizing a user′s face from inputted image information to acquire face information; a gesture recognition module for recognizing a user′s gesture from the inputted image information to acquire gesture information; and an emotion expression meaning analysis module for extracting corresponding emotion expression meaning information based on at least one between the face information and the gesture information.

column12: TESTER AND TESTING METHOD OF SEMICONDUCTOR MEMORY DEVICE
column13: 본 발명은 비교적 짧은 시간내에 메모리 셀의 에러 발생과 그 발생 위치를 찾을 수 있는 반도체 메모리 소자의 테스트 장치에 관한 것으로서, 메모리 셀 어레이의 각 메모리 셀에 접속되어 행으로 배렬된 MOS 트랜지스터들 및 열로 배열된 MOS 트랜지스터들; 행 워드라인 디코더에 의해 선택된 행으로 배열된 MOS 트랜지스터들에 각각 접속된 행 비트라인을 통해 메모리 셀 어레이의 데이터를 리드하기 위한 행 비트라인 리드부; 열 워드라인 디코더에 의해 선택된 열로 배열된 MOS 트랜지스터들에 각각 접속된 열 비트라인을 통해 메모리 셀 어레이의 데이터를 리드하기 위한 열 비트라인 리드부; 행 비트라인 리드부로부터 전달된 행 데이터들의 1의 값들과 열 비트라인 리드부로부터 전달된 열 데이터들의 1의 값들을 행 및 열별로 각각 가산하여 출력하는 행 및 열 가산부; 행 및 열 가산부로부터 전달된 행 데이터들의 1의 값들을 행별로 배열하여 출력하는 행 데이터 배열부; 및 행 및 열 가산부로부터 전달된 열 데이터들의 1의 값들을 열별로 배열하여 출력하는 열 데이터 배열부를 포함한다.

column12: BOLLARD
column13: The present invention relates to a bollard wherein a body is embedded inside a predetermined depth from the ground, and having a structure wherein a plurality of protrusion units are taken out to an internal side of the body. Therefore, the protrusion units of the bollard are pulled to protrude from the ground in accordance with the intention of a worker, and pushed toward the ground to be stored to an internal side of the body. A vehicle does not enter a sidewalk inside a crosswalk, and further, a secondary accident which may occur as an accident vehicle enters a sidewalk through a crosswalk when an accident occurs near the crosswalk can be prevented. Moreover, a bollard is formed to be multistage for construction to be simple.

column12: AI METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR AI DEMAND FORCASTING
column13: An AI demand prediction method includes the steps of: obtaining, from a database, existing sales data of a store including reservation history information and visit history information of customers for each date of the store; preprocessing the existing sales data of the store; generating a plurality of store demand prediction models by using a plurality of preset algorithms learned from the preprocessed existing sales data of the store; determining a store demand prediction model based on evaluation results of each of the store demand prediction models; and predicting the demand of the store using the determined store demand prediction model. Accordingly, it is possible to provide scientific customer analysis and sales prediction information.

column12: Combined DVD/CD data processor
ELECTROLYTE LAYER FORMING METHOD OF SOLID ELECTROLYTIC CONDENSER
column13: PURPOSE: Method for forming an electrolytic layer of a solid electrolytic condenser is provided to lower the value of Equivalent Series Resistance by reducing the number of porosity formed in a conductive high polymer. CONSTITUTION: In the method for forming an electrolytic layer of a solid electrolytic condenser, a high polymer layer(16) is formed on the surface of an oxidation film(14) by using an electrolytic polymerization of a monomer such as pyrrole, thiophene, furan, aliline, acethylene, etc. A part of the porosities(18) in the high polymer layer(16) are impregnated with the hetero cyclic compound such as polypyrrole, polythiophene polyfuran which are melted by a solvent such as NMP, chlorotorn, aceton, methanol, DMSO at a weight fraction of 30¯95w%. The other part of the porosities(18) in the high polymer layer(16) are impregnated with the conductive high polymer such as polyaniliine, polyacetylene, polyphenylenesulfide, polyphenylenevinylene, polythienylenevinylene, polyisothianaphthen at a weight fraction of 5¯70w%. After impregnation of the solvent, the porosities(18) are removed by the volatilization of the solvent.

column12: A side engraving method of seal and engraving knife thereof
column13: 목적 : 석재 뿐만 아니라 목재, 동물의 뼈 및 뿔 등에도 측면에 측관을 넣어 인장의 품위 향상에 기여할 수 있는 방법을 제시하고자 하는 인장의 측관 방법 및 인도에 관한 것이다. 구성 : 본 발명에 의한 인도(50)는 크게 손잡이 부분(56)과 칼날부분(52)으로 나뉘며, 칼날 부분(52)은 일면은 전면에서 보아 2면이 일정각도를 갖는 경사면의 날카로운 칼날이 형성되어 있으며, 타측면은 평면으로 구성되어 있다. 효과 : 종래에는 인장의 측면에 수직방향으로 글씨를 인각하고자 할때에는 결이 수직방향으로 되어 있어 인각시에 수직으로 되어 있는 결이 일어나게 되어 인각된 귀퉁이 부분이 떨어져 나감으로써 사용이 불가능하였었다. 이와 같이 결에 따라 인각이 불가능한 목재, 동물의 뼈, 뿔 등의 인재를 이용한 인장에 측관이 가능해 짐으로써, 측관이 함유된 인장을 사용할 수 있게 됨으로써 사용자의 품위 향상에 기여할 수 있는 등의 효과가 있는 것이다.

column12: REHABILITATION SYSTEM USING VIRTUAL REALITY AND REHABILITATION METHOD USING VIRTUAL REALITY
column13: 개시된 본 발명의 가상현실을 이용한 재활시스템은 재활대상의 머리에 착용하고 재활대상이 시연 가능하도록 다수의 가상현실 재활컨텐츠 중 재활대상의 재활부위를 재활훈련하는데 특화된 훈련컨텐츠를 재생하는 헤드셋과, 재활부위와 함께 움직이도록 재활부위에 결합되고 재활부위의 움직임에 따른 운동정보를 수집하는 정보수집부가 포함된 컨트롤러 및 다수의 가상현실 재활컨텐츠 중 훈련컨텐츠를 헤드셋에 제공하고 정보수집부가 수집한 운동정보를 전송받아 재활대상의 재활정도를 분석하는 정보분석유닛을 포함한다.

column12: BANDSPANNUNGSSTEUERVORRICHTUNG FUER EINEN VIDEORECORDER
ELASTIC MEMBER AND SLIDING MODULE HAVING THE SAME
column13: Disclosed is an elastic member that has good durability improved by uniformly distributing stress and that materializes a miniaturization of a device by maximizing space usability. The elastic member includes a first coupling portion, a second coupling portion, and a spiral coil. The first coupling portion is coupled to pivot on the first member of the sliding module and the second coupling portion is coupled to pivot on the second member of the sliding module. The second sliding module may be coupled to slide along the first member. The spiral coil is helically wound from the first coupling portion outwardly and connects the first and second coupling portions with each other. The first coupling portion is disposed to be apart from a reference line passing through both a substantial center of the second coupling portion and an approximate center of the spiral coil with a predetermined distance.
column14: MTX HYBRID CO LTD;;CHOI MYUNG HOON

column12: urethane foam and a manufacturing method for cosmetic
column13: The present invention relates to a method for producing a cosmetic foam, and a foam thereby. The cosmetic foam of the present invention ensures excellent touching sensibility, high rebounding elastic force, release properties, and absorptiveness, when used after immersed in liquid cosmetic compositions such as suspension, cream, gel, emulsion, or organic solutions. The cosmetic foam of the present invention is co-polymerized by using a mixture A consisting of polyester polyol and polyether polyol, at least one of acrylic acid or acrylate, and a surfactant, and also has a net-like opened cell structure.

column12: Agents for improving dye fastness
PHOTOCHROMIC MATERIAL
column13: Photochromic dyes are disclosed. A photochromic dye can include a first photo-reactive group and a second photo-reactive group. A first photochromic reaction can be induced in the first photo-reactive group of the photochromic dye by radiation having a first intensity, and a second photochromic reaction can be induced in the second photo-reactive group of the photochromic dye by radiation having a second intensity. The second intensity may be greater than the first intensity.
column16: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION (2010-02-09)

column12: SHROUD MADE OF BAMBOO FIBERS
Waste residue separation device for environment-friendly chemical machinery
column13: The utility model provides an environment-friendly waste residue separating device for chemical machinery. The environment-friendly waste residue separating device comprises a box body, a flushing device and a filtering device are arranged on the box body; the filtering device comprises a coarse filtering plate and a fine filtering plate which are arranged in the box body; a connecting plate is fixedly connected between the coarse filter plate and the fine filter plate; the connecting plate is connected with a rotating shaft; the rotating shaft is connected with a motor which is arranged at the outer end of the box body and is connected with the box body; a slag outlet pipe is communicated and connected with the box body, the coarse filter plate and the fine filter plate; the flushing device comprises a water tank at the lower end of the box body; the water tank is connected with a water outlet pipe; a water pump is arranged on the water outlet pipe; the other end of the water outlet pipe is communicated with a water distribution plate fixedly connected with the box body; the water diversion plate is communicated and connected with a water spraying head penetrating through the box body; the lower end of the surface of the box body is communicated with a water inlet pipe; the water inlet pipe is connected with a water return pipe communicated with the water tank through a hoop assembly; a filter assembly is arranged at the joint of the water inlet pipe and the water return pipe, so that a coarse filter plate, a fine filter plate and a second fine filter plate are convenient to clean, waste residue blockage is avoided, and later recovery and treatment are facilitated.

column12: SMART COMPREHENSIVE RAW COTTON MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column13: The present invention relates to a smart comprehensive raw cotton management system and, more specifically, to a smart comprehensive raw cotton management system for providing comprehensive management for member companies of the raw cotton industry and raw cotton suppliers, wherein the system provides a member company with information obtained through various evaluations of raw cotton purchased by the member company, so as to improve the efficiency of raw cotton management, and when a purchase request for raw cotton is received from a member company, provides the member company with priori information for the purchase, so as to achieve rational purchase and trade of raw cotton.

column12: CARD PAYMENT SYSTEM IN ELECTRONIC COMMERCE AND METHOD THEREFOR
column13: The present invention relates to a card payment system in electronic commerce and a method therefor, which performs card payment in a hybrid authentication scheme using order information, delivery information, payment information, etc. without ActiveX required to make card payment for a purchased product in the existing electronic commerce. Thus, the present invention can effectively solve problems which are conventionally caused by recklessly installed ActiveX programs in authentication and security procedures.

column12: A METHOD FOR MANAGING CONNECTION BETWEEN A PERSONAL NETWORK AND A CPNS SEVER IN A CONVERGED PERSONAL NETWORK SERVICE(CPNS) SYSTEM
column13: PURPOSE: An access managing method for a PN(Personal Network) and a CPNS(Converged Personal Network Service) server is provided to maintain a connected personal network by converting a gateway connected to the CPNS server. CONSTITUTION: A first device connected to a CPNS server through a first communication network confirms a second device including a PNGW(Personal Network GateWay)(703). The first device requests access to the CPNS server through the second device and the first communication network(704). The first device terminates the access of the CPNS server which is connected through the first communication network by connecting the second device to the CPNS server through the first communication network. The first device includes the PNGW. [Reference numerals] (701) Physical pairing; (702) Personal network formation and authentication procedure; (703) Confirming a PNGW supporting terminal in a personal network by PNinfo confirmation; (705) Confirming PNGW2 state; (708,710) Updating PN inventory; (712) Terminating a gateway function and PN inventory; (713) Mode change

column12: PORTABLE DISPLAY DEVICE
column13: The present invention aims to provide a portable display device that has a foldable structure, which allows for both easy portability and convenient usage at the same time. To this end, the present invention provides a portable display device that includes a main body case that is equipped with a display panel on the front, a connection stand that is equipped in such a manner that one end thereof can be connected to the back of the main body case, a first hinge unit that is placed between the main body case and the connection stand in order to allow the main body case to rotate around the connection stand, a main cover which is equipped to be connected to the other end of the connection stand, and a second hinge unit that is placed between the main cover and the other end of the connection stand so that the connection stand can be tilted toward the main cover.

column12: CALIBRATION DEVICE AND CALIBRATION METHOD
column13: PURPOSE: A correction jig device is provided to prevent the position of a manipulator from being changed in a distance measuring process by obtaining the distance of the manipulator and the distance of a wafer without contact. CONSTITUTION: A tray (111) is regularly formed on a cassette. The tray forms two walls to be narrower than a wafer (191,193). A distance measuring unit (130) measures a distance from the wafer and a distance from a manipulator (180) which receives the wafer on the tray. The distance measuring unit measures a reference distance from the wafer which is received on the tray. The distance measuring unit generates the position information of the manipulator by using the reference distance and the distance from the manipulator.

column12: Child rest aids for bed restraint
column13: Disclosed is an infant care assistance device for being held on a bed for an infant. The device for being held on a bed for an infant is possible to assist parents so as to more conveniently perform infant care when the infant is on the bed for an infant. The present invention uses an infrared thermometer and a hygrometer to identify a state of the infant in a non-contact manner, and then immediately notifies relevant contents to the parents.

column12: Electrically conductive polymers with enhanced conductivity
column13: An electrically conductive polymer linked to conductive nanoparticle is provided. The conductive polymer can include conductive monomers and one or more monomers in the conductive polymer can be linked to a conductive nanoparticle and can include a polymerizable moiety so that it can be incorporated into a polymer chain. The electrically conductive monomer can include a 3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene as a conductive monomer. The electrically conductive polymer having the conductive nanoparticle can be prepared into an electrically conductive layer or film for use in electronic devices.
