column12: PROBE DEVICE
column13: A probe apparatus is provided to enhance measurement accuracy and measurement uniformity by reducing an error of a measured value in a measuring process. A probe apparatus includes a probe(30) for detecting a measured value of a mechanism and measuring pressure applied to a front end of an elastic body and a plurality of supporters(20) for supporting movably the probe. The supporter includes a main body(21) for supporting the probe, a first supporting body(25) formed on an upper surface of the main body, a first joint(23) for connecting the first supporting body with the main body to move the first supporting body, a second joint(29) for connecting the first supporting body with the probe, a second joint(27) for connecting the first supporting body with the second supporting body to move the second supporting body, and a third joint(33) for connecting the probe with the second supporting body to move the probe.

column12: DISINFECTING AND CLEANING MACHINE FOR A BATHHOUSE
THE CLEAN AN ASHTRAY
column13: A clean ashtray is provided to allow a water tissue to be automatically exchanged according to a set-up time interval of a timer so as to solve the visual displeasure. The clean ashtray comprises: two rolls, one of which is arranged in an upper part of the ashtray body, and used for unwinding an unused water tissue and the other of which is arranged in a lower part of the ashtray body, and used for winding a used water tissue which is dried after being used; a fan, arranged in a lower part of the ashtray body, and preventing the bad smell of cigarette stubs from flowing out; a drawer type stub storage, arranged in a bottom of the ashtray body; an air cleaner; a timer, allowing users to set up the time interval; and a tissue exchanging motor, arranged also in the lower part of the ashtray body, and connected to the lower roll so that the latter is rolled according to the set-up time interval for exchanging the used tissue with the unused.

column12: AUTOMATIC AIR BLAST MACHINE
column13: PURPOSE: An automatic air blast machine is provided to check target material state and to monitor work progress by photographing the inside of a receiving case with a photographing device. CONSTITUTION: An automatic air blast machine comprises a housing-shaped receiving case(1), an air spraying member, and a turntable. A placing hole(3) is formed in one side of the receiving case. The air spraying member is inserted in the placing hole to spray compressive air into the receiving case. The turntable is rotatably installed in the receiving case.
column14: HANNA METAL AND MACHINERY CO LTD

column12: POWER CONTROL APPARATUS, VEHICLE HAVING THE SAME, AND METHOD OF CONTROLLING VEHICLE
column13: A power control apparatus, a vehicle having the same, and a method of controlling the vehicle are provided. The power control apparatus includes a communication unit that is configured to receive a request message related to a power setting via a communication network in a vehicle and a determination unit that is configured to determine a power condition based on the request message related to the power setting. Additionally, an application controller is configured to execute an application of power supplied from at least one among a battery and an alternator power supply based on a result of the determination.
column14: KIA MOTORS CORP;;HYUNDAI MOTOR CO LTD

column12: MOBILE BUSINESS CARD MANAGEMENT SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR EXCHANGING MULTIPARTY BUSINESS CARD
column13: Disclosed are a mobile business card management system for automatically performing electronic business card exchange among multiple parties and a multiparty business card exchange method using the same. According to the present invention, the mobile business card management system comprises: a master terminal, which is a user terminal for using a business card management application to generate an electronic business card of a user and register generated electronic business card information in a business card management server, requesting to open a business card exchange meeting for multiparty business card exchange; a plurality of slave terminals, which are a terminal held by each participant of a meeting opened by the request of the master terminal, receiving a meeting participation request signal from the master terminal or the business card management server, and registering each participant′s electronic business card information to the business card management server; and the business card management server storing the business card information received from the plurality of slave terminals and the master terminal, generating the business card exchange meeting in accordance with the request of the master terminal, and receiving business card exchange authentication information from the master terminal to provide the business card information of participants except for the business card information of the user to each terminal included in the business card exchange meeting when the authentication information is confirmed.

column12: SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE AND METHOD OF FABRICATING THE SAME
column13: A semiconductor comprises two transistors of the first conductivity type separated from two transistors of a second conductivity type by a first element isolation layer. Further, the two transistors of the first conductivity type are separated from each other by a second element isolation layer and the two transistors of the second conductivity type are separated from each other by a third element isolation layer. In example embodiments, the second and third element isolation layers are shallower than the first element isolation layer.

column12: FUNCTIONAL BED
column13: Disclosed is a functional bed. The functional bed of the present invention is configured such that the mattress of the bed is divided in a vertical direction and can move in an upward or downward direction, or the mattress of the bed is divided into a horizontal direction and the height of the divided mattress can be adjusted to improve the snoring of a user, which is the main cause of disturbed sleep, and improve snoring and sleep apnea of a patient by changing the sleeping posture of the patient. The functional bed of the present invention has a toilet portion at the center of the mattress to aid in the evacuation of a seriously ill patient.

column12: -- Video streaming-based creator-advertiser-sponsor virtuous cycle collaboration system and method
column13: 본 발명은 영상 스트리밍 기반의 크리에이터-광고주-후원자 선순환 협업 시스템 및 방법에 관한 것 이다.

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR ASYNCHRONOUS TRANSCEIVER OF DATA BETWEEN NEAR BOARD
TASTATUR FÜR MOBILSTATION
column13: A keypad assembly for a mobile station comprises a base pad adapted to support a plurality of keys, the plurality of keys comprising a plurality of first keys and a plurality of second keys. The keypad assembly also comprises the plurality of first keys and the plurality of second keys arranged on the base pad, the plurality of second keys defined by horizontal center lines and vertical center lines of the plurality of first keys. The plurality of second keys may be further defined by outer perimeters of the plurality of first keys. The keypad assembly may further comprise a strength reinforcing plate coupled to the base pad, adapted to mechanically strengthen the keypad assembly. An alphabetic character may be assigned to each of the plurality of first keys. A numeral may be assigned to at least one of the plurality of second keys.

column12: SIMULATION DEVICE AND METHOD FOR DESIGN OPTIMIZATION AND RECORD MEDIA RECORDED PROGRAM FOR REALIZING THE SAME
MOBILE COMMUNICATION TERMINAL AND PCB MANUFACTURING METHOD FOR THE SAME
column13: A mobile terminal and a method for manufacturing a PCB(Printed Circuit Board) thereof are provided to prevent noises in case of transmitting a clock signal through a pattern by converting a clock signal into an optical signal and transmitting it through an optical fiber when manufacturing a PCB. A mobile terminal comprises a PCB, an optical fiber(30), and an optical signal conversion part. The optical fiber, deposited on the PCB, transmits a clock signal. The optical signal conversion part performs signal conversion so that the clock signal can be transmitted through the optical fiber. The optical signal conversion part consists of an optical signal transmitting part(11) and an optical signal receiving part(21). The optical signal transmitting part converts an electronic signal, generated from the PCB, into an optical signal and transmits it to the optical fiber. The optical signal receiving part converts an optical signal, transmitted through the optical fiber, into an electronic signal and supplies it to the PCB.

column12: O O-Ring Anti-Corrosion Gasket
column13: The present invention relates to an O-ring corrosion preventing gasket, including: a sealing ring provided on a groove of a semiconductor manufacturing device to improve sealing force; and a guard provided on the groove and surrounding an outer circumferential surface of the sealing ring on a lower portion of the sealing ring. According to the present invention, the O-ring corrosion preventing gasket is possible to prevent the sealing ring to be corroded by high temperature gas or chemical substances discharged from the semiconductor manufacturing device by the guard surrounding the sealing ring on the lower portion of the sealing ring.

column12: PLASMA DISPLAY PANEL
FUEL PROCESSING DEVICE
column13: The present invention relates to a fuel processing device comprising a device body; a fuel reforming part disposed at the center of the device body; a heating part disposed at the upper side of the device body so as to heat the fuel reforming part; a CO denaturation part connected to the fuel reforming part, and disposed at the lower side of the device body; and a preferential oxidation (PROX) reaction part connected to the CO denaturation part, and disposed at the upper side of the device body. The present invention improves heat transfer and cooling efficiency through optimal arrangement, stably performs a reforming reaction and a CO removal reaction, and is advantageous in miniaturizing the device.
column32: EDUARDO,ET AL: "Preferential oxidation of CO in a folded-plate reactor", 《CHEMICAL ENGINEERING SCIENCE》

column12: DATA SECURITY MODULE AND DATA SECURITY SYSTEM USING THE SAME
column13: A data security module and a data security system using the same are disclosed. The data security module can quickly and accurately detect whether the connection port of a PC or a data storage device is opened or closed and the position of the open connection port regardless of whether the power of the PC or the data storage device is turned on or off, thereby greatly improving security performance. When the data security module and the data security system using the data security module are applied to a place such as a bank or a public institution where data security is very important, it is possible to basically prevent the leakage of data stored in the PC or the data storage device, and to greatly improve reliability for customers.

column12: Method for detecting cracks in the silicone rod
column13: The present invention relates to a non-destructive inspection method for detecting the existence and position of a crack on a surface or the inside of a silicone rod, comprising: (a) a step of applying an ultrasonic wave having a certain frequency to one surface of the silicone rod by using an ultrasound wave generator; (b) a step of measuring the frequency of an ultrasonic wave detected on the other surface of the silicone rod; and (c) a step of comparing the measured frequency of the ultrasonic wave with a reference frequency, and determining the existence and/or position of the crack, or comprising: (A) a step of heating a part on a surface of the silicone rod by using a heat source; (B) a step of measuring the temperature on the other surface or the inside of the silicone rod by using a heat detection unit; and (C) a step of comparing the measured temperature with a reference temperature, and determining the existence and/or position of the crack. The present invention aims to provide a method for detecting a crack on a silicone rod, which is able to precisely and easily detect the size and position of the crack.

column12: Method for displaying background screen in navigation device
column13: The invention relates to a method for displaying a background screen in a navigation device. When a vehicle is driving, a camera image can be selected that photographing a front or other direction of a vehicle in real time to display the selected image on a background screen of a menu screen in a navigation device. In addition, selection buttons of the menu screen is displayed to be transparent or translucent. Since a driver can keep eyes a moving direction of the vehicle while manipulating a navigation device, possible accidents of the vehicle can be prevented in advance.

column12: Automatic cutter for chamfering
column13: The present invention relates to an automatic cutter for chamfering, and more specifically, to an automatic cutter for chamfering functioning as a device for chamfering the edges of rectangular workpieces of various materials including wood, metal, etc. The automatic cutter for chamfering comprises: a cutting cylinder for vertically rotating a rotary cutter which chamfers the edge of a workpiece in a hinged manner, a stopper cylinder for stopping the workpiece at a work position, a clamper cylinder for fixing the workpiece to prevent the workpiece from shaking during chamfering, and the like are automatically operated so that a worker can carry out chamfering of a workpiece rapidly and safely, and in particular, the chambering angle of the workpiece can be freely adjusted by rotating a rotation frame, to which the rotary cutter is attached, from side to side. To achieve this, the present invention provides an automatic cutter for chamfering, comprising: the rotation frame having one side hinge-coupled to a worktable to rotate to the left and right in a hinged manner; the rotary cutter having a lower end coupled to the rotation frame and hinge-coupled to be vertically rotated in a hinged manner; the cutting cylinder having one side end portion connected to the rotation frame, and having an outer side end portion of a piston inserted into the same to be connected to the rotary cutter such that the rotary cutter vertically rotates in a hinged manner as the piston is drawn out of or inserted into the same; the stopper cylinder which is positioned in the front side of the workpiece transferred to the work position and stopping the workpiece as an end portion of the piston comes in contact with the front surface of the workpiece transferred to the work position as the piston is drawn; and the clamper cylinder which is drawn downward and pushes and fixes the upper surface of the workpiece transferred to the work position.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MANAGING THE GOODS BY WEIGHING THE GOODS
column13: A method and a device for managing articles by weighing the articles are provided to manage delivery and return of the articles by weighing the articles and detecting use of the received articles correctly. An article detector(314) is installed to a receiving groove formed in an article receiving unit(312) and outputs article delivery/reception information by detecting delivery/reception of the articles received in the receiving groove. A balance(318) weighs total weight of the articles received in the article receiving unit. A memory(320) stores total article weight of each article type and total weight of the articles received in the article receiving unit. A controller(330) reads the weight of the delivered or received articles from the memory by receiving the article delivery or reception information, calculates a difference of total weights by receiving the measured total weight, and generates/outputs the article sale or return information when the difference of the total weights is equal to the weight of the delivered or received article.

column12: Fabrication method of double-sided dielectric PCB on waveguide for slotted waveguide array antennas
column13: PURPOSE: A method for attaching a waveguide of a double-sided dielectric substrate is provided to allow for efficiency and ease of manufacture of the antenna by simplifying manufacturing procedures. CONSTITUTION: A waveguide array(12) produced through a sheet metal working is square C-shaped, and holes(14) are formed at the wing part of the waveguide array. The holes are filled with a conductive adhesive so as to thereby attach the waveguide array to a dielectric substrate(13) and obtain a slot array antenna without using a rivet.
column14: CHOI SANG HOON;;GNT WORKS CO LTD

column12: POWER SOURCE CONTROL DEVICE, VEHICLE INCLUDING THE SAME, AND VEHICLE CONTROL METHOD
column13: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a power source control device that eliminates the need to individually attach a power source stabilization circuit to various apparatuses in a vehicle, and to provide a vehicle including the same, and a vehicle control method.SOLUTION: A power source control device 100 comprises: a communication section 110 that receives a requirement message relating to power source setting via a communication network in a vehicle; a determination section 120 that determines a power source condition on the basis of the requirement message relating to the power source setting; and an application control section 130 that controls application of a power source received from a battery or at least one of vehicle generator power sources on the basis of the result of the determination. The vehicle 200 including the same and a vehicle control method are also provided.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 4
column14: HYUNDAI MOTOR COMPANY CO LTD;;KIA MOTORS CORP

column12: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PREDICTING DEMAND AT STORE
column13: An operation method of a system for predicting demand at a store may comprise the steps of: obtaining, from a database, existing sales data of a store including reservation history information and visit history information of customers of the store by date; preprocessing the existing sales data of the store; generating multiple store demand prediction models by using multiple preconfigured algorithms obtained by learning the preprocessed existing sales data of the store; determining a store demand prediction model on the basis of an evaluation result of each of the multiple store demand prediction models; and predicting demand at the store by using the determined store demand prediction model.

column12: Power control apparatus, vehicle having the same, and method of controlling vehicle
column13: A power control apparatus, a vehicle having the same, and a method of controlling the vehicle are provided. The power control apparatus includes a communication unit that is configured to receive a request message related to a power setting via a communication network in a vehicle and a determination unit that is configured to determine a power condition based on the request message related to the power setting. Additionally, an application controller is configured to execute an application of power supplied from at least one among a battery and an alternator power supply based on a result of the determination.
column14: HYUNDAI MOTOR CO LTD;;KIA MOTORS CORP

column12: COMPOSITE SHEET FOR ORGANIC LIGHT EMITTING DISPLAY MODULE
column13: 개시된 유기발광표시모듈용 복합 시트는, 나노 카본과 그라파이트 파우더를 포함하는 제1 열확산 점착층, 상기 제1 열확산 점착층과 결합되며, 상기 제1 열확산 점착층보다 높은 열전도성을 갖는 열확산 전달층, 상기 열확산 전달층과 결합되며, 나노 카본과 그라파이트 파우더를 포함하는 제2 열확산 점착층, 상기 제2 열확산 점착층과 결합하는 절연층, 상기 절연층과 결합하는 제1 열확산 금속층, 상기 제1 열확산 금속층과 결합되며, 나노 카본과 그라파이트 파우더를 포함하는 제3 열확산 점착층 및 상기 제3 열확산 점착층과 결합되며, 상기 제1 열확산 금속층보다 두꺼운 두께를 갖는 제2 열확산 금속층을 포함한다.

column12: Functional mask manufacturing method
column13: The present invention relates to a method for manufacturing a functional mask, and to a mask using the same, wherein the method further includes: outer left and right members having ear hooks formed on the left and right sides of a lycra having superior flexibility; and inner left and right members coupled to the outer left and right members to form a mask, and made of a nonwoven fabric or the like formed to correspond to the shape of the outer left and right members, wherein the outer left and right members are made of a lycra having superior flexibility, so as to be freely worn regardless of the size of the nose, mouth and the like of the face of people of all ages and genders, and fine dust, dust, and various harmful viruses in the air are completely removed using the outer left and right members and the inner left and right members to enable a wearer of the mask to breathe purified air.

column12: Power control apparatus, vehicle having the same, and method of controlling vehicle
column13: A power control apparatus, a vehicle having the same, and a method of controlling the vehicle are provided. The power control apparatus includes: a communication unit configured to receive a request message related to a power setting via a communication network in a vehicle, and a determination unit configured to determine a power state based on the request message with respect to the power setting, in addition, an application control element is configured to perform an application of the power supplied by at least one of either a battery or an alternator power supply based on a result of the determination.
column14: HYUNDAI MOTOR CO LTD;;KIA MOTORS CORP

column12: WAVE DISSIPATION BLOCK OCEANIC STRUCTURE USING THE SAME AND CONSTRUCTION METHOD THEREOF
column13: The present invention relates to a wave dissipation block, an offshore structure using the same, and a construction method for the same. The wave dissipation block is easily lifted and installed. Also, the weave dissipation block is stably interlocked and efficiently prevents wave overtopping. A body unit of the wave dissipation block is extended forward and backward, and a horizontal angle unit is installed on both sides in the rear of the body unit. A vertical angle unit is installed in the vertical direction in front of the body unit. A forward protruding angle unit is installed in front of the body unit to be in front of the vertical angle unit. The load of the horizontal angle unit can be increased, and the load of the vertical angle unit can be reduced to minimize a forward movement of the center of gravity, generated by the forward protruding angle unit. The forward protruding angle unit has excellent wave overtopping prevention effect and can be used to stably and simply lift the wave dissipation block.

column12: Branch Tube type Ground Heat Exchange System
column13: The present invention relates to an underground heat exchange system, and configuration thereof comprises: a hollow space in which a space connected to the outside is formed in the ground; an inflow pipe formed at the center of the hollow space and extending to the bottom surface of the hollow space to guide external air to a lower end of the hollow space; and a discharge pipe connected to the inflow pipe and guiding movement of the air moved to a lower end of the inflow pipe to the outside. The inflow pipe and the discharge pipe are radially arranged with respect to the inflow pipe, and are connected by curved flow paths bent downward.
column14: NAT UNIV CHANGWON IND ACADEMY COOP CORPS

column12: Shift Register And Touch Display Device Including The Same
column13: The present invention relates to a shift register and a touch display device including the same, and more particularly, to a touch display device which prevents an image from being displayed abnormally when switching from a touch section to a display section. In accordance with the present invention, the shift register comprises: M block areas each having K stages; and M-1 first and second bridge stages, respectively, disposed between the block areas. The first bridge stage includes N sub-bridge stages. During a display period, the K stages sequentially output gate signals. During a touch period, the N sub-bridge stages are alternately repeated to output a sub-bridge signal having a high logic value. Therefore, a Q node of the second bridge stage is charged.

column12: Eye guidance light installed inside the tunnel
column13: The present invention relates to a sight guidance lamp including: a frame body constructed in a tunnel to divide a road and a sidewalk, installed on a wall of a sidewalk block locating the sidewalk in an upper part in comparison with the road, and including an accepting groove part; a guidance lamp block installed in the accepting groove part to be insertable and dischargeable, and including a light source to radiate light leading a driver passing through the tunnel to be aware of the sidewalk block; a connection block connected with the guidance lamp block, and inserted into an entry part of the accepting groove part to seal the accepting groove part into which the guidance lamp block is inserted; a connection part connecting or separating the connection cover and the guidance lamp block; and a detachable part connecting a jig device detachably to the connection cover to connect the connection cover with the jig device placing a worker beside the wall of the sidewalk block in a state, in which the worker is located on the sidewalk, such that the connection cover and the guidance lamp block can be separated from the frame member. Therefore, the present invention is capable of preventing a worker from colliding with a vehicle during cleaning or replacement work.

column12: A CUP SET FOR DISPLAYING AND SERVING
METHOD FOR ANALYZING LOYALTY OF THE CUSTOMER TO STORE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND SYSTEM THEREOF
column13: Provided is an operating method of a system for predicting the demand of a store, which includes the steps of: obtaining, from a database, existing sales data of a store including reservation history information and visit history information of customers by date of the store; preprocessing the existing sales data of the store; generating a plurality of store demand prediction models using a plurality of preset algorithms which have learned the preprocessed existing sales data of the store; determining a store demand prediction model based on evaluation results of each of the plurality of store demand prediction models; and predicting the demand of the store by using the determined store demand prediction model.

column12: RF-Modul für ein Mobilkommunikationsendgerät
column13: The radio frequency (RF) part of a mobile communication terminal is separately modularized so that an RF multi-chip module (RF MCM) can easily support communication services even in locations where different frequencies are used, by replacing the RF module which is designed to correspond to the appropriate frequency for that location. The RF MCM includes a ceramic laminated board; a plurality of RF components mounted on the ceramic laminated board; and a cap for isolating the RF components from the exterior envionment.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR CONTROLLING HANDOVER OF USER EQUIPMENT IN MOBILE COMMUNICATION NETWORK
column13: A method for controlling a handover in a mobile communication network of the present invention comprises the steps of: transmitting, to a second terminal, a re-invite message corresponding to an invite message for an inter-network handover request received from a first terminal and receiving a response message; discerning whether the second terminal is a supporting terminal that can process the re-invite message by analyzing the response message; ordering the first terminal to process a call for the inter-network handover if the second terminal is the supporting terminal that can process the re-invite message; and generating and transmitting an error code to the first terminal if the second terminal is a non-supporting terminal that cannot process the re-inviter message.

column12: VALVE STRUCTURE OF A SHOCK ABSORBER
column13: PURPOSE: A valve structure of a shock absorber is provided to implement a control flow passage on a pilot valve by forming an orifice in one side surface of the pilot valve. CONSTITUTION: A valve structure of a shock absorber comprises a piston body(124) and valve units(130,140). In the piston body, one or more paths(125,126) for passing working fluid are formed. The valve unit is respectively arranged in the upper part and lower part of the piston body. The valve unit generates damping force, and is equipped with a pilot valve(131) which is settled on the surface of the piston body. The pilot valve comprises an opening and an orifice(131b). The opening is formed to penetrate the paths and pilot chamber.

column12: DISK SEARCHING APPARATUS AND METHOD
column13: PURPOSE: A disk searching apparatus and method is provided to perform searching quickly by adopting a method for controlling a rate using a reference rate profile including a uniform area and a deceleration area in exponential function form and a position controlling method in a stationary area adjacent to a target track. CONSTITUTION: A digital signal processor(10) generates a reference speed profile, generates a control signal according to a speed control and a position control and supplies it to a tracking actuator driving unit(24). The tracking actuator driving unit(24) drives a tracking actuator installed in an optical pick-up(26) in response to a control signal of the digital signal processor(10). The optical pick-up(26) radiates light on a disk and detects a reflected light. A tracking error detector(28) detects a tracking error signal from an optical detecting signal outputted from the optical pick-up(26). A pulse counter(30) counts the number of travel tracks on the basis of the tracking error signal outputted from the tracking error detector(28). A travelling rate detector(32) is connected between the tracking error detector(28) and the digital signal processor(10).

column12: DISPLAY DEVICE IMPROVED CONTRAST RATIO
METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR DISPLAYING EDITING OBJECTS
column13: The present invention relates to a method and an apparatus for displaying editing objects. A method for displaying editing objects according to the present invention, which enables an indication by expansion and downsize of editing area within a display unit, comprises steps of: receiving a selected input of an editing object; receiving a setting information of a print unit which prints the editing area; indicating an editing object on the editing area in a first magnification following an expand command or a downsize command based on the setting information of the print unit corresponding to an expand command or a downsize command of the editing area, and indicating an editing object on a preview area of the editing area in a second magnification to the size printed in practice. The present invention improves convenience of a user by checking the object actually printed as the printed object is additionally indicated on a part of the editing area by a printing device, when an object being edited changes corresponding to the expansion or downsize command.

column12: ANGLE SHOES FOR CORRECTING THE HUMAN BODY
THE ADVERTISEMENT SYSTEM AND METHOD WHICH USES THE LOBBY PHONE
column13: A system and a method for performing advertisement with a lobby phone are provided to enable residents of an apartment complex to receive local information easily and the advertisement around the apartment complex by displaying the local information and the advertisement to the lobby phone installed to the lobby of an apartment. A lobby phone(100) stores the advertisement and the local information received from an apartment complex server(300), and displays the received information according to an advertisement period, a display position, and advertisement contents to an LCD(Liquid Crystal Display). A web server(400) registers the local information, local shop information, and the advertisement of the local shops around the apartment complex by connecting to the apartment complex server. The apartment complex server stores the information registered by the web server, enables the web server to set the advertisement period, the display position, and the advertisement contents, and transmits the stored information to the lobby phone.

column12: Detachable water bottle
column13: The present invention relates to a dividable water bottle, which solves a problem of being unhygienic since the inside is difficult to clean in a prior art by opening the inside through division so as to easily wash and disinfect the inside. The present invention provides a water bottle, comprising: a main body formed in a cylindrical shape so as to contain water; a connection member having one side formed in a protrusion form and the other side formed in a burial form so as to make a divided main body connectable and the main body dividable; and an external silicone formed flat and regular such that water can be blocked not to be leaked. Therefore, the present invention solves a problem of being unhygienic since the inside is difficult to clean in a prior art by opening the inside through division so as to easily wash and disinfect the inside.

column12: A cursive hand from my wallet
column13: 본 발명은 흘림 방지 지갑에 관한 것으로서 고무의 마찰력에 의한 지갑 잊어버림을 방지하도록 함으로써 기존의 일반지갑은 쉽게 흘려 잊어 버리는 문제점을 해소 하도록 한 것이다.즉 본 발명은, 지갑에 있어서 마찰을 일으켜 흘림을 막을수 있 동그라미로 형성한 고무로 구성한 것이다.따라서, 본 발명은 고무의 마찰력에 의한 지갑 잊어버림을 방지하도록 함으로써 기존의 일반지갑은 쉽게 흘려 잊어 버리는 문제점을 해소하도록 한 효과를 갖는 것이다.

column12: MEDICAL BLADE
column13: The present invention relates to a blade damper to minimize noise and vibration generated when a blade is retracted by an elastic restoring force. According to one embodiment of the present disclosure, the blade damper comprises: a body including a guide hole formed longitudinally in a side surface thereof, and a guide rail formed therein to move a blade forward and backward; the blade coupled to the inside of the body to move along the guide rail, and including a cutting blade drawn in/out of an opening in a front end of the body; and a pressing member pushing the blade towards a front end. A protrusion formed on the blade is fixed to a locking groove formed in one surface of the body when the blade moves towards the front end by the pressing member, and moves to an original position by an elastic restoring force when a pressing part formed on the body presses the protrusion. The blade damper further comprises a buffering member formed at a rear end of the inside of the body to offset friction of the blade with the body when the blade moves to the original position. According to a preferred feature of the present disclosure, the buffering member includes a damper spring.

column12: AVN AVN system having gateway
column13: The present invention provides an audio video navigation (AVN) system having a gateway providing a convenience function in a vehicle. The AVN system has sensor modules installed on a plurality of positions of the vehicle, respectively, to collect information necessary for performing convenience functions for a driver. A gateway connected to an existing AVN wirelessly receives information from each sensor module and provides the information to an AVN such that the AVN of the vehicle displays various pieces of information to the driver based on the information collected from various sensor modules and is able to provide various services such as prevention of drowsy driving by detecting drowsiness of a driver or the like. In addition, the AVN system according to the present invention is interlinked with a smartphone of a user to perform communication with the smartphone through Wi-Fi (wireless fidelity) via a hot spot formed in the smartphone, accesses Internet through the smartphone, analyses a pattern of the driver by storing information collected inside the vehicle into a service providing server, and is able to provide a proper service to the driver.

column12: APARATUS AND METHOD FOR NAVIGATING REFLECTING MOVING SPEED OF CAR
column13: A navigation apparatus and method is provided to notify a driver of required road information at a navigation point, without interfering with driver safety. A navigation point searching unit(340) searches whether a road information notifying point is provided on a road on which a vehicle travels. An output position determining unit(350) variably determines a position for outputting road guidance information to the searched navigation point at traveling speed of a vehicle. An information output unit outputs road guidance information to the navigation point when the vehicle reaches the output position. The navigation point searching unit utilizes a present position of the vehicle, and node information and link information stored in a storage unit(320).

column12: SKIN BEAUTY TREATMENT DEVICE WITH STEAM SPRAY HAVING IONIZER
column13: The present invention relates to a steam-spraying skin care device capable of generating anions. The steam-spraying skin care device capable of generating anions includes: a heater case (130) which heats water supplied through a water tank pipe connected to an outlet of the water tank; a first separating wall (143) which is installed in the perpendicular direction of movement of steam heated in a heater case (130) to pass only steam and drop water into the water tank pipe; an anion generating device (160) installed close to an spraying hole through which steam that has passed the first separating wall (143) is discharge through a steam pipe to the outside; a grounding plate (175) which is located in front of the anion generating device(160) and is installed behind the spraying hole (190); and a power source part which supplies electric power to a heat dissipating device and the anion generating device.

column12: Server and method for training speech disorder
column13: A server for training a speech disorder and a method thereof are disclosed. According to an embodiment of the present invention, the server for training a speech disorder includes a user interface part for providing a reference word to a user terminal according to a predetermined language training cycle and receiving pronunciation data for a reference word, a conversion part for converting the inputted pronunciation data into text, an analysis part for comparing the converted text with previously stored similar words to analyze the degree of matching, a DB management part for accumulating the analyzed degrees of matching to construct a training result database, and an information providing part for providing information related to speech training using the constructed training result database. It is possible to easily check information about the training of a speech disorder.

column12: Oil cooler
column13: 본 발명은 오일쿨러에 관한 것으로, 더욱 상세하게 바이패스 밸브가 연결되는 측의 헤더탱크가 타측 헤더탱크보다 길게 형성되고, 바이패스 밸브와 연결되어 오일이 배출되는 유출구가 서포트부보다 외측에 위치한 헤더탱크에 형성되며, 서포트부보다 외측에 위치한 한 쌍의 헤더탱크 영역에 양단이 고정된 리턴파이프를 통해 튜브 전 영역에서 1 PASS로 유동된 오일이 배출되도록 형성됨으로써, 통유저항을 최소화하여 냉각 성능이 향상된 오일쿨러를 제공하는 것이다.

column12: Bandspannungssteuervorrichtung für einen Videorecorder
A HOOD HINGE INTEGRATED HOOD STAY
column13: The present invention relates to a hood stay integrated with a hood hinge. The hood stay integrated with a hood hinge includes: a hinge bracket which is fixed on a vehicle body; a hinge arm fixed on a hood; a hinge pin which rotatably coupled to hinge bracket and the hinge arm; a detent lever which includes a lever pin to rotatably couple to the hinge bracket; a spring which has a rear end supported by the hinge bracket and the front end supported by the level pin to elastically support the detent lever against the hinge bracket to the front side; an arm pin which is formed to protrude from the hinge arm to the detent lever, and contacts the front surface of the detent lever when the hood opens; a mounting surface which is formed on the front surface of the detent lever and dents toward the rear side; a peak surface which is formed to connect the front surface of the detent lever and the lower side of the mounting surface and is protruding to the front side.

column12: THE LASER APPARATUS
column13: The present invention includes a laser irradiating system comprises: a laser irradiation device; a laser unit for irradiating a beam along a first axis; a guide unit for guiding the beam irradiated from the laser unit along a predetermined path; a coupling unit including a nozzle having a slit through which the beam guided by the guide unit passes; and a lens unit disposed between the laser unit and the guide unit and controlling the beam in response to at least one of the size and position of the slit. Accordingly, by changing the position of a nozzle, the focus of the beam can be easily and precisely adjusted to correspond to the slit.

column12: HUMIDIFIER USING TEMPERATURE-HUMIDITY SENSOR
column13: Generally, a humidifier humidifies a room and is classified into an evaporative humidifier, an ultrasonic humidifier, a heating humidifier, a combination humidifier and the like in accordance with the humidification method. The evaporative humidifier humidifies a room after water of a water tank is absorbed by an evaporative filter and air is humidified while passing through the humidifying filter. The ultrasonic humidifier sprays water in small particles by generating ultrasonic waves in the bottom portion of a container in which water is contained, wherein the vapor coming from the humidifier is cold vapor. The heating humidifier sprays water in a vapor state by heating water in the humidifier, wherein the vapor coming from the humidifier is hot vapor. The combination humidifier is a combination of the ultrasonic humidifier and the heating humidifier to strengthen the ultrasonic humidifier and the heating humidifier. Firstly, the temperature of water is increased in a heating tube, and the water is sterilized and is injected using ultrasonic waves, wherein vapor can be hot or cold depending on the situation. The humidifier of the present invention is automatically controlled to appropriately maintain the indoor moisture. The humidifier comprises: a housing formed on the outer surface to protect various devices; a temperature-moisture sensor simultaneously detecting data including temperature and moisture, converting the data into an electric or transmission signal, and transmitting the signal to a micom; and the micom outputting a control signal transmitted from the temperature-moisture sensor and controlling the device.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PROCEDURING OPERATOR DETERMINED BARRING DATA IN MOBILE COMMUNICATION SERVICE SYSTEM, MOBILE MANAGEMENT ENTITY FOR OPERATOR DETERMINED BARRING DATA PROCESS
column13: PURPOSE: A method and system for processing operator determined barring information and a mobile communication exchange for processing the operator determined barring information are provided to supply a specific free data service to a data service barring subscriber by inserting partial data barring service information into operator determined barring information. CONSTITUTION: A UE(100) offers a broadband communications service to a subscriber. An MME(104) charges a signal control between an eNB and an SGW(106). The SGW manages the mobility of the UE between a 3GPP network and an EUTRAN. A PGW(108) maintains routing information with the SGW and PDN for a packet service. An SGSN(112) determines the operator determined barring information by querying HLR/HSS(10).

column12: MEMORY SYSTEM INCLUDING HOST AND A PLURALITY OF STORAGE DEVICES AND DATA MIGRATION METHOD THEREOF
column13: A data migration method of a memory system including first and second storage devices includes performing a read operation of original data stored in the first storage device in response to a data migration request, obtaining parameters of files included in the original data with reference to metadata of the original data, re-arranging the files included in the original data based on at least one of the parameters, and storing the files included in the original data in the second storage device according to the re-arrangement.

column12: SEAT BELT
column13: A safety belt for an infant which is installed at a chair of a vehicle is provided to protect a passenger safely with simple installation property by supporting the passenger with an impact absorption part. A safety belt for an infant which is installed at a chair of a vehicle includes an impact absorption part(10), a fastening belt(20), and a fixing belt(30). The impact absorption part is installed at the front of a chair, and supports an abdominal part of a passenger. The fastening belt passes through the impact absorption part to a longitudinal direction. Two free ends of the fastening belt are connected each other. The fixing belt is formed on an inner side of the fastening belt, and fixes the fastening belt on the chair.

column12: AIR CLEANER
column13: The present invention relates to an air cleaner, comprising: a housing; a valve seat formed on an outer surface of the housing; a drain hole formed in the valve seat to discharge foreign matter; a drain valve for opening and closing the drain hole; and a groove formed on the valve seat to engage with an inner space of the housing. As a result, the contact force between the drain valve and the valve seat is enhanced, so that the drain valve can open and close the drain hole as intended. Accordingly, the foreign matter and noise can be prevented from flowing into the housing from the outside of the housing.
column14: MAHLE DONGHYUN FILTER SYSTEMS CO LTD;;MAHLE INT GMBH

column12: Organic light emitting display device
column13: An OLED device according to one example includes a substrate defined into a plurality of sub-pixel regions which includes red, green and blue sub-pixel regions; a first electrode formed on the substrate; an organic emission layer formed on the first electrode; a second electrode formed on the organic emission layer; and a capping layer formed on the second electrode. The capping layer is formed to contain an optical adjustment material which rises in proportion to a wavelength of incident light.

column12: EMBODIMENT SYSTEM OF WIDE DISPLAY SCENE IN MOBILE COMMUNICATION TERMINAL
Multi-display system and display apparatus
column13: A multi-display system includes a plurality of display apparatuses capable of mutual data communication, and at least one of the plurality of display apparatuses receives predetermined control information from a user and transmits the control information to another display apparatus. The display apparatus can be remotely controlled without a central computer.

column12: PHARMACEUTICAL COMPOSITION
column13: PURPOSE: A pharmaceutical composition and a preparation method thereof are provided to inhibit cholesterol and neutral fat from a deposit on a blood vessel and to prevent and treat hypertension by using Korean mistletoe. CONSTITUTION: A pharmaceutical composition comprises a therapeutically effective amount i.e., 0.01-50 wt% of an extract of Korean mistletoe's leaves, stems or roots. The preparation method comprises: defatting the sample using nonpolar solvents to extract from the Korean mistletoe; vacuum concentrating the extracts obtained using water-soluble organic solvent; extracting with low polar organic solvent which dissolves the concentrate in water.

column12: Novel clean room air cooler with high heat exchange efficiency and heat exchange method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of air coolers, and provides a novel clean room air cooler high in heat exchange efficiency and a heat exchange method.The novel clean room air cooler comprises a fixing plate, a first containing groove is formed in the top end of the fixing plate, and a plurality of fixing blocks are fixedly arranged in the first containing groove and fixedly connected; the novel air cooler special for the clean room has the beneficial effects that the EC fan wall in the novel air cooler special for the clean room replaces a traditional alternating current centrifugal fan, the air wall composed of the multiple EC fans enables the air speed passing through the surface of the cooling coil pipe to be more uniform, the cooling efficiency of the cooling coil pipe is improved, noise of the clean room can be reduced by adopting the EC fans, the air guide flow equalizing plate is a honeycomb-shaped cylindrical pore plate, and the air guide flow equalizing plate is more stable. When passing through the cooling coil pipe, hot air uniformly flows into the suction inlet of the fan according to different air inlet hole channels, so that the hot air uniformly passes through the cooling coil pipe for heat exchange, and compared with a cooling air conditioning box, the air conditioning box is light in weight, small in occupied space, low in noise and low in price.
column14: SUZHOU YANGJI ELECTROMECHANICAL ENG CO LTD

column12: cleaning tool
column13: 본 발명은 걸레부착시트의 하단에 긁기 부재가 설치되어, 걸레부착시트의 탄성을 이용하여 긁기 부재의 긁기 사용을 극대화시킨 청소 도구에 관한 것이다.

column12: NANOPARTICLES
column13: Nanoparticles can include a core linked to a polymerizable moiety that can be polymerized, cross-linked or cured. The polymerizable nanoparticles can be included in a composition for a polymerization, cross-linking or curing reaction in an amount and disposition sufficient for inhibiting or preventing volume shrinkage during polymerization, cross-linking or curing reaction. Also, the nanoparticles can be included with monomers, dendrimers, oligomers or polymers in the compositions that can be reacted to form a polymerized, cross-linked or cured product.

column12: Seismic rehabilitation structure of concrete beams for building structures
column13: The present invention relates to a seismic rehabilitation structure of a concrete beam for a building structure, and more specifically, to a seismic rehabilitation structure installed on a foundation beam of a building structure, comprising: a seismic rehabilitation frame disposed while surrounding the outer surface of a foundation beam formed on a slab of a building structure and fixed to the slab; a composite reinforcing beam fixed to the seismic rehabilitation frame to support the load together with the foundation beam and lessening the impact; and a connecting portion connecting the composite reinforcing frame to the seismic rehabilitation frame. The composite reinforcing beam is fixed to the foundation beam formed in an existing building to achieve seismic rehabilitation according to the earthquake, and the seismic rehabilitation frame is constructed to be connected to the composite reinforcing beam while surrounding the foundation beam, the foundation beam can be directly reinforced according to the earthquake in the process of constructing the composite reinforcing beam on the foundation beam, thereby ensuring the integrity of the composite reinforcing beam and the foundation beam and improving resistance of the foundation beam to earthquakes.

column12: ELECTRICALLY CONDUCTIVE POLYMERS WITH ENHANCED CONDUCTIVITY
column13: An electrically conductive polymer linked to conductive nanoparticle is provided. The conductive polymer can include conductive monomers and one or more monomers in the conductive polymer can be linked to a conductive nanoparticle and can include a polymerizable moiety so that it can be incorporated into a polymer chain. The electrically conductive monomer can include a 3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene as a conductive monomer. The electrically conductive polymer having the conductive nanoparticle can be prepared into an electrically conductive layer or film for use in electronic devices.
column16: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION (2010-01-12)

column12: METHOD, APPARATUS AND SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING SINGLE RADIO VOICE CALL CONTINUITY INTEGRATED CALL CONTROL
column13: Provided is a method for providing single radio voice call continuity integrated with call processing, which comprises the steps of: receiving, from a wireless terminal that is connected to a first network and has transmitted an originating call, an invite message based on a handover request from the first network to a second network via a call status management apparatus; checking whether a subscriber who uses the wireless terminal is a subscriber to an intelligent network; and transmitting an error response to the invite message from the wireless terminal to a terminal switching node if the subscriber is the subscriber to the intelligent network as a result of the determination.

column12: A processing tool system
column13: 본 발명은 탄발 압출수단을 갖는 재사용 가공물 가공용 절삭공구장치에 있어서, 특히 원기둥형 공작물의 속을 깍아내어 원통형 구조물로 제작하는 과정에서 상기 원기둥형 공작물의 속을 원기둥 형태로 파내도록하여 재료의 재사용이 가능한 원기둥을 추출하여 이용성을 높이도록하되 가공용 절삭공구장치에 탄발 압출수단을 더 부가설치하여 가공후 후퇴를 보다 원할하게 진행하여 재사용 가공물의 가공이 보다 빠르고 쉽게 이루어지도록 하는 것을 특징으로 하는 탄발 압출수단을 갖는 재사용 가공물 가공용 절삭공구장치에 관한 것으로, 수직단면이 원형 또는 다각형으로 이루어지는 원기둥형 또는 다각기둥형 공작물과; 상기 공작물의 일측을 붙잡아 지지함과 동시에 회전시키는 회전 고정수단과; 상기 공작물의 타측에 접촉함과 동시에 내측을 원기둥 형태로 가공하기 위한 가공수단과; 상기 가공수단의 몸체를 통해 절삭유를 공급하는 절삭유 공급수단과; 상기 가공수단이 공작물로부터 쉽게 분리되도록 가공수단의 중심축에 설치되는 탄발 압출수단을 포함하여 이루어지는 것이 특징이다.

column12: DATA SIGNAL CONNECTION CONTROL SYSTEM AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: PURPOSE: A data call connection control system and a method thereof are provided to maintain or disconnect a data call session by a state of the data call session when usage limit of a subscriber with a limited call rate plan is exceeded. CONSTITUTION: When usage limit of a subscriber with a limited call rate plan reaches a specific limit exceeding condition, a call exchanger(100,200) provides a state information of a data call session of a corresponding terminal for a predefined condition time. When the usage limit of the subscriber with a limited call rate is exceeded and the terminal is in a idle state, a billing service device(300,400) requests a data call session release for the terminal to the call exchanger.

column12: MANUFACTURING METHOD OF CRACK SEALANT
Keypad assembly for mobile station
column13: A keypad assembly for a mobile station comprises a base pad adapted to support a plurality of keys, the plurality of keys comprising a plurality of first keys and a plurality of second keys. The keypad assembly also comprises the plurality of first keys and the plurality of second keys arranged on the base pad, the plurality of second keys defined by horizontal center lines and vertical center lines of the plurality of first keys. The plurality of second keys may be further defined by outer perimeters of the plurality of first keys. The keypad assembly may further comprise a strength reinforcing plate coupled to the base pad, adapted to mechanically strengthen the keypad assembly. An alphabetic character may be assigned to each of the plurality of first keys. A numeral may be assigned to at least one of the plurality of second keys.

column12: Method for supplying power to a copying machine
column13: In the copying machine including an electrifier, a developer, a developer roller, a transcriber, a discharging brush, a cleaning blade, a cleaning portion and a front and a rear guides, the guide and the discharging brush are grounds, the predetermined symmetric AC voltage is directly applied to the drum to generate the asymmetric AC power in the surface of a photosensitive drum.

column12: DISPLAY APPARATUS AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: The present invention relates to a display device and a method thereof. The display device comprises: an input unit configured to receive data; a display unit including a plurality of LEDs and configured to display the data; and a control unit configured to control currents, supplied to the plurality of LEDs, to be supplied to only LEDs which are necessary to display the data inputted from the input unit. Therefore, the display device can easily transfer an intention of a user to another user.

column12: SHOE HAVING FRAME MECHANISM
column13: The present invention relates to shoes including a midsole and an outsole welded into the lower part of the midsole. The midsole include a midsole main body on the upper part and a bridge part welded into the bottom surface of the midsole main body. Upward bridges, downward bridges, and heel supporting bridges are integrally formed in the bridge part. In the midsole main body, a first buffer material insertion space of a trapezoid shape is formed in the front foot part and a second buffer material insertion space of a rectangular shape is formed in the heel part.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR CONVERTING SPREAD SHEET DOCUMENT INTO PRESENTATION PAGE DOCUMENT
column13: The present invention relates to a method and an apparatus for converting a spread sheet document into a presentation page document. The method and an apparatus for converting a spread sheet document into a presentation page document according to an embodiment of the present invention includes the steps of: receiving an object selection input for selecting an object corresponding to at least one cell of a spread sheet document, producing a presentation page document including an object selected by the object selection input and configuration information of the at least one cell, and outputting the presentation page document that displays the information such that the configuration information may be identified. The present invention provides a method and an apparatus for converting a spread sheet document into a presentation page document by which an object selected from the spread sheet document may be easily converted into the presentation page document.

column12: THE HOME NETWORK SYSTEM AND COMMUNICATION METHOD WHICH PROVIDES THE COMMUNICATION BETWEEN THE VIDEO-PHONE AND THE MOBIL PHONE
column13: A home network system for providing a communication function between a video phone and a portable phone and a communication method thereof are provided to enable a visitor to make a call with a resident during resident's absence by using the video phone installed in an apartment house such as an apartment and a villa, and enable the resident to confirm identity of the visitor, and then open/close a door of a common entrance or each household, thereby providing security and convenience to the resident and the visitor. A home network system for providing a communication function between a video phone and a portable phone comprises the followings: a video phone(100,150); a home network server(200) which performs a phone call by controlling connection with a specific receiving party's video phone, a general telephone, and a portable phone through a virtual telephone office(400) supporting an Internet phone service, and performs remote control through power lines of various information home appliances according to a request of a resident of a remote place; the virtual telephone office(400) which provides a function for perform connection with the specific receiving party's video phone, the general telephone, and the portable phone by using an Internet phone number assigned to the video phone(100,150); and the portable phone(600).

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ANALYZING CUSTOMER LOYALTY TO STORE
column13: An operation method of a system for analyzing customer loyalty to a store may comprise the steps of: obtaining store visit record information including visit date information and visit frequency information of customers of the store; obtaining information on sales of the store generated by the customers; standardizing the store visit record information of the customers and the information on sales generated by the customers; generating a loyalty analysis model by learning the standardized store visit record information and the standardized information on sales; and classifying the customers into one of pre-classified groups with reference to the loyalty, by using the loyalty analysis model.

column12: AI METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR AI DEMAND FORCASTING
column13: An AI demand prediction method includes the steps of: obtaining, from a database, existing sales data of a store including reservation history information and visit history information of customers for each date of the store; preprocessing the existing sales data of the store; generating a plurality of store demand prediction models by using a plurality of preset algorithms learned from the preprocessed existing sales data of the store; determining a store demand prediction model based on evaluation results of each of the store demand prediction models; and predicting the demand of the store using the determined store demand prediction model. Accordingly, it is possible to provide scientific customer analysis and sales prediction information.

column12: GUIDE DEVICE OF STOPPING PLACE OF A TROLLEY BUS
Address producing circuit for zoom function
column13: Disclosed is an address producing circuit for zoom function in which horizontal and vertical addresses are to make more free selection of a partial picture around a plurality of locations disposed on a screen of a monitor device, and image data stored in a predetermined address region according to the selection is read out to display on the screen, so that the picture of the selected partial region can be magnified to a whole screen picture.
column16: SAMSUNG ELECTRONICS CO. LTD. #416 MAETAN-DONG KWONSUN-GU SUWON-CITY KYOUNGGI-DO KOREA A CORP. OF REP. OF KOREA (1989-06-27)

column12: SLIDING MODULE OF MOBILE PHONE
column13: Disclosed is a sliding module of a mobile phone which can realize compactness and slimness of the mobile phone, thereby improving the durability and productivity. The sliding module includes a main unit, a sliding unit, and an elastic unit. The elastic unit includes an elastic portion spirally wound in a direction as the elastic portion progresses outward, and a stress dispersion unit spirally wound in a direction opposite to the direction in which the elastic portion is wound as the stress dispersion unit progresses inward. Thus, according to the present invention, a height of the elastic unit is reduced, thereby realizing slimness of the mobile phone, and stress concentration on the elastic portion is prevented, thereby improving durability of the elastic portion and improving productivity due to a simplified assembly process.

column12: Shell for a USB receptacle connector
A HINGE ROTARY TYPE CAMERA MODULE
column13: A hinge rotative-type camera module is provided to improve a structure of combining an FPCB(Flexible Printed Circuit Board) with a camera casing simply, thereby reducing concentration of distortion stress on a particular area of the FPCB extracted to the outside during repeated rotative operation of the camera casing, thus disconnection of a pattern circuit is prevented. A lens barrel has at least one lens. An image sensor is disposed under a housing combined with the lens barrel. The image sensor is electrically mounted on one end of an FPCB(155). A camera casing has a cover(120) having an extraction hole through which the FPCB(155) is extracted outside, and seals an opened end of a module receiver(110) having an exposure hole(112) through which the lens barrel is exposed outside, by using the cover(120). The extraction hole is formed as a long hole inclined by being rotated at certain angle in rotative mobile direction for a horizontal reference line in initial stopping state of the module receiver(110).

column12: JIG SYSTEM FOR ASSEMBLING VEHICLE NAVIGATION DEVICE
column13: The present invention relates to an assembly jig system for a navigation device. The assembly jig system enables a screw to be rapidly screwed to a component in a navigation device assembling process and prevents the screw from missing in a screw fastening work. According to the present invention, the assembly jig system automatically locks and releases the component to improve productivity of the component.

column12: MOBILE COMMUNICATION TERMINAL WITH PROTRUSION PREVENTION FUNCTION FOR KEY PAD
System und Verfahren zum Bereitstellen von Software-Updates
column13: Ein System zum Bereitstellen eines Software-Updates umfasst einen Server, in dem Software-Updates registriert sind, und ein Terminal zum Empfangen von Versionsinformation eines Software-Updates von dem Server und zum Ausführen eines Software-Updates auf Grundlage der empfangenen Versionsinformation des Software-Updates, wobei der Server eine Versionsinformation-Prüfeinheit zum Sammeln von Versionsinformation von Software, die vorübergehend in dem Terminal gespeichert ist, oder von Versionsinformationen von Software, die in dem Terminal installiert ist, und zum Vergleichen der Versionsinformation der vorübergehend gespeicherten Software oder der Versionsinformation der installierten Software mit der Versionsinformation des Software-Updates, um zu bestimmen, ob das Software-Update an das Terminal zu übertragen ist, umfasst.

column12: Receptacle Connector
column13: The present invention relates to a receptacle connector. The receptacle connector includes a plurality of contacts electrically connecting a plug connector and a substrate, an insulating part provided with the contacts, a cover provided with the insulating part, and a blocking part coupled to the cover. The cover includes a lower cover and an upper cover which are integrally formed. The blocking part is coupled to the cover so as to cover the rear surface of the insulating part. It is possible to reduce the occurrence of radiation to a signal.

column12: RECYCLING APPARATUS FOR RESIDUE RESIN OF INJECTION MOLDING
column13: PURPOSE: Recycling apparatus of residual resin is provided to directly use residual resin as an injection molding material in field by instantly recycling the residual resin. CONSTITUTION: Recycling apparatus of residual resin comprises: a storage hopper(100) in which a residual resin is put in; a pulverizing unit(200) pulverizing the residual resin supplied from the storage hopper; a mixing hopper(300) temporary storing the pulverized residual resin; a melting and extruding unit(500) heating the residual resin over melting point, and discharging to outside by extruding with diameter corresponding with injection molding material; a cooling transfer unit(600) transferring recycled resin with continuous strip shape, cooling the extruded residual resin; a cutting unit(700) cutting the transferred residual resin with strip shape to constant size.

column12: Address producing circuit for zoom function
column13: Disclosed is an address producing circuit for a zoom function in which a plurality of horizontal and vertical addresses are provided to permit wider selection of a partial picture around a plurality of locations disposed on the screen of a monitor device. Image data stored in a predetermined address region according to the selection is road out to display on the screen, so that the picture of the selected partial region can be magnified to a whole screen picture. Two multiplexers are respectively fed with a plurality of row and column addresses defining the starting point of the plurality of regions. The pair of addresses are selected using a microprocessor (13) and command decoder (14) controlling the multiplexers (15), (16). The zoom function is produced by addressing the field memory at sub-rates of the color sub-carrier and horizontal sync. frequencies. <IMAGE>

column12: A REFRIGERATOR
AUTOMATIC POWER CONTROL DEVICE, PARTICULARLY CONCERNED WITH CONTROLLING A POWER SUPPLY TO AN ELECTRIC DEVICE BY DETECTING AN IMAGE OF A PREDETERMINED AREA
column13: PURPOSE: An automatic power control device is provided to control a power supply to an electric device, depending on whether a living body is detected, thereby automatically sensing the living body while continuously supplying power to the device even though the living body does not move or faintly moves. CONSTITUTION: An image detection unit(110) senses a movement of a living body within an area for detecting an image. A living body sensing unit(120) senses the movement of the living body within the area. A reference setup unit(130) sets various standards necessary for power control. A memory(140) stores data on the set standards. A CPU(200) generates a command for controlling a supplying or cutting-off of power to an electric device(170), based on information on the sensed living body and the set standards. A power control unit(150) controls the power according to the generated command.

column12: Portable sterilizer
column13: The present invention relates to a sterilizer, and specifically, to a portable sterilizer in which a UV sterilization bar is disposed in an internal receiving space to slide such that when seated in the internal receiving space, the UV sterilization bar can sterilize an object disposed therein, and when taken out of the internal receiving space and exposed to the outside, the UV sterilization bar can sterilize an object disposed outside. To this end, the portable sterilizer, according to the present invention, is a portable sterilizer in which a cover and a base are hinge-coupled. The cover and the base are formed to have the same shape and are symmetrical to each other. The cover includes a cover plate, which is a cover main body, and a cover hinge connection part extending to the cover plate and hinge-coupled to the base. The base includes a base plate, which is a base main body, and a base hinge connection part extending to the base plate and hinge-coupled to the cover. When the cover and the base are closed, the UV sterilization bar is received in a first space formed by the cover hinge connection part and the base hinge connection part, and an object to be sterilized by the UV sterilization bar is received in a second space formed by the cover plate and the base plate.

column12: MULTI-DISPLAY SYSTEM AND DISPLAY APPARATUS
Turn-by-turn navigation-based descriptive direction indicator for vehicles
column13: A system for providing an externally visible signal regarding a navigational instruction at a vehicle includes a navigation system, a navigation message sender, a navigation message receiver, and a display system. The navigation system generates and outputs turn-by-turn navigational directions within the vehicle to assist a driver of the vehicle in reaching a given destination location. The navigation message sender receives the turn-by-turn navigational directions and transmits them to the navigation message receiver. The navigation message receiver provides a navigational message to the display system for display in a manner visible outside the vehicle.

column12: TILTABLE SLIDING DEVICE
column13: A sliding device capable of conducting a tilting action is provided to comprise a cover unit, a main unit, and a tilting unit, and to tilt the tilting unit in front direction at a certain angle, thereby realizing various modes as improving speech sensitivity in handset mode when the sliding device is applied to a personal portable terminal. A main unit(200) is combined with a rear side of a cover unit(100) in a sliding way. A tilting unit(300) is rotatively combined with one side of the main unit, and performs a tilting action at a certain angle in front direction while the cover unit slides to an upper part. A mode conversion unit(600) is equipped at a rotative axis of the tilting unit and the main unit, and converts operation of the tilting unit by selectively restricting the tilting action of the tilting unit by operation of a conversion switch.

column12: Server and Method for Group Electronic Business Card
column13: Disclosed are a server and a method for generating a group of electronic business cards to prevent theft of a business card. The server for generating an electronic business card comprises: a database managing an electronic business card generation application program, a business card form for each group, department and job grade, authentication information confirming data, and basic information of a user wanting to generate the business card; an authentication information confirming module requesting personal authentication information to a smart device of the user and checking validity of the personal authentication information if receiving the personal authentication information; an electronic business card generation module, if the authentication information confirming module determines that the personal authentication information is valid, extracting a form corresponding to the basic information including a group, a job grade and a department, to which the user belongs, and generating an electronic business card; and an electronic business card management module, if the generated electronic business card is to be transmitted to a smart device of the other side, selecting an electronic business card transmission method according to whether an electronic business card generation application is installed in the smart device of the other side, and then transmitting the electronic business card to the smart device of the other side.

column12: A mask having a fixed part that can be used in combination with moisture control frame fine dust filtering fabric and outside skin fabric
column13: The present invention relates to a structure for a fine dust barrier mask including a fixing unit designed to freely combine: a filter (200) for blocking fine dust, a frame (100) including a valve (120) capable of controlling moisture while contacting one surface of the filter (200), and an outer shell (300) for covering the filter while coming into contact with the other surface of the filter (200). A second fixing unit (250) among the designed fixing units has both a second fixing unit storage space (252) capable of storing a first fixing unit protrusion (151) of a first fixing unit (150) and a second fixing unit protrusion (251) to be inserted into a third fixing unit storage space (352) of a third fixing unit (350), so that the outer shell (300) and the filter (200), the filter (200) and the frame coupling part (100), the outer shell (300) and the frame coupling part (100), and the filter (200) and the frame coupling part (100) are selected and worn in combination.

column12: FUEL PROCESSING DEVICE
column13: The present invention relates to a fuel processing device comprising: a device body; a fuel reforming part disposed at the center of the device body; a heating part disposed at the upper side of the device body so as to heat the fuel reforming part; a CO denaturation part connected to the fuel reforming part, and disposed at the lower side of the device body; and a preferential oxidation (PROX) reaction part connected to the CO denaturation part, and disposed at the upper side of the device body. The present invention improves heat transfer and cooling efficiency through optimal arrangement, stably performs a reforming reaction and a CO removal reaction, and is advantageous in miniaturizing the device.

column12: METHOD FOR OPERATING BASE STATION MANAGER, AND BSM SERVER FOR THE SAME
COMBINED DVD/CD DATA PROCESSOR
column13: A combined DVD/CD (Digital Video Disk/Compact Disk) data processor used in a DVD/CD player. The DVD/CD data processor includes a PLL (Phase Locked Loop) to receive a pulse stream input to generate a PLL clock; a frame/ID synchronization detector to latch the pulse stream according to the PLL clock, to generate a symbol clock; a demodulator to EFM demodulate the pulse stream according to the symbol clock in a DVD mode, and EFM demodulate the pulse stream according to the symbol clock in a CD mode; an ECC demodulator to error-correct input data according to a predetermined code length and error correction range, the predetermined code length and error correction range having different values in the DVD and CD modes; a memory to store the demodulated data to provide the ECC demodulator with the demodulated data stored therein; a descrambler to descramble the error corrected data stored in the memory, in the DVD mode; and a CD audio processor to process the error corrected data stored in the memory, in the CD mode.

column12: Water-soluble electrically conductive polymers
column13: Water-soluble electrically conductive polymers and a composition comprising such polymers are provided. Also, an electrically conductive layer or film formed from the composition, and articles comprising the electrically conductive layer or film are provided. The electrically conductive polymers according to the present disclosure have one or more hydrophilic side chains. Hydrophilic side chains are covalently bonded to the conductive polymers, which allow the polymer to be stable at high temperature. Thus, the stability of electrical conductivity is prolonged. Depending on the concentration of hydrophilic side chains, the conductivity may be changed. The hydrophilic side chains provide a successful way to fabricate a ductile film exhibiting tunable conductivity. Furthermore, high levels of surface-resistance uniformity can be achieved in the field of coating technology that uses eco-friendly water-based solvents to uniformly and quickly coat the conductive polymer on to plastic film surfaces.
