column12: The high-sensitive premium automobile seat
column13: The present invention relates to a high quality premium seat for a vehicle. Specifically, an upper rail engaged with a lower rail is provided on a floor, a first traction plate is mounted on an upper surface of the upper rail, a forward/backward motor is mounted on the upper rail, a flat plate frame is mounted on the first traction plate through a second traction plate formed on a side of the flat plate frame, a rotating protrusion protrudes from an upper portion of the flat plate frame, a rotation frame is mounted such that a rotation insertion hole formed at a center of a rotation frame is fitted to the rotating protrusion of the flat plate frame in which the rotation frame is rotatably mounted between a fixing jig located on a bottom surface of the flat plate frame and an angle setting frame located on an upper surface of the rotation frame, a clutch having a pedal is mounted on one side of the rotation frame in order to be engage with a plurality of setting grooves radially formed in the angle setting frame, a support frame is mounted on both sides of the upper portion of the rotating frame through mounting holes formed in an inner bottom surface, a backrest frame mounted thereon with a rotary motor is mounted to a rear of the support frame, and a saddle frame is mounted on an upper portion of the support frame. In addition, a fixation frame is mounted on a front of the support frame, a ball nut mount bar is mounted between front ends of the support frame, the fixation frame includes a first rotating link, a second rotating link, a third rotating link, and a support which are folded, the first, second, and third rotating links and the support base are expanded and folded according to an operation of a pulling motor, and an angle of the calf support mounted on the support base is adjusted.

column12: VIDEO CAMERA SELECTION AND OBJECT TRACKING
column13: Embodiments described herein provide approaches relating generally to selecting and arranging video data feeds for display on a display screen. Specifically, the invention provides for video surveillance systems that model and take advantage of determined spatial relationships among video camera positions to select relevant video data streams for presentation. The spatial relationships (e.g., a first camera being located directly around a corner from a second camera) can facilitate an intelligent selection and presentation of potential “next” cameras to which a tracked object may travel.

column12: Breathing mask with functional polymer nanofiber filter
column13: The present invention relates to a respiratory mask with a functional polymer nanofiber filter, and more specifically includes: a mask with a built-in polymer nanofiber filter to block foreign substances contained in the air from entering a wearer's body when breathing outside air; and a supplied air unit detachable from the front of the mask and discharging the exhaled breath of a wearer. Therefore, it is possible to prevent harmful substances or fine dust contained in the air from being inhaled into the wearer's body when breathing outside air.

column12: Cooling structure for electronic element
column13: A cooling structure for an electronic element is disclosed in which smooth heat transfer can be carried out via a variety of heat transfer routes of conduction and convention without recourse to a forced cooling means such as a fan or the like, thus improving the cooling performance of electronic elements and stabilizing the operation of electronic circuits for a long period of time.

column12: KEYBOARD WHICH HAS FUNCTION OF MOUSE
column13: A keyboard equipped with a mouse function is provided to implement the mouse function without using a mouse by moving the keyword with a wrist not a finger in a state for manipulating the keyboard. A keypad(510) includes multiple keys, and receives a character, a number, or a symbol matched with each key, and a command for controlling a terminal from a user. A horizontal moving part(520) is combined to the keypad as one body at a lower side of the keypad, and is slid in a widthwise and lengthwise direction by force transferred from the user through the keypad. A displacement detector(530) is mounted at the lower side of the horizontal moving part in parallel to make the horizontal moving part slid. A fixing part(540) is combined to the displacement detector at the lower side of the displacement detector, is faced to an upper side of a desk, and includes a controller(542) for interfacing with the terminal.

column12: Jelly-Roll type electrode assembly
column13: PURPOSE: A Jelly-roll type electrode assembly structure is provided to improve battery performance by equalizing distribution of electrolyte, and to minimize the deformation of jelly-roll, thereby improving durability, and minimizing the thickness of a battery. CONSTITUTION: A Jelly-roll type electrode assembly(11) structure comprises a positive electrode plate(11a), a separation film(11b), a negative electrode plate(11c), and a separator laminated in order. Active material-uncoated parts(11aa,aaca), which is located in both right and left round parts of the jelly-roll type electrode assembly, are formed. The active material is coated on all over width of the positive electrode plate and the negative electrode plate, and is coated with specific gap along longitudinal direction thereof. Between the active material coated layer, a plurality of the active material-uncoated parts are formed.

column12: Device for cleaning polishing pad
column13: The utility model discloses a device for cleaning a polishing pad. The device comprises a high-pressure cleaning arm which is provided with a fixed end and a movable end; a plurality of high-pressure cleaning spray head pairs capable of spraying high-pressure deionized water DIW towards an upper polishing pad and a lower polishing pad of the double-sided polishing equipment at the same time are arranged in the direction from the movable end to the fixed end of the high-pressure cleaning arm; the movable end of the high-pressure cleaning arm can enter the space between an upper fixed disc and a lower fixed disc according to the direction perpendicular to the upper fixed disc and the lower fixed disc of the double-face polishing equipment. The multiple high-pressure cleaning spray head pairs spray high-pressure DIW to an upper polishing pad and a lower polishing pad of the double-face polishing equipment at the same time, and the total cleaning area range of the multiple high-pressure cleaning spray head pairs can cover the radial radius area of the upper polishing pad and the radial radius area of the lower polishing pad. And the cleaning area range of each high-pressure cleaning nozzle pair and the cleaning area range of the adjacent high-pressure cleaning nozzle pair have an overlapped part.
column14: XIAN YISIWEI MATERIAL TECH CO LTD;;XIAN YISIWEI SILICON CHIP TECH CO LTD

column12: HMI HMI for enhancing security using iris scanning
column13: The present invention relates to an HMI device. An iris authentication system is applied to an HMI to perform user authentication by comparing and contrasting a feature pattern of an iris image of a user with feature patterns of preregistered users when the corresponding user approaches to allow only authorized users to operate and approach to markedly increase security. An inquiry-order aligning unit of a controller optimizes an inquiry order of preregistered registration feature data for each preset period (T) to maximize authentication speed in comparison to an identical configuration and effectively prevent unnecessary operation processing and time consumption. An inquiry order setting unit of the controller optimizes inquiry order information in accordance with various environmental variables for each preset period (T) to flexibly respond to environment variables to optimize authentication speed.

column12: SMART PAYMENT SOLUTION
column13: A user of an online marketplace selects items for purchase. The user may have access to a number of discounts, each discount associated with a set of criteria that define when the discount may be applied. For example, a discount may be limited to application to only one item. Other discounts may apply only when a particular payment option is used or when other criteria are met. Assignment of available discounts to the selected items is a complex multidimensional problem appropriate for linear programming. The multidimensional problem of assigning discounts to items is decomposed by payment method, resulting in one simpler optimization problem for each payment method. Thus, one proposed combination of discounts is generated for each payment method. The proposed combination of discounts resulting in the lowest price is proposed to the user, along with the corresponding payment method.

column12: Photochromic material
column13: Photochromic dyes are disclosed. A photochromic dye can include a first photo-reactive group and a second photo-reactive group. A first photochromic reaction can be induced in the first photo-reactive group of the photochromic dye by radiation having a first wavelength, and a second photochromic reaction can be induced in the second photo-reactive group of the photochromic dye by radiation having a second wavelength.
column14: CHOI DONG HOON;;UNIV KOREA RES & BUS FOUND

column12: BATHTUB CONTROL SYSTEM WHICH USES THE WALL-PAD
column13: A control system of water level/temperature of a bath tub using a wall pad is provided to set desired temperature and water level, and to control the temperature and water level of water automatically by using a wall pad. A control system of water level/temperature of a bath tub using a wall pad includes a water level/temperature measuring device(100), a bath tub telephone(200), a wall pad(400), and a flow control valve(300). The water level/temperature measuring device installed on one side of a bath tube measures the water level and temperature of the bath tub, and sends the information thereof to the bath tub phone. The bath tub phone sends the information to the wall pad. The wall pad controls the flow control valve though a cable to make the temperature and water level information conform to the set temperature and water level.

column12: IC SYSTEM FOR DESIGN CONFORMANCE CHECK BETWEEN ICS
column13: The present invention relates to a design suitability check system between ICs capable of quickly and accurately checking design suitability between ICs by verifying electrical specifications between ICs in advance, which comprises: an IC type name input unit receiving a first IC type name and a second IC type name; a matching determination unit accessing an electrical specification database and determining whether an electrical specification of the first IC and an electrical specification of the second IC match; a display unit visually displaying information including the electrical specification of the first IC, the electrical specification of the second IC, and a matching result from the matching determination unit; and a control unit for controlling the overall operation of each unit.

column12: ORGANIC LIGHT EMITTING DISPLAY DEVICE
column13: An OLED device according to one example includes a substrate defined into a plurality of sub-pixel regions which includes red, green and blue sub-pixel regions; a first electrode formed on the substrate; an organic emission layer formed on the first electrode; a second electrode formed on the organic emission layer; and a capping layer formed on the second electrode. The capping layer is formed to contain an optical adjustment material which rises in proportion to a wavelength of incident light.

column12: TWO-IN-ONE SPOON
column13: The present invention relates to an integrated spoon, which enables a patient to take food usefully in any situation. The integrated spoon comprises: a spoon part having various shapes, thicknesses and angles; a fork part having various shapes, thicknesses and angles; a storage hole part formed in a circular or rectangular shape; and a handle part formed in a curved or straight shape.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING DATA LIMIT SERVICE IN MOBILE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM, PACKET DATA NETWORK GATEWAY FOR DATA LIMIT SERVICE
column13: PURPOSE: A packet data network gateway device for a data limit service, a data limit service method, and a system in a mobile communication system are provided to prevent a data call in a packet data network gateway when the limit of a data limit service user is finished in a long term evolution/evolved packet core network. CONSTITUTION: When user equipment(UE) of a data limit service user reaches or exceeds a limit of the amount of data use, a receiving unit(302) receives changed rate system information of the UE from a home location register/home subscriber service. When the UE accesses to a call or a new call based on the changed rate system information, a service processing unit(300) performs call connection control based on a predetermined data service limit expiration rule. A transmitting unit(308) transmits a generated call deletion request message to a mobility management entity. [Reference numerals] (300) Service processing unit; (302) Receiving unit; (304) Message generating unit; (306) Rule DB; (308) Transmitting unit

column12: EXTENSION IMPLEMENTS FOR CORRECTING THE HUMAN BODY
METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR UPDATING DATA SESSION
column13: Provided is a method for updating a data session comprising the steps of: receiving an invite message on the basis of a handover of a wireless terminal from a terminal switching apparatus; retransmitting the invite message to at least one node included in an IMS network on the basis of the received invite message; receiving a response to the retransmitted invite message from the at least one node included in the IMS network; and if the response is received, transmitting an update message to the at least one node included in the IMS network.

column12: A camera module
column13: A camera module is provided. The camera module comprises a filter disposed between a lens and an image sensor, a shell comprising an accommodating part used for accommodating wires connected to the image sensor and a mounting part used for mounting the filter, wherein the first side surface of the mounting part and the second side surface of the filter are inclined relative to the optical axis.

column12: Nanoparticles
column13: Nanoparticles can include a core linked to a polymerizable moiety that can be polymerized, cross-linked or cured. The polymerizable nanoparticles can be included in a composition for a polymerization, cross-linking or curing reaction in an amount and disposition sufficient for inhibiting or preventing volume shrinkage during polymerization, cross-linking or curing reaction. Also, the nanoparticles can be included with monomers, dendrimers, oligomers or polymers in the compositions that can be reacted to form a polymerized, cross-linked or cured product.
column14: CHOI DONG HOON;;UNIV KOREA RES & BUS FOUND
column16: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION (2010-03-16)
column32: Huang et al. Polymeric Materials: Science & Engineering, 2009, 101, p. 891-893.;;Australian Patent Office; International Search Report and Written Opinion in corresponding PCT application (PCT/KR2010/009126): mailed Feb. 25, 2011.;;Yan-Jyi Huang, et al "Effects of Micron and Nano-Scale Inorganic/Organic Core-Shell Particle on the Volume Shrinkage in the Cure of Unsaturated Polyester and Vinyl Ester Resins" Polymeric Materials: Science & Engineering (2009) vol. 101, pp. 891-893.;;Huang et al., "Effects of Micron and Nano-Scale Inorganic/Organic Core-Shell Particle on the Volume Shrinkage in the Cure of Unsaturated Polyester and Vinyl Ester Resins", Polymeric Materials: Science and Engineering (2009), vol. 101, pp. 137-139.

column12: goods display apparatus
column13: The present invention relates to an article display apparatus. The article display apparatus includes: a first body having a first storage groove formed in an upper part; a second body provided with a front side rotated to be opened and closed with respect to a hinge part on a rear side in an upper part of the first body, and having a second storage groove formed in a lower part; locking units provided on the front sides of the first body and the second body respectively, and locked to or unlocked from each other when the first and second bodies are rotated to be opened and closed; a pad part inserted into the first storage groove, and having an upper side on which an article is seated; a mirror having a rear side coupled with the second storage groove, and having a reflective surface formed on a front side; and an information display unit having a rear side coupled with the second storage groove, and displaying information of the article on a front side, wherein the upper side of the pad part includes a rotary stand provided to be horizontally rotatable around a vertical rotation axis, and having an upper side on which the article is seated, and at least one slit formed to be concave such that the bottom of the article can be inserted thereinto. Therefore, the present invention is capable of facilitating transport and storage by reducing support legs in volume.

column12: VEHICLE MULTIMEDIA TERMINAL FOR DISPLAYING CLOCK BY GLOBAL POSITIONING SYSTEM
column13: PURPOSE: A multimedia terminal for a vehicle for displaying time information and interlocking with a Global Positioning System provides current time information to a driver even if a battery is discharged. CONSTITUTION: A multimedia terminal for a vehicle for displaying time information and interlocking with a GPS comprises a GPS module, a clock button(110), a control part, and a display part(140). The GPS module receives GPS time information. The clock button accepts a display order of the current time information. After the display order of the current time information is accepted, the control part controls the displaying of the current time information using GPS time information. The display part displays the current time information under the control of the control part.
column14: HYUNDAI MOTOR CO LTD;;KIA MOTORS CORP

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR DETERIMINING CALL PROCESS, AND SYSTEMS FOR CALL PROCESS
column13: The present invention relates to a method and an apparatus for determining about call processing and a system for the call processing. The method for determining about call processing comprises the steps of: extracting an identifier included in a call connection request message; determining whether a connection requested call is a circuit switched fallback (CSFB) call based on the extracted identifier; and when processing of the call connection request message fails, determining to end a CSFB call and to reprocess call connection of a non-CSFB call through a circuit switched network according to a result of the determination. Accordingly, it is possible to basically prevent an infinite loop of call processing, which may occur when a switching node of a circuit network transmits a call connection message to an IMS switching node to control additional services and the IMS switching node transmits the call connection message to be reprocessed through the circuit network while a call receiving-side mobile communication terminal device to receive an originated call is engaged to another call by an SRVCC handover.

column12: LOCATION INFORMATION SERVICE SYSTEM AND THE METHOD WHICH USE THE LBS
column13: A system and a method for providing a location information service in a housing complex by using an LBS are provided to make reference to location information through a home wall pad, thereby improving the safety and convenience of family members. A location information terminal(600) has an instinct ID(Identification) number and communicates with a mobile communication base station(500). An LBS(Location Based Service) server(400) receives the wireless communication information of the location information terminal received from the mobile communication base station, extracts the information of the location information terminal, and transmits the information to a housing complex server(300). The housing complex server transmits the location of the location information terminal received from the LBS server to a wall pad(100). The wall pad accumulates location information and the residence time of the location information terminal according to a location by using the information of the location information terminal, compares the residence time with preset safe zone information, and derives a result value, and notifies the location information terminal that the location information terminal escapes the preset safe zone or a residence time according to the location as a voice, vibration, or a text by using the result value. The wall pad displays the location information and residence time of the location information terminal by using an electronic map.

column12: WAFER SPIN CHUCK
column13: A wafer spin chuck is provided to reduce erroneous operations and to prevent leakage of chemicals by reducing a load applied to a driving device. A wafer fixing bottom member(202) is positioned within an edge of a rotary table(20) in order to be rotated. A bottom magnet(204) is positioned in the inside of the wafer fixing bottom member. A wafer fixing top member(201) is positioned at an upper part of an edge of the rotary table. The wafer fixing top member is rotated according to the rotation of the wafer fixing bottom member. A top magnet(203) is positioned in the inside of the wafer fixing top member and is coupled with the bottom magnet by magnetic force. A wafer fixing pin(205) is positioned at the upper part of the wafer fixing top member in order to fix the wafer.

column12: VENTILATION VALVE FOR FUEL TANK
column13: A ventilation valve for a fuel tank in a vehicle is provided to improve the responsiveness of the whole valve by preventing the restoration delay of a float. A ventilation valve for a fuel tank in a vehicle comprises: a valve housing(40) in which a valve path(41) connected to a canister is formed inside; a float(50) which is installed to move vertically inside the valve housing with fuel; a flapper(60) selectively opening and closing the valve path; a first fixing part(70) which is formed at the upper side of the float and supporting one side of the flapper; and a second fixing part(80) supporting the other side of the flapper. The ventilation path is connected to the valve path and the fuel tank and is formed between the valve housings. The second fixing unit has the length relatively longer than the vertical length of the first fixing part. The valve housing is mounted to be fixed on the fuel pump module.
column14: HYUNDAI MOTOR CO LTD;;KIA MOTORS CORP

column12: METHOD OF RECYCLING A DIFFERENT TYPE OF COMPOSITE MATERIAL USED FOR AUTOMOBILE PARTS
column13: 본 발명은 자동차 부품용 이종복합재료를 재활용하는 방법에 관한 것이다. 구체적으로, 본 발명은 나일론, 폴리에틸렌(PE) 및 롤리에틸렌테레프탈레이트(PET)로 구성된 자동차 부품용 이종복합재료를 분쇄한 다음 에틸렌-아크릴산-무수말레인산(EEM) 삼원공중합체 또는 무수말레인산으로 개질된 에틸렌-프로필렌(EPR) 공중합체 등의 개질제를 더 첨가하여 용융블렌딩하는 재활용 방법에 관한 것이다.

column12: PCB JIG FOR IN-CIRCUIT TEST OF PCB
column13: The present invention relates to a jig for in-circuit inspection of a PCB which can shorten the time in the process of inspecting a PCB in-circuit. In the jig for supporting the PCB during in-circuit test (ICT) of the PCB, the jig is made of a non-conductive soft plastic.

column12: VEHICLE AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
column13: 본 발명은 차량 및 그 제어 방법에 관한 것으로, 차량이 주행 중인 도로의 차로 정보를 정확하게 획득하여 내비게이션의 맵 데이터에 반영함으로써, 내비게이션에서 정확한 도로 정보가 안내될 수 있도록 하는데 그 목적이 있다. 이를 위해 본 발명에 따른 차량 제어 방법은, 차량의 전경 영상으로부터 현재 주행 중인 도로의 제 1 차로 정보를 획득하는 단계와; 내비게이션의 맵 데이터로부터 상기 현재 주행 중인 도로의 제 2 차로 정보를 획득하는 단계와; 상기 차량의 전경 영상으로부터 획득한 상기 제 1 차로 정보를 상기 내비게이션과 공유하여 상기 지도 데이터의 상기 제 2 차로 정보를 업데이트하는 단계를 포함한다.

column12: APPARATUS FOR PROVIDING FLIGHT PATH
column13: The present invention relates to a device for providing a flight path, which displays both a standard flight path and the actual flight path. According to an aspect of the present invention, the device for providing a flight path includes: a standard flight path selecting unit selecting one of multiple standard flight paths which are preset according to user input; a GPS information acquisition unit collecting GPS information including latitude, longitude, and altitude measured at predetermined periods by a GPS receiver and a reception timing corresponding to the GPS information; an actual flight line generation unit matching a feature point for displaying each GPS information obtained by the GPS information acquisition unit on pre-stored map data according to the latitude and the longitude of each GPS information obtained by the GPS information acquisition unit, and generating an actual flight line for displaying the actual flight path by connecting the feature point matched to the map data in order according to the reception timing corresponding to each GPS information obtained by the GPS information acquisition unit; and a flight path output unit outputting a flight path display area by overlapping the actual flight line and the map data on which the criterial path is mapped.

column12: APPARATUS METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR MANAGING AND PROCESSING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED HOSPITAL CARE AND PRESCRIPTION INFORMATION
column13: 인공지능 기반 병원 진료 및 처방 정보의 관리 및 처리 방법, 장치 및 시스템이 개시된다. 본 발명의 실시예에 따른 인공지능 기반 병원 진료 및 처방 정보의 관리 및 처리 방법은, 가입 보험 약관 정보를 수신하고, 다수의 병원 진료 및 처방 정보를 수신하며, 미리 설정된 기간 동안의 다수의 병원 진료 및 처방 정보를 포함하는 보험 보상 청구 정보를 보험사 서버로 전송하고, 보험사 서버로부터 보험 보상 처리 내역을 수신하며, 가입 보험 약관 정보 및 영수 정보와 보험 보상 처리 내역을 비교하여 가입 보험 약관 정보에 따라 보상금이 정상 지급되었는지 여부를 판단하고, 판단 결과 보상금이 정상 지급되지 않은 것으로 판단된 제1 병원 진료 및 처방 정보를 포함하는 보험 보상 수정 요청을 형성하며, 보험 보상 수정 요청을 보험사 서버로 전송하고, 보험사 서버로부터 보험 보상 수정 내역을 수신하며, 보험 보상 처리 내역 및 보험 보상 수정 내역을 매핑하여 저장한다.

column12: TWO-WAY CHECKING DEVICE AND METHOD OF BUS BAR LOCKING
column13: The present invention can check a conclusion state of a bus bar in two ways of charging or discharging a battery by using one integrated apparatus and method which integrates a bus bar conclusion state checking apparatus and method in charging an existing battery and a bus bar conclusion state checking apparatus and method in discharging the battery. In charging and discharging the battery, different apparatuses and methods were used. However, a structure is simplified and a manufacturing cost of a battery pack is reduced by using the one integrated apparatus and method.

column12: PREDICTION METHOD FOR SOCCER FINAL SCORE
column13: PURPOSE: A prediction method of soccer game final score is provided to offer simple information as the operation process is simple and maximize the participation of users. CONSTITUTION: A prediction method of soccer game final core comprises a step of inputting DB (S1); a step of extracting Input parameter which extracts the Input parameter using the data obtained in the DB input stage; a step of forecasting final score (S3) which predicts final score by applying Input parameter in the extracting step of the Input parameter; and a step of transmitting information (S4) which transmits the final score and information extracted from the final score predicting step to the user terminal. [Reference numerals] (S1) Step of inputting DB; (S2) Step of extracting parameter; (S34) Step of forecasting final score; (S4) Step of transmitting information

column12: DEVICE FOR GENERATING TRANSMISSION STREAM FOR DIGITAL TV
column13: PURPOSE: A device for generating a transmission stream for a digital TV is provided so that a digital TV receiver can be efficiently developed and tested, by varying the transmission stream to be output to the digital TV receiver according to a channel number from a microcomputer. CONSTITUTION: An input control unit receives an input channel number data from a microcomputer(65), and outputs a channel number to a hard disc and a data output start signal to an output control unit. The output control unit outputs a data output control signal to the hard disc, and reads a transmission stream corresponding to the channel number. An FIFO buffer outputs the transmission stream in a predetermined rate according to an output rate control signal from the output control unit. An output unit outputs a control signal for a transmission stream decoder(61) and the transmission stream from the FIFO buffer according to an additional control signal from the output control unit. The transmission stream decoder(61) inverse-multiplexes the transmission stream, and outputs video and audio streams to a video decoder(62) and an audio decoder(64). The video decoder(62) decodes the video stream, and outputs a video signal to a video display processor(63). The audio decoder(64) decodes the audio stream and outputs an audio signal. The microcomputer(65) controls the whole operation through a serial or parallel data bus.

column12: A method for dyeing microfibers and fabric woven with microfibers dyed thereby
column13: The invention relates to a method for dyeing split-type microfibers made of a composite of polyester and polyamide by a yarn dyeing process. The method comprises: a weight reduction step comprising winding the microfibers on a yarn dyeing machine and adding an alkali agent at a uniform temperature of 100-130 DEG C for 30-60 minutes to make a reduction of 6-15% in the weight of the microfibers; a water-washing step comprising injecting iron-free water at 70-80 DEG C onto the microfibers through a nozzle, applying water pressure to remove foreign materials while scouring the microfibers by the addition of a scouring agent, and treating the microfibers with acid to a pH of 4-5; a dyeing step of dyeing the microfibers under pressure by the addition of a dye together with a dispersant, a leveling agent, an antistatic agent and a softening agent; and water-washing and drying the dyed microfibers.

column12: Cooling Filter for Ciga type Electronic Cigarette
column13: The present invention relates to a cooling filter for a cigarette type electronic cigarette, which is provided on a cigarette stick of the cigarette type electronic cigarette to cool the high temperature nicotine vapor, is capable of securing the sufficient flow length, and has excellent manufacturability and processability. The cooling filter (50) has a plurality of channels (53) formed in a cylindrical shape and through which nicotine vapor flows through a hollow tube of the cigarette stick and the channels (53) is formed in a screw shape.

column12: The high-sensitive premium automobile seat
column13: The present invention relates to a high-sensitivity premium car seat. As a specific configuration thereof, an upper rail (11) matched with a lower rail (10) is provided on the bottom, a first towing plate (12) is installed on the upper surface of the upper rail (11), a forward and backward motor (50) is installed on the upper rail (11), a flat frame (20) is installed on the first towing plate (12) through a second towing plate (21) formed on the side thereof, a rotation protrusion portion (22) protrudes at the upper portion of the flat frame (20), a rotation frame (30) is installed while a rotation fitting hole (31) formed at the center thereof is fitted to the rotation protrusion portion (22) of the flat frame (20), and is installed to rotate between a fixing jig (23) positioned on the bottom surface of the flat frame (20) and an angle setting frame (24) positioned on the upper surface of the rotation frame (30) coupled to each other, a clutch (32) provided with a pedal (33) is installed on one side of the rotation frame (30), and is installed to engage with a plurality of setting grooves (25) formed radially in the angle setting frame (24), a base frame (40) is installed on both side of the upper portion thereof through a mounting portion (41) formed on the inner bottom surface, a backrest frame (42) provided with a rotation motor (54) is installed at the rear of the base frame (40), and a saddle frame (42) is installed at the upper portion of the base frame (40).

column12: BLAST DRYER
column13: The technology disclosed in the specification relates to a blow dryer for drying an object, including: a storage unit for storing an object to be dried; a supply unit for discharging fluid; a guide unit that is connected to the supply unit and guides movement of the fluid to a side of the storage unit; and a heating unit for heating the fluid guided by the guide unit.

column12: WASTEBASKET FOR SEPARATE COLLECTION
column13: 본 발명은, 쓰레기통 몸체의 전면에서 비닐 봉투를 용이하게 결합 및 분리할 수 있도록 한 분리수거용 쓰레기통과 관련된 다양한 실시예들이 기술된 바, 한 실시예에 따르면, 분리수거용 쓰레기통은, 그 내부에 쓰레기를 수거하는 수거 공간이 형성된 쓰레기통 몸체; 상기 쓰레기통 몸체의 상부에 개방되어 형성되고, 상기 쓰레기를 상기 수거 공간으로 유도하는 쓰레기 투입구; 상기 수거 공간의 내부에 배치되고, 비닐 봉투의 상부를 걸어 고정하거나 걸림을 해제하는 걸림 부재; 상기 쓰레기통 몸체의 전면의 적어도 일부에 개방되어 형성되고, 상기 걸림 부재에서 걸림이 해제된 상기 비닐 봉투를 상기 수거 공간에서 배출시키는 배출구; 및 상기 쓰레기통 몸체의 전면에 회전가능하게 결합되고, 상기 비닐 봉투를 상기 배출구로부터 배출하기 위해 회전에 따라 상기 배출구를 개폐하는 개폐 도어부;를 포함할 수 있으며, 이외에도 다양한 다른 실시예들이 가능하다.

column12: The Remote Medical Examination System and Method Using Internet Network
column13: PURPOSE: A remote picture medical treatment system and method using the Internet is provided so that a herb doctor and a patient can conduct a medical question at a remote medical office opened in a web server. CONSTITUTION: If a patient accesses a web server and requests a herb doctor medical question service(S211), the web server requests patient connection to a DSS(Decision Support System) server(S212). If access is possible, the DSS server transmits connection confirmation information to the patient(S213). In this state, the patient asks the DSS server about a reservation time(S214). The DSS server asks a database server about the reservation time(S215). The database server informs the DSS server that the patient's reservation has been made at the reservation time, and stores this reservation information and the patient's information in a database(S216). The DSS server transmits the reservation result to the patient(S217).

column12: liquor vending machine
column13: 본 발명은 키오스크 방식의 주류 자판기에 관한 것으로서 카드리더기에 의하여 카드로 주류 결제를 할 수 있게 하고, 터치스크린에 의하여 사용자가 원하는 상품을 간편하게 선택할 수 있게 하고, 음료 혼합기에 의하여 음료와 주류를 원하는 비율로 혼합할 수 있게 함으로써 주류를 구매할 수 없고 카드결제가 불가한 문제점을 해소하도록 함으로써 기존의 주류를 구매할 수 없고 카드결제가 불가한 문제점을 해소 하도록 한 것이다.즉 본 발명은, 음료 자판기에 있어서 카드로 주류 결제를 할 수 있게 동전 투입구와 지폐 투입구 위치를 대체하여 위치 한 카드리더기, 사용자가 원하는 상품을 간편하게 선택할 수 있게 터치센서를 활용한 키오스크 시스템을 자판기 본체에 형성한 터치스크린, 음료와 주류를 원하는 비율로 혼합할 수 있게 모터에 프로펠러를 결합한 음료 혼합기, 자판기 용품을 구성하고 상품을 진열할 수 있도록 구성용품이 들어갈수 있을만큼 큰 크기의 박스 모양으로 형성한 자판기본체로 구성한 것이다.따라서, 본 발명은 카드리더기에 의하여 카드로 주류 결제를 할 수 있게 하고, 터치스크린에 의하여 사용자가 원하는 상품을 간편하게 선택할 수 있게 하고, 음료 혼합기에 의하여 음료와 주류를 원하는 비율로 혼합할 수 있게 함으로써 주류를 구매할 수 없고 카드결제가 불가한 문제점을 해소하도록 함으로써 기존의 주류를 구매할 수 없고 카드결제가 불가한 문제점을 해소하도록 한 효과를 갖는 것이다.

column12: TERMINAL APPLYING TRAFFIC INFORMATION AND METHOD FOR OPERATING THE TERMINAL
column13: A terminal for reflecting traffic information is disclosed. The terminal comprises: a first traffic information receiving module for receiving first traffic information from a first traffic information source; a second traffic information receiving module for receiving second traffic information from a second traffic information source; and a control unit for providing a service based on the first traffic information when the second traffic information is not received from the second traffic information source. Accordingly, the user convenience can be improved.

column12: A MICROSCOPE FOR INSPECTING WAFER
column13: 본 발명은 웨이퍼 검사용 마이크로스코프에 관한 것으로서, 웨이퍼 검사용 마이크로스코프의 다수개의 렌즈중 하나를 제거하고 탈거 가능하게 전원이 연결된 도팅기를 설치하여서 이루어진 웨이퍼 검사용 마이크로스코프를 제공하고자 한 것이다.

column12: A CIRCUIT OF ABSOLUTE VALUE
column13: 본 고안은 절대값 계산 회로에 관한 것으로 특히, 절대값 계산시 오버플로어가 발생하면 최대 양수를 출력시키는 회로를 부가함으로써 프로그램을 간단히 함은 물론 처리 시간을 줄일 수 있도록 안출한 것이다. 이러한 본 고안은 입력 데이타를 각기 저장하는 레지스터(210)(220)와, 상기 레지스터(210 또는 220)의 출력 데이타를 입력으로 절대값을 계산하고 오버플로어 여부를 판단하는 산술 연산기(230)와, 이 산술 연산기(230)의 오버플로어 신호에 따라 레지스터(250)의 출력값 '7FFFh'과 상기 산술 연산기(230)의 출력값중 하나를 선택하는 멀티플렉서(260)와, 이 멀티플렉서(260)의 출력값을 저장하여 출력하는 레지스터(24)로 구성한다.

column12: CARD WALLET UPPER
column13: The present invention relates to a card wallet upper which pushes up a card from the down side to enable a user to take out the card in an easy manner. Usually, there is inconvenience that a finger is stuck in a pocket of the card wallet when the user picks up a card. The card wallet upper includes: a fixated rod which is formed to be thin to be attached to a card pocket to prevent the card wallet from being excessively thick, and supports the card in the card pocket from the down side; a pushing rod arranged to be joined with the fixated rod to operate the fixated rod from the outside; and a fixation bar which prevents the fixated rod from escaping a pathway when the pushing rod pushes up the fixated rod. The user does not need to directly insert fingers into the card pocket in an inconvenient manner when taking the card out of the card pocket and can use the card wallet upper in an easy manner when the user needs to urgently take out the card stored in the card wallet.

column12: MANUFACTURING METHOD OF FUNCTIONAL RICE BRAN USING ENZYMATIC HYDROLYSIS AND VACUUM DRYING
column13: A method for preparing functional rice bran is provided to prevent acidification of the rice bran in order to preserve the rice bran for a long time and improve intestinal absorption rates by enzymatic decomposition and vacuum drying. A method for preparing functional rice bran comprises the following steps of: decomposing the rice bran in the presence of cellulase and inactivating the cellulase in a first step; adding calcium lactate and iron lactate to the decomposed rice bran in a second step; and vacuum-drying the rice bran with the calcium lactate and iron lactate in a third step. In the first step, the 0.1~0.3wt% of cellulase is added to the rice bran and the rice bran is decomposed at 60~65°C for 1~2 hours.

column12: EXPERIMENT EDUCATION INSTRUMENT FOR WATER PURIFYING AND DEODORIZATION
column13: An experimental education instrument for water purifying and deodorization is provided to allow a learner to understand an absorption principle and enjoy studying. An experimental education instrument(1) for water purifying and deodorization includes glass tubes(10,10'), a container(20), a support(25), and a stand(30). The glass tubes form inlets(11,11') and outlets(13,13'). The glass tubes have a pipe shape of a predetermined length. An absorbent is received in the glass tubes. Any one of activated carbon(C) and zeolite(Z) is preferably used as the absorbent. The stand supports a bottom of the support. The stand receives the container and has an approximately "U" shape. A beaker is used as the container. The container is provided in lower parts of the glass tubes and is received in the support.

column12: MULTI-SCREEN GENERATION CIRCUIT
column27: H4F FD1B1         GH;;H4F FD1D9         GH;;H4F FD1K1         GH;;H4F FD12M         GH;;H4F FD12X         GH;;H4F FD2A          GH;;H4F FD30K         GH;;H4F FGH           GH

column12: PARKING LOCATION GRASP SYSTEM AND THE METHOD WHICH USE THE TRIPODAL MEASUREMENT
column13: A system and a method for recognizing a parking location are provided to guide an exact parking location to a driver by using a trigonometric measurement scheme. A system and a method for recognizing a parking location includes a vehicle RF(Radio Frequency) module(100), a location estimation RF antenna(400), and a main server(200). The vehicle RF module is mounted on a vehicle. The location estimation RF antenna installed in a parking lot communicates with the vehicle RF module, estimates an RF communication degree, and supplies location information of the vehicle according to the estimation result. The main server provides interphone and advertisement functions to an entrance device of the parking lot, and calculates the location information using the RF communication degree between with the vehicle RF module.

column12: 3D Lab Analog for Implant 3D Printing Models
column13: 본 발명은 임플란트 3D 프린팅 모형용 랩 아날로그에 관한 것으로 임플란트용 석고모형이 아닌 3D 프린팅 모형에 최적화된 랩 아날로그를 제공함에 있어, 랩 아날로그를 3D 프린팅 모형으로 된 잇몸부의 하부에서 삽입한 후, 잇몸부의 상부에서 어버트먼트를 맞대어 삽입한 다음, 잇몸부의 상부에서 스크류를 체결하는 구조로서, 하부측에서 상향 삽입되는 랩 아날로그와, 상부측에서 하향 삽입되는 스크류가 어버트먼트를 사이에 두고 일체로 고정되게 함으로써 잇몸부 상에서 랩 아날로그의 이탈을 방지토록 하기 위해, 임플란트 3D 프린팅 모형의 잇몸부(2) 상에 형성된 체결공(3) 내에 삽입 고정되는 랩 아날로그(10)와, 상기 랩 아날로그(10)의 상부에 결합되는 어버트먼트(30)와, 상기 어버트먼트(30)의 상부에 관통삽입되어 랩 아날로그(10)에 결합고정되면서 랩 아날로그(10) 상에서 어버트먼트(30)의 위치를 고정지지하는 스크류(50)를 포함하여 이루어지되, 상기 랩 아날로그(10)의 외면부는, 하부가 폐쇄되고 상부 개방공(21)을 갖는 원통형의 중간몸통부(15)와, 상기 중간몸통부(15)의 상부측에 형성되는 상부테두리부(11)와, 상기 중간몸통부(15)의 하부측에 중간몸통부(15)의 직경 보다 큰 가로 및 세로 길이를 갖는 4각 형태로 된 하단걸림부(19)로 구성되고, 상기 랩 아날로그(10)의 내면부는, 상기 상부테두리부(11)의 내측면 상에 형성되는 하향축소경사면(11a)과, 상기 하향축소경사면(11a)의 하단부에서 수직하향연장되는 고정면(23)과, 상기 고정면(23)의 하단에 내향수평형성되는 제1단턱부(22)와, 상기 제1단턱부(22)의 하부측에 제1단턱부(22) 보다 소폭으로 수직하향 형성되는 암나사부(26)로 구성되며, 상기 어버트먼트(30)의 외면부는, 상부측에 하향확개 형태로 상부체(31)가 형성되고, 상기 상부체(31)의 하단부에서 하향축소 형태로 중간몸체(35)가 형성되며, 상기 중간몸체(35)의 하단부에서 내향수평단턱부(36)가 형성되고, 상기 내향수평단턱부(36)의 하단부에서 하향축소 형태로 경사밀착부(37)가 형성되며, 상기 경사밀착부(37)의 하단부에서 수직하향으로 고정부(39)가 형성되고, 상기 어버트먼트(30)의 내면부는, 상단측(41)에서부터 하단측(45)까지 수직관통공(42)이 형성되고, 상기 수직관통공(42)의 내면 상에 내향수평단턱부(34)가 형성되며, 상기 스크류(50)는 원형의 중간몸체부(54)가 형성되고, 상기 중간몸체(54)의 상부측에 중간몸체(54)의 직경 보다 큰 직경으로 확장되어 하부측에 수평단턱부(53)를 갖는 머리부(52)가 형성되며, 상기 중간몸체(54)의 하부측에 중간몸체(54)의 직경 보다 작은 직경으로 수직하향되게 수나사부(56)가 형성되고, 상기 잇몸부(2) 상의 상부측에 하향축소경사면(4)을 갖는 원형의 체결공(3)이 하향 연장 형성되고, 상기 하향축소경사면(4)의 하단부에서 수직하향으로 원형의 수직결합면(7)이 형성되며, 상기 잇몸부(2) 상의 하부측에 상기 4각 형태로 된 하단걸림부(19)의 형태에 대응되도록 형성된 하부걸림지지홈(5)이 체결공(3)의 직경 보다 크게 형성되어, 상기 랩 아날로그(10)는 잇몸부(2)의 하부측 하부걸림지지홈(5) 측에서부터 상부측으로 상향 삽입진입되어 랩 아날로그(10)의 중간몸통부(15)는 잇몸부(2)의 수직결합면(7)에 밀착되면서 상기 걸림지지홈(5) 내에 랩 아날로그(10)의 하단걸림부(19)가 회전방지되도록 걸림지지되고, 상기 잇몸부(2)의 하부측에 랩 아날로그(10)가 삽입된 상태에서 잇몸부(2)의 상부측 체결공(3)에서부터 하부측으로 어버트먼트(30)를 삽입하여 상기 랩 아날로그(10)의 상부측 일부에 결합밀착되면서 랩 아날로그(10)의 제1단턱부(22) 상에 어버트먼트(30)의 내향수평단턱부(36)가 안착지지되고, 상기 랩 아날로그(10)의 고정면(23) 내에 어버트먼트(30)의 고정부(39)가 밀착고정되며, 상기 랩 아날로그(10)의 하향축소경사면(11a) 상에 어버트먼트(30)의 경사밀착부(37)가 밀착지지되고, 상기 어버트먼트(30)의 상부 내측으로 스크류(50)를 삽입하여 상기 스크류(50)의 수평단턱부(53)가 어버트먼트(30)의 내향수평단턱부(34)에 안착지지되고, 상기 스크류(50)의 수나사부(56)가 랩 아날로그(10)의 암나사부(26)에 체결되도록 함으로써, 상기 잇몸부(2) 상에 랩 아날로그(10), 어버트먼트(30) 및 스크류(50)가 일체 고정되도록 구성하는 것을 특징으로 한다.

column12: NOISE DECREASING TYPE PISTON ROD OF SHOCK ABSORBER FOR VEHICLE
column13: PURPOSE: A noise reducing type piston rod of a vehicle shock absorber is provided to prevent the direct transferring of shock wave and vibration to a vehicle body. CONSTITUTION: A noise reducing type piston rod(10) of a vehicle shock absorber comprises a piston valve(13) and a vibration reducing unit(20). The piston valve is installed in the end portion of a piston rod. The vibration reducing unit is installed in the longitudinal direction of a piston rod and vibrated according to the reciprocation of the piston rod for reducing the transferring speed of shock wave generated by the opening and closing of the piston rod and reduce the vibration transferred to a vehicle body through resonance frequency change. The material of the vibration reducing unit is different from that of the piston rod and has a higher damping coefficient than the piston rod.

column12: BLOCKCHAIN-BASED DIGITAL CONTENT SHARING SYSTEM FOR SHARING DIGITAL CONTENT AMONG MULTIPLE ORGANIZATIONS AND DIGITAL CONTENT SHARING METHOD USING THE SAME
column13: 본 명세서는 컴퓨팅 장치에 의해 복수의 블록체인 네트워크들 사이에서 디지털 컨텐츠를 공유하는 방법에 관한 것이다. 상기 방법은, 상기 컴퓨팅 장치에서 실행되는 디지털 컨텐츠 공유 서비스 애플리케이션이, 제1 블록체인 네트워크 내의 제1 사용자로부터, 제2 블록체인 네트워크 내의 제2 사용자로 상기 디지털 컨텐츠의 이관을 요청하는 이관 요청 메시지를 수신하는 단계; 상기 디지털 컨텐츠 공유 서비스 애플리케이션이, 상기 이관 요청 메시지에 응답하여, 상기 제1 블록체인 네트워크의 상기 제1 사용자의 계좌에서 상기 디지털 컨텐츠에 대한 NFT(Non-Fungible Token)를 비가용 상태로 전환하는 단계; 및 상기 디지털 컨텐츠 공유 서비스 애플리케이션이, 상기 제2 블록체인 네트워크에서 상기 디지털 컨텐츠에 대한 신규 NFT를 상기 제2 사용자의 계좌로 발행(mint)하는 단계;를 포함하며, 이 방법은 서로 다른 블록체인 네트워크에서 개별적으로 관리되는 디지털 컨텐츠 아카이브를 타 블록체인 네트워크에서 사용할 수 있도록 하는 효과가 있다.

column12: WATER-SOLUBLE ELECTRICALLY CONDUCTIVE POLYMERS
column13: Water-soluble electrically conductive polymers and a composition comprising such polymers are provided. Also, an electrically conductive layer or film formed from the composition, and articles comprising the electrically conductive layer or film are provided. The electrically conductive polymers according to the present disclosure have one or more hydrophilic side chains. Hydrophilic side chains are covalently bonded to the conductive polymers, which allow the polymer to be stable at high temperature. Thus, the stability of electrical conductivity is prolonged. Depending on the concentration of hydrophilic side chains, the conductivity may be changed. The hydrophilic side chains provide a successful way to fabricate a ductile film exhibiting tunable conductivity. Furthermore, high levels of surface-resistance uniformity can be achieved in the field of coating technology that uses eco-friendly water-based solvents to uniformly and quickly coat the conductive polymer on to plastic film surfaces.

column12: LED mask blower assembly with air duct structure
column13: The purpose of the present invention is to provide a blower assembly with an air duct structure for an LED mask. The blower assembly comprises: a front mask (110); a rear mask (120) coupled to the front mask (110) to form an air duct (121AD) between the front mask (110) and the same; a fan installed in the air duct (121AD) between the front mask (110) and the rear mask (120) to supply air to an eye patch (210) at a predetermined pressure; and an air inlet port and an air outlet port provided in the rear mask (120). The blower assembly comprises: a vaporizer (515) built into the air chamber; a Peltier element (514) supported by the vaporizer (515) to generate cold or warm heat; and a cooling heat sink (512) disposed in a position facing the vaporizer (515). The fan comprises: a heat dissipation fan (517) disposed at a position facing the heat dissipation plate (513) built into the air duct (121AD); and a cooling fan (519) disposed at a position facing the vaporizer (515) from the side of the cooling heat sink (512).

column12: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING OPERATION OF REFRIGERATOR IN ACCORDANCE WITH ILLUMINATION AND REFRIGERATOR USING THE SAME
column13: A method for controlling operations of a refrigerator based on surrounding intensity of illumination and a refrigerator using the method are provided. More particularly, a method for controlling operations appropriate for a mini bar of an accommodation facility and a mini bar using the method are provided. The refrigerator includes an illumination intensity sensor unit which measures surrounding intensity of illumination of the refrigerator and generates a measured intensity value of illumination, a refrigeration unit which lowers an internal temperature of the refrigerator through circulation of a refrigerant when a predetermined power is supplied, and a control unit which blocks power supply to the refrigeration unit for a predetermined time based on the measured intensity of illumination. The refrigerator recognizes that a user turned off the light for a sleep and blocks power supply to the refrigeration unit for a predetermined time which is set in advance by the user when the surrounding intensity of illumination changes from a value greater than the set intensity of illumination to a value smaller than the set intensity of illumination. In addition, the refrigerator supplies the power to the refrigeration unit again when a predetermined sufficient time for the user to fall asleep elapses. As a result, the refrigerator enables the user to have a sound sleep together with achieving an original purpose.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PURCHASE AND DISTRIBUTION MANAGING OF HOSPITAL ARTICLES
column13: There are provided a purchase and distribution management system and method for purchasing articles used in a hospital by proxy and managing the distribution of the articles, the purchase and distribution management system including: an interface part connecting an exclusive management device of the hospital, the device computerizing the articles in the hospital, to the purchase and distribution management system to be compatible with each other in such a way that a user is able to use the purchase and distribution management system by using only the exclusive management device without downloading a new program; a purchase application reception part receiving a purchase application for hospital articles from the user; a contract check part retrieving whether there exists a contract between the user and a provider for the articles; a contract generation part generating the contract between the user and the provider when there is no contract for the hospital articles for which purchase application is received as a result of the retrieving of the contract check part; a purchase order management part generating and sending a purchase order for the articles to the provider when there is the contract for the articles for which purchase application is received as the result of the retrieving of the contract check part or the contract is generated by the contract generation part; a distribution management part checking an amount of each article in stock in the hospital, generating a purchase application according to a result of the checking, and managing a delivery process of the article in the hospital; and a consignment stock management part allowing a certain amount of warehoused articles for consignment stock to be consigned to the provider to be stored and changing an amount of interim warehoused articles consigned to the provider according to a use of the user.

column12: MONOLITHIC KEY PAD AND MOBILE COMMUNICATION TERMINAL HAVING THE SAME
manufacturing method of artificial marble
column13: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing artificial marble on which jade patterns are formed is provided. CONSTITUTION: The method comprises first process of hardening the transparent gel coat(14) coated on the releasing layer(12,22) at an ordinary temperature of 20 to 25 deg.C for about 15 min by evenly coating the transparent gel coat on the releasing layer to a thickness of 0.03 to 0.05 mm after forming a releasing layer on one side of lower molding frame(10); second process of separately preparing a part that becomes ground color of jade patterns as filler(16) prepared by mixing and kneading jade powder, alumina and glass frit with transparent synthetic resin to a viscosity that is appropriate for doing work and a part that becomes two or more patterned colors having brightness different from the ground color by additionally mixing inorganic pigment or ocher and jade powder with the filler so that certain jade patterns are formed on the ground color; third process of sequentially deposition coating the separate fillers having ground color and patterned colors respectively on an easily foldable vinyl sheet(18) in such a way that the filler having the patterned colors is coated on the vinyl sheet in an irregular pattern; fourth process of laying half of the vinyl sheet on top of the other half of the vinyl paper by folding the coated vinyl sheet into two leaves, pressing the coated vinyl sheet so that depth of patterns of the filler impregnated into the vinyl sheet is adjusted, and unfolding the vinyl sheet to the original state; fifth process of adhering the filler in the impregnated state of the fourth process to the surface of the gel coat hardened in the first process; and sixth process of coating a separate filler on an upper molding frame(20) that is treated with a releasing agent after removing the vinyl sheet, hardening the filler coated on the upper molding frame at an ordinary temperature of 25 deg.C for about 20 to 30 min correspondingly to the lower molding frame, and fabricating an artificial marble by stripping the resulting material.

column12: HMI HMI for enhancing recognition rate for iris and speed
column13: The present invention relates to a human-machine interface (HMI) device in which a controller is configured to extract an iris region corresponding to a distance (Δ) from a user detected by a distance sensor and extract an iris image from the extracted iris region so that an iris recognition rate is increased and acquisition of the iris image is correctly and quickly performed to increase the overall authentication speed and reduce unnecessary time consumption required for authentication. Since the controller can recognize the iris without making the user move the iris to a position close to a camera, an iris recognition process for the user is facilitated, thereby increasing user convenience. Moreover, since an iris authentication system is applied to the HMI device, the user authentication is performed by comparing and contrasting feature patterns of the iris image of the user with feature patterns of previously registered users when the corresponding user approaches, operation and access are permitted to only authorized users, thereby significantly increasing security. The HMI device comprises the distance sensor, a capturing means, and the controller.

column12: a water bottle that generates water using a pelting element
column13: 본 발명은 펠티어 소자를 이용해 물을 생성하는 물병에 관한 것으로서 팬, 태양광 패널, 펠티어 소자를 이용하여 물을 먹을때마다 물을 급수해야하는 번거로움을 덜었다.하도록 함으로써 기존의 자동급수가 자동으로 되지 않는 물통 문제점을 해소 하도록 한 것이다.즉 본 발명은, 물통에 있어서 에너지를 저장할 수 있게 원형 기둥으로 구성한 배터리, 물을 담을 수 있게 원통형으로 구성한 물통 본체, 공기가 유동할 수 있게 유선형으로 구성한 팬, 이슬점에 도달하기 위한 온도를 만들 수 있게 직사각형으로 구성한 펠티어 소자, 배터리 충전을 할 수 있게 넓은 판형으로 구성한 태양광패널, 표면적을 넓여 많은 수증기를 응결할 수 있게 기본적인 방열판 형태로 구성한 방열판 하, 물을 흘리지 않고 보관할 수 있게 원통형으로 구성한 물통 뚜껑, 펠티어 소자의 방열을 할 수 있게 방열판 형태로 구성한 방열판 상으로 구성한 것이다.따라서, 본 발명은 팬, 태양광 패널, 펠티어 소자를 이용하여 물을 먹을때마다 물을 급수해야하는 번거로움을 덜었다.하도록 함으로써 기존의 자동급수가 자동으로 되지 않는 물통 문제점을 해소하도록 한 효과를 갖는 것이다.

column12: DUAL PORT RAM CONTROL METHOD
column13: A method for controlling a DPRAM(Dual Port RAM) is provided to implement a FIFO(First Input First Output) function with a small capacity FPGA(Field Programmable Gate Array) by minimizing logic resources in case that the DPRAM is controlled through the FPGA by using HDL(Hardware Description Language). In case that a cell to be written is occurred in a cell pointer counter, the cell is written(S102). It is checked whether the last bit of the cell is written or not(S103). In the case that the cell is completely written, the next cell is written and an address area is jumped(S104). It is checked whether the next pointer counter is used up or not after address jump(S105). In the case that the counter is not used up, a write pointer counter value is output. In the case that the counter is used up, the write pointer counter value is output after a carry is inverted(S106).

column12: How to manufacture a built-in closet where only doors can be replaced and separated
column13: 본 발명은 도어만 교체 및 분리가 가능한 붙박이장 제조방법에 관한 것으로서 중간벽체에 의해 수납부가 여러개로 구획된 가구본체와 가구본체전면에 설치되어 수납부를 개폐하는 도어부로 붙박이장을 구성함에 있어서, 가구본체의 전면 상단에는 길이 방향을 따라 후면에 롤러삽입용 개방부가 구비되고, 개방부하단에 걸림턱이 구비된 상부레일을 설치하며, 가구본체의 전면 하단에는 롤러이동로가 상면 중앙에 구비되고, 뒤쪽 레일간 일부위에 롤러출입구가 형성된 하부레일을 상부레일과 일직선상 위치에 설치하며, 도어부를 구성 하는 양쪽 외측도어와 그 사이의 내측도어는 경첩에 의해 "W"자형으로 지그재그 절첩되도록 형성하되, 내측도어의 상단부 이면에 부착되는 상부브라켓에는 일단이 위로 돌출되도록 힌지핀을 설치하고, 힌지핀의 돌출된 일단에 끼워져 회전되는 롤러브라켓 전면에는 상부레일의 개방부를 통해 착탈식으로 끼워져 걸림턱에 걸리는 상부롤러를 설치하며, 내측도어의 하단부 이면에 부착되는 하부브라켓에는 하부레일의 롤러출입구를 통해 착탈되는 하부롤러를 설치하여 롤러이동로를 따라 이동되게 하며, 가구본체의 양쪽 가장자리에 위치하는 수납부의 외측벽 상단과 하단에는 괘지핀과 자석을 각각 설치하고, 양쪽 외측도어 의 상하 가장자리 이면에는 괘지핀이 끼워지는 괘지공과 자석에 부착되는 금속판을 각각 설치하여 가구본체로 부터 도어부를 착탈식으로 교체할 수 있도록 한 것으로서 이러한 본 발명은 붙박이장을 사용하다가 도어부가 파손되거나 더러워졌을 경우 또는 붙박이장을 오랜기간 사용하여 색상이나 디자인에 싫증을 느꼈을 경우 가구본체는 그대로 두고 도어부만을 신속하고 간편하게 교체할 수 있음에 따라 종래 붙박이장 전체를 교체함에 따라 소요되는 비용을 현저하게 절감할 수 있는 매우 유용한 발명이다.

column12: Photochromic material
PORTABLE BEAUTY DEVICE FOR SKIN PEELING
column13: The present invention relates to a portable skin beauty device for skin peeling using ultrasonic waves. The device of the present invention comprises: a first chamber (120) of a housing, wherein the first chamber (120) has vibrator assembly (130) embedded therein and a first sealing member (115) for sealing the front portion of the housing; a second chamber (140) of the housing, wherein the second chamber (140) is positioned at the rear of the first chamber (120), performs sealing through a second sealing member (145) which physically differentiates a space from the first chamber (120), and has a battery (150) and an electronic circuit (160); a blade (110) with elasticity passing through the first sealing member (115) from the first chamber (120) to be exposed to a front surface part of the housing, combined with the vibrator assembly (130), and made of a metal material; and a switch (171) installed at a rear surface part (170) of the housing at which a third sealing member (175) for protecting the second chamber (150) is installed, and electrically connected with the electronic circuit (160) of the second chamber.

column12: COUPLING DEVICE FOR PORTABLE ELECTRONIC APPARATUS
column13: PURPOSE: A coupling device for a portable electronic apparatus is provided to couple an upper case, a lower case and a battery cover all together through one coupling device by coupling a coupling unit to a first coupling unit and detachably installing the coupling unit at a second coupling unit. CONSTITUTION: A coupling device enables the detachment of a battery cover(13) from a lower case(12). A coupling unit(110) allows the lower case, and is installed at an upper case(11). A first coupling unit(120) is coupled to the coupling unit, and pierces the coupling unit. A second coupling unit(130) is coupled to the one end of the coupling unit, and is separated form a union.

column12: Automatic toilet bowl flushing device
column13: The present invention relates to an auto-flushing device for a toilet and, more specifically, relates to an auto-flushing device for a toilet comprising: a fastening member which is installed on the front side of a water tank; a pawl button which moves forwards and backwards within the fastening member to operate an operation lever; and a towing means which is installed on a toilet lid to tow the pawl button. The present invention has a simple configuration and structure which allows flushing to take place simultaneously upon closing of the toilet lid when flushing wash water stored in the water tank after using the toilet. Further, the present invention has excellent durability and allows a user to make a habit of closing the toilet lid, thereby promoting hygiene and cleanliness of a bathroom.

column12: 3D PARTITION CHAMBER FOR 3D PRINTING
column13: The present invention provides a processing chamber dividing device of a 3d printer. According to the present invention, a processing chamber in which 3D printing is performed is divided into a plurality of parts to adjust the size of the internal volume of the processing chamber depending on the size of a 3D printing workpiece, so that the consumption of a powder, which is a 3D printing material, can be reduced and a 3D printing time can be shortened.

column12: LOCKING DEVICE OF THE BIDET WATER PIPE
column13: The present invention relates to a locking device of a bidet water pipe. According to the present invention, a connection member is firmly fixated to a holder formed on a supply pipe for a heat water tank or a supply pipe for an angle valve, and a supply pipe for the water tank and the angle valve. A slip prevention member prevents the connection member from being separated from the holder, and a movement prevention protuberance is locked into a movement prevention groove depending to a rotation of the slip prevention member, thereby preventing a movement of the connection member. While maintaining a state of the connection member coupled with the holder, leakage can be prevented, thereby improving the reliability of a product.

column12: MOBILE ROBOT CUSTOMIZED AUTONOMOUS DRIVING METHOD AND PROGRAM FOR EACH SPACE SIZE OF MOBILE ROBOT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column13: 본 개시는 인공 지능 기반의 이동 로봇의 공간 크기별 맞춤형 자율 주행 방법에 있어서, 이동 로봇이 도착지까지의 전역 경로를 생성하는 단계; 이동 로봇이 도착지까지의 전역 경로에 따라 기 설정된 공간 크기보다 큰 제1 공간 또는 기 설정된 공간 크기보다 작은 제2 공간인지를 판단하는 단계; 제1 공간이면, 이동 로봇이 장애물을 감지한 상태에서 기 설정된 장애물과의 접근 시간 및 접근 거리가 될 때에, 장애물의 접근 상태에 따라 회피하여 주행하기 위한 제1 회피 경로를 생성하는 단계; 및 제2 공간이면, 이동 로봇이 장애물을 감지한 순간, 장애물을 즉시 회피하여 주행하기 위한 제2 회피 경로를 생성하는 단계를 포함할 수 있다.

column12: TABLE TYPE REFRIGERATOR
column13: The present invention relates to a table type refrigerator. The table type refrigerator comprises: a main body including a cooling chamber formed therein, a door being provided to selectively open and close one surface of the cooling chamber; at least one rail provided on an inner wall of the main body; and a sliding unit. The sliding unit is provided with a sliding base which is slidably supported by the rail. Further, the sliding unit is prepared to form a sliding chamber having a partition wall between the same and the cooling chamber, formed of the partition wall, the sliding base, and the inner wall of the main body inside the main body, and separated from the cooling chamber.

column12: A method of manufacturing a multi-use plate in a prefabricated built-in cabinet that can be used for various purposes
column13: 본 발명은 다양한 용도로 사용이 가능한 조립식 붙박이장 다용도판 제조방법에 관한 것으로서, 더욱 상세하게는 붙박이장을 조립식으로 구성하고, 전면으로 돌출되 는 측면이동판과 중간세로판이 붙박이장 외부로 이동하여 다용도판을 수평으로 회전시킨후 지지시켜 다리 미판이나 책상으로 사용할 수 있게 한 다용도 붙박이장에 관한 것이며, 양측에 형성된 측면판의 상단에 상부레일이 형성되고, 하단에 하부레일이 형성되며, 레일의 내측단부에 레일홈이 형성되고, 상부레일의 저면과 하부레일의 상면에 레일돌기부가 형성되는 내부설치틀 상단과 하단에 레일홈이 형성되고, 내측벽면 중간부에 수평으로 받침판이 형성된 측면이동판 양측단부에 레일돌기부가 형성되고, 저면 중앙부에 전후방향으로 돌출된 레일이 형성되는 상부판과 하부판 상단과 하단에 각각 레일홈이 형성되고, 일측이 절개되어 다용도판수납부가 형성되며, 몸체부의 전단에 봉이동홀이 형성된 중간세로판 이동가이드봉이 일측에 고정되어 상기 봉이동홀을 따라 전후 이동과 회전이 가능하게 설치되고, 상단에 레일홈이 형성되는 다용도판으로 구성되는 것을 특징으로 한다.

column12: INTEGRATED HOSPITAL LOGISTICS MANAGEMENT SYSTEM USING AI TECHNOLOGY, AND INTEGRATED HOSPITAL LOGISTICS MANAGEMENT METHOD USING SAME
column13: The present invention relates to an integrated hospital logistics management system and an integrated hospital logistics management method using same, in which artificial intelligence analyzes trends and seasonal trends by using big data and predicts actual usage by using an artificial intelligence technology, and an artificial intelligence system automatically processes reorders, replacements, etc., thereby ensuring that an appropriate safety stock level can be maintained at all times according to a stock quantity, stock state, issue quantity, etc. of hospital supplies. The integrated hospital logistics management system according to the present invention comprises: an order processing module which processes ordering and warehousing of supplies in conjunction with suppliers that provide hospital supplies; a logistics management module which requests the order processing module to purchase or replace the supplies according to the states of the supplies in a hospital; and a system control module including a machine learning unit which generates and learns rules about the operation of the supplies by using metadata, and a control unit which controls the logistics management module according to the rules.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR SHORT MESSAGE TRANSMISSION
column13: PURPOSE: A system and a method for short message transmission are provided to prevent the infinite loop by abandoning a corresponding call if the frequency of call forwarding operation exceeds the preset allowance frequency. CONSTITUTION: An HRL(Home Location Register)(100) confirms the supplementary service subscription information including the call forwarding for an SMS(Short Message Service) receiver. An SMSC(Short Message Service Center)(200) confirms a call forwarding number coded in a preset specific field of an interworking protocol. If the frequency of the confirmed call forwarding exceeds a preset permission number, the SMS center determines the transmission for the corresponding SMS. An ESME(External Short Message Entity)(300) requests the transmission of the SMS from a certain SMS center corresponding to a reception number.

column12: double mop
column13: 하면엔 마른 걸레, 상면엔 젖은 걸레를 부착시켜서 닦기와 물걸레질을 다 할 수 있는 양면 사용이 가능한 밀대에 관한 것으로서, 특히 상하 걸레부착판의 좌우측에 탄성 날개편이 각각 조립되어, 모서리나 굴곡진 곳 또는 모서리 벽면 등을 자유자재로 수월하게 청소 가능한 양면 사용이 가능한 밀대에 관한 것이다.

column12: EXTRUSION MOLDING DEVICE OF SOLID FUEL TYPED OF PELLET USING COMBUSTIBLE WASTE
column13: The present invention relates to an extrusion molding device of a pellet-formed solid fuel using combustible waste, which is configured comprise a compression transfer cylinder installed horizontally on one side of a waste storage; a feeding hopper installed on the rear end side of the compression transfer cylinder; a drive motor mounted on the rear end of the transfer cylinder compression; a transferring screw mounted lengthily up to a front end from the rear end of the compression transfer cylinder to transfer the combustible waste to the front end side; an electric heater installed so as to surround the front end outer periphery of the compression transfer cylinder; and an extrusion molding mounted on the front end of the compression transfer cylinder to extrude the compressed solid fuel.

column12: METHOD FOR CHECKING LINK-STATE IN COMMUNICATION SYSTEM, AND APPARATUS FOR THE SAME
Cooling structure of electronic element
column13: A cooling structure of an electronic element is disclosed in which a smooth heat transfer can be carried out via a variety of heat transfer routes of conduction and convention without recourse to a forced cooling means such as a fan or the like, thus improving the cooling performance of electronic elements and stabilizing the operation of electronic circuits for a long period of time.

column12: PROBE PIN BONDING APPARATUS
column13: The present invention relates to a probe pin bonding apparatus and, more particularly, to a probe pin bonding apparatus for automatically bonding a probe pin to a probe card. One embodiment of the present invention provides a probe pin bonding apparatus for bonding a probe pin to a probe card, comprising: a pickup unit for transferring a probe pin on a wafer; an array unit for arranging the probe pin transferred from the pickup unit; and a bonding unit for transferring the probe pin arranged in the array unit to bond the probe pin to a probe card.

column12: ATM SWITCHING POINT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM INDEPENDENT OF PROTOCOL
column13: PURPOSE: An ATM(Asynchronous Transfer Mode) switching point management system independent of a protocol is provided to manage the ATM switching point, regardless of any protocol, by accepting the CMIP(Common Management Interface Protocol) and the SNMP(Simple Network Management Protocol). CONSTITUTION: A first TMN(Telecommunication Management Network) manager(40) transmits and receives network management information with a GUI(Graphic User Interface) application program(42) through an F interface. A CMIP proxy agent(50), connected with the first TMN manager through a Q3 interface, transmits and receives an ATM management interface message through a COM(Common Object Model) interface. A second TMN manager(60) transmits and receives network management information with the GUI application program(42) through the F interface. An SNMP proxy agent(70), connected with the second TMN manager(60) through the SNMP interface, transmits and receives the ATM management interface message through the COM interface.

column12: MOBILE MANAGEMENT APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR SERVICING TIME INFORMATION USING THE SAME
column13: PURPOSE: A mobile managing apparatus and time information providing method using the same can transmit a message including time information in network connection procedure of LTE (Long Term Evolution) network. CONSTITUTION: A timer driving unit (204) receives an access request message from a base station device. The timer drive unit drives a timer. A message generating unit (200) receives a predetermined control signal from the timer. The message generating part generates a message including time information based on the control signal. A communications unit (202) transmits the generated message to a user terminal as a first down link data. [Reference numerals] (200) Message generating unit; (202) Communications unit; (204) Timer driving unit; (206) Timer

column12: OIL GUIDE DEVICE FOR AXLES OF ELECTRIC VEHICLES
column13: 본 발명은 전기차량의 액슬용 오일 가이드장치로서, 더욱 상세하게는 액슬 하우징에 내장되는 몸체부와, 몸체부에서 연장 형성되어 액슬 샤프트와 회동 가능하게 결합되는 중공부 및 몸체부에서 연장 형성되고, 액슬 샤프트의 회동에 의해 중공부와 연동되어 액슬 하우징을 향해 유입되는 오일의 유량을 제한하는 유량조절부가 구비된 전기차량의 액슬용 오일 가이드장치를 제공한다.

column12: WALL PANEL FOR PREFAB BATHROOM COMPOSED OF THERMOPLASTIC RESIN SHEET, MINERAL PANEL, FRAME AND FOAMING REINFORCEMENT AND PRODUCING METHOD THEREOF
column13: PURPOSE: A wall panel for a prefab bathroom is provided to form a three dimensional shape on a mineral panel and to mold a thermoplastic resin sheet in the mineral panel for producing a mineral panel for a new toilet. CONSTITUTION: A method for producing a new mineral panel is composed of the steps of sanding a surface after cutting a mineral panel(12), coating the surface with an adhesive(11) after forming an embossed and engraved three dimensional shape on a the surface, and producing a mineral panel(13) for a toilet by bonding a thermoplastic resin sheet(10) to the surface. Then the method is progressed to the steps of attaching the mineral panel for a toilet to a frame(15) with an adhesive(14) and finally attaching a foaming reinforcement(16) to the mineral panel for a toilet.

column12: Electronic device life prediction system and prediction method thereof
column13: The present invention relates to a system for predicting the life of an electronic apparatus and a method for predicting the life thereof. More specifically, the system comprises: a variable test unit (10) providing a power supply device (11) and a load device (12); a chamber measurement unit (20) providing a chamber (23) whose internal temperature is adjustable; a conversion unit (30) providing a filter portion (31) and an ADC (32); and a control unit (40). Provided are the system for predicting the life of an electronic apparatus, which facilitates de-rating design of an electronic apparatus by adjusting stress such as a voltage, a current, the temperature, and the like applied to components of the electronic apparatus, and the method for predicting the life thereof.

column12: METHOD OF PACKING A PRODUCT AND DEVICE FOR PACKING
column13: The present invention relates to a method for automatically packaging a product in a packaging box suitable for a bar-type product and an apparatus. More specifically, the present invention relates to the method for packaging a product and the apparatus, which allow the packaging box supplied in a folded state to be made into a parallelogram cylinder by a stopper and a forming guide, and to be made into a square cylinder by a roller, allow insertion of a bar-type packaged product at the same time as lifting inlay by an insertion guide, and cause an auxiliary cover, first and second covers, to be sequentially covered.

column12: Variable capacity battery chiller
column13: The present invention relates to a variable capacity stacking type heat exchanger and, more specifically, relates to a stacking type heat exchanger to cool cooling water used for cooling a battery module in a water-cooled battery cooling system. The stacking type heat exchanger enables an amount of refrigerant flowing therein to be variably controlled in accordance with necessity.

column12: WATER-SOLUBLE ELECTRICALLY CONDUCTIVE POLYMERS
column13: Water-soluble electrically conductive polymers and a composition comprising such polymers are provided. Also, an electrically conductive layer or film formed from the composition, and articles comprising the electrically conductive layer or film are provided. The electrically conductive polymers according to the present disclosure have one or more hydrophilic side chains. Hydrophilic side chains are covalently bonded to the conductive polymers, which allow the polymer to be stable at high temperature. Thus, the stability of electrical conductivity is prolonged. Depending on the concentration of hydrophilic side chains, the conductivity may be changed. The hydrophilic side chains provide a successful way to fabricate a ductile film exhibiting tunable conductivity. Furthermore, high levels of surface-resistance uniformity can be achieved in the field of coating technology that uses eco-friendly water-based solvents to uniformly and quickly coat the conductive polymer on to plastic film surfaces.
column16: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION (2010-03-16)

column12: A processing tool system
column13: The present invention relates to a cutting tool device for reusable workpiece machining. According to the present invention, a coolant supply hole is formed in the body of a cylindrical main body so that a coolant can be smoothly supplied to a bite position. The coolant supply hole is formed up to an end portion of the body, and thus the coolant can be directly supplied to a bite proximity region. Accordingly, heat generated when the bite cuts a workpiece can be effectively removed. The present invention includes a cylindrical or polygonal column-shaped workpiece (10) having a circular or polygonal vertical cross section; rotation support means (30) rotating, holding, and supporting one side of the workpiece; machining means (40) for machining the inside in a circular column shape while being in contact with the other side of the workpiece; and cutting oil supply means (50) supplying cutting oil through the body of the machining means. The machining means (40) includes a cylindrical support member (42); a cutting blade (41) installed on one side of the support member; a cutting oil guide pipe (43) molded in a penetrating manner from the center to an end portion of the support member; and a cutting oil discharge port (44) formed in the end portion of the support member.

column12: SUB-VIDEO COMPOSITION CIRCUIT USING ENCODER IC
Apparatus and method for controlling scheduling in mobile communication system
column16: LG-ERICSSON CO., LTD. (2011-08-24);;LG- NORTEL CO., LTD. (2006-12-01)

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM OF PROVIDING DISPLAY IN DISPLAY MONITORING SYSTEM
column13: A method for receiving a video in a video monitoring system comprises the steps of storing space connection information indicating a spatial arrangement of videos recorded by a plurality of cameras in a space where the cameras are installed; receiving selection of a first video among the videos; and arranging the first video and at least one second video based on the space connection information.

column12: ELECTRICALLY CONDUCTIVE POLYMERS WITH ENHANCED CONDUCTIVITY
column13: An electrically conductive polymer linked to conductive nanoparticle is provided. The conductive polymer can include conductive monomers and one or more monomers in the conductive polymer can be linked to a conductive nanoparticle and can include a polymerizable moiety so that it can be incorporated into a polymer chain. The electrically conductive monomer can include a 3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene as a conductive monomer. The electrically conductive polymer having the conductive nanoparticle can be prepared into an electrically conductive layer or film for use in electronic devices.
column32: Sih ("Gold and cadmium selenide (CdSe) nanoparticles capped with oligothiophenes." Thesis of Doctor of Philosophy, Univ. of British Columbia, July 2007).

column12: Heat exchanger
column13: The present invention relates to a heat exchanger. The heat exchanger includes: a header tank; a core part; a first flange having flow paths through which a heat exchange medium is introduced and discharged; a second flange combined with the header tank, and having flow paths connected to the header tank to allow heat exchange media to be introduced and discharged therethrough; and a bypass valve selectively operated such that the heat exchange medium can be introduced into the core part or bypassed. Ends of the flow paths are not exposed to the outside on sides in which the first flange, the bypass valve and the second flange are stacked and opposed to each other, and the first flange, the bypass valve and the second flange are brought into surface contact with each other to form consecutive flow paths, thus simplifying a heat exchange medium flow path connection constitution between components combined with the bypass valve, which can lead to a reduction in manufacturing costs and time as well as easy assembly.

column12: A READING DESK HAVING AUTOMATIC HOLDER
column13: The present invention relates to a reading board having an automatic fixing device which can fix a book on a reading board simply by placing the book on the reading board to greatly improve convenience. The reading board having an automatic fixing device comprises: a holder (10) on which a book is held; a support (30) connected to a lower portion of the holder to support a lower portion of the book; and a book fixing unit (300) fixing the book. The reading board has a book placing plate (110) vertically moving by a spring and formed in the middle of the support (30). A first spring fixing protrusion (210) allowing a spring (230) to be fixed thereon is formed in the middle of the support (30). A second fixing protrusion (150) allowing a spring to be fixed thereon is formed on a lower portion of the book placing plate (110), and a pressing plate (130) is formed on the lower end of both sides. A descending part (330) coming in contact with the pressing plate (130) is formed on one side of a fixing plate (350), and the other side of the fixing plate (350) fixes the book. The book fixing unit (300) of a long plate shape has a rotary shaft (310) formed between the descending part (330) and the fixing plate (350). The fixing plate (350) rises while the descending part (330) descends when the pressing plate descends to fix the book.

column12: Rack Bar Supporting Device of Steering Apparatus for Vehicle
column13: The present invention relates to a rack bar supporting device of a steering device for a vehicle, comprising: a cylindrical shaped yoke guide inserted into a cylinder of a gear box; a support yoke coupled to the yoke guide via a rolling member and supporting a rack bar; and a yoke plug coupled to the cylinder and supporting an opposite side terminal end of an shaft direction elastic member that elastically supports the support yoke, thereby capable of stably supporting the rack bar by the support yoke even if the rack bar moves, and improving a steering feeling of a driver by preventing loose feel phenomena.

column12: MANUFACTURING METHOD FOR BRIQEUTTE USING SEWAGE SLUDGE
column13: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing briquette using sewage sludge is provided to cost-effectively generate regenerated fuel based on organic wastes such as the sewage sludge. CONSTITUTION: Sewage sludge is dehydrated and dried. The dried sewage sludge is carbonated to obtain sludge carbide. A combustible gas is generated from a sludge carbide generating process. The combustible gas cooling process and a toxic material eliminating process are further implemented. Mixed fuel coal is generated by mixing sludge carbide, anthracite coal, and charcoal. The briquette is obtained using the mixed fuel coal. In the mixed fuel coal, 70-90 weight% of anthracite coal and 5-15 weight% of charcoal.
column14: DAEGU METROPOLITAN CITY ENVIRONMENTAL INSTALLATIONS CORP

column12: SYSTEM FOR CARD PAYMENT IN THE ELECTRONIC COMMERCE AND METHOD THEREOF
