column13: Provided is a card payment system and method in an electronic transaction, which can effectively solve authentication and security problems that are caused by Active-X programs that are indiscriminately installed, by performing a card payment in a complex hybrid authentication scheme using order information, delivery information, and payment information without an Active-X that is needed to pay for a purchased product by card in an existing electronic transaction.

column12: Extension Implements for Correcting the Human Body
column13: PURPOSE: A stretch excercise machine for correcting bodily shape is provided to normalize the transposed skeletal structure of the human body, and to recover and activate the physiological function of each region of the human body. CONSTITUTION: The stretch excercise machine for correcting bodily shape is comprised of: a mat(10) onto which a patient lies down; an upper support plate(10a) for supporting the upper half part of the body; a waist support plate(10b); a lower support plate(10c) for supporting the lower half part of the body; a head support part(11); a thoracic vertebra support part(12); a pelvis support part(13); a pelvis surrounding belt(14); a pulling band(15) for the pelvis surrounding belt; a footstool(16); an ankle support bar(17); an ankle fixing string(18); a gastrocnemius fixing string(19); a thigh fixing string(20); a hip joint angle keeping string(21); and a fastening string(22) for the sole of the foot.

column12: Knife holder with knife sharpener
column13: The present invention relates to a knife holder used for a kitchen. A knife is required to be sharpened after using the knife for some period of time. However, there is inconvenience of separately sharpening the knife, and the knife holder removes the inconvenience. The present invention enables a knife sharpener to be attached to a portion of a hole which is positioned in the knife holder and enables the knife to be inserted therein, wherein a blade of the knife comes in contact with the portion. Therefore, the knife is sharpened when the knife is inserted or withdrawn without sharpening the knife.

column12: AUTOMATED PREPAID PHONE RECHARGE PROCESSING SYSTEM WITH ONLINE EASY PAYMENT
column13: 온라인 간편 결제를 통한 선불폰 간편 충전 자동화 처리 시스템은 프로세서 및 메모리를 포함할 수 있다. 프로세서는 제 1 단말로부터 신호를 수신함에 기반하여 상기 제 1 단말의 사용자가 상기 제 1 단말을 개통한 시점을 결정하고, 제 1 단말이 개통된 시점으로부터 1개월 단위로 통화 시간, 문자 메시지 사용량 및 데이터 사용량을 측정하고, 3개월 동안의 사용량에 대해 평균값을 계산하며, 제 1 단말의 3개월 동안 평균 통화 시간 사용량이 제 1 수준을 초과하면서, 가입된 요금제의 통화 시간을 기준으로 상기 제 1 단말의 남은 통화 시간이 제 2 수준 미만임에 기반하여 현재 가입된 요금제와 비교하여 허용된 통화 시간이 더 많으면서 단위 통화 시간당 금액이 더 저렴한 요금제를 추천하고, 제 1 단말의 3개월 동안 평균 문자 메시지 사용량이 제 3 수준을 초과하면서, 가입된 요금제의 문자 메시지 사용량을 기준으로 상기 제 1 단말의 남은 문자 메시지 사용량이 제 4 수준 미만임에 기반하여 현재 가입된 요금제와 비교하여 허용된 문자 메시지 사용량이 더 많으면서 단위 문자 메시지당 금액이 더 저렴한 요금제를 추천하고, 제 1 단말의 3개월 동안 평균 데이터 사용량이 제 5 수준을 초과하면서, 가입된 요금제의 데이터 사용량을 기준으로 상기 제 1 단말의 남은 데이터 사용량이 제 6 수준 미만임에 기반하여 현재 가입된 요금제와 비교하여 허용된 데이터 사용량이 더 많으면서 단위 데이터 당 금액이 더 저렴한 요금제를 추천할 수 있다.

column12: Surveillance device for video signals and data signals synchronous interpreting
column13: The present invention relates to a surveillance device for synchronous interruption of an image signal and a data signal, and more particularly, to a surveillance device for synchronous interruption of an image signal and a data signal, capable of synchronizing a data signal (D) sensed in a sensor unit (10) and an image signal (I) photographed in a plurality of cameras (21), storing the data signal (D) and the image signal (I) as an output signal (O), according to a reference level signal (T) that is a threshold value, and easily grasping the cause of an abnormal operation of a device (A) to be tested by analyzing the stored output signal (O).

column12: VR DEVICES FOR CREATING VR EXHIBITION SPACES
column13: 유저가 자신이 저작한 컨텐츠들을 전시물로서 가상의 공간 상에 전시하는 전시 공간을 용이하게 생성할 수 있고, 다른 유저와의 공감이 가능한 부가적 설정이 가능하도록 하여 전시물의 전시에 대한 흥미도 및 이용률을 높일 수 있는 기술을 제공한다. 본 발명의 일 실시예에 따른 3차원 가상 전시 공간 제작 서비스 제공 장치는, 유저 단말로부터 3차원 가상 공간 상에 배치될 전시물의 모델링 데이터인 전시물 객체 데이터와, 3차원 가상 공간의 속성 정보를 설정하기 위한 정보인 공간 설정 정보를 수신 시, 속성 정보에 따라 생성된 입체 모델을 갖는 3차원 가상 공간 상에 마련된 각 전시 영역에, 전시물 객체 데이터에 따라 시각화된 전시물 객체를 배치하여, 전시물 객체가 배치된 가상 공간인 전시 공간을 생성하는 공간 제작부; 유저 단말로부터 입력된 것으로서, 전시물 객체를 전시 공간을 이용하여 다른 유저 계정이 이용 시, 전시물 객체의 관람에 도움이 되는 컨텐츠인 부가 컨텐츠에 대한 설정 입력을 수신하고, 수신한 설정 입력에 따라서 각 전시물 객체에 상기 부가 컨텐츠를 설정하는 부가 컨텐츠 설정부; 및 공간 제작부에 의하여 생성된 전시 공간에 부가 컨텐츠 설정부에 의하여 설정된 부가 컨텐츠를 적용하여, 다른 유저 계정이 전시 공간을 이용할 수 있고, 전시 공간의 이용 시 부가 컨텐츠를 이용할 수 있는 전시 인터페이스를 생성하여 다른 유저 계정이 이용 가능한 상태로 관리하는 인터페이스 생성부;를 포함한다.

column12: HEAT SINK HAVING HIGH RADIATION CERAMIC COATING LAYER, METHOD OF MANUFACTURING THE SAME AND METAL PCB
column13: PURPOSE: A heat sink, a manufacturing method thereof and a heat sink integral metal PCP are provided to improve a radiation performance of a slim electrical appliance by including a high radiation organic-inorganic complex coating thin film. CONSTITUTION: A heat sink(150) includes a radiation member(110) and a high radiation organic-inorganic complex coating thin film(120). The radiation member is arranged on a heating source in order to make low a temperature of a heat source. The radiation member has a thickness of 0.1mm to 5mm. The high radiation organic-inorganic complex coating thin film is formed on the radiation member. The high radiation organic-inorganic complex coating thin film includes a changing silicon resin, inorganic filler and a metal filler. The high radiation organic-inorganic complex coating thin film has the thickness of 0.03mm to 0.06mm.

column12: REGENERATIVE APPARATUS
column13: The present invention relates to an apparatus for regenerating wasted cable. The apparatus for regenerating the wasted cable, including copper wire, an inner and outer sheathing material and an earthing part, according to an embodiment of the present invention, comprises: a cable supplying part for arranging the wasted cable in a longitudinal direction and continuously supplying the wasted cable; an outer sheathing material peeling part for removing the outer sheathing material from the wasted cable supplied from the cable supplying part; an earthing material peeling part for removing the earthing part from the wasted cable where the outer sheathing material is removed; an inner sheathing material peeling part for removing the inner sheathing material from the wasted cable where the earthing part is removed. The present invention mechanically and sequentially separates insulation sheathing materials from the wasted cable to separate the copper wire (or a copper plate) of the earthing part and core copper wire from the insulation sheathing materials and to collect the copper wire, whereas heating, extruding and regenerating the separated insulation sheathing materials, thereby maximizing recycling rate of the wasted cable to construct a resource circulation system and minimizing the wasted material currently being buried or burned to contribute to the protection of environment.

column12: Sink top plate made of artificial marble that provides convenient workability
column13: 본 발명은 편리한 시공성을 제공하는 인조대리석으로 제작된 싱크대 상판에 관한 것으로, 싱크대의 설치작업의 용이성과 작업환경을 위생적으로 할 수 있도록 한 것이다. 현재 싱크대 상판의 코너부를 형성할 경우에 앞코부분에 의하여 단순한 절단의 형태로는 앞코를 맞추기가 용이치 아니하다는 단점이 있는 것이고, 일체형의 것을 사용할 경우에는 운반이나 또는 설치장소의 규격화가 불가능함으로 설치작업에 상당히 곤란성이 있는 것이다. 따라서 본 발명은 굴곡진 전면을 갖는 싱크대 코너부를 구비토록 함으로서 이러한 코너부의 양측으로 일자형 상판만을 조립토록 함으로서 설치장소에 관계없이 시공의 용이성을 제공하게 되는 것이다.

column12: PLASMA DISPLAY PANEL AND DRIVING METHOD OF THE SAME
MULTI-DISPLAY SYSTEM AND DISPLAY APPARATUS
HOLDER FOR PORTABLE ELECTRONIC DEVICE
column13: The present invention relates to a holder for a portable electronic device, which allows the portable electronic device to be erected at a predetermined angle, thereby facilitating the watching of a video, etc. The holder comprises: a main body part for holding a portable electronic device; a rotation part which is embedded in the main body part and holds the main body part so as to be rotatable; a support part which is coupled to the rotation part; and a plurality of leg parts which are connected to the support part. The holder can easily support the portable electronic device even in places where the surface is not flat.

column12: Sink target plate in which the folded part between the flat plate part and the rear plate part is curved in a round shape
column13: 본 발명은 평판부와 후면판부 사이 접힘부를 라운드지게 굴곡 형성하여 청소가 용이하여 위생상의 청결함을 구현할 수 있도록 한 싱크대 상판을 제공한다. 이를 구현하기 위한 본 발명은 평판부와, 평판부의 전면 하단에 수직으로 직각되게 절곡 구성되는 전면판부 및 평판부의 후면 상단에 수직으로 직각되게 절곡 구성되는 후면판부로 구성한 싱크대 상판에 있어서, 평판부와 후면판부 사이 상면에는 라운드부가 오목하게 형성되어, 후면판부를 평판부에서 직각되게 절곡 구성하는 과정에서 평판부와 후면판부 사이 맞대음 부위에 라운드부가 위치하도록 함을 요지로 한다. 본 발명은 평판부와 후면판부 사이 접힘부를 라운드지게 굴곡 형성하여 조리과정이나 혹은 설겆이 과정에서 물 이나 각종 음식찌꺼기등의 오염원이 평판부와 후면판부 사이 맞댄부위에 쌓이더라도 라운드부에 의해 손이 나 행주와 같은 청소용품이 쌓여진 오염원에 쉽게 닿을 수 있어 제때 제거가 가능하여 싱크대를 청결하게 관리 할 수 있는 효과를 가진다.

column12: Laser irradiation device of laser printers
column13: This invention relates to a laser irradiation device of laser printers in which has a simplified laser diode excitation control device, comprising a laser beam emitter, a first lens for converting the laser beam emitted from the laser beam emitter into parallel laser beam, a polygonal mirror for reflecting the parallel laser beam, the polygonal mirror being rotated and having a plurality of reflection surfaces and sensing part, the sensing part sensing the starting points of each reflection surfaces, a second lens for receiving the laser beam reflected by the polygonal mL-Tor, and a controller for synthesizing an output signal from the sensing part of the polygonal mirror with a picture signal and generating control signal to control the laser beam emitter.

column12: FABRIC WITH THE CUT LOOP AND MANUFACTURING METHOD OF THE SAME
METHOD FOR PROVIDING PRODUCT DISCOUNT COUPONS BASED ON STORE DEMAND FORECASTING AND SYSTEM THEREOF
column13: An operating method of a product discount providing system based on store demand forecasting comprises the steps of: obtaining existing sales data of a store including reservation history information and visit history information of customers by data of the store from a database; predicting demand for the store using the existing sales data of the store; determining the available number of product discount coupons based on the demand forecast result of the store; providing the product discount coupon to a user terminal of a customer; receiving request information for using the product discount coupon from the user terminal; and transmitting the request information for using the product discount coupon to the store. The present invention enables the store to predict the customer demand in advance.

column12: SMART RAW COTTON TOTAL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column13: Provided is a smart raw cotton total management system and more particularly, a smart raw cotton total management system which promotes efficiency of raw cotton management by providing a variety of evaluation information on the raw cotton purchased by the member to the member side and totally manages a raw cotton member and a raw cotton supplier by providing purchase prior information to the member when requesting the raw cotton purchase of the member to perform reasonable raw cotton purchase and transaction.

column12: A REPRODUCTION PROCESS OF LAMP
column13: 본 발명은 폐 후단조합램프의 재생방법에 관한 것으로서, 더욱 상세하게는 폐 후단조합램프를 분쇄하여 강 부분을 분리하고 여기에 내열성이 우수한 ABS 수지를 일정량 첨가하여 혼합하고 컴파운딩하므로써 충격강도, 열변형온도 및 신율이 향상된 재생수지를 제조할 수 있는 폐 후단조합램프의 재생방법에 관한 것이다.

column12: Apparatus and method for queue assignment for each link in multi-links of an access pointer controller
PORTABLE SHADING THE LIGHT DEVICE
column13: The present invention relates to a portable shading apparatus comprising: a vertical part installed on the ground vertically; a supporting plate coupled to be hinged on the bottom of the vertical part to be able to rotate and installed in parallel with the ground; a shading film installed on the top of the vertical part, and having an adjustable spreading length; and a support installed to be extended or contracted to adjust the spreading length of the shading film. Therefore, the portable shading apparatus is capable of being manufactured to have a simple structure, thereby conveniently installing and disassembling the portable shading apparatus.

column12: Reducer of Electric Power Steering Apparatus
column13: The present invention relates to a reducer of an electric power-assisted steering apparatus. According to an embodiment of the present invention, a reducer of an electric power-assisted steering apparatus comprises: a holder having a coupling hole at a central portion thereof to be coupled to an end portion of a worm shaft and having a first guide portion having a protrusion and a groove at the outer surface thereof; a holder cap coupled to the inside of a gear housing, formed in a hollow shape with one side closed, and having a holder groove to which a holder is coupled at the inner surface of an end portion and a second guide portion having a protrusion supported by a protrusion of a first guide portion of a holder on a side of the holder groove; and an elastic supporter coupled between an upper inner circumferential surface of the holder cap in a direction opposite to a worm wheel and the holder to support an end portion of the worm shaft in the worm wheel direction.

column12: LED mask hanger
column13: An objective of the present invention is to provide an LED mask holder, and the configuration of the present invention includes: a base (716) on which an LED mask is mounted; a box (712) which is coupled to the base (716) to form a chamber therebetween; and a sterilization operation means which generates a sterilizing material in the chamber, wherein the sterilization operation means is composed of an ultraviolet ray generating means provided in the base (716), the sterilizing material is an ultraviolet ray generated by the ultraviolet ray generating means, and the ultraviolet ray generating means is composed of a plurality of ultraviolet LEDs provided in the base (716). The LED mask holder is helpful for hygiene by stably holding the LED mask and sterilizing the LED mask periodically.

column12: THE CONCRETE COMPOSITION WITH FILTER PERFORMANCE
column13: PURPOSE: An environmentally friendly concrete composition having a filter function is provided to have dead load, strength, water permeability, and air penetrability and permeability. CONSTITUTION: An environmentally friendly concrete composition having a filter function comprises cement, aggregate, and water. The combination ratio of the aggregate and cement is 6-8 of aggregate based on 1 of cement(volume ratio standard). W/c(water cement ratio, volume ratio standard) is 30-40% and the used aggregate is 5-25 mm aggregate. The aggregate is 13 mm aggregate, 19 mm aggregate, or 25 mm aggregate, or the aggregate is composed of 25-35% of 5 mm aggregate and 65-75% of 19 mm aggregate, or the aggregate is composed of 45-55% of 10 mm aggregate and 45-55% of 19 mm aggregate, or the aggregate is composed of 35-45% of 5 mm aggregate and 55-65% of 13 mm aggregate.

column12: Single type substrate treating apparatus and method
column13: Provided are a single type substrate treating apparatus and method. A polishing unit is disposed in a process chamber for polishing a substrate chemically and mechanically, and a cleaning unit is disposed in the same process chamber for cleaning the substrate. Therefore, according to the single substrate treating apparatus and method, a polishing process and a cleaning process can be performed on a substrate in the same process chamber by a single substrate treating method in which substrates are treated one by one.

column12: TECHNIQUES FOR DETERMINING A STORE DEMAND FORECASTING MODEL
column13: According to an embodiment of the present invention, a method for determining a store demand forecasting model is disclosed. The method for determining a store demand forecasting model comprises the following steps of: obtaining at least one evaluation index for each of a plurality of pre-learned models by using a forecasting value outputted by inputting a test data set to each of the plurality of pre-learned models and label data related to the test data set; and determining a store demand forecasting model based on the at least one evaluation index for each of the plurality of pre-learned models.

column12: SHIELD ELEMENT OF MODULE WITH MOVABLE TYPE ANTENNA CONNECTING MEANS AND ANTENNA INTEGRAL TYPE MODULE HAVING THE SAME
column13: A shield unit with a movable antenna connecting member and a module with an integrated antenna and the shield unit are provided to accurately measure the performance of the module by selectively supplying signals or power from the module to a measuring jig. A shield unit of a module includes a shield body(10) and a connection unit(30). The shield body is mounted on a module board. The connection unit is contacted with an output portion of the module board. When an external force is applied, the connection unit is moved by the external force and integrated with the shield body. An antenna circuit portion, which is electrically coupled with the connection terminal, is formed on the shield body. The movable antenna connection unit includes a push slice(32), an antenna feeder(34), and a connector(36). The push slice is exposed from the shield body. The antenna feeder is contacted with the board output portion without using welding. The connector couples the push slice and the antenna feeder to the shield body.

column12: ELECTRIC AUTO SLIDING HINGE
column13: An automatic sliding module of a mobile terminal is provided to accomplish a high quality smooth operation preferred by a user, and allow a sliding operation manually in a power-off state. A guide shaft(33) for linearly guiding a moving slider hinge(32) that attaches upper and lower slider bodies(11,12) having an LCD(Liquid Crystal Display) and slidably moved is attached to a base slide hinge(31). A feeding motor assembly(40) is formed by integrally assembling a stepping motor(41), which operates upon receiving an electrical pulse signal and has a planetary gear, and a lead screw(42) coaxially rotated with the stepping motor(41). A lead gear(43) formed at the moving slide hinge(32) is combined to a slope face of the lead screw(42) which is rotated when the stepping motor(41) is driven, in order to convert the rotational movement of the lead screw(43) into a linear movement to allow the moving slider hinge(32) to slidably operate.

column12: METHOD OF COLORING FOR METAL THIN PLATE AND KEY-PAD OF USING THE SAME
column13: A metal thin plate coloring method and a key pad produced by the same are provided to express the desirable color by generating the coherence, diffraction, refraction, and dispersion of the light by forming a coating layer of several folds and patterns and to secure the degree of pattern freedom by forming the patterns through a chemical method. A method for coloring a metal thin plate(200) installed at a key pad for a personal terminal comprises a first process for coating one surface of the metal thin plate with a first coating material having specific saturation, by using at least one of physical vapor deposition and chemical vapor deposition and a second process for secondly coating the metal thin plate with a second coating material having the specific saturation and the refractive index of the light different from that of the first coating material, by using at least one of physical vapor deposition and chemical vapor deposition. Further, the physical vapor deposition is one of an EB-RIP(electro beam reaction ion plating) of PAPVD(plasma assisted physical vapor deposition) and a CAD(cathodic arc deposition).

column12: RF module structure of a mobile communication terminal
column13: An apparatus is disclosed for a module structure of a mobile communication terminal. The module structure comprises a radio frequency portion for processing communicated radio frequency signals, and a base-band portion commonly used by the radio frequency portion for providing modular replacement of a radio frequency multi-chip module connected to the radio frequency portion. The radio frequency multi-chip module is selected in accordance with a corresponding frequency band of the mobile communication terminal.

column12: Semiconductor devices having stressed active regions therein and methods of forming same
column13: A method of fabricating a semiconductor device includes providing a substrate including a semiconductor material having a first lattice constant and then patterning the substrate to form a first semiconductor pattern extending in a first direction. A second semiconductor pattern is also formed on and in contact with the first semiconductor pattern. The second semiconductor pattern extends in the first direction and has a second lattice constant that is sufficiently greater than the first lattice constant so that lattice stress is present at an interface between the first semiconductor pattern and the second semiconductor pattern. The second semiconductor pattern is further patterned to define a sidewall of the second semiconductor pattern that extends in a second direction intersecting the first direction. A gate electrode is formed, which extends in the first direction on the second semiconductor pattern.

column12: Cooling structure of electronic element
column13: A cooling structure of an electronic element is disclosed in which a smooth heat transfer can be carried out via a variety of heat transfer routes of conduction and convention without recourse to a forced cooling means such as a fan or the like, thus improving the cooling performance of electronic elements and stabilizing the operation of electronic circuits for a long period of time.

column12: Mixer device to dissolve powder food
column13: Disclosed is a mixer device for dissolving powder food. The present invention provides a technology capable of spreading concentration quickly and evenly without any auxiliary means when powder food is put into a liquid, such as water or milk, for dissolving the powder food. Accordingly, an auxiliary means for distributing the concentration of powdered food is removed, thereby preventing environmental pollution and enhancing a user's health. According to the present invention, the mixer device comprises: a container having an open top structure capable of accommodating a solution; a container fixing part provided in the mixer device and provided to mount a container; a fixing part rotating part provided to include the container fixing part, provided in the mixer device, and having a disk shape to rotate the container in a horizontal direction; a non-contact level sensor provided in a side part of the mixer device and provided to detect the rising height of the solution due to the rotation of the container in real-time; and a pressure sensor provided under the fixing part rotating part.

column12: VOUCHER DEVICE, VOUCHER MANAGING SYSTEM INCLUDING THE DEVICE, AND MANAGING METHOD OF THE SAME
column13: PURPOSE: A voucher terminal, a voucher management system, and a method thereof are provided to prevent abuse and misuse of a terminal by managing service user information through bio-information. CONSTITUTION: A biological recognition unit(110) recognizes biological information from a user. A communication unit(120) transmits biological information to an external server. The communication unit receives service information from the external server. An input unit(130) inputs a character, a number, or a control command from the user. An output unit(140) outputs biological information, user information, and service information on a screen.

column12: SYSTEM FOR ELIMINATING DEAD ZONE OF MOTOR VEHICLE USING FLEXIBLE DISPLAY
column13: A vehicle blind spot removal system comprises a vehicle external image input unit, a flexible display unit, and an image control unit. The vehicle external image input unit inputs external images of a vehicle, the flexible display unit installed in a pillar of the vehicle outputs an image input from the vehicle external image input unit, and the image control unit corrects the input image in accordance with an installation type of the flexible display unit. The present invention intends to provide a system capable of removing a blind spot caused by a vehicle pillar, which is a main cause of a traffic accident.

column12: Semiconductor device having stress active region and method for fabricating the same
column13: A method of fabricating a semiconductor device includes providing a substrate including a semiconductor material having a first lattice constant and then patterning the substrate to form a first semiconductor pattern extending in a first direction. A second semiconductor pattern is also formed on and in contact with the first semiconductor pattern. The second semiconductor pattern extends in the first direction and has a second lattice constant that is sufficiently greater than the first lattice constant so that lattice stress is present at an interface between the first semiconductor patternand the second semiconductor pattern. The second semiconductor pattern is further patterned to define a sidewall of the second semiconductor pattern that extends in a second direction intersecting thefirst direction. A gate electrode is formed, which extends in the first direction on the second semiconductor pattern.

column12: Chemical machinery anti-corrosion stop valve
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of stop valves, in particular to an anti-corrosion stop valve for chemical machinery. The valve comprises a valve body and a valve cover, a water inlet is formed in one side of the valve body, a water outlet is formed in the other side of the valve body, a sliding groove is formed in the valve body, a sliding block is connected into the sliding groove in a sliding mode, a movable plate is fixedly connected to the sliding block, a plurality of baffles are fixedly connected to the bottom of the movable plate, and an adjusting column is fixedly connected to the upper portion of the movable plate. A valve rod is in threaded connection with the interior of the adjusting column, the bottom of the valve rod penetrates through the movable plate and is fixedly connected with a sealing ball body, the top end of the adjusting column penetrates through the valve cover and is fixedly connected with an adjusting plate, the top end of the valve rod penetrates through the adjusting plate and is fixedly connected with a rotating handle, and a driven wheel is fixedly installed on the valve rod. A rotating rod is rotationally connected to the adjusting plate, and a driving wheel is fixedly installed on the rotating rod. The cut-off device can cut off twice, so that the cut-off purpose is achieved, and the cut-off effect is improved.

column12: POWER CONTROL APPARATUS VEHICLE HAVING THE SAME AND METHOD FOR CONTOLLING VEHICLE
column13: Provided are a power control apparatus, a vehicle having the same, and a method for controlling the vehicle. According to an aspect, the power control apparatus can comprise: a communications unit receiving a request message relevant to power setting through a communications network within a vehicle; a determination unit determining a power condition based on the request message relevant to the power setting; and a supply unit supplying power based on the determination result.
column14: HYUNDAI MOTOR CO LTD;;KIA MOTORS CORP

column12: Energiesteuergerät, Fahrzeug, welches dasselbe besitzt, und Verfahren des Steuerns des Fahrzeugs
column13: Ein Energiesteuergerät, ein Fahrzeug, welches dasselbe besitzt, und ein Verfahren des Steuerns des Fahrzeugs werden bereitgestellt. Das Energiesteuergerät beinhaltet: eine Kommunikationseinheit, welche konfiguriert ist, eine Anforderungsnachricht, bezogen auf eine Energieeinstellung, über ein Kommunikationsnetz in einem Fahrzeug zu empfangen und eine Bestimmungseinheit, welche konfiguriert ist, einen Energiezustand, basierend auf der Anforderungsnachricht, bezogen auf die Energieeinstellung, zu bestimmen. Zusätzlich ist ein Anwendungssteuerelement konfiguriert, um eine Anwendung der Energie, welche von wenigstens einem, entweder einer Batterie oder einer Lichtmaschinen-Energieversorgung geliefert ist, basierend auf einem Ergebnis der Bestimmung, auszuführen.
column14: HYUNDAI MOTOR CO LTD;;KIA MOTORS CORP

column12: Updated software provides system and thereof method
column13: The present invention provides an updated software providing system and a method thereof. The updated software providing system includes a server in which update software is registered; and a terminal for receiving the version information of the update software from the server and performing update based on the version information of the received update software. The server includes a version information checking unit for collecting the version information of the software temporarily stored in the terminal or the version information of preinstalled software, comparing the version information of the temporarily stored software or the version information of the preinstalled software with the version information of the update software, and determining whether to transmit the update software.

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PREVENTING RECEIVING FAILURE OF PAGING SIGNAL ON EPC NETWORK
column13: PURPOSE: A paging loss preventing device and in an evolved packet core (EPC) network and a preventing method thereof are provided to transmit an audio paging signal to a terminal device when a network connection or position registering procedure between mobility management entity (MME) and the terminal device is completed. CONSTITUTION: A paging transmission part (452) transmits a paging signal to a terminal device. A control part (454) transmits a location registration request to a mobile switching center according to the network connection and location registration request of the terminal device. The control part performs a network connection and position registration procedure. The control part receives the paging signal according to the reception of a voice call of the terminal device with the network connection and position registration procedure is not completed. The control part transmits the paging signal to the terminal device after buffering. [Reference numerals] (450) Network connecting part; (452) Paging transmission part; (454) Control part; (456) Memory part

column12: Display apparatus and the using restriction method thereof
column13: Provided are a display apparatus and a use restriction method thereof. The display apparatus includes a media interface unit, a memory unit, and a control unit. The media interface unit detects the connection of an external device and receives unique information of the connected external device. The memory unit stores the unique information of the external device received through the media interface unit. The control unit stores/registers the unique information of the connected external device in the memory unit and determines whether to permit the use of the external device connected through the media interface unit on the basis of the unique information registered in the memory unit. Herein, upon detecting the connection of an unregistered external device, the control unit restricts the use of the unregistered external device on the basis of the registered unique information of the external device.
column32: International Search Report issued in PCT/KR2008/006476 dated Mar. 23, 2009.;;European Search Report dated Apr. 25, 2012 issued in Application No. 08 84 9172.

column12: HEAT EXCHANGER
column13: 본 고안은 열 교환기에 관한 것이다. 상호 소정간격 이격되어 열 교환매체의 통로부를 형성하는 헤더 파이프와, 헤더 파이프의 양 단부에 결합되는 다수개의 튜브와, 튜브의 외주면에 설치되어 방열 면적을 넓히는 방열 휜과, 헤더 파이프의 외주면에 설치되어 차체에 고정되는 브라켓을 포함하는 열 교환기에 있어서, 브라켓은 내측에 공간부를 형성하여 헤더 파이프를 수용하고, 양 단부에 다수개의 관통공이 형성된 U형 부재와, U형 부재의 양 단부에서 연장하여 절곡가능하게 형성하고, U형 부재의 내측으로 절곡하여 그 단부가 헤더 파이프의 외주면과 접촉하고, U형 부재의 관통공과 상응하는 중공부를 형성하여 체결수단으로 체결하는 절곡 부재와, U형 부재의 외주면에 설치하여 차체와 고정되는 판상 부재를 포함하는 것을 특징으로 한다. 본 고안에 따르면, 브라켓은 체결수단을 사용하여 체결하는 방식이므로 헤더파이프의 임의의 위치로 이동이 자유롭게 가능하므로 차체의 다른 부분에 고정시 작업이 용이하다.

column12: WASTEBASKET FOR SEPARATE COLLECTION
column13: 본 발명은, 쓰레기통 몸체의 상부에 배치된 광고 하우징의 양측면에서 슬라이딩 이동에 따라 인입되거나 인출되는 복수개의 광고 패널들을 구성한 광고 기능을 포함하는 분리수거용 쓰레기통과 관련된 다양한 실시예들이 기술된 바, 한 실시예에 따르면, 분리수거용 쓰레기통은, 개방된 쓰레기 투입구를 형성한 쓰레기통 몸체; 상기 쓰레기 투입구의 상부에 배치되고, 전면 및 후면에 제 1, 2 개구부를 형성한 광고 하우징; 상기 광고 하우징의 제 1, 2 개구부에 슬라이딩 이동가능하게 결합되고, 슬라이딩 이동에 따라 상기 광고 하우징의 양측면에서 상기 광고 하우징의 길이방향을 향하여 인입되어 결합되거나, 인출되어 분리되는 복수개의 광고 패널들; 및 상기 복수개의 광고 패널들을에 배치되고, 상기 광고 하우징에 상기 복수개의 광고 패널을 결합 또는 분리시 탄성력에 의해 고정시키거나, 고정을 해제시키는 적어도 하나의 패널 락킹 구조;를 포함할 수 있으며, 이외에도 다양한 다른 실시예들이 가능하다.

column12: Gloves for real-time sign language translation and braille signs
column13: The present invention relates to gloves capable of real-time sign language translation and braille output. The gloves include: left and right glove bodies put on left and right hands, respectively; left and right bending sensor parts provided in finger accepting parts of the left and right glove bodies, respectively, to sense whether ten fingers are bent; left and right gyro sensors provided in the left and right glove bodies, respectively, to sense angles and motions of the left and right hands; a left sensing integration part provided in the left glove body to collect sensing results of the left bending sensor part and the left gyro sensor; a storage part storing a sign language database, and voice and braille files corresponding to each sign language gesture; a voice output part provided in the right glove body, and outputting the voice file; a braille output part formed to be attached to or detached from one of the left and right glove bodies and formed to display characters and braille letters corresponding to sign language gestures; and a control part searching the sign language database of the storage part for sign language words suitable for the motions of the left and right hands transmitted from the left sensing integration part, the right bending sensor part and the right gyro sensor, and then, transmitting voice or braille files corresponding to the discovered sign language words to the voice output part or the braille output part. Therefore, the present invention is capable of enabling the visually handicapped people to acquire more accurate information.

column12: COSMETIC PENCIL HAVING AIR TIGHT FUNCTION
column13: The present invention relates to a cosmetic pencil having an airtight function, wherein the lower end part of a cosmetic lead is elastically coupled to the cosmetic pencil to be prevented from being separated during use and a use portion of the cosmetic lead is sealed during non-use to prevent evaporation thereof, thereby increasing usability and reliability of a product. According to the present invention, a slap hole is formed on one sidewall of a holder, tension holes are formed on an opposite sidewall, a tension rib is formed between the tension holes, and a sealing cylinder is coupled to the inside of a cap, such that the slap hole and the tension hole allows the cosmetic lead to be elastically coupled to the cosmetic pencil, thereby preventing separation and preventing the cosmetic lead from being evaporated during non-use.

column12: APPARATUS FOR DISCHARGING GOODS IN REFRIGERATOR USING IN SLEEPING ACCOMMODATIONS
column13: An apparatus for discharging goods in a refrigerator used at sleeping accommodations is provided to protect stored goods from being dirty by keeping the goods inside without exposing them to the outside and to prevent possibility of theft since the user is not allowed to replace the original contents to other contents after use. An apparatus for discharging goods in a refrigerator used at sleeping accommodations comprises a tray(110), a tray driving unit(130), a separator(120), and a separator driving unit. The tray includes an article storage part(111), and is combined to a cell. The tray driving unit drives the tray to move in a forward/reverse direction between a deposit position where the tray is inserted in the cell and a withdrawal position where the article storage part is partially exposed to the outside. The separator is mounted at the tray to be projected towards the article storage part of the tray. The separator driving unit allows the separator to be projected towards the article storage part when the tray is in the withdrawal position, and prevents the separator from being projected when the tray is in the deposit position.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR SUPPLEMENTING SCAN DATA BY USING LIBRARY DATA
column13: A method for supplementing scan data by using library data according to the present invention comprises: a scan step of acquiring scan data of a subject including a structure; a step of selecting library model data corresponding to the structure; and a step of post-processing the scan data, wherein the library model data is added at the step of post-processing of the scan data and is post-processed together with the scan data. Accordingly, the scan data in which distortion or a data gap has occurred is supplemented by the library model data, and thus a user acquires a highly reliable three-dimensional model.

column12: UNIT FOR SUPPORTING A SUBSTRATE
column13: PURPOSE: A unit for supporting a substrate is provided to suppress the damage to a senor due to a fume by arranging a sensor inside of a stage. CONSTITUTION: A substrate support unit comprises a stage(110), a supporting unit(120), a holder(130), a driving part(140), and a sensor(150). The supporting unit is arranged on the stage. The supporting unit rotates the substrate. The holder holds the edge part of the substrate. The driving part is connected to the holder. The driving part drives the holder. The sensor senses whether the holder holds the substrate or not.

column12: Plasma display panel and driving method of the same
column13: A plasma display panel having enhanced discharge cell light emission efficiency while minimizing the increase in power consumption. The plasma display panel includes first and second substrates facing each other, address electrodes formed on the first substrate, and barrier ribs arranged between the first and the second substrates to partition discharge cells. Display electrodes are formed on the second substrate while crossing the address electrodes. The display electrodes have a first electrode provided at the discharge cells, and second electrodes are arranged at both sides of each discharge cell, while interposing the first electrode, independently of the neighboring discharge cells.

column12: CANISTER FOR VEHICLE
column13: The present invention relates to a vehicular canister. The purpose of the present invention is to provide a vehicular canister of which the case can be shared so that a mold required for manufacturing the case can be unified, thereby reducing costs for developing and manufacturing the mold, reducing costs for managing the mold and A/S parts, and efficiently managing the parts through the sharing of the mold. The vehicular canister with a variable partition structure according to the present invention is provided to accomplish the purpose, and comprises: the case having a partition in the inner space thereof and having a purge port, a loading port, and an atmosphere port; activated carbon filling the inner space partitioned by the partition, wherein the partition includes an integrated partition integrally formed on the inner surface of the upper side of the case, and an assembled partition assembled to be extended from the integrated partition downward. [Reference numerals] (AA) Capacity small

column12: Apparatus and method for queue assignment for each link in multi-links of an access pointer controller
column13: A system and method for managing traffic in a communication system assigns multiple links in a system to a queue. The queue is formed from one or multiple memories and a queue assignment unit assigns banks in the queue to one or more links. The queue assignment also writes data in the banks of specific links through a write control signal. A signal detection unit detects availability of a line interface unit, and a data control unit that reads data from the queue and writes it in the line interface unit. Through this structure, a faster and more efficient data transmission system is formed.
column16: LG ELECTRONICS INC (2003-10-01);;LG NORTEL CO. LTD (2006-07-10)

column12: Method for producing the conductive paste reducing change of elapsed time in viscosity
column13: The present invention relates to a conductive paste comprising metal powder, a solvent, an organic vehicle, glass frit, and the like, wherein the conductive paste is manufactured by mixing, dispersing and filtering raw materials excluding the metal powder and some solvents, and then mixing remaining solvents and the metal powder, thereby minimizing a viscosity change over time of the manufactured conductive paste.

column12: 3D Digital Lab Analog for Implant 3D Printing Models
column13: 본 발명은 임플란트 3D 프린팅 모형용 디지털 랩 아날로그에 관한 것으로 임플란트용 석고모형이 아닌 3D 프린팅 모형에 최적화된 랩 아날로그를 제공함에 있어, 랩 아날로그를 3D 프린팅 모형으로 된 잇몸부의 하부에서 삽입한 후, 잇몸부의 상부에서 어버트먼트를 맞대어 삽입한 다음, 잇몸부의 상부에서 스크류를 체결하는 구조로서, 하부측에서 상향 삽입되는 랩 아날로그와, 상부측에서 하향 삽입되는 스크류가 어버트먼트를 사이에 두고 일체로 고정되게 함으로써 잇몸부 상에서 랩 아날로그의 이탈을 방지토록 하고, 또한 랩 아날로그의 중간몸통부의 외면부를 다각형 기둥으로 형성함과 아울러, 그 외면에 방사형으로 다수의 만곡홈부를 형성하여 연화 확장되는 잇몸이 만곡홈부내에 밀착되게함으로써 상호간의 밀착고정력을 극대화하도록 하기 위해, 임플란트 3D 프린팅 모형의 잇몸부(2) 상에 형성된 체결공(3) 내에 삽입 고정되는 디지털 랩 아날로그(10); 상기 랩 아날로그(10)는 상기 랩 아날로그(10)의 외면부는, 하부가 폐쇄되고 상부 개방공(21)을 갖는 원통형의 중간몸통부(11)와, 상기 중간몸통부(11)의 외주연 방향 일정간격 방사형태로 형성되어 중간몸통부(11)의 길이방향으로 형성되는 만곡홈부(12)와, 상기 중간몸통부(11)의 상부측에 형성되는 상부테두리부(15)와, 상기 중간몸통부(11)의 하부측에 중간몸통부(11)의 직경 보다 큰 원형 또는 다각 형태로 된 하단걸림부(19)로 구성되고, 상기 랩 아날로그(10)의 내면부는, 상기 상부테두리부(15)의 내측면 상에 형성되는 하향축소경사면(15b)과, 상기 하향축소경사면(15b)의 하단부에서 수직하향연장되는 고정면(23)과, 상기 고정면(23)의 하단에 내향수평형성되는 제1단턱부(22)와, 상기 제1단턱부(22)의 하부측에 제1단턱부(22) 보다 소폭으로 수직하향 형성되는 암나사부(26)로 구성되며, 상기 랩 아날로그(10)의 상부에 결합되는 어버트먼트(30); 상기 어버트먼트(30)의 외면부는, 상부측에 하향확개 형태로 상부체(31)가 형성되고, 상기 상부체(31)의 하단부에서 하향축소 형태로 중간몸체(35)가 형성되며, 상기 중간몸체(35)의 하단부에서 내향수평단턱부(36)가 형성되고, 상기 내향수평단턱부(36)의 하단부에서 하향축소 형태로 경사밀착부(37)가 형성되며, 상기 경사밀착부(37)의 하단부에서 수직하향으로 고정부(39)가 형성되고, 상기 어버트먼트(30)의 내면부는, 상단측(41)에서부터 하단측(45)까지 수직관통공(42)이 형성되고, 상기 수직관통공(42)의 내면 상에 내향수평단턱부(34)가 형성되며, 상기 어버트먼트(30)의 상부에 관통삽입되어 랩 아날로그(10)에 결합고정되면서 랩 아날로그(10) 상에서 어버트먼트(30)의 위치를 고정지지하는 스크류(50); 상기 스크류(50)는 원형의 중간몸체부(54)가 형성되고, 상기 중간몸체부(54)의 상부측에 중간몸체부(54)의 직경 보다 큰 직경으로 확장되어 하부측에 수평단턱부(53)를 갖는 머리부(52)가 형성되며, 상기 중간몸체부(54)의 하부측에 중간몸체부(54)의 직경 보다 작은 직경으로 수직하향되게 수나사부(56)가 형성되고, 상기 잇몸부(2) 상의 상부측에 하향축소경사면(4)을 갖는 원형의 체결공(3)이 하향 연장 형성되고, 상기 하향축소경사면(4)의 하단부에서 수직하향으로 원형의 수직결합면(7)이 형성되며, 상기 잇몸부(2) 상의 하부측에 상기 원형 또는 다각 형태로 된 하단걸림부(19)의 형태에 대응되도록 형성된 하부걸림지지홈(5)이 체결공(3)의 직경 보다 크게 형성되어, 상기 랩 아날로그(10)는 잇몸부(2)의 하부측 하부걸림지지홈(5) 측에서부터 상부측으로 상향 삽입진입되어 랩 아날로그(10)의 중간몸통부(11)는 잇몸부(2)의 수직결합면(7)에 밀착되면서 상기 하부걸림지지홈(5) 내에 랩 아날로그(10)의 하단걸림부(19)가 회전방지되도록 걸림지지된 상태에서, 상기 잇몸부(2)가 연화되면서 중간몸통부(11) 상에 방사상으로 형성된 만곡홈부(12) 내에 확장밀착되게 하고, 상기 잇몸부(2)의 하부측에 랩 아날로그(10)가 삽입된 상태에서 잇몸부(2)의 상부측 체결공(3)에서부터 하부측으로 어버트먼트(30)를 삽입하여 상기 랩 아날로그(10)의 상부측 일부에 결합밀착되면서 랩 아날로그(10)의 제1단턱부(22) 상에 어버트먼트(30)의 내향수평단턱부(36)가 안착지지되고, 상기 랩 아날로그(10)의 고정면(23) 내에 어버트먼트(30)의 고정부(39)가 밀착고정되며, 상기 랩 아날로그(10)의 하향축소경사면(15b) 상에 어버트먼트(30)의 경사밀착부(37)가 밀착지지되고, 상기 어버트먼트(30)의 상부 내측으로 스크류(50)를 삽입하여 상기 스크류(50)의 수평단턱부(53)가 어버트먼트(30)의 내향수평단턱부(34)에 안착지지되고, 상기 스크류(50)의 수나사부(56)가 랩 아날로그(10)의 암나사부(26)에 체결되도록 함으로써, 상기 잇몸부(2) 상에 랩 아날로그(10), 어버트먼트(30) 및 스크류(50)가 일체 고정되도록 구성하는 것을 특징으로 한다.

column12: Apparatus and method for controlling scheduling in mobile communication system
column13: A scheduling apparatus and method are capable of maximizing efficiency of trunk line usage and preventing queue congestion when a trunk line is used in a mobile communication system. A variable bandwidth management service for allocating more bandwidth to a queue with greater traffic is provided so that allocation of bandwidth can be made flexibly. A scheduler calculates actually provided class information and performs scheduling according to a current scheduling ratio, thereby preventing congestion of a specific queue.

column12: SLIDING DEVICE
column13: A sliding device is provided to reduce the strength necessary for a sliding operation by minimizing the friction in the sliding operation. A sliding module(100) is placed between a main unit and a cover unit, and a mutual sliding operation between the main unit and the cover unit is enabled as the main unit and the cover unit are coupled to one and the other portion of the sliding module. The sliding module includes a base member(110) and a sliding member(120). The sliding member is coupled to the base member, and the sliding member can slide. The main unit is coupled to the base member. A first guide member(112) is formed at the right/left portions of the base member, and a second guide member(122) are formed at the right/left portions of the sliding member.

column12: DIFFERENTIAL GEAR APPARATUS
column13: 본 발명은 링기어와 일체로 구성되는 제1 디퍼렌셜 케이스; 및 상기 제1 디퍼렌셜 케이스에 조립되는 제2 디퍼렌셜 케이스; 를 포함하는 차동 기어 장치를 제공한다.

column12: BIO TRICKLING FILTER SYSTEM
TERMINAL SERVER AND METHODS FOR SUPPORT THE PROVISION OF PUBLIC-SERVICES
column13: A communication terminal device according to one embodiment comprises: a storage unit which stores a program; a communication unit which performs long-range communication and short-range communication with a nearby device through at least one of a mobile communication network and wireless Internet; and a processor unit which loads and executes the program to perform a social service provision supporting method by using an electronic voucher. The method controls the communication unit to perform pairing with a nearby device through the short-range communication, register the paired nearby device as at least one of counterpart devices for the social service, generate pairing status information through the short-range communication with the counterpart device a plurality of times, and transmit supply and demand information of the social service based on the generated pairing status information to a preset destination through the long-range communication. Therefore, it can be checked whether a service recipient and a service provider of the social service are continuously close to each other at the destination receiving the pairing status information from the communication terminal device.

column12: MANUFACTURING METHOD OF SEASONED WALLEYE POLLOCK
column13: The present invention relates to a method for producing seasoned dried Pollack strips. More specifically, the method comprises: a seasoning mixture manufacturing step of mixing water, brown sugar, starch syrup, fresh cream, red pepper powder, brewed soy sauce and oyster sauce; a seasoning application step of applying the seasoning mixture prepared in the seasoning mixture manufacturing step to dried Pollack strips; a stir-fry step of stir-frying pollack strips coated with seasoning through the seasoning application step; and a drying step of drying the fried pollack strips through the roasting step. The seasoned dried pollack strips prepared through the method not only improve taste, texture and preference significantly, but also exhibit excellent preservability due to the low moisture content thereof.
column32: 술안주도 되고 밥반찬도 되는 황태채볶음 만들기. 네이버 블로그. 2019.03.06. [2023.11.03. 검색]. 인터넷: <URL: https://blog.naver.com/28ssan/221475009295>*;;쌈장 황태채무침만드는법 NO마요네즈. 네이버 블로그. 2013.08.23. [2023.11.03. 검색]. 인터넷: <URL: https://blog.naver.com/lovekimsumi/90179685910>*

column12: DYNAMIC PCC PROVISIONING CONTROL SYSTEM, APPARATUS AND METHOD
column13: PURPOSE: A dynamic PCC(Policy And Charging Control) provisioning control system, a device, and a method are provided to implement limit inquiries with OCS(Online Charging System) only about CC(Charging Characteristic) defining the inquiring condition of the OCS, thereby reducing unnecessary PCC or OCS inquiries. CONSTITUTION: An HSS(Home Subscriber Server) or an HLR(Home Location Resister)(104) provides the registered CC information per subscriber of a terminal device connected to a communication network. A PDN-GW(Packet Data Network Gateway)(110) analyzes the characteristics of a call from the terminal device using the provided CC information. The PDN-GW implements the PCC against the call according to the PCC set-up information corresponding to the characteristics of the call. The PDN-GW previously stores a CC table in which the PCC set-up information is defined.

column12: THREE DIMENSIONAL PRINTER WITH ROTATABLE PRINTING BED
column13: The present invention relates to uses of both sides of a printer bed of a three-dimensional printer. By using a device which can rotate the printing bed in the horizontal direction, the present invention aims to have the capability of printing a plurality of objects on the other side without delays, by rotating the bed once printing on one side is finished. When performing double-side printing, the maximum printing height is limited so as not to exceed the maximum turning radius. When a height exceeding the maximum is printed, the software or device sends a signal notifying that the double-sided printing cannot be executed. When using the printer of the present invention to print multiple prototypes, even when the multiple prototypes cannot be printed at once, being able to simply rotate the printing bed without needing to remove the printed object, or confirm and pre-heat can provide convenience for the user and reduce the operating time required. Also, using the rotatable-type bed does not require altering the outer appearance and size of the three-dimensional printer.

column12: Manufacturing method of slotted waveguide array antennas for DSRC using double-sided dielectric PCB
column13: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing a waveguide slot array antenna is provided to reduce resistance loss and dielectric loss and prevent radiation loss, while allowing for ease of adjustment of polarization angle. CONSTITUTION: A double-sided dielectric substrate has a bottom surface where slots(2) are formed, and a top surface where strip patch lines(1) are formed in such a manner that the strip patch lines are arranged perpendicularly to the slots. A micro patch array antenna(5) is mounted on a waveguide(3) in such a manner that the micro patch array antenna covers the top surface of the waveguide. The micro patch array antenna and the waveguide are connected with each other through a rivet(4).
column14: CHOI SANG HOON;;GNT WORKS CO LTD

column12: HOTEL NETWORK SYSTEM PROVIDED WITH ROOM CONTROL AND ON-LINE SERVICE WITH INTERNET DISPLAYPHONE AND SERVICE METHOD IN SAID SYSTEM
column13: A hotel network system capable of a room control and an online service using an internet video phone and a service method thereof are provided to perform room automation within a room by using an internet video phone including a function such as a home server. A server farm(20) comprises a plurality of servers. A hotel common part management system comprises a CCTV(Closed Cable TV) terminal, a parking control terminal, an elevator call managing terminal and POS(Point Of Sale) terminal. A network switch(50) connects a gateway(10), the server farm and terminals of the hotel common part management system. An internet image telephone(60) is connected to a network switch through the room terminal box(70). The function of the internet video call and regular telephone is provided. All kinds of the rooms devices controlled through the wire/wireless network are controlled.

column12: BODY FIGURE CURING SLANT FOOTWEAR
column13: The present invention relates to a body figure curing footwear, and more particularly to a body figure curing slant footwear which prevents and cures symptoms such as inwardly curved knee (bow leg) by balancing a body upon walking by slantly forming a part of front portion of footwear sole.

column12: METHOD FOR MAKING DOCUMENT SCORE USING BOOK SEARCH AND SYSTEM FOR EXECUTING THE METHOD
column13: A method for generating a document score used for searching a book and a system for the same are provided to generate a document score for evaluating the quality of a document for the searched book and rank books of high quality to an upper side of a book search result page based on the document score, thereby improving the quality of a search result. A sale score generator(610) generates a sale score based on a sale index and bibliography information of a book. A document length score generator(620) generates a document length score based on the bibliography information. A document score generator(630) generates a document score based on the sale and document length score. The document score is a score for evaluating the quality of a user query and ranking of the search result is determined based on the document score. The sale score generator includes a generator(611) and a penalty weight assigner(612) assigning penalty weight to the sale score based on the bibliography information. The document length score generator includes a character string comparator(621) comparing the length of a character string related to the bibliography information with the length of a predetermined character string and a comparison result processor(622).

column12: intensity adjustable motor band
column13: 본 발명은 강도 조절 가능한 운동 밴드에 관한 것으로서 밴드 손잡이 에 의하여 손잡이의 위치를 이동해 운동의 강도를 조절할 수 있게 함으로써 밴드의 장력이 변하지 않아 항상 운동의 강도를 조절할 수 없는 문제점을 해소하도록 함으로써 기존의 밴드의 장력이 변하지 않아 항상 운동의 강도를 조절할 수 없는 문제점을 해소 하도록 한 것이다.즉 본 발명은, 테라밴드에 있어서 탄력있는 밴드로 근력운동을 할 수 있게 긴 고무 밴드 형태로 형성한 밴드, 손잡이의 위치를 이동해 운동의 강도를 조절할 수 있게 밴드의 양 끝에 위치해 위치를 조절할 수 있도록 구성한 밴드 손잡이 으로 구성한 것이다.따라서, 본 발명은 밴드 손잡이 에 의하여 손잡이의 위치를 이동해 운동의 강도를 조절할 수 있게 함으로써 밴드의 장력이 변하지 않아 항상 운동의 강도를 조절할 수 없는 문제점을 해소하도록 함으로써 기존의 밴드의 장력이 변하지 않아 항상 운동의 강도를 조절할 수 없는 문제점을 해소하도록 한 효과를 갖는 것이다.

column12: SUPER ABSORBENT POLYMER DRYING APPARATUS AND DRYING METHOD USING THE SAME
column13: A super absorbent polymer drying apparatus according to an embodiment of the present invention includes: a conveyor belt for moving a bed (BED) containing a super absorbent polymer in one direction; a first drying unit for drying the upper portion of the bed moving along the conveyor belt; and a second drying unit for drying the lower portion of the bed that has passed through the first drying unit. One or more roll structures can be disposed on the top of the bed in the second drying unit.

column12: Method of transferring Semiconductor Device
column13: The present invention provides a method for transferring a semiconductor device, which comprises the processes of: forming a release layer on a carrier substrate, and forming a semiconductor device on the release layer; preparing a base substrate having a conductive adhesive layer formed thereon; positioning the carrier substrate on the base substrate to allow the semiconductor device to face the conductive adhesive layer; and irradiating a laser beam on the carrier substrate to separate the semiconductor device from the release layer, and seating the same on the conductive adhesive layer. The process of positioning the carrier substrate on the base substrate includes a process of separating the semiconductor device from the conductive adhesive layer at a predetermined interval without being in contact therewith. Also, the process of irradiating the laser beam includes a process of irradiating the release layer with the laser beam after passing through the carrier substrate to swell an area of the release layer irradiated with the laser beam. Therefore, the semiconductor device can be transferred to a desired location on the base substrate of an electronic device.
column32: Jing Bian et al., “Laser Transfer, Printing, and Assembly Techniques for Flexible Electronics”, Adv. Electron. Mater., Vol.5, 1800900( https://doi.org/10.1002/aelm.201800900) (2019.05.13.) 1부.*

column12: Manufacturing method of flooring material and flooring material manufactured by the method
column13: 본 발명은 마루바닥재의 제조방법 및 그 방법에 의하여 제조된 마루바닥재에 관한 것으로, 더욱 상세하게 설명하면, 초박판 고밀도 섬유판의 일면에 직접 마루용 제품으로 사용가능한 내마모도에 적합한 나무문양 모양지를 배치하고 LPM(Low Pressure Melamin) 공법으로 가공시켜 상기 모양지와 초박판 고밀도 섬유판이 일체화되게 접착시키고 상기 모양지의 상부면에는 치장마감층이 형성되고 하부면에는 상기 섬유판과 불규칙한 경계면이 형성되게 일체화되게 접착시킨 후 바로 합판위에 상기 일체화된 섬유판을 적층시켜 배치하고 고압프레스로 합판과 초박판 고밀도 섬유판을 한번의 접착작업을 통해서 반제품을 만든 다음, 혀와 홈을 가공하여 시공시 서로 인접한 마루바닥재끼리 쉽게 시공할 수 있게 제조하여 별도의 치장마감재를 접착하거나 도장작업이 없이 바로 섬유판이 합판에 접착되면서도 상기 섬유판의 일면에는 치장마감층이 형성되어 제조가가 저렴하고 제조공정이 단축되어 제조시간이 절감되는 것이 가능하고, 치장마감층이 섬유판과 일체화가 되도록 섬유판에 침지결합된 상태에서 경화되므로 치장마감층이 벗겨지지 않게 되어 내구성이 길어져 수리비가 없이 장기간을 사용할 수가 있는 우수한 마루바닥재 및 그 방법에 의하여 제조된 마루바닥재의 제조방법에 관한 것이다.

column12: Beam scanning device for an electronic photography type printer
column13: A scanning device for an electronic photography printer which comprises a photosensitive drum, a rotary cylinder horizontally disposed and provided with spiral slits which are spaced from one another, an LED array horizontally penetrating the inside of the rotary cylinder and having a plurality of LEDs which are disposed on the LED array and each having a width of the same distance as the space between respective spiral slits of the rotary cylinder, a horizontal slit plate disposed between the photosensitive drum and the rotary cylinder and having a plurality of slits which are inclined on the basis of the horizontal line of the horizontal slit plate and spaced from one another, and a self-focus lens array horizontally disposed between the photosensitive drum and the horizontal slit plate.

column12: Protection facilities for maintenance of fire hydrant boxes in road tunnels and hydrant boxes include this same
column13: The present invention relates to a protection facility for maintenance of a fire hydrant in a road tunnel and a fire hydrant including the same. An objective of the present invention is to check left and right roads of a hydrant box together even if a worker does not turn his/her head and looks at one side when the worker checks the fire hydrant installed in the road tunnel while moving along the road tunnel, and prevents the worker from falling into the road is to prevent The protection facility for the maintenance of the fire hydrant in the road tunnel according to the present invention comprises: a fixation plate (110) inserted and fixed inside a main body of the fire hydrant installed in the road tunnel; a mirror (120) which is slidably or rotationally connected to the fixation plate and is inserted into the main body (11) of the fire hydrant and projects outside the main body of the fire hydrant when necessary to illuminate the road; and a safety bar (130) fixed in the main body of the fire hydrant through the fixation plate and fixed with a worker's safety wire. One side of the safety bar is connected to the fixation plate and the other side is supported on an inner wall of the main body of the fire hydrant opposite to the fixation plate through a length-adjustable fastener. The fixation plate is installed on left or right sides of the main body of the fire hydrant. An operator can directly check the road in front of the mirror while looking at the mirror, and simultaneously check the road behind the mirror through the mirror.

column12: WATER-SOLUBLE ELECTRICALLY CONDUCTIVE POLYMERS
column13: PURPOSE: Water-soluble electrically conductive polymers are provided to allow the polymer to be stable at high temperature since hydrophilic side chains are covalently bonded to the conductive polymers, thereby prolonging the stability of electrical conductivity and to enable the change of the conductivity depending on the concentration of hydrophilic side chains. CONSTITUTION: A polymer comprises at least one repeating unit of formula 1 and formula 2, wherein A and B are independently at least one member selected from the group consisting of phenylene, phenylene vinylene, pyrrolylene, pyrrolylene vinylene, thienylene, thienylene vinylene, fluorenylene, fluorenylene vinylene, furanylene, furanylene vinylene, phenothiazinylene, phenothiazinylene vinylene, phenazinylene, phenazinylene vinylene, phenoxazinylene and phenoxazinylene vinylene, which are unsubstituted or substituted with one or more substituents; R1 represents formula A and R2 represents formula B; R3, R4, R5, R6, R7 and R8 are independently hydrogen, alkyl, ammonium or formula C with the proviso that at least one of R3, R4, R5, R6, R7 and R8 is ammonium or formula D; K represents alkylene having one or two carbon; d is 1 to 3; R9 is hydroxyl, carboxylic acid, sulfonic acid, or a straight or branched alkyl which is unsubstituted or substituted with hydroxyl; and the polymer has a degree of polymerization of 100 to 1,000.

column12: wallet provided with magic function
column13: The present invention relates to a wallet having a magical function. Using inflammable liquid and a piezoelectric element, one side of a business card burn right after a user takes out the business card and then is extinguished, offering a counselee with visual effects and changing atmosphere. By creating flame on the business card, it is possible to gain flavor and increase efficiency in counseling.

column12: COUNTING APPARATUS OF MEDICAL EXAMIMATION STICK
column13: PURPOSE: A diagnosis stick quantity measuring device is provided to measure a quantity corresponding to the thickness of overlapped diagnosis sticks by measuring a quantity corresponding to a height of the laminated diagnosis sticks and vertically standing the diagnosis sticks. CONSTITUTION: Stoppers(22,22') temporarily stop a transferred loading bay(10) at a limited number. The stoppers stop or move diagnosis sticks. A first quantity measuring unit(24) measures a height of the diagnosis sticks laminated on the stopped loading bay by using an optical sensor. A second physical quantity measuring unit measures a quantity corresponding to the thickness of the overlapped diagnosis in a rack by using a cylinder rod.

column12: 1/2 Equipment of antenna feeding circuits in half-height waveguide
column13: PURPOSE: An antenna module for receiving an antenna feeder circuit is provided to reduce the size of the antenna module by integrating the RF module and waveguide antenna. CONSTITUTION: A waveguide antenna has spaces designed to have the ratio of 4:1, and the other space which is not occupied by a waveguide(10) includes a saved space(13) for accommodation of an RF module(9). A feeding point(11) is mounted in the waveguide, and connected to the RF module accommodated in the saved space, to thereby obtain a waveguide antenna module accommodating a feeder circuit.
column14: CHOI SANG HOON;;GNT WORKS CO LTD

column12: Multi-display system and display apparatus
column13: A multi-display system includes a plurality of display apparatuses capable of mutual data communication, and at least one of the plurality of display apparatuses receives predetermined control information from a user and transmits the control information to another display apparatus. The display apparatus can be remotely controlled without a central computer.

column12: CHARACTER NOTE STUDYING APPARATUS
column13: The present invention relates to a device for learning characters, capable of easily obtaining characters, by enabling children, illiterates, or people who start to learn characters of foreign country to visually and audibly recognize each character and order of a stroke of a character, which comprises: a video output unit for outputting a character to be learned to a video; a voice output unit for outputting a voice corresponding to the character outputted from the video output unit; a sensing unit for sensing a state of writing the character to be learned by a learner; and a distinguishing unit for distinguishing whether to be accurately written with respect to the written character sensed in the sensing unit. The video and voice output in the video output unit and the voice output unit are capable of recognizing the character to be learned by the learner in advance, by performing in the sensing unit before being sensed.

column12: METHOD FOR BOOTING APPLICATION PROGRAM IN DIGITAL DEVICE
TECHNIQUES FOR ADJUSTING HYPERPARAMETERS OF A STORE DEMAND FORECASTING MODEL
column13: According to an embodiment of the present disclosure, disclosed are a method of adjusting hyperparameters of a store demand forecasting model. A method of adjusting hyperparameters of a store demand forecasting model includes the steps of: calculating the accuracy of the pre-learned store demand prediction model at a preset time interval; and determining whether to adjust the hyperparameters of the pre-learned store demand prediction model based on the accuracy. Therefore, it is possible to provide customer analysis and sales forecasting information using an accurate demand forecasting model.

column12: TWO STAGE OF HYDRAULIC REDUCTION GEAR BOX
KEYPAD ASSEMBLY AND MOBILE TELEPHONE TERMINAL
column13:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a keypad assembly on which many keys can be arranged and which can improve structural strength and a mobile communication terminal having the keypad assembly.

SOLUTION: The keypad assembly 400 comprises a base pad 410 having a prescribed area, a plurality of first keys K4 arranged on the base pad 410 and a plurality of second keys K5 arranged in respective unit areas defined by the center line of the first keys K4 in a row direction and the center line of the first keys K4 in a column direction and respectively having a shape corresponding to the shapes of the respective unit areas. This reinforces the structural strength of the terminal and many keys can be arranged on the keypad assembly.
