column12: RF module structure of mobile communication terminal
column13: The radio frequency (RF) part of a mobile communication terminal is separately modularized so that an RF multi-chip module (RF MCM) can easily support communication services even in locations where different frequencies are used, by replacing the RF module which is designed to correspond to the appropriate frequency for that location. The RF MCM includes a ceramic laminated board; a plurality of RF components mounted on the ceramic laminated board; and a cap for isolating the RF components from the exterior envionment.

column12: Wear Test Apparatus
column13: The present invention relates to a wear testing apparatus comprising: a movement module wherein a plurality of cleaning rubbers cleaning a nozzle of a semiconductor producing device are coupled and which moves the plurality of cleaning rubbers; a movement rail coupled to the movement module and wherein the movement module slidingly moves; a wear inspection unit which is disposed at an upper part of the movement rail and can move up and down, and abuts the cleaning rubbers moving along the movement rail and presses the cleaning rubbers; and a control module controlling a movement range, a movement speed, and a movement number of the movement module, and a descending degree of the wear inspection unit which presses the cleaning rubbers by manipulation of a user. According to the present invention, abrasion resistance can be tested by applying various parameters to increase test accuracy.

column12: ELECTROLYTE LAYER FORMING METHOD OF SOLID ELECTROLYTIC CONDENSER
column13: PURPOSE: Method for forming an electrolytic layer of a solid electrolytic condenser is provided to lower the value of Equivalent Series Resistance by reducing the number of porosity formed in a conductive high polymer. CONSTITUTION: In the method for forming an electrolytic layer of a solid electrolytic condenser, an oxidation film(14) is formed on a surface of valve metal such as tantalum or aluminum and the electrolytic layer is formed there above. A high polymer layer(16) is formed on the surface of the oxidation film(14) by using an electrolytic polymerization of a monomer such as pyrrole, thiophene, furan, aliline, acethylene, etc. The porosities(18) in the high polymer layer(16) are impregnated with the hetero cyclic compound such as polypyrrole, polythiophene polyfuran which are melted by a solvent such as NMP, chlorotorn, aceton, methanol, DMSO. After impregnation of the hetero cyclic compound, the porosities(18) are removed by the volatilization of the solvent.

column12: CHECK OUT METHOD AND SYSTEM
column13: A method and a system for performing check-out of a guestroom are provided to enable a guest to conveniently perform the check-out in the guestroom at desired time with a guestroom terminal by managing use particular information in a main server whenever the guest uses each facility of the guestroom. Each facility control server(22) generates facility use particular information representing particulars using the facilities installed in each guestroom. A main server(10) stores guestroom information including settlement information of the guest and updates guestroom use particular information by receiving the facility use particular information from each facility control server. If a check-out request signal is received from each guestroom terminal(52-1~52-n), the main server transmits the settlement information and the guestroom use particular information to the guestroom terminal, and performs the check-out and generates check-out particular information by receiving a settlement confirmation signal from the guestroom terminal.

column12: BEVERAGE FEEDER, CONCERNED WITH SEALING UP BEVERAGE COLDLY AND WARMLY
column13: PURPOSE: A beverage feeder is provided to maximize the efficiency of refrigeration and thermal insulation for beverage by sealing up beverage coldly and warmly. CONSTITUTION: A beverage feeder includes a beverage container(110), a cooler/heater portion, and a bucket-type feeder(120). The beverage container contains beverages arranged to be slant with respect to the container and is made of a sealing member to isolate the feeder from an outer atmosphere. The cooler/heater portion is implemented at a lower portion of the beverage container. The bucket-type feeder is implemented in the beverage container.

column12: DISPLAY APPARATUS AND THE USING RESTRICTION METHOD THEREOF
PHOTOVOLTAIC DEVICES
column13: A photovoltaic device includes a photoactive layer which has at least one embossed pattern on a surface thereof. This embossed pattern varies traveling directions of light in the photoactive layer.
column14: UNIV KOREA RES & BUS FOUND;;CHOI DONG HOON

column12: WASTEBASKET FOR SEPARATE COLLECTION
column13: 본 발명은, 쓰레기통 몸체의 상부에서 덮개부를 회전하여 상기 쓰레기통 몸체의 상부에 형성된 쓰레기 투입구를 개폐한 상태에서, 쓰레기통 몸체의 전면에서 비닐 봉투를 용이하게 결합 및 분리할 수 있도록 한 분리수거용 쓰레기통과 관련된 다양한 실시예들이 기술된 바, 한 실시예에 따르면, 분리수거용 쓰레기통은, 그 내부에 쓰레기를 수거하는 수거 공간이 형성된 쓰레기통 몸체; 상기 쓰레기통 몸체의 상부에 개방되어 형성되고, 상기 쓰레기를 상기 수거 공간으로 유도하는 쓰레기 투입구; 상기 쓰레기통 몸체의 상부에 회전가능하게 결합되고, 회전에 따라 상기 쓰레기 투입구를 개폐하는 덮개부; 상기 쓰레기통 몸체의 상부에 배치되고, 상기 덮개부의 회전에 따라 외부에 노출되며, 외부에 노출시 비닐 봉투의 상부를 걸어 고정하거나 걸림을 해제하는 걸림 부재; 상기 쓰레기통 몸체의 전면의 적어도 일부에 개방되어 형성되고, 상기 걸림 부재에서 걸림이 해제된 상기 비닐 봉투를 상기 수거 공간에서 배출시키는 배출구; 및 상기 쓰레기통 몸체의 전면에 회전가능하게 결합되고, 상기 비닐 봉투를 상기 배출구로부터 배출하기 위해 회전에 따라 상기 배출구를 개폐하는 개폐 도어부;를 포함할 수 있으며, 이외에도 다양한 다른 실시예들이 가능하다.

column12: PORTABLE SHADING THE LIGHT DEVICE
column13: The present invention relates to a portable light shielding device. The portable light shielding device includes: a folding unit including multiple support plated to move in a hinge rotation motion in a radial direction; supports which are coupled to the tip of each of the support plates on the folding unit and are installed on the ground in the vertical direction; and a light shielding film installed on the upper end of each of the supports. The folding unit is configured to move the support plates in a hinge rotation motion to fold the support plates as a unit to simplify the structure of the portable light shielding device. Accordingly, the portable light shielding device can be easily installed or dismantled, fold the folding unit to minimize the volume, and be stored and carried around easily.

column12: AXLE DEVICE OR VEHICLE
column13: 차량용 액슬장치에 대한 발명이 개시된다. 개시된 차량용 액슬장치는: 내부에 제1전동기 카운터 샤프트가 회전가능하게 설치되며, 제1전동기 카운터 샤프트와 맞물려 결합되는 제1전동기 인풋기어와, 윤활유를 이송시키는 오일펌프가 설치되고, 윤활유가 공급되는 제1전동기 하우징부와; 제1전동기 하우징부와 결합되고, 내부에 차동기어가 설치되며, 윤활유가 공급되는 액슬하우징부와; 액슬하우징부와 결합되고, 내부에 제1전동기 카운터 샤프트와 연결되는 썬기어샤프트와, 썬기어샤프트와 맞물려 결합되는 유성기어부와, 하이포이드 기어의 일단부가 설치되며, 윤활유가 공급되는 유성기어 하우징부와; 내부에 썬기어샤프트와 연결되는 제2전동기 하이기어와, 제2전동기 하이기어와 맞물려 결합되는 제2전동기 인풋기어가 설치되고, 하이포이드 기어의 타단부가 설치되며, 윤활유가 공급되는 제2전동기 하우징부와; 제1전동기 하우징부, 액슬하우징부, 유성기어 하우징부 및 제2전동기 하우징부 중 적어도 어느 하나에 설치되며, 윤활유의 수위를 상승시키는 윤활유수위상승부와; 윤활유수위상승부를 작동시키는 작동부;를 포함하는 것을 특징으로 한다.

column12: OIL COOLER
column13: The present invention relates to an oil cooler comprising: a pair of header tanks (100) installed to be spaced from each other by a predetermined distance in a longitudinal direction; a plurality of tubes (200) of which both longitudinal ends are fixated to each header tank (100) to have a flow passage; a heat dissipation fin (300) interposed between the tubes (200); a first flange (500) where an inlet pipe (410) and an outlet pipe (420) are coupled in a longitudinal direction; a second flange (600) coupled to one header tank (100) in a longitudinal direction; a bypass valve (700) installed between the first flange (500) and the second flange (600); and a fixing bolt (800) penetrating the first flange (500), the bypass valve (700), and the second flange (600) in a longitudinal direction to be fastened. The present invention prevents a decrease in the fastening power of a bolt and prevents damage to the bolt.

column12: CONTROLLER FOR DRIVING APC AND METHOD THEREOF
ELECTOLITIC LAYER FORMING METHOD OF SOLID ELECTROLITIC CONDENSER
column13: PURPOSE: A method to form an electrolytic layer of a solid electrolytic condenser is provided to improve the quality of high-frequency and to realize the low Equivalent Series Resistance value of an electrolytic condenser by reducing the porosity between the electrolytic layers. CONSTITUTION: A method to form electrolytic layer of a solid electrolytic condenser comprises the steps of: filling the porosity(18) inside manganese dioxide layer(16) by melting, impregnating the multiple ring aromatic compound as polyisothianaphthene and polyazulene with NMP, chloroform, acetone, methanol and DMSO solvents and then putting the fillers out; forming a high-molecule layer(16) by removing the porosity by volatilizing only the solvent.

column12: PASSIVATION SENSING CIRCUIT FOR SEMICONDUCTOR CHIP
column13: 본 발명은 반도체 소자의 패시베이션 감지 회로에 관한 것으로 패시베이션을 제거하고 칩을 동작시키는 경우 이를 감지하기 위한 패시베이션 감지 회로에 관한 것으로 상기 목적 달성을 위하여 전원 전압을 감지하여 패시베이션 감지 회로부를 인에이블 시키기 위한 펄스를 발생시키는 패시베이션 감지 회로 인에이블 신호 발생 수단과, 상기 패시베이션 감지 회로 인에이블 신호 발생 회로부의 출력신호에 의해 동작되어 패시베이션의 존재 유무를 감지하기 위한 패시베이션 감지 회로 수단을 구비한다.

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING LOCATION INFORMATION OF TERMINAL
column13: PURPOSE: A terminal position information supplying device and a method thereof are provided to accurately measure and supply position information such as cell information when a mobile terminal is in an idle state in an evolved packet core (Evolved Packet Core) network. CONSTITUTION: When the measurement of a position of a mobile terminal is requested, a paging processing unit (141) performs paging on the mobile terminal according to state information of the mobile terminal in an idle state of the mobile terminal. The paging processing unit processes paging response caused by the mobile terminal. A position information grasp unit (143) receives position information of the mobile terminal grasped according to the processing of the paging response by corresponding to request. The paging processing unit determines the idle state according to state information of the mobile terminal included in subscriber data stored in a subscriber database in advance. [Reference numerals] (141) Paging processing unit; (143) Position information grasp unit; (145) Movement management unit

column12: CAMERA MODULE
column13: Provided is a camera module capable of quickly performing an auto-focus adjusting function. The camera module of the present invention comprises: a first camera unit for adjusting a focal distance; a second camera unit having a fixed focal distance; and an actuator for obtaining a resolution value of an image photographed by the second camera unit, and driving a lens barrel of the first camera unit to adjust the focal distance of the first camera unit according to the obtained resolution value.

column12: APPARATUS FOR GENERATING TEMPLATE
column13: PURPOSE: A template generating device is provided to eliminate a manual work time of a worker by automatically generating a template image to be matched in the arrangement of two images. CONSTITUTION: An edge extracting unit(20) generates each edge extraction image from an input image. An edge map generating unit(30) generates an edge map converted into first blobs by using a final edge score value. A template generating unit(40) converts the matching of the image and each template candidate image for the first blobs into second blobs. The template generating unit selects template candidate images extracted from the second blobs having the calculated matching value satisfying an examination condition as final template images. [Reference numerals] (10) Image input unit; (20) Edge extracting unit; (30) Edge map generating unit; (40) Template generating unit; (50) Storage unit; (60) Image output unit; (70) Control unit

column12: METHOD FOR FORMING ELECTROLYTE LAYER OF SOLID ELECTROLYTIC CONDENSER
column13: PURPOSE: A method for forming an electrolyte layer of a solid electrolytic condenser is provided to decrease a porosity of the electrolyte layer for realizing a low equivalent series resistance value of the electrolytic condenser and improving a characteristic of a high-frequency wave. CONSTITUTION: A method for forming an electrolyte layer of a solid electrolytic condenser comprises: filling a porosity(18) existing in a manganese dioxide layer(16) with other elements(S, NH) substituted for a C6 cyclic compound or a hydrogen(H) in a C6 cyclic compound for polymerizing a high molecule compound such as a soluble conductive high molecule polyaniline, polyphenylene sulfide, and polyphenylene dissolved in NMP, chlorotorn, acetone, methanol, and DMSO solvent for infiltrating; and pulling out for volatilizing the solvent for eliminating the porosity to form a high molecule electrolyte layer.

column12: MANUFACTURING METHOD OF BUNCHUNGSAGI BY SMOKE-FLARE METHOD UNDER THE HIGH TEMPERATURE
column13: The present invention relates to a method for manufacturing grayish-blue powdered celadon using a high temperature smoke-flare technique, and specifically, to a method for manufacturing grayish-blue powdered celadon, which contains ceramics of high durability to be used for decorative purposes and also for real life, and has irregular cracks unique to each ceramics to be produced so as to have very excellent degree of aesthetic completion. According to the present invention, the manufacturing grayish-blue powdered celadon of the present invention is formed with rough sandy clay containing an iron powder, the high temperature smoke-flare technique is used, a sequential firing process is performed, a glaze using a pine tree containing an oak tree and the iron powder is used, irregular cracks unique to each product are formed to manufacture the ceramics showing transparent and bright color of emerald, and the durability thereof is high to be used in real life.

column12: VALVE STRUCTURE OF SHOCK ABSORBER
column13: PURPOSE: A valve structure of a shock absorber is provided to increase the variation degree of damping force by opening a rebound disk accordingly if the pressure of working fluids increases with the acceleration of a piston rod. CONSTITUTION: A valve structure of a shock absorber includes a piston rod(102) installed to make a reciprocating motion in a cylinder(100), and a piston valve(200) installed to the end of the piston rod to generate damping force. The piston valve includes a piston body(124) provided with one or more compression passages(126) and one or more rebound passages(125), a compression valve device(140) arranged on the upper part of the piston body to generate damping force against the pressure of working fluids passing through the compression passage, and a rebound valve device(150) arranged on the lower part of the piston body to generate damping force against the pressure of working fluids passing through the rebound passage.

column12: IC IC transmission characteristics Matching Design Method
column13: The present invention relates to an IC transmission characteristic matching design method. More specifically, provided is the IC transmission characteristic matching design method which easily matches transmission characteristics between ICs by calculating and predicting level differences or waveform delays which can occur during signal transmission between circuit ICs based on electrical characteristics and passive element values of the ICs.

column12: SILVER DRIVING
column13: A technical field relates to computer program, IT, material, printing and output technology fields, and two-wheeled, electric, passenger, commercial, SUV, van, lorry vehicle industry technology and driving industry technology fields. In accordance with an objective, through the present invention, vehicle drivers and users in a road, a parking lot and a parking facility can be informed of a vehicle driven by an elderly person. To achieve the objective, provided are a printout, a three-dimensional printout, a sign, a picture, an image and a sticker, which can be placed inside or outside a vehicle or can be attached and detached in regard to the driving or parking of a vehicle. (4) In accordance with effects, since drivers are informed when an elderly person is driving a vehicle on a road or parking the vehicle in a parking lot or a parking facility, a car accident on the road or various accidental issues occurring in the parking lot or the parking facility or various big and small conflicts occurring in the road, the parking lot or the parking facility can be prevented, and also, violent language and behavior on the road between drivers, which become more frequent and more serious as time goes by, can be partially solved and prevented through the placement and attachment/detachment of a printout, a three-dimensional printout, a sign, a picture, an image and a sticker, which indicate that an elderly person is driving.

column12: The gap sealing member
column13: The present invention relates to a packing member for sealing a gap, which can be applied to the doorframe of a door, a window, or a temporary wall and, more specifically, to a packing member for sealing a gap, in which an expandable expansion material is charged in a holder body coupled or decoupled and then, a cover coupled to the holder body is removed to fill a space (gap) between the doorframe of the door or the temporary wall and the bottom surface or between the window and a wall to obtain an insulating and soundproof effect, thereby extremely reducing energy consumption. The packing member for sealing a gap of the present invention comprises: the holder body which has a holding portion provided on the outer side of an end of a basket attached to the bottom surface or the window; the cover which is integrated with a fastening portion coupled to the holding portion of the holder body, has a space portion to insert a packing material, and pressurizes and compresses the expansion material inserted into the space portion; and the packing material being expandable and having one surface fixed to the inner side of the holder body by an adhesive.

column12: VENTILATOR FOR PUBLIC TOILET IN FIELD
column13: PURPOSE: A ventilation system for an outdoor bathroom is provided to create an optimal environment by changing the ventilation mode. CONSTITUTION: A ventilation system for an outdoor bathroom comprises a suction fan(10), an intake unit which is connected to the suction fan and consists of an intake duct having an exhaust hole, an exhaust fan(20) which communicates with the outside of an outdoor bathroom, an exhaust unit which exhausts indoor air to the outside of the exhaust fan, a temperature sensor(30) which detects the temperature of the outside air of the outdoor bathroom, and a controller(40) which controls the exhaust fan and suction fan. [Reference numerals] (30) Temperature sensor; (40) Controller; (50) Regenerator

column12: Efficient ATM cell switching method using ATM header having end destination
column13: Efficient ATM (Asynchronous Transfer Mode) cell switching operations for establishing routing paths for ATM cells in an ATM-based network is achieved by using a newly created field indicating an end destination that is added to the front of an ATM cell header. Network delays and processing loads due to unnecessary ATM cell switching operations are reduced, and waste of VPI (Virtual Path Identifier) and VCI (Virtual Channel Identifier) resources is prevented. Such techniques may be applied to a network board requiring frequent ATM cell switching in an ATM-based mobile communication system.
column16: LG ELECTRONICS INC (2004-08-21);;LG NORTEL CO. LTD (2006-07-10)

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR COMPENSATING FREQUENCY OF WIRELESS SYSTEM
column13: An apparatus and a method for compensating a frequency in a zigbee system are provided to improve accuracy of the received packet data by compensating the frequency of a second packet signal by adding the frequency error element of the first packet signal and a frequency error element of the second packet signal. A frequency error measuring unit(230) outputs a frequency error element of a plurality of packet signals received in a interval which is shorter than the preamble section. A frequency compensator(240) receives each frequency error element of a plurality of packet signals from the frequency error measuring unit and compensates the frequency of the plurality of packet signals based on the frequency error element. A preamble or SFD(Start of Frame Delimiter) detector(250) detects whether the plurality of packet signals are included in the preamble or SFD signal. If the first packet signal is included in the preamble or SFD signal, the frequency of the second packet signal is compensated by adding the frequency error elements of the first packet signal and the second packet signal.

column12: Oil cooler
column13: An oil cooler includes a plurality of tubes having both ends each fixed to a pair of header tanks in the length direction to form channels. The oil cooler further includes heat radiation fins, a first flange having an inlet pipe and an outlet pipe each coupled thereto in the length direction, a second flange coupled to any one of the header tanks in the length direction, and a bypass valve installed between the first flange and the second flange. The fixing bolts bolt the first flange, the bypass valve, and the second flange together while penetrating through the first flange, the bypass valve, and the second flange in the length direction.
column16: HALLA VISTEON CLIMATE CONTROL CORP (2015-06-01);;HANON SYSTEMS (2015-07-28)

column12: Composition for cosmetic soft foam and soft foam thereof
column13: 본 발명은 화장료 연질 발포체용 조성물 및 그 연질 발포체에 관한 것으로, 특히 흡수력 증강에 따른 액상료 조성물 침지시 작업효율증가 및 액상조성물 침지/함유량을 증대시킬 수 있음과 동시에 VOC방출량을 현저히 저감시킬 수 있도록 하기 위해 식물성 성분을 함유하여 발포되는 연질 발포체용 조성물 및 이를 이용하여 발포된 연질 발포체에 관한 것으로, 본 발명에서는 폴리올 70~90중량부, 식물성 원료 5~15중량부, 폴리에틸렌글리콜 2~10중량부, 가교제 3~5중량부, 계면안정제 1~3중량부, 산화방지제 1.5~3.5중량부, 3가 아민촉매제 0.05~0.3중량부, 주석촉매제 0.1~0.25중량부, 톨루엔 디이소시아네이트(Tolune Diisocyanate; TDI) 27~35중량부를 포함하여 이루어지는 것을 특징으로 하는 화장료 연질 발포체용 조성물 및 그 연질 발포체가 개시된다.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AUTHENTICATING AND MANAGING PRIVATE INFORMATION ON THE NETWORK
Photochromic material
column13: Photochromic dyes are disclosed. A photochromic dye can include a first photo-reactive group and a second photo-reactive group. A first photochromic reaction can be induced in the first photo-reactive group of the photochromic dye by radiation having a first intensity, and a second photochromic reaction can be induced in the second photo-reactive group of the photochromic dye by radiation having a second intensity. The second intensity may be greater than the first intensity.

column12: Electrically conductive polymers with enhanced conductivity
column13: An electrically conductive polymer linked to conductive nanoparticle is provided. The conductive polymer can include conductive monomers and one or more monomers in the conductive polymer can be linked to a conductive nanoparticle and can include a polymerizable moiety so that it can be incorporated into a polymer chain. The electrically conductive monomer can include a 3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene as a conductive monomer. The electrically conductive polymer having the conductive nanoparticle can be prepared into an electrically conductive layer or film for use in electronic devices.

column12: ELASTIC MEMBER AND SLIDING MODULE HAVING THE SAME
column13: Disclosed is an elastic member that has good durability improved by uniformly distributing stress and that materializes a miniaturization of a device by maximizing space usability. The elastic member includes a first coupling portion, a second coupling portion, and a spiral coil. The first coupling portion is coupled to pivot on the first member of the sliding module and the second coupling portion is coupled to pivot on the second member of the sliding module. The second sliding module may be coupled to slide along the first member. The spiral coil is helically wound from the first coupling portion outwardly and connects the first and second coupling portions with each other. The first coupling portion is disposed to be apart from a reference line passing through both a substantial center of the second coupling portion and an approximate center of the spiral coil with a predetermined distance.
column14: MTX HYBRID CO LTD;;CHOI MYUNG HOON

column12: RF module structure of mobile communication terminal
column13: The radio frequency (RF) part of a mobile communication terminal is separately modularized so that an RF multi-chip module (RF MCM) can easily support communication services even in locations where different frequencies are used, by replacing the RF module which is designed to correspond to the appropriate frequency for that location. The RF MCM includes a ceramic laminated board; a plurality of RF components mounted on the ceramic laminated board; and a cap for isolating the RF components from the exterior envionment.

column12: The premier chair for bus passengers
column13: The present invention relates to a high quality chair for a bus passenger. A passenger chair is seated into a shell (1). A flat frame (20) is installed on an upper portion of a support frame (10) in the passenger chair. A mounting jig (23) is fixed and installed on both sides of one side of the flat frame (20). A lower rail (21) is fixed and installed on both sides of an edge of an upper surface of the flat frame (20). An upper rail (22) is coupled into the lower rail (21). A shaft of a forward/backward motor (50) is connected to the upper rails (22) to simultaneously operate the upper rails (22). A towing frame (30) is assembled on an upper surface of the upper rail (22) by a coupling means. One side of the towing frame (30) is assembled on both sides of a lower portion of a backrest frame (40) by a hinge means such as a hinge. The other side of a link plate (31) is coupled to one side of the lower portion of the backrest frame (40) by a rotation means. One side of the link plate (31) is coupled to a mounting jig (23) fixed and installed on the flat frame (20) by a rotation means. The backrest frame (40) is rotated backwards when the towing frame (30) is moved straight by an operation of the forward/backward motor (50) to adjust a setting angle.

column12: MAGNETO RESISTIVE ELEMENT ELEMENT
column13: A magnetic resistive device of bias-type and method thereof are provided to improve an adhesive force of chip and bias magnet and reliability. The magnetic resistor comprises: a magnetic resistive chip(2) having a via hole formed an electrode; a leadframe(3) fixed to the rear surface of the magnetic resistive chip(2) by soldering; and a complex body(5) having a bias magnet(4) located at the back side of the leadframe(3). The complex body(5) is built-in with a resistive device holder(1), thereby increasing the adhesive force between the chip(2) and the bias magnet(4).

column12: COLOR CATHODE RAY TUBE CAPABLE OF PREVENTING LOCAL DOMING OR HOWLING BY OPTIMIZING CURVATURE OF INNER SURFACE OF PANEL
column13: PURPOSE: A color cathode ray tube is provided to achieve improved drop characteristics and prevent a local doming or howling phenomenon, by optimizing the curvature of an inner surface of a panel. CONSTITUTION: A color cathode ray tube comprises a panel(10) having a substantially flat surface and an inner surface with a predetermined curvature; and a mask spaced apart from the inner surface of the panel, wherein the mask has a plurality of electron beam passing holes. A formula 0.4*Zp(D)<Zp(X)<0.6*Zp(D), and a formula 0.4*Zp(D)<Zp(Y)<0.6*Zp(D) are satisfied, wherein Zp(D) is the height difference between a panel center and an end of effective surface of screen along a diagonal axis, Zp(X) is the height difference between the panel center and an end of effective surface of screen along a longer axis, and Zp(Y) is the height difference between the panel center and an end of effective surface of screen along a shorter axis.

column12: SYSTEM FOR MANAGING ONLINE LEARNING
column13: The present invention relates to an online learning management system, and discloses an online learning management system to enable automatic learning design according to the learner's selection, easily create, manage, and search various content for learning and exams, and increase the security of digital content protection through different protection policies to the user's threat behavior. For example, the system includes: an online learning design unit that provides and manages at least one digital lecture content, and designs online learning for each learner based on the digital lecture contents and the lecture medium; an online learning execution unit that perform online learning for each learner based on the online learning design data generated through the online learning design unit, and conducts at least the type and type of the online test; and an online learning result processing unit that calculates online learning and online test results through the online learning execution unit, and issues online completion certificates in a batch or individual method according to the calculated results.
column14: KORA E LEARNING DEVELOPEMENT INST;;CHOI JI HOON

column12: SITZ BATH FOR TREATMENT
column13: PURPOSE: A sitz bath is provided which shows fomentation and treatment effect by sending steam from various herbal medicines to the affected part. CONSTITUTION: The sitz bath is produced by the following characteristics of: Sealing completely a steam generating device(10) to make cylindrical shape; Making users' hip stay safely at the upper part thereof and binding arrival plate(22) which radially punches steam circulation holes(23) to the inside part thereof; Binding the center axis to the lower part of the plate(22); Preparing an adjusting plate(30) wherein adjusting holes(33) are radially punched to adjust the circulation holes(23) inside the plate(22); Preparing a knob(32) which is exposed outside through a slide hole(24) of the generating device(10) at one side of the plate(30); and Preparing a preventing part(34) to adjust the slide hole(24) at the proper position of the knob(32).

column12: MOLD BLOCK APPARATUS FOR STICK TYPE COSMETICS
column13: The present invention relates to a mold for filling stick type cosmetics, in which a pressing surface of a container positioned at an upper portion is pressed by a top holder, and at the same time, an inlet of the container located at a lower portion is sealed by a silicon pad to fill raw materials, so that the cap for blocking the inlet of the container is unnecessary, the coupling direction of a cap must be aligned, there is no inconvenience in operation such as injection of silicone oil, no warm-up operation of the cap for bubble removal at the time of filling is not required, and generation of peeling and burr is prevented by separating the cap after filling.

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD OF TRANSFERRING THE SUBSTRATE
column13: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method of transferring a substrate are provided to sense damage to a substrate in advance by sensing the pressure of a vacuum line. CONSTITUTION: A vacuum passage is formed inside a blade. The blade comprises a center adsorption hole(31) and a plurality of side adsorption holes communicated with a respective vacuum path. The blade adsorbs the central part of the substrate by using the vacuum pressure offered to the center adsorption hole. The blade absorbs the peripheral unit of the substrate by using the vacuum pressure applied to the side adsorption holes. A vacuum line(141) is connected to the blade and supplies vacuum pressure to the vacuum path. The vacuum member is connected to the vacuum line and applies vacuum pressure to the vacuum line.

column12: MANUFACTURING JIG OF SLIDE CORE FOR MOBILE PHONE CASE
column13: PURPOSE: A processing jig of a slide core for a portable terminal case is provided to prevent a crack in the case from generating due to a stepped pulley in the case by preventing from generating the stepped pulley in an adhering unit while being mounting on an upper mold or a lower mold. CONSTITUTION: A processing jig (100) of a slide core for a portable terminal case comprises a body, a support plate (140) in a square shape, a pressing bar (160), a square block (170), a tap hole, a bolt, an inserting groove (125), a key, a count bore slot, a tap hole, a slot (163), an inclined surface (133), and a support surface (137). The bolt is connected in the tap hole through the slot. The inclined surface is formed to be inclined from both sides of inner surface of the body to a lower surface (123). The body includes the support surface which is evenly formed on an outer corner unit to be stood in a V-shape.

column12: COLD AND WARMTH FOOD CARRIED CAR
column13: The present invention relates to a carrying cart for keeping food warm or cool, comprising a body having a door and movable wheels on one side and a space formed inside for storing food trays; a setting part which controls an operating power and sets the temperature of the space for storing the food tray; a cooler which generates a cooling air based on setting values of the setting part; a heater which generates a warm air based on the setting values of the setting part; a dividing assembly which divides the food tray into a warm temperature-keeping part for maintaining the temperature which is not less than room temperature in the space for storing the food tray and a cool temperature-keeping part for maintaining the temperature which is not more than room temperature in the space for storing the food tray wherein the dividing assembly has guide protrusions with a certain height which are protruded on the upper surface of the center and extended in the lengthwise direction of the dividing assembly; and guide grooves which are formed on the lower part of the center corresponding to the guide protrusion and block a different space between the stacked dividing assemblies, thereby blocking different space between the dividing assembly, when the dividing assemblies are stacked, and maintaining the predetermined temperature of the divided part in an easy manner by blocking the different space.

column12: INTEGRATED HOSPITAL LOGISTICS MANAGEMENT SYSTEM USING AI TECHNOLOGY, AND INTEGRATED HOSPITAL LOGISTICS MANAGEMENT METHOD USING SAME
column13: An integrated hospital logistics management system and an integrated hospital logistics management method using same is provided. Artificial intelligence analyzes trends and seasonal trends by using big data and predicts actual usage by using an artificial intelligence technology, and an artificial intelligence system automatically processes reorders, replacements, etc., thereby ensuring that an appropriate safety stock level can be maintained at all times according to a stock quantity, stock state, issue quantity, etc. of hospital supplies. The integrated hospital logistics management system includes an order processing module which processes ordering and warehousing of supplies; a logistics management module which requests the order processing module to purchase or replace the supplies according to the states of the supplies; and a system control module including a machine learning unit which generates and learns rules about the operation of the supplies by using metadata.

column12: AN UNMANNED VEHICLE AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING DOCKING OF THE UNMANNED VEHICLE
column13: 도킹스테이션에 도킹하는 무인 이동체 및 무인 이동체의 도킹 제어 방법이 개시된다. 상기 방법은, 상기 무인 이동체의 제1 방향을 바라보는 카메라를 이용하여, 도킹스테이션에 위치하는 마커를 인식하는 단계; 상기 인식된 마커에 기록된 상기 마커의 위치 정보를 획득하는 단계; 상기 마커에 위치 정보에 기초하여, 상기 무인 이동체의 제2 방향을 바라보는 라이다가 상기 도킹스테이션을 바라보도록 상기 무인 이동체를 회전시키는 단계; 상기 라이다를 이용하여 상기 도킹스테이션을 식별하는 단계; 상기 도킹스테이션의 도킹 위치를 결정하는 단계; 상기 무인 이동체로부터 상기 도킹 위치까지의 거리 및 각도를 계산하는 단계; 및 상기 도킹 위치로 이동하면서, 상기 무인 이동체가 상기 도킹스테이션에 도킹될 때까지, 상기 라이다를 이용하여 상기 도킹 위치까지의 거리 및 각도를 업데이트하는 단계를 포함할 수 있다.

column12: MOBILE ROBOT DEVICE FOR MOVING TO DESTINATION AND OPERATION METHOD THEREOF
column13: 본 개시의 일 실시예는, 목적지까지 이동하는 이동 로봇 장치 및 이동 로봇 장치의 동작 방법을 개시한다. 이동 로봇 장치는 이미지를 획득하는 이미지 센서, 포인트 클라우드를 획득하는 라이다(LiDAR) 센서, 메모리 및 프로세서를 포함하고, 프로세서는 인스트럭션을 실행함으로써 이미지로부터 장애물을 인식하고, 포인트 클라우드에 포함된 장애물에 대응되는 아이디와 인식된 장애물을 비교하여, 아이디와 장애물의 매칭 여부를 판단하고, 아이디와 장애물이 매칭되는 경우 장애물을 회피하여 목적지까지 도달하기 위한 제1 회피 경로를 생성하고, 아이디와 장애물이 매칭되지 않는 경우, 장애물을 회피하여 특정 지점까지 도달하기 위한 제2 회피 경로를 생성할 수 있다.

column12: SELF BANKING KIOSK
column13: Disclosed is a self-banking kiosk that, regardless of a height of a user while not using an expensive face recognition camera, can quickly and accurately perform a face scan for identification checking of the user using a financial service without distortion. The self-banking kiosk may comprise: a kiosk main body part with a display part enabling a touch input; an up/down movement unit installed at an upper end part of the kiosk main body part; and a camera module for face recognition that photographs the face of the user and enables to scan the face after a height is adjusted by operating the up/down movement unit to fit a position of the face according to the height of the user when installed in the up/down movement unit and the user approaches the scan position.

column12: Valve assembly for vacuum gate valve
column13: The present invention relates to a valve assembly for a vacuum gate valve installed inside a valve housing in which an opening communicating with a process chamber is formed in a longitudinal direction on one side, and coupled to an upper end of a valve rod installed to be lifted and rotated in a direction of the opening wherein the valve rod is provided with a first connection part having a cylindrical shape and a second connection part having a polygonal shape in a lower part of the first connection part. The valve assembly for a vacuum gate valve comprises a valve plate and a buffer member. The valve plate is formed in a block shape and has a second coupling hole which is spaced apart from an outer circumferential surface of the second connection part in an upper direction from one central side of a bottom surface, and a first coupling hole to which the first connection part is coupled wherein the second and first coupling holes are continuously formed. In addition, the valve plate is provided with a shielding surface formed on one side thereof to shield the opening. Moreover, the buffer member is interposed between an outer circumferential surface of the second connection part and an inner circumferential surface of the second coupling hole, and has an insertion hole, into which the second connection part is inserted, on one side. According to the present invention, a coupling structure of the valve rod and valve plate is improved. Thus, as the horizontal alignment of the valve plate for shielding the opening of the valve housing is automatically performed, a shielding state of the valve plate can be maintained more reliably. In addition, the present invention has the effect of improving an installation groove structure of the valve plate in which the sealing member is installed, thereby preventing the sealing member from being easily separated from the valve plate even when used for a long period of time.

column12: ANTI-TORSION SENSOR OF A ARM UNIT IN STOCKER FOR LIQUID CRYSTAL DISPLAY
column13: An apparatus for detecting twisting of an arm unit of a stocker for a liquid crystal display is provided to prevent damage to equipment by detecting minute twisting of the arm unit for the stocker of the liquid crystal display. An apparatus for detecting twisting of an arm unit of a stocker for a liquid crystal display includes a pair of arm units(30), a scale bar(100), a position sensor(S1), an angle sensor(S2), and an output section. The pair of arm units loads and unloads the cassette to and from a shelf. The scale bar simultaneously connects arm articulations so that the arm articulations of the arm units can be slid. The position sensor is installed at the arm articulation to detect the position of the arm articulation from the center of the scale bar. The angle sensor is installed at the center of the scale bar to detect the inclination of the scale bar. The output section receives a torsion signal of the arm unit from the position sensor and the angle sensor to operate an alarm.

column12: SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE AND FABRICATING METHOD OF THE SAME
column13: Provided are a semiconductor device and a manufacturing method thereof. The semiconductor device comprises: a substrate including an active region defined by an element separation layer; an impurity region of a first conductivity type formed in the active region; a first semiconductor layer of a second conductivity type formed in the impurity region; a buried insulating layer formed on the first semiconductor layer; a second semiconductor layer formed on the buried insulating layer; and a well contact connected to the first semiconductor layer. The lowest level of the first semiconductor layer is higher than the lowest level of the element separation layer.

column12: Wire bonding defect detection device and operation method thereof
column13: The present invention relates to an apparatus and a method for detecting a bonding defect occurring between a battery cell and a bus bar connected via a wire by ultrasonic bonding, in which machine learning of a convolutional neural network is used to learn data formed by collecting ultrasonic bonding parameters over time, and then detecting a bonding defect based thereon.

column12: MULTI-DISPLAY SYSTEM AND DISPLAY APPARATUS
column32: See also references of WO 2005111775A1

column12: Fault detection device of wire bonding process and method thereof
column13: 본 발명은 배터리 셀과 버스바를 연결하기 위한 와이어 본딩 과정에서 발생하는 불량을 딥러닝 알고리즘의 일종인 합성곱신경망의 기계학습 기능을 이용하여 검출하는 장치 및 방법에 관한 발명이다.

column12: REAL-TIME HOME SHOPPING SYSTEM AND METHOD USING SEPARATE INFORMATION OF GOODS WITH HOME NETWORK SYSTEM
column13: A real-time home shopping system and a method thereof using separate product information through a home network system are provided to transmit information on a product broadcasted through home shopping to household home network terminals via each household home network server and a relay management server unit in a separate way, so that the terminals can confirm and order product information in real time. A home shopping server system(10) comprises as follows. A relay management server unit(20) is connected to each household home network server(30), receives information on separately transmitted products in real time, sends the information to household home network servers in real time, and transmits product selection and order information to the home hopping server system. The household home network servers mutually connect home network terminals(31). The household home network terminals transmit the selection and order information to the servers.

column12: Combined DVD/CD data processor
column13: A combined DVD/CD (Digital Video Disk/Compact Disk) data processor used in a DVD/CD player. The DVD/CD data processor includes a PLL (Phase Locked Loop) (52) for receiving a pulse stream input to generate a PLL clock; a frame/ID synchronization detector (54) for latching the pulse stream according to the PLL clock, to generate a symbol clock; a demodulator (56) for EFM+ demodulating the pulse stream according to the symbol clock in a DVD mode, and EFM demodulating the pulse stream according to the symbol clock in a CD mode; an ECC demodulator (62) for error-correcting input data according to a predetermined code length and error correction range, the predetermined code length and error correction range having different values in the DVD and CD modes; a memory (58) for storing the demodulated data to provide the ECC demodulator with the demodulated data stored therein; a descrambler (60) for descrambling the error corrected data stored in the memory (58), in the DVD mode; and a CD audio processor (64) for processing the error corrected data stored in the memory, in the CD mode.
column32: N. TAKAHASHII, H. SATO, H. OSAWA, H. ISOBE, I. KASUGA: "Digital Video Disk/Compact Disk (DVD/CD)-Compatible Pickup Head with Dual Lens Rotating Actuator", JPN. J. APPL. column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING SOFTWARE UPDATES
column13: A system for providing a software update includes a server in which software updates are registered, and a terminal for receiving version information of a software update from the server and performing a software update on the basis of the received version information of the software update, wherein the server includes a version information checking unit for collecting version information of software temporarily stored in the terminal or version information of software installed in the terminal and comparing the version information of the temporarily stored software or the version information of the installed software with the version information of the software update to determine whether to transmit the software update to the terminal.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR RECOVERING WASTE HEAT FROM DRAINAGE WATER DISCHARGED FROM MEMBRANE FILTER IN WATER DISPENSER
column13: PURPOSE: A method for recovering waste heat from drainage water discharged from membrane filter in water dispenser and apparatus therefor are provided to utilize waste heat as a source for heating or cooling drinking water of water dispenser. CONSTITUTION: A heat blocking plate(113) is installed between a subsidiary condensation tank(114) and a subsidiary evaporation tank(112). The subsidiary evaporation tank has a subsidiary evaporation coil(306), and the subsidiary condensation tank has a subsidiary condensation coil. A drainage pipe(A,107) is connected to the middle part of a heat exchanger(110) for drainage water, and a drainage valve(111) through which a drainage pipe(B,115) is connected is installed at the bottom part of the subsidiary evaporation tank. By using the heat exchanger for drainage water which is installed on the upper part of the subsidiary condensation tank, a compression type coolant circuit(300) recover waste heat from purified water and drainage water to heat/cool drinking water of water dispenser.

column12: How to manufacture a sink with a multi-functional dimple
column13: 다기능 보조개수대를 구비한 싱크대 제조방법에 관한 것으로, 소정의 크기로 이루어진 바닥판의 가장자리로부터 소정 높이를 갖는 측판으로 이루어져 설거지 대상물을 수납할 수 있도록 형성되는 개수대 본체, 포크, 수저, 젓가락, 나이프와 같은 비교적 작은 크기의 설거지 대상물을 수납할 수 있도록 개수대 본체의 일측 하부에 소정의 공간을 갖도록 형성되는 보조개수대,보조개수대 내면에 투입 가능하게 형성되는 보관통을 마련하여 개수대 본체의 일측에 비교적 크기가 작은 그릇, 접시, 수저, 젓가락, 나이프, 포크 등을 별도로 담아둘 수 있고, 이들 설거지 대상물을 보조개수대 또는 보관통에 담아 1차 세척을 할 수 있으며, 이들 설거지 대상물을 1차 세척 후 2차로 세척함에 따라 설거지 대상물의 세척을 보다 청결하게 함은 물론 설거지 시간을 단축할 수 있다는 효과가 얻어진다.

column12: SPEED CONTROL DEVICE FOR SINGLE PHASE AC MOTOR OF REFRIGERANT CYCLE COMPRESSOR DRIVING
column13: PURPOSE: A speed control device for a single phase ac motor of a refrigerant cycle compressor is provided to efficiently use the heat from a waste water which is generated in supplying hot and cold water to a water purifier and a vending machine. CONSTITUTION: A speed control device for a single phase ac motor of a refrigerant cycle compressor receives a first temperature signal and a second temperature signal from the tube of an evaporator. A control device compares the first temperature signal with the second temperature signal and controls the speed of a motor driving a compressor according to the state of refrigerant. The control device senses a third temperature sensor and calculates discharge pressure of the compressor to control the rotation of the motor.

column12: PHOTOCROSSLINKABLE ELECTRICALLY CONDUCTIVE POLYMERS
column13: Photocrosslinkable electrically conductive polymers and compositions including the polymers are provided. Also, electrically conductive layers or films formed from the compositions, preparation methods of these, and articles including the electrically conductive layers or films are provided. The electrically conductive polymers according to the present disclosure have photoreactive groups that can be crosslinked using like. The electrically conductive polymers can also be dissolved in aqueous solution. These photocrosslinkable and soluble properties allow the electrically conductive polymers to be used in wet processing to make films and/or to be made into a patterned conductive layer or film using a photomask.
column16: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION (2010-01-18)

column12: A METHOD FOR PROCESSING CARD INFORMATION USING MAGNETIC TRANSMISSION AN APPRATUS AND A SYSTEM THEREOF
column13: According to an embodiment of the present invention, a method for processing card information of a card information processing device includes: a step of storing a previously generated decoding key to a magnetic transmission module; a step of obtaining card information encoded by the encoding key; a step of allowing a magnetic strip reader of a payment terminal to generate magnetic signal information capable of being read remotely from the decoded card information; and a step of generating a magnetic field signal capable of being read from the payment terminal by using the magnetic signal information.

column12: The Laser Irradiating Apparatus consisting of Beam Rearrangement Part which control the Irradiation Area of the light
column13: 본 발명은 레이저 빔을 조사하는 빔 조사부; 및 상기 레이저 빔 중 적어도 일부의 이동경로를 조절하여 상기 레이저 빔의 조사 영역을 재배치하는 빔 재배치부를 포함하고, 상기 빔 재배치부는 제1 렌즈 어레이 및 상기 제1 렌즈 어레이와 중첩되는 제2 렌즈 어레이를 포함하고, 상기 레이저 빔은 상기 빔 재배치부 상면의 제1 영역으로 입사한 후 상기 빔 재배치부를 통과하면서 굴절되어 상기 빔 재배치부 아래에 위치한 대상 부재의 제2 영역에 조사되는 레이저 조사 장치를 제공한다.

column12: 3 ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND METHOD FOR PROCESSING SCANNED IMAGE OF THREE DIMENSIONAL SCANNER
column13: 본 개시의 전자 장치는 대상체의 구강을 스캔하는 3차원 스캐너의 제1 스캔에 의해, 제1 스캔 데이터를 획득하고, 대상체의 구강을 본뜬 인상 모델을 스캔하는 3차원 스캐너의 제2 스캔에 의해, 제2 스캔 데이터를 획득하고, 제1 스캔 데이터 및 제2 스캔 데이터 중 하나를 반전시키고, 제1 스캔 데이터 및 제2 스캔 데이터 중, 반전된 스캔 데이터와 반전되지 않은 스캔 데이터 사이에 중첩되는 영역이 존재하는지 여부를 판단하고, 상기 중첩되는 영역이 존재하는 경우, 상기 중첩되는 영역에 기초하여 반전된 스캔 데이터와 반전되지 않은 스캔 데이터를 얼라인함으로써, 대상체의 구강에 대한 3차원 이미지 모델을 생성하도록 구성될 수 있다.

column12: REAR COMBINATION LAMP ASSEMBLY
column13: 본 발명은 리어 콤비네이션 램프 어셈블리의 재생 방법에 관한 것으로서, 더욱 상세하게는 서로 다른 재질의 종(Sub) 부품으로 구성된 폴리프로필렌계(PP)계 리어 콤비네이션 램프 어셈블리를 분쇄하고 이들 분쇄물을 분리용액 중에서 최소한 일 회 재질별로 분리회수한 후 건조하고, 압출기를 사용하여 압출 재생함으로써 폐기물 처리비용을 절감하고 생산공정 또는 조립공정 중 발생하는 불량품의 재활용에 유용하게 이용될 수 있는 리어 콤비네이션 램프 어셈블리의 재생 방법에 관한 것이다.

column12: Socket connector
column13: The utility model provides a socket connector, include: a plurality of contactors carry out the electricity connection with plug connector and base plate, insulation portion, the contactor set up in insulation portion, the shroud, insulation portion set up in the shroud, and shielding portion, with the shroud combines together, the shroud is including supplying plug connector male insertion groove, insulation portion is with its preceding being located the mode of insertion groove set up in the shroud, shielding portion is in order to shelter from the back mode of insulation portion with the shroud combines together.

column12: Fluororesin tube with high thermal conductivity and low gas permeability
column13: The present invention relates to a fluororesin tube used in a heat exchanger requiring corrosion resistance and contamination resistance, and more specifically relates to a fluororesin tube of a single layer or a dual layer exhibiting low gas permeability and high thermal conductivity by adding a filler to a fluororesin.

column12: MEDIA INFORMATION SENDING SYSTEM OF DISPLAY UNIT
column13: A system for transmitting image information of a display unit according to the present invention comprises an image data server for storing image data provided for a display unit; a content related data server for storing content related data including osphresis information and tactus information, etc. corresponding to the image data; a synchronization server for synchronizing the content related data with the image data; and a communications unit for transmitting the image data synchronized by the synchronization server to the display unit , wherein the content related data goes through a blind process and is inputted in the edge of an image displayed in the display unit.

column12: ELECTRICALLY CONDUCTIVE POLYMERS WITH ENHANCED CONDUCTIVITY
column13: PURPOSE: An electrically conductive polymer bonded to conductive nanoparticles is provided to enhance conductivity and to enable the production of an electrically conductive layer or film for use in electronic devices. CONSTITUTION: A polymer comprises: a conductive polymer having one or more conductive monomers; and a conductive nanoparticle linked to the polymer. The conductive nanoparticle is linked to the one or more conductive monomers. The one or more conductive monomers includes a 3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene. The polymer comprises one or more conductive monomers having a structure of formula 2.

column12: Circuit design verification platform based on artificial intelligence
column13: 본 발명은 인공지능 기반의 회로 설계 검증 플랫폼을 제공하는 것을 목적으로 하는 것으로, 본 발명의 구성은 소자 적합성 검증부(120); 회로 적합성 검증부(130); 지식 엔진부(140); 상기 소자 적합성 검증부(120)와 상기 회로 적합성 검증부(130) 및 상기 지식 엔진부(140)와 연계된 파싱부(150); 상기 파싱부(150)에 입력되는 입력 파일(160); 상기 소자 적합성 검증부(120)와 상기 회로 적합성 검증부(130) 및 상기 지식 엔진부(140)를 통해 출력되는 출력 파일(170); 상기 소자 적합성 검증부(120)와 상기 회로 적합성 검증부(130) 및 상기 지식 엔진부(140)에 의해 생성된 소자 데이터 베이스 테이블(180)과 회로 데이터 베이스 테이블(190)과 지식 베이스(200);를 포함하는 것을 특징으로 한다. 본 발명의 인공지능 기반의 회로 설계 검증 플랫폼은 제품 디자인의 설계와 수정이 간편하고 쉬워서 컴퓨터를 이용한 설계 작업의 효율화를 가져오고, 제4차 산업혁명은 모든 사람·사물, 서비스의 데이터가 네트워크를 기반으로 연결(초연결)되며 축적되는 데이터의 분석 활용(초지능)을 통해 혁신적인 융합서비스와 부가가치가 창출되고 이는 미래 산업 및 국가 경쟁력을 높일 수 있고, 지능화 처리를 위해 생성된 대용량 데이터는 네트워크 통해 실시간으로 전달(IoT, Mobile)되며 수집된 데이터를 저장 분석(Cloud, Big Data)해 새로운 산업과 가치를 창출하는 등의 여러 가지 효과가 있다.

column12: Breathing-friendly functional mask
column13: The present invention relates to a functional mask for easy breathing. The mask is made of double raschel knitted fabric, and comprises fine networks on the inside and outside composed of one 30 denier monofilament yarn and a support network composed of DTY 150 denier/48 monofilament yarn between the inside and outside of the fine network. A detachable means is provided inside the mask formed as described above so that a filter pad can be attached and detached to be used as needed. According to the mask of the present invention, since the mask is light, the mask does not interfere with activities when is worn, breathing is comfortable, and fogging can be prevented even when a user wears glasses. In addition, since the mask is composed of three layers, harmful substances such as dust and droplets are refracted and filtered several times. In particular, since the filter pad can be additionally used depending on the surrounding environment, it is possible to not only block ultra-fine dust but also greatly improve economy and convenience.

column12: STRUCTURE FOR RADIO FREQUENCY MODULE BASED TO MOBILE COMMUNICATION
column13: The radio frequency (RF) part of a mobile communication terminal is separately modularized so that an RF multi-chip module (RF MCM) can easily support communication services even in locations where different frequencies are used, by replacing the RF module which is designed to correspond to the appropriate frequency for that location. The RF MCM includes a ceramic laminated board; a plurality of RF components mounted on the ceramic laminated board; and a cap for isolating the RF components from the exterior envionment.

column12: THE MASK HAVING EAR LOOP THAT ADJUST LENGTH
column13: The present invention relates to a mask, and more particularly, to a face mask having a length-adjustable ear hook portion, in which the face mask includes: a face portion for preventing cold air, fine contaminants, or external air from entering a respirator; and the ear hook portion for closely attaching and fixing the face portion to the face of a wearer, wherein the length of the ear hook portion is adjusted or a predetermined length is fixed according to the wearer so as to closely attach the face portion of the wearer to the face portion of the mask, thereby minimizing inflow of cold air or contaminants.

column12: METHOD FOR APPLYING DYNAMIC SCORE TO RESULT OF SEARCH AND SYSTEM FOR EXECUTING THE METHOD
column13: A method for applying a dynamic score to a search result and a system for executing the method are provided to offer a high-quality search result to a user who uses a user terminal. A method for applying a dynamic score to a search result includes the steps of: grasping a result score of the search result for a search word input from a user terminal and a length of the search word(S201); checking a primary importance weight for an engine similarity supplied from a search engine(S202); and adjusting a ratio between a secondary importance weight and the primary importance weight for the result score according to the length of the search word(S203). The similarity of the search result is calculated on the basis of the engine similarity applied from the search engine and the result score for the search result. As the length of the search word received from the user terminal increases, a search result having a high degree of match between a content of the search result and the search word becomes more important. As the length of the search word decreases, a search result having a high result score becomes more important.

column12: METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING UNDERWEAR
column13: The present invention relates to a method for manufacturing an underwear capable of connecting fabrics while minimizing needlework. The method for manufacturing underwear according to the present invention comprises: a cutting process for cutting members into predetermined sizes to make fabrics composed of synthetic fibers correspond to the shape of underwear to be manufactured; a seaming process for folding the fabrics by a predetermined width along the connection parts of the fabrics to connect the cut fabrics; an attaching process for temporarily fixing the fabrics after overlapping the seamed parts of each material; a heating process for making the facing surface of each material semi-melted by generating momentary heat at the connection parts of the seamed fabrics; and a fusing and cutting process for cutting seamed parts while fusing and connecting the fabrics by transferring the semi-melted fabrics while pressurizing the fabrics. [Reference numerals] (S1) Cutting; (S2) Seaming; (S3) Attaching; (S4) Fusing and cutting; (S5) Attaching a reinforcing material

column12: ROD GUIDE FOR A SHOCK ABSORBER HAVING GROOVES
column13: PURPOSE: A rod guide with a groove for a shock absorber is provided to a prevent piston valve of the end of a piston road from colliding with the rod guide of the upper end of a shock absorber by diversifying created damping force. CONSTITUTION: A rod guide(20) with a groove for a shock absorber comprises an inner circumference surface and an orifice. The orifice is concavely formed on the inner circumference surface. The orifice is composed of one or more grooves(20a) formed along the longitudinal direction of the rod guide. The length of each groove is different. A concave part is formed on the inner circumference surface of the rod guide to change the damping force.

column12: SUBSTRATE TREATING APPARATUS AND METHOD
column13: 예시적인 실시예들에 따르면 기판 처리 장치가 제공된다. 상기 기판 처리 장치는, 기판을 처리하기 위한 처리 공간을 가지는 챔버; 상기 챔버에 연결되고, 상기 기판의 상면으로 초임계 유체를 공급하는 유체 공급 장치를 포함하고, 상기 유체 공급 장치는, 초임계 유체 저장부와 상기 챔버를 연결하며, 상기 초임계 유체가 흐르는 유체 공급 배관; 상기 유체 공급 배관의 하류에 배치되고, 상기 초임계 유체에 포함된 파티클을 여과하는 필터; 및 상기 필터보다 상류에서 상기 유체 공급 배관에 배치되는 소음기를 포함하고, 상기 소음기는 상기 초임계 유체의 압력을 감소시킬 수 있다.

column12: METHOD FOR FORMING A METAL COATING
column13: 본 발명은 금속표면처리 및 피막형성방법에 관한 것으로서, 피도물 표면의 이물질을 제거하는 전처리단계, 피도물 표면의 스케일층에 물리적 자극을 주는 예비처리단계, 단계별로 진행하는 산세단계를 포함하여 저농도의 산세용액을 사용함에도 단시간에 정밀한 산세가 가능하고, 과잉산세를 방지할 수 있는 특징이 있다.

column12: MINI-BAR FOR LODGING FACILITY TO CHECK USE IN REMOTE PLACE
column13: PURPOSE: A mini-bar for a lodging facility to check use in a remote place is provided to prevent inconvenience that a visitor waits at a counter during confirmation and minimize management manpower by easily checking the use of the goods in the mini-bar, as a goods limited supplying device is installed to the mini-bar. CONSTITUTION: A goods storing/supplying part stores the goods and supplies the goods by manipulation of a user. A controller(1) controls goods supply by the goods storing/supplying part based on the user's manipulation, and transmits a use signal of a cold-storage goods and a room temperature-storage goods to a counter terminal(2).

column12: A LEVEL
ORGANIC LIGHT EMITTING DISPLAY APPARATUS
column13: 본 발명의 일 실시예에 따라, 청색 발광 소자의 청색 발광층에 포함된 호스트의 정공 이동도 및 전자 이동도를 조절하여, 청색 발광 소자의 저 계조에서의 발광 효율이 고온 동작 전 대비 고온 동작 후에 증가하도록 구성할 수 있다. 이에 따라, 유기 발광 표시 장치의 고온 동작에서의 백색 광에 대한 저 계조에서의 색 품질이 향상될 수 있다.

column12: HINGE ASSEMBLY FOR HOME BAR OF REFRIGERATOR AND REFRIGERATOR USING THE SAME
column13: A hinge assembly for a homebar door of a refrigerator and a refrigerator having the same are provided to prevent the abrupt opening of the homebar door and damage to a hinge by damping the rapid rotation or shock of the homebar door by an oil damper. A hinge shaft(16) is extended from a homebar door(15). An oil damper(100) has a housing(110) fixed to a refrigerator door, a rotation shaft fitted into the housing for forming a sealed space to be filled with oil and having a blade connected to the hinge shaft and moving in the oil for damping the rotation force of the hinge shaft, a through-hole formed in the rotation shaft to communicate the sealed space to the outside, and a fixing element inserted into the through-hole for sealing the through-hole.

column12: RF module structure of a mobile communication terminal
column13: The radio frequency (RF) part of a mobile communication terminal is separately modularized so that an RF multi-chip module (RF MCM) can easily support communication services even in locations where different frequencies are used, by replacing the RF module which is designed to correspond to the appropriate frequency for that location. The RF MCM includes a ceramic laminated board; a plurality of RF components mounted on the ceramic laminated board; and a cap for isolating the RF components from the exterior envionment.

column12: Water-soluble electrically conductive polymers
column13: Water-soluble electrically conductive polymers and a composition comprising such polymers are provided. Also, an electrically conductive layer or film formed from the composition, and articles comprising the electrically conductive layer or film are provided. The electrically conductive polymers according to the present disclosure have one or more hydrophilic side chains. Hydrophilic side chains are covalently bonded to the conductive polymers, which allow the polymer to be stable at high temperature. Thus, the stability of electrical conductivity is prolonged. Depending on the concentration of hydrophilic side chains, the conductivity may be changed. The hydrophilic side chains provide a successful way to fabricate a ductile film exhibiting tunable conductivity. Furthermore, high levels of surface-resistance uniformity can be achieved in the field of coating technology that uses eco-friendly water-based solvents to uniformly and quickly coat the conductive polymer on to plastic film surfaces.

column12: Ellipsoidal Rolling Moving Apparatus
column13: The present invention relates to an ellipsoidal rolling movement apparatus capable of enabling a smooth rolling movement due to an ellipsoidal exterior shape as well as freely implementing various motions such as direction switching, rotation-in-place, jumping and the like. The ellipsoidal rolling movement apparatus includes: an outer ellipsoid forming a hollow ellipsoidal shape; an inner sphere provided to be rotatable in a random direction in the outer ellipsoid, having a diameter equal to or smaller than a minor axis diameter of an inner circumference surface of the outer ellipsoid, and forming a hollow spherical shape; and a rotation driving part provided in the inner sphere, and rotating a rotation force rotating the inner sphere in the random direction to transmit the force to the inner sphere. The outer ellipsoid can be rolled and moved in accordance with a change in the center of gravity due to the rotation of the inner sphere and angular momentum.

column12: UNMANNED DELIVERY SYSTEM WHICH USES THE LOBBY PHONE
column13: An unmanned delivery system using a lobby phone in an apartment complex is provided to enable a householder to check delivery information promptly through the lobby phone by linking the lobby phone with an unmanned delivery device, and add a delivery charge automatically to a management charge of each house when the householder receives an article through the unmanned delivery device. An unmanned delivery device(200) receives an article delivered to each house by each house, and transmits delivery/payment information to a lobby phone(100) or an apartment complex server(400) when the delivery/payment information is received. The lobby phone stores the received delivery/payment information, authenticates a householder by receiving a password, an entry card, or biometric information from each householder, informs the authenticated householder of the delivery/payment information, and receives/transmits a payment signal corresponding to article reception to the apartment complex server. The apartment complex server stores the received delivery/payment information, and settles a payment price by adding the payment price to a management charge of each house when the payment signal is received from the lobby phone. A wall pad(500) generates a payment signal to the apartment complex sever so that the apartment complex sever may calculate the management expense to which the delivery fee is included.

column12: Combined DVD/CD data processor
column13: A combined DVD/CD (Digital Video Disk/Compact Disk) data processor used in a DVD/CD player. The DVD/CD data processor includes a PLL (Phase Locked Loop) (52) for receiving a pulse stream input to generate a PLL clock; a frame/ID synchronization detector (54) for latching the pulse stream according to the PLL clock, to generate a symbol clock; a demodulator (56) for EFM+ demodulating the pulse stream according to the symbol clock in a DVD mode, and EFM demodulating the pulse stream according to the symbol clock in a CD mode; an ECC demodulator (62) for error-correcting input data according to a predetermined code length and error correction range, the predetermined code length and error correction range having different values in the DVD and CD modes; a memory (58) for storing the demodulated data to provide the ECC demodulator with the demodulated data stored therein; a descrambler (60) for descrambling the error corrected data stored in the memory (58), in the DVD mode; and a CD audio processor (64) for processing the error corrected data stored in the memory, in the CD mode.

column12: Locking device of the bidet water pipe
column13: The present invention relates to a locking device of a bidet water pipe. According to the present invention, a connection member is firmly fixated to a holder formed on a supply pipe for a heat water tank or a supply pipe for an angle valve, and a supply pipe for the water tank and the angle valve. A slip prevention member prevents the connection member from being separated from the holder, and a movement prevention protuberance is locked into a movement prevention groove depending to a rotation of the slip prevention member, thereby preventing a movement of the connection member. While maintaining a state of the connection member coupled with the holder, leakage can be prevented, thereby improving the reliability of a product.

column12: ARRAY FEEDING APPARATUS OF MEDICAL EXAMIMATION STICK
column13: PURPOSE: An apparatus for aligning and transferring medical examination sticks is provided to improve productivity by preventing medical examination sticks from being not separated from a second adsorbing pad by static electricity. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for aligning and transferring medical examination sticks comprises a discharge part(10), a first pickup device(20), a stick aligning table(30), a second pickup device(40), and a transferring conveyor(50). The discharge part has a vacuum hole. The first pickup device is installed in the upper part of a path in which a discharge moving table is forwardly moved, and comprises multiple first adsorbing pads to adsorb and transfer medical examination sticks. The stick aligning table is installed in the front of the first pickup device and is arranged in both sides of a rotary table by which the transferred medical examination sticks can be aligned and clamped to be rotatably transferred at 180 degree. The second pickup device comprises multiple second adsorbing pads to laminate the medical examination sticks of the stick aligning table to an adsorbing and loading box in multiple stages. [Reference numerals] (AA) Heading direction

column12: TELEPHONE WAITING MUSIC SELECTING METHOD AND THEREOF
column13: 본 발명은 전화기에 관한 것으로 국선 전환시 송출되는 보류음악을 사람들이 선호하는 음악 또는 자연 음으로 자유롭게 선택녹음하여 송출하도록 한 것이다. 본 발명은 보류음악의 자유로운 선택녹음, 송출로 인하여 사람들에 세 친근감을 제공하며 통신이 빈번한 사무실에서 다양한 보류음악의 서어비스 제공으로 활에 쾌적함을 제공한다.

column12: Mask case
column13: The present invention relates to a mask case. As a case for which at least one or more opening parts are formed, the mask case allows to separately store or withdraw an ear hook string and a mask pad of the mask for which has reduced a volume, in the case, through the opening part, or allows a volume of the mask pad of the mask to be reduced through the opening part to be stored or withdrawn into the case, thereby enabling to be easily stored when the mask is not in use and having an effect for which the mask can be stored hygienically and safely.

column12: ORGANIC LIGHT EMITTING DIODE DISPLAY AND MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF
column13: According to the present invention, an organic light emitting diode display device includes an anode electrode, a bank layer, an organic compound layer, and a cathode electrode. The anode electrode is located on a base substrate. The bank layer is located on the anode electrode and dividing a light emitting area. The organic compound layer includes at least one from a hole injection layer and a hole transmission layer. The cathode electrode is located on the organic compound layer. At least one from the hole injection layer and the hole transmission layer is formed thicker in the upper portion of the light emitting area than the upper portion of a bank area.

column12: Switching unit for magnetic tape recorder providing double function - of sensor and tape cassette ejector in which index wheel has signal tracks and cam track for ejector operation.
column13: The magnetic tape recording and playback system has a switching unit that combines the double function of being a sensor and a cassette ejector function. The unit has a sensor wheel (20) that is mounted (40) onto a circuit plate (10) that has tracks (10a) for functions and these terminate in leads (12). Also mounted on the circuit plate is an ejector lever (30) element. The ejector element has a follower pin (31) that engages with cam slots formed in the surface of the wheel. Rotation of the wheel causes the ejector arm to be displaced. At the same time signals are generated via the tracks. USE/ADVANTAGE - Simple means of combining functions.

column12: THE AUTOMATIC RICE CAKE MANUFACTURE MACHINE OF MULTISTAGE
LAMINATING DEVICE
column13: A laminating device comprises: a chamber unit including a first chamber portion in which an object is disposed and a second chamber portion disposed to face the first chamber portion and in which an attachment member facing the object is disposed; an expansion member disposed in the second chamber portion and expanded by an external force to transfer the attachment member spaced apart from the object to a surface of the object; and an expansion unit for expanding the expansion member.

column12: FABRICATING METHOD FOR KEY PAD OF PORTABLE TERMINAL
INTEGRAL SPOON LURE FOR LURE FISHING
column13: Provided by the present invention is an integrated spoon lure in which an elastically operable needle is integrally coupled to a spoon lure main body. The present invention minimizes a possibility that a target species is able to visually recognize a needle by minimizing the overall length at which the needle is combined with the spoon lure main body so that the target fish species is able to bite the spoon lure main body and the needle together or swallow the bitten object immediately without feeling of irritation upon biting the fish. To this end, the integrated spoon lure has the elastically operable needle combined with the spoon lure main body in a united body. Accordingly, the present invention is able to: increase a hooking probability by making a target species bite the spoon lure main body and the needle together or inducing a natural operation in which the target species immediately swallows the object upon biting the same; improve the efficiency of lure fishing; and minimize the phenomenon of underwater jamming which may occur when moving a fishing rod while waiting for a target species after dropping a spoon lure under the water.

column12: Prefabricated helmet for leisure sports
column13: 본 발명은 레저스포츠용 조립식 헬멧에 관한 것으로 보다 상세하게는 각각 이 분리된 블럭형태로 서로 끼움에 의해 결합되어 이루어져 다양한 형상으로 변경이 가능하고, 조립 및 해체가 용이하여 보관 및 운송이 이용한 레저스포츠용 조립식 헬멧은 곡면형태로 이룬 프레임으로 내주면에는 충격을 완충할 수 있도록 완충폼이 구비되며 양측측면에는 외부로 돌출된 결속돌기가 형성되고 상부에는 결합홈부가 형성된 제 1 둘레블럭부과 곡면형태로 이룬 프레임으로 내주면에는 충격을 완충할 수 있도록 완충폼이 구비되며 양측면에는 상기 제 1 둘레블럭부의 결속돌기가 끼워결합될 수 있도록 결속홈부가 형성되며 상부에는 결합홈부가 형성된 제 2 둘레블럭부과 곡면형태로 이룬 프레임으로 내주면에는 충격을 완충할 수 있도록 완충폼이 구비되며 양측측면에는 상기 제 1,2 둘레블럭의 상부에 형성된 결합홈부에 끼워결합될 수 있도록 외부로 돌출된 결속돌기가 형성된 상부블럭부를 포함하여 이루어진 구조이다.

column12: THE MANUFACTURING MATHOD FOR A FOCUSING RING
column13: The present invention relates to a method of manufacturing a focusing ring, comprising: a first fixing step of arranging a substrate defined by an upper surface, a lower surface, and a side surface, and arranging the substrate in a state in which the upper surface of the substrate is parallel to a first plane; a first processing step of processing the substrate into a ring shape; a second fixing step of arranging the substrate in a state in which the upper surface of the substrate is parallel to a second plane perpendicular to the first plane; and a second processing step of cutting between the upper and lower surfaces of the substrate, thereby capable of manufacturing the focusing ring by precisely and easily processing the substrate, which is a difficult-to-cut material.

column12: EXCHANGE RATE DISPLAY SYSTEM
MULTI-DISPLAY SYSTEM AND DISPLAY APPARATUS
column13: A multi-display system includes a plurality of display apparatuses capable of mutual data communication, and at least one of the plurality of display apparatuses receives predetermined control information from a user and transmits the control information to another display apparatus. The display apparatus can be remotely controlled without a central computer.
column32: See also references of EP 1747507A4

column12: RF module structure of a mobile communication terminal
column13: An apparatus is disclosed for a module structure of a mobile communication terminal. The module structure comprises a radio frequency portion for processing communicated radio frequency signals, and a base-band portion commonly used by the radio frequency portion for providing modular replacement of a radio frequency multi-chip module connected to the radio frequency portion. The radio frequency multi-chip module is selected in accordance with a corresponding frequency band of the mobile communication terminal.

column12: NOTICE STAND FOR GUIDE OF SIGHTS
A PROCESS FOR DYEING MICROFIBERS
FLAG POLE APPARATUS MOUNTABLE TO BUS
column13: According to the present invention, a flag pole apparatus capable of being mounted on a bus comprises: a side mirror holder wherein a side mirror of a bus is mounted; a flag pole holder fixated to the side mirror holder; and a flag pole fixated to the flag pole holder for various flags to be installed thereon. Regardless of wind, as flags are always unfolded, in case of installing a national flag, the general public is inspired about meaning of a national holiday. Moreover, in case of mounting a flag for advertisement, an advertising effect can be increased.
